name: HARLEY
description: Harley is not sure how he wound up at shelter in his senior years but as you see from the pictures the shelter asked if we could find a real home for this active senior boy. You would never know he is 9 years old. Very playful and loves humans and all the dogs he has met at adoptions he seems to like. He is 59 lbs so still pretty strong for a senior but loves walks and you have to love his ears. If you would like to meet this happy go lucky boy please contact AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com. Updated pictures this Sunday.

name: BIGGIE
description: 6 year old Biggie has lost his home and really wants a home of his own. We are getting more information about him, does well with other dogs if introduced properly. We know he is a big cuddle bunny but more info and pictures will be up Sunday. If you want to meet Biggie please contact AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com

name: Ziggy
description:
Approx 2 years old.
 Did I catch your eye? I don't blame you if you had to stop and stare, I am quite cute if I do say so myself.  I'm Ziggy and I think you look like a wonderful choice for my forever friend! I don't give my heart away at the drop of a hat, but if you will give me some time and space to settle in and adjust to my new life, we can be buddies. Once I'm comfortable, I love to go on walks, play, and spend time curled up with my best friends. 
Ziggy is shy  until he knows you and feels safe. He was found as a stray so we have no history on him. He is learning to trust, loves being petted and having belly rubs. He will follow you around the yard. He knows sit and is learning to walk on a leash. He is unsure about what toys are for but shows interest in them.
Beautiful colors in his brindle coat. 


Adoption fee $60 (cash or check) includes neuter, rabies and DHPPC vaccination

name: Theo
description: Theo is a friendly dachshund mix who gets along well with other dogs in his size range. This cute boy is on the submissive side and will thrive in a home with lots of love to grow his confidence. He is approximately 8 lbs and 1 year old. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Oliver
description:
Oliver was born around mid-June and came to us recently after living most of his life left in a backyard. He is loving getting all of the love and attention that he can in his foster home, discovering fun toys and just how comfy the couch is! We are guessing him to be primarily Boxer/Beagle and around 50 lbs when fully grown. 

Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Macadamia
description: Macadamia was born around July 8th and donât let her serious face fool you, this girl is all puppy mischief and fun! She is expected to be approximately 12 lbs when fully grown. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Dodger
description: Dodger is a handsome, smart Heeler mix who was born on May 26th. He has a lot of energy and needs an active home. He weighs 22 lbs currently and is estimated to be around 50 lbs when fully grown. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Huckleberry
description: Huckleberry is a friendly girl who was born May 26th. She is full of energy and will be best suited to a home with the time and patience for a puppy. She weighs 22 lbs currently  and is expected to be around 50 lbs when fully grown.Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Fagin
description: Fagin was born on May 26th and is a smart, inquisitive boy who will excel in a home with the time and training for a puppy. He weighs 22 lbs and is expected to be approximately 50 lbs when fully grown. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Speckles
description: Speckles is a 4 month old Heeler/Hound mix who is a gentle girl and enjoys lots of cuddles from her foster mom. She is expected to be around 40 lbs when fully grown. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Cashew
description: Cashew is sweet girl who was born around July 8th. With her long legs, she should grow into a graceful dog but right now sheâs all clumsy puppy! She loves to cuddle almost as much as she likes to play. She weighs 3 lbs currently and is expected to be approximately 12 lbs when fully grown. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Dash
description: Born May 26th, Dash is a handsome, spirited boy who will excel in an active home! He weighs 22 lbs currently and is expected to be approximately 50 lbs when fully grown. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Sydney
description: Meet Sydney- Sheâs a 5 year old Border Collie mix and is a high energy girl. Sheâs a super lover when she gets to know you. She was brought back for being not friendly to the male in the home but hasnât shown any kind of adverse reactions to men in public or at our facility. She is however less than friendly to other dogs now, which is a new issue we are going to have to work on. She lived with me a few years back and with my littles and my big with no issue. Sydney is spayed, chipped, and up to date on vaccines.  For more info please contact Desirea at 702-525-0518

name: Kimberly aka Freckles
description: Hello my name is Kimberly âFrecklesâ! I was born on April 22, 2019. Iâm a very energetic pup with a feisty personality. Iâm the smallest of the litter but still love to wrestle and play with my three siblings! We have been trained to use a doggie door. Iâm still learning my commands so please be patient with me. I am a very smart girl and can't wait to meet my forever family!  For more info or to meet me please fill out an adoption interest form on our website at www.ahome4spot.com and then contact Desirea at 702-525-0518 or text Diana at 702-239-7986.

name: Tina
description: Hello my name is Tina! I was born on April 22, 2019. I am a happy pup but a little shy.  I love to play all day with my three siblings! We have been trained to use a doggie door. Iâm still learning my commands so please be patient with me. I am an absolute love and sweet girl.  I can't wait to find my forever family!  For more info or to meet me please fill out an adoption interest form on our website at www.ahome4spot.com and then text Diana at 702-239-7986

name: Max
description:
Max came to our rescue from a young man who had been his friend his whole life. But, he couldn't take care of Max any longer. Max is blind, but that doesn't stop him. He loves to wonder around and we've been amazed quickly he figures out new surroundings. At 16 yrs young, it's not surprising that Max likes to sleep quite a bit. He also loves to snuggle. Max has had a dental and his kisses are as fresh as can be.

For interest in this sweet senior please email info@havlv.com

name: Flower
description: Hi! My name is Flower.  I am a 5 year old female long hair chihuahua mix and weigh 8lbs.  I am a little scared right now as I was left at the shelter and then taken into rescue, so my world is a little flipped upside down.  However, I know that I am going to be just fine and I will find a loving forever home soon!  I am a little shy and intimidated with other dogs right now but I am learning that they are ok from my foster mom.  She is showing me what love is and that I can trust again.  I am a very sweet little girl and with time and patience I promise to the best dog ever if you adopt me.  I am spayed, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines,  For more info or to meet me please contact Diana 702 239 7986

name: Sparky
description: Hi my name is Sparky and I am just that...full of life and feisty as can be.  I am a long hair chihuahua, 12 years young, and weigh 6.7lbs.  I am looking for a loving forever home to adopt me with my best friend, Zoey. I am very energetic and don't let my age fool you.  I love to talk and play and get along great with other small dogs.  Zoey and I promise to love you forever if you adopt us.  I am spayed, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines.  To meet me please contact  at  Diana at 702-239-7986. the pair will stay together.

name: Zoey
description: Hi my name is Zoey and I am a sweet senior girl looking for love.  I am a long hair chihuahua, 12 years young and weigh 4.5lbs.  I am very calm and love to be held.  I am looking for a loving forever home with my best friend Sparky. We are two spunky girls and truly believe age is just a number.  If you are looking for loving companion, nap buddy, or shadow I am your girl.  I can be a little shy at first but once I get to know you I attach very quickly.  I still have a lot of love to give and please don't let my age stop you from meeting me.  I like other small dogs and am well mannered.  To meet me and make us a part of your forever home please text 702-239-7986 the dog on the second row is the boned sister we will not split them up..

name: Cabby
description: Cabby is the sweetest mature gentleman. At 11 years young, he has found himself available to make a new family very happy. He just received a dental and is in incredibly great shape for his age. He loves to ride in the car, take trips to the park, or just hang out and watch TV. Cabby is neutered, up to date on vaccines, and has a microchip. For interest, please email info@havlv.com

name: Butch
description:
Butch is a big lover! The family that surrendered him to the shelter said he was 10 yrs old, but we and our vet think he is younger. Hearts Alive Rescue has him now and we think he is very very special! He lived with other big dogs, cats, and children from babies to teenagers before. His old family filled out a paper and they describe him as smart and enthusiastic. He knows his basic commands: sit, stay, down, and come and he always let them know when he had to go potty outside. His previous family say he hides during storms and fireworks but loves his people so much and is very sweet and loyal. Butch caught a bad cold at the shelter and is being treated, but feeling so much better already. He is neutered, up to date on vaccines, and has a microchip.

Butch is ready to start his next chapter with his new family. Is it you!!?? please email info@havlv.com for interest

name: Bella
description:
Bella is a 1 year old Lab/Doxie mix weighing 38 pounds. She is all puppy and will need another dog or an active family. (please no children under 10). She was surrendered due to a change in the living situation.

Adoption fee $225.00

If interested, please complete an application at:

https://forecloseduponpets.org/dog-adoption-application/

name: MINNIE
description: Minnie found herself in the shelter and very loved by all workers who think she deserves a wonderful home of her own. This 7 year old, 55 lbs girl loves to play with other dogs and most of all loves humans. We will have good pictures of her soon and if you would like to meet a playful senior please contact AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com

name: SUGAR
description: Not sure how little Sugar ended up at shelter but this sweet little girl is 4 years old and weighs 9 lbs. More photos to be up soon but she is working on her potty training and will be getting groomed when her stitches are removed from her spay. Contact AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com if you would like to meet Sugar.

name: SCOOTER
description:
ALL ANIMALS are placed on a legal stray hold per Bullhead City Ordinances for the to owner reclaim. If the animals are not claimed they will be placed up for adoption based on the available date provided.

* All animals MUST be spay/neutered before leaving the shelter *

Adoption Fee is $100

I'm available for adoption on 09/09/2019

Adoption fees cover vet exam, spay/neuter surgery, rabies vaccine, first core vaccine (DA2PP or FRCP), and if you reside in Bullhead City your first 1 year license is on us!

My name is Scooter, My mom was in the hospital but no one ever came in for me. I am cute, but I growl at people when they come to visit me because I am scared. I love the staff here when I see them I wag my tail and whine to come out and play. I just need someone to spend time with me, get to know me I will warm up I promise. 

I do ask that I live in a home that does not have children they are a little to wild for me and freaks me out.

name: SLOTH
description:
ALL ANIMALS are placed on a legal stray hold per Bullhead City Ordinances for the to owner reclaim. If the animals are not claimed they will be placed up for adoption based on the available date provided.

* All animals MUST be spay/neutered before leaving the shelter *

Adoption Fee is $100

I'm available for adoption on 09/19/2019

Adoption fees cover vet exam, spay/neuter surgery, rabies vaccine, first core vaccine (DA2PP or FRCP), and if you reside in Bullhead City your first 1 year license is on us!

I was brought in as a stray and no one came into to claim me and now I am available for adoption. I have two different colors eyes just like David Bowie.

name: Bear
description:
I'm a rambunctious, happy puppy! I still bark at things I don't understand but I'm willing to learn and I love rides in the car! I will need a lot of continued training but I'm a smart boy!If you would like to contribute to the care and well being of our animals please visit
Nevadaspca.org

name: Mochi
description:
Hi I'm Mochi! 
Even though I'm a senior I love to play and I LOVE the water (I love to sit in my water bowl)! I'm super friendly but I also think I'm a tough guy so I would be best with other dogs my size.If you would like to contribute to the care and well being of our animals please visit
Nevadaspca.org

name: Goldie's Gus
description:
Goldie's Gus is about 8 1/2 weeks old weighing about 2 lbs.   They have been socialized in a foster home with dogs of all sizes.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Goldie's Gus, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Goldie's Gus is spayed/neutered, has current vaccinations and includes a microchip, deworming and 2 free vet visits.  Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information listed on the homepage for requirements and restrictions. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Goldie
description:
Goldie is about  2 1/2  yrs old and weighs about 6 lbs.  She is good with other dogs, and would do best in a home with another social dog.   She is shy, so a quiet household would help her adjust.   She was an owner surrender with her two daughters (both with newborn pups) and Goldie was pregnant.  They lived under the trailer and were not treated very nicely.     More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

name: Vail
description: Vail came to us due to resource guarding issues. She is working hard in her training and is great with an experienced handler, training and appropriate exercise. She is very high energy and needs a very active home! She is a loving girl that just needs appropriate guidance!

name: Bella
description: Bella is the real scared one unless with her sister then her scared side goes away.Today I just sat with her , she did let me pet her and sit by her. I will work more with her on Thursday. text diana 702 239 7986

description:

name: Doc Holiday
description: My name is Doc Holliday. Iâm a lightly aged cocker spaniel who loves walks in the park, rolling in the grass, and obsessively begging for belly rubs from my humans. I might take a bit to warm up, but when I do, Iâm all cuddles all the time. Iâm a good boy in the car and like to go for rides very much! Especially if we are going to the park. Rolling in the grass is my favorite!! I also like to walk through stores like Home Depot and Iâm not reactive on a leash and walk like a good boy. Sometimes I act cranky when Iâm in a kennel but I go right back to being a good boy as soon as Iâm out. For more info or to meet me go to www.ahome4spot.com or text Desirea at 702-525-0518.  or diana 702 239 7986 He is neutered, chipped, and up to date on vaccines.  If you are a cocker spaniel this is the boy for you! he is 7yrs old

name: Lilac
description: Meet sweet little Lilac. Sheâs the cutest little staffy mix. At a little less than 4mo old, she is all puppy all the time. Favorite past times are walking herself, chewing on your face, arms, hands and/or anything near her mouth, running amok and giving lots of unconditional love. If you are up for some crazy puppy times and a lot of work in exchange for the best puppy love there is, you can fill out an interest app on our web site at www.ahome4spot.com or you can text Diana at 702-239-7986.

name: Jax
description:
Meet Jax
Owner died that's how Jax's came to us. He is a fantastic dog ,potty trained walks well on a leash loves men. He is a very happy dog , just got his dental and neutered. He rides well in a car. He is ready for his new home.Please text 702 239 7986  he is about 10 pds and 8years old.

name: Taquito
description:
This handsome fellow is Taquito (little Taco) a sweet little one year old chihuahua, all of 4.5 lbs!  He loves to cuddle, enjoys walks and does well with quiet well behaved small dogs.  He would appreciate a quiet home.  Because of his size, a home with small children is not recommended. Taquito has done very well on house training as long as his person is able to read his signals that he needs to go out. 

Taquito is neutered, current on vaccines and micro chipped.  To express interest in Taquito, please to go wecareforanimals.org to complete our online application.  Taquitoâs adoption fee is $150.

name: Atlas
description:
Hello, Iâm 6 month old Atlas!! ???

If youâre a big dog I will follow you, personal space, whatâs that? I have two big foster brothers and Iâm learning the ropes from them and follow them around. Iâve got lots of energy... I love to run around and play. My sister has been with me too and I donât think we know how to sit still. ??

I do like my food bowl separate from others for now.  Bones and treats, yes please! I love giving kisses, I can be a bit strong with them, so fair warning. I like an assertive figure that will tell me NO and shows me Iâm not the boss. I am only 6 mos old afterall!!  I survived the Korean meat trade so I am behind on my puppy training. ?

I really want an active home with another large breed playful pup to be my best friend. ??

I enjoy my crate I go in it pretty easily on my own and I havenât had any accidents.  I will bark if I hear a noise during the night but if itâs nothing I go right back to sleep. Iâm also really great on car rides. 

Some things still make me a little nervous out in the world as things are still a little new to me, but If you show me itâs ok, I relax pretty quick. I know Iâm a good boy and I know I have lots of love in me for whoever I pick to adopt me!!!  So please have lots of love time and energy for me. I deserve a forever home after all I have been through. ????

vegaspetrescueproject.com
Vegas Pet Rescue Project VPRP

name: Trixie
description: Trixie is a sweetie

name: Lily
description:
LILY ?

PLEASE SHARE, SHARE, SHARE

This senior chi/doxie mix was rescued from the shelter about 3 mos ago. She had huge bladder stones and a rotten mouth. Poor sweetie was really in a lot of pain but despite that she was and is the sweetest thing. 

She had all stones removed and infection cleared and had an ectensive dental surgery. She is 10 yrs old approximately and is:

â¢On a special Urinary Tract food diet for previous bladder stones and also, it is soft canned food because of dental surgery. She has 3 teeth; 2 front canines and 1 upper.
â¢Enjoys soft treats 
â¢Does not jump on furniture 
â¢House trained 
â¢Doggie door trained
â¢Loves the outdoors
â¢Enjoys short walks
â¢Rides well in cars
â¢Does well leashed with harness
â¢Gets Along well with other small dogs 
â¢Unsure of medium to large dogs that are full of energy
â¢Barks when strangers come to the door 
â¢Loves here own fluffy bed aside of crate
â¢No issues in a crate if needed to be used temporarily. She actually sleeps in it at night with the door open....It has fluffy blankets and it makes her happy...itâs HER space

She is looking for her perfect forever home with loving humans that want to cherish a senior rescue pup?

vegaspetrescueproject.com

name: Ara
description: Ara is pretty shy at the shelter.  She's just wondering what's going on.  In the play yard she smelled all around and wasn't to sure who I was, but once we spent some time together she came over and wanted me to pet her.  She seemed to do pretty good on the leash.  She might take a little time to get comfortable with where she is, but once she does she'll love you.

name: Sofie
description: Sofie is a sweet loving girl.  She is still a puppy so she loves toys and playing and running around.  she also loves cuddles and pets.

name: Lala
description: Lala is a sweet girl.  She likes to do her own thing and was messing about the play yard checking everything out.  When she was ready she came right up and wanted pets from me.  She wasn't super interested in toys but there were a lot of smells to smell.  once she knows her surroudings she'll probably love toys, treats, and lots of loving.

name: Maximus
description: Maximus is outgoing and full of energy.  He loves to play and run around.  He likes to get pets.  He might not know sit just yet, but he is an eager learner and loves food and toys to motivate him.

name: Bobbi
description: Bobbi is very shy at the shelter.  She did not want to interact so she just sat in the corner.  Once she's in a home she'll probably warm right up.

name: Marty
description: Marty seems like a sweet dog.  He's a little shy at first but likes to cuddle up to people right away.  He wasn't super interested in toy's, but he would probably love some once he gets a home of his own.

name: Jackson
description: Jackson is a fun-loving little guy.  He loves to play and bounce around with other dogs.  he loves to chase toys and get lovin' from people.

name: Steve
description: Steve is a sweetheart.  He was found in rough shape.  He can barely walk from being nearly starved to death but is making progress toward recovery every day.  He's eating wet food twice a day, he's not quite ready for kibble.  He loves to be with someone and just be petted or put his head in your lap for loving.  He just wants to heal and be loved on.

name: Mileena
description: Mileena is a sweet girl.  She likes to play ball, cuddle and get pets.  She loves toys and treats.

name: Velma
description:
Who's the prettiest 2yr old girl? Velma, that's who! Velma loves to go for car rides and hang out with her human. She gets along with other dogs who are not too bossy and so far hasn't shown much interest in cats. We can further cat test her if necessary. She sits and stays on command. Velma really wants to be a good girl.

She is spayed, up to date on vaccines and has a microchip. Please email info@havlv.com for interest.

name: Flash
description: Hi! My name is Flash. Iâm about 5 months old, weigh a little over 5 lbs, and am a male Chihuahua mix.  I love lots of attention and cuddles. Iâll stay in my crate when needed and have some potty accidents that me and my foster mom are currently working on. I pee mostly on the pee pads. I know the basic âsitâ command and love treats. Iâm very observative and get anxious at first around other dogs. I love my own space. Me And my human big sis love to hang out together. I will be neutered, microchipped and up to date on vaccines prior to be adopted. To meet me please contact my foster mommy, Destiny, at 702-205-2723  There is an adoption fee.

name: Monique
description: Monique is a sweet 7lb Maltese mix who was found running on the streets.  She was severely matted and had a mouth full of rotten teeth.  No owner came forward to claim her, so she was bathed, shaved, spayed, vaccinated, teeth extracted, dental and polish.  She is now ready for a forever home.

name: Kimo
description: Kimo is a four and a half year old Shepherd/Golden Retriever Mix.  He was surrendered by his owner when he could no longer care for him.  Kimo is a sweet, gentle boy who is currently being fostered with two other large dogs.  He is neutered, current on vaccines and microchipped.

name: Lobo
description: Meet Lobo... He's an owner surrender. Look at those eyes !! This boy is super friendly and would make a great family dog. He is a two year old Siberian Husky. He's about 66 pounds and he has been neutered and microchipped. Good with all !

name: Ella
description:
Totally devoted to you!
Ella is a gorgeous girl who is 
happy, affectionate and good with other dogs. Sweet and full of personality, she just lo-o-o-o-ves people.  If youâre looking for a pooch that will stick to you like glue Ella would be your gal!
Ella is a young dog who's fallen on hard times but her gentle, nurturing soul still shines through. Ideal for a family with well behaved children, she'd be the perfect companion for a family who wants a quiet, friendly pet with good house manners. Ella is 14 pounds and 1 and half years old. She was rescued from our local shelter due to a cloudy eye- as of now we are trying to save her eye. We are doing two drops every 8 hours- we will soon know if her eye needs removed. She is housebroken, crate trained, good with other dogs her size, loves a walk, great in the car and extremely sweet.  Ahome4spot call Mandi 702-321-0578

name: Carmen
description:
Carmen is about  7  yrs old.  She definitely loves to be around people. Carmen loves to go for walks and runs around the neighborhood. She also doesn't mind to just relax on the couch next to you. Carmen loves blankets that she can lay on just the way she likes. She is not a fan of being in a cage at all. She sleeps on the couch instead, but would probably prefer to be in your bed. This is what her foster has learned about her so far! Come see for yourself all this cute girl has to offer! More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

name: Ember
description: Ember is a beautiful 5-6 year old Giant Schnauzer with a friendly demeanor. She knows some basic obedience and is kennel trained. She does fine with other dogs but no kitties please - she loves to chase them! Ember weighs approximately 65 lb. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Rogue
description:
With a tail that never stops wagging, Rogue is one happy boy! This 15 lb, 1 year old man gets along well with other dogs and loves making new human friends. Heâs mildly curious about cats but would be fine with a dog-friendly cat. Rogue is playful but also loves to be held, heâll make a great addition to almost any loving family.

Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Barley
description: Barley was one of our Mommy dogs and she is a sweet girl who is learning how to trust people. She lives with a foster family with young kids and she loves them - they do tend to spill a lot of food! She gets along well with other dogs too and her ideal home will have a friendly dog for her to mimic normal dog behaviors. She is probably never going to be the type of dog to jump into your lap but she does enjoy receiving pets once she knows you. Barley is approximately 3 years old and 50 lbs. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: Felicity
description: Felicity is a mellow mannered, 2 year old girl who gets along well with other dogs. She is quiet, friendly and will make an easy addition to her new home. She weighs 18 lbs. Meet me Saturday from 11 to 1 at Petco, 645 S. Green Valley Pkwy in Henderson.  If you are interested in adopting please submit an application at www.waggingtailsrescue.org.

name: KASH
description:
ALL ANIMALS are placed on a legal stray hold per Bullhead City Ordinances for the to owner reclaim. If the animals are not claimed they will be placed up for adoption based on the available date provided.

* All animals MUST be spay/neutered before leaving the shelter *

Adoption Fee is $100

I'm available for adoption on 08/08/2019

Adoption fees cover vet exam, spay/neuter surgery, rabies vaccine, first core vaccine (DA2PP or FRCP), and if you reside in Bullhead City your first 1 year license is on us!

I have been at the shelter for 30 days, and I have seen dogs come and go, but here I still remain. I was surrendered because my owner could not handle me, but truth is I was taught. Ask to get me out and see me shine, staff tell me everyday what a good boy I am.

name: Badger
description: Badger and father Bear had to be surrendered when their own was deployed. Bear is a sweet boy who does well with other dogs. He is big sweet heart with lots of love to give. As he is still very much a puppy he needs a lot of training and patience

name: Twixx
description: Meet Twixx, a 1.5yr.old Miniature Pincher with a happy-go-luck personality.  Twixx loves to posse at every opportunity and would love to be the center of attention (as you can see from the picture).  He gets along with his four-legged friends big and small. He enjoys having humans around him especially little kids. Cuddling is his favorites activity, aside from eating. He loves the pool and spends his time meditating on his floating throne. Twixx is looking for his forever family who will spoil him rotten. Twixx weighs 20lbs. I am currently enrolled in the Pups on Parole program at the women's correctional facility where I am learning my basic commands. Upon completion of the program, I will be brought out for viewing at Saturday adoptions at Bogarts Bone Appetit, 4985 S. Fort Apache at Tropicana. Â  Please call about my status at 702-227-5555 if you are interested in adopting. Please checkout our Facebook page to see who is making an appearance to Saturday.Â Be advised that I may have a waiting list.I like to sleep on Kuranda Dog beds, but we don't have enough for everyone.  If you would like to donate a bed at a special wholesale price for me to sleep in comfort, please click here.https://kuranda.com/donate/3894

name: Lucielle
description: Lucielle is a bit shy, but oh sooo sweet. She seems like a lover.  she wasn't to interested in toys, just being with people

name: Dolly
description: Dolly is a sweetheart.  She loves cuddles and attention.  She thought the toys were fun too

name: Archie
description: Archie is a big loving goof.  He's large and full of energy. While he likes kids, he may knock small ones over.  He loves to play with toys.

name: Casan
description: Casan is a big dude, but he's pretty relaxed and chill. He likes treats and toys.

name: Ares
description: Ares is a sweet dog.  He likes to be get pets.  He also likes to do his own thing and check out everything that is going on.

name: Darby
description: Recently VSR got a call from TAF regarding a young (7-8 months old) male shepherd with burn wounds. Darby needed our help so we jumped at the chance to get Darby the medical care he needed. This happy boy didnât seem to notice the burns on his back, shoulder and neck, and just wanted to by a typical, happy puppy. Darby showed us that he already knew how to sit, would happily retrieve a toy, bring it back and give it to you to throw for him again, and also that he knows how to open the lever style door knobs. Darby is also emaciated, so until he is healthy, the vets are postponing his neuter and vaccines. We will keep everybody posted on Darbyâs progress and will also post updates as we learn more about him. So stay tuned and donât touch that dial!

name: Burgess
description: Say hello to handsome, 4 year old Burgess. This dog. What can I say? Rarely does a dog act so happy and affectionate so quickly after getting out of the shelter. Especially after what this precious dog went through. He was found by a Good Samaritan coming out of the desert in the middle of the night. The good Sam did the right thing and had Animal Control come pick him up so his family would have a chance to find him. She then contacted us, letting us know what a great dog he was, after having spent only 7 hours with this dirty, matted, skinny boy. We wanted to help, so we requested him from the shelter. The day before we were supposed to pick him up, he was reclaimed, only to be returned to the shelter the next day. So we contacted the shelter, letting them know we still wanted to save him. (He had been put on the transfer list for being scared the first time he got to the shelter.) He was definitely confused about what was going on, but didnât hesitate when I opened the back of my car, and he flew in! By the time we got to the vet clinic he was happy, wagging his tail, asking for attention and affection. He is getting all cleaned up and we are getting to know him a little better. Stay tuned for updates on our desert dog, Burgess.

name: Trinity
description: Meet beautiful Trinity. Trinityâs life was in danger when she ended up at the shelter and was terrified. But was she acting aggressive? Cowering in the corner the the kennel? No. Poor Trinity was simply submissive urinating when strangers approached her. We are letting her decompress and learning more about her. Then we will post her bio.

name: Blair
description: Meet Blair. Blair was confiscated from a hoarding situation in rural Arizona and was going to be euthanized for space because he was fearful of people. This funny little 7-8 month old shepherd mix peanut has so much personality, itâs hard to describe! He now LOVES everyone he meets and wants only to be loved! Blair is going to make some lucky family very happy! Not only is he kid friendly, but heâs dog friendly too! Donât wait! Get your apps in quickly! Blair is the best lap dog (although he really is a little too big to be a lap dog, but donât tell him that!) Are you going to be the lucky family to take Blair home?

name: Duane
description: Handsome Duane was confiscated from part of a hoarding situation in rural Arizona. His life was in jeopardy because of the lack of space in the small shelter, and timid dogs don't show well, so he wasnât going to be given a chance to find a forever family. This shy 10-11 month old pup is slowly learning that people are good. Duane is dog friendly and is learning to love attention and affection from humans. Duane will be a great family dog and any family will be lucky to have him. Get your apps in soon if you think Duane needs to be the next member of your family.

name: Doja
description:
Awe wee love, Iâm sure shes sore ! She was spayed today. Meet Doja... Her owners are in their 80âs with ailing heath, so we took her in.  Doja is a 9 mth old Pit/Bulldog Mix. 
Shes great with dogs & kids, not sure about cats. Shes potty trained & crate trained, knows sit & come, walks good on leash & good in car. Very gentle when taking treats , Loves loves loves toys! Will occupy herself for hours, just has HIGH puppy energy! But when she chills she will want to be around your neck or as close as possible! Doesnt bark much either ??

name: Roxie
description:
Roxie is a delightful girl, with the most amazing patterned coat and big brown eyes.  At 3-4 years old sheâs past the puppy stage, making her much more obedient and easy to have around. Roxie is friendly with everyone, and canât wait to find a loving home where she can be part of the family. She will make an ideal companion with her low-maintenance, affectionate nature.

Roxie wants you to know :I am a sweet girl that enjoys being petted. I love to go on walks and be with people. I can be a little shy. All I need is someone who will give me time with them and let me, in my own time, adjust and gain back my confidence. I am well-behaved and think you'll enjoy being with me.


$60 ( cash or check) adoption fee covers spay, rabies and DHPPC

name: Nala
description: Nala is a 2 1/2-year-old sweet Doberlady whose owner surrendered her when an unexpected change in his living conditions led him to decide she deserved better. She is appropriately cautious with strangers but then is a Velcro leaner full of kisses. Nala is bright and friendly and has manners and social behavior even though not yet having formal training. She was born in Serbia but moved here as a pup. She walks well on a lead, loves car rides, has lived with a smaller dog and is a champ at using a doggy door. To be considered to adopt Nala, please go to www.drnv.org and complete an application.

name: Joey
description: Joey is a 9-year-old all-natural red Dober-gentleman whose owner left him with his roommate and then abandoned him completely. The roommate took him in but could not keep him so he surrendered Joey to DRNV. He is a gentle soul who gets along with other dogs if they are not aggressive toward him, having survived an attack by a pit bull that required stitches. He is a very sweet boy, knows some commands and has had some interaction with very young children. He just had a dental and had a tooth removed, so he is ready to go! To be considered to adopt Joey, please go to www.drnv.org and complete an application.

name: Barney
description: Barney is a 7-year-old black and tan Doberman who was hit by a car while being chased by Animal Control. The shelter asked if we could take him â they canât treat a broken leg and possible internal injuries. Without being pulled by a rescue, he was doomed. Yes, we took him! Our vet examination showed he did break his leg in three places but the clean breaks could be repaired with a splint. He did not have internal injuries as feared but his teeth are worn down from chewing rocks. And through it all, Barney was licking the hands of all who examined him. The sweetest boy! To be considered to adopt Barney, please go to www.drnv.org and complete an application.

name: Bowser
description: Meet Bowser! Bowser is a handsome 12 year old chihuahua and weighs 7lbs. His best friend is Basil! Basil is also a Chihuahua, 10 years old and weighs 6lbs.  These two dogs are bonded and love to cuddle.  We are looking for a loving home to adopt both of them.  Their tails never stop wagging and they can't wait to meet you! Basil and Bowser are both neutered, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines.  For more info or to meet them please text 702 239 7986

name: Basil
description: Meet Basil! This handsome Chihuahua is 10 years old and weighs 6lbs.  He is a friendly little guy and loves his buddy Bowser. Bowser is a 12 year old chihuahua and weighs 7lbs.  These two dogs are bonded and love to cuddle.  We are looking for a loving home to adopt both of them.  Their tails never stop wagging and they can't wait to meet you! Basil and Bowser are both neutered, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines.  For more info or to meet them please text 702 239 7986

name: Avalon
description: Meet Avalon, or as we call her in her foster home, Ava.  Ava is a very sweet 4 year old chihuahua possibly Doxie mix.  Sheâs shy at first, but once she feels safe, sheâs happy and outgoing.  Ava is great with other dogs and does well on a leash.  She uses a dog door, or stands by the door to be let out, and has never once had an accident in her foster home.  Ava does best with calm, older children, as little ones scare her.  She enjoys playing with her ball, and she loves being outside when itâs not too hot.  She will bark to defend her yard.  Ava is about 17 pounds.  She rides very nicely in the car and enjoys looking out the window.  She sleeps on her dog bed through the night. Ava loves to be with her people, you can tell because she has a huge smile when you come home!  To meet Ava, please text her foster mom at (702) 366-6391.  She is spayed, up to date on shots and microchipped.  Her teeth look great.  There is an adoption fee.

name: Twinky
description: Meet Twinky! She is a 6 year old Terrier mix and weighs 14lbs. Twinkly seems pretty out going so far and loves people! She is fine with other dogs and loves to follow you around. If you are a TERRIER lover you will love this sweet girl! Twinky is spayed, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines.  For more info please text 702 239 7986

name: Gizmo
description: Meet Gizmo, a male terrier mix (maybe part Yorkie).  Gizmo is about 9 years old and weighs about 12 pounds.  He was surrendered due to his family moving.  Gizmo is mostly housetrained, though he marks occasionally.  He uses the dog door like a pro.  Gizmo isnât a big barker, though he will bark if someone rings the doorbell.  Gizmo is a special needs dog.  He doesnât like to be picked up or handled roughly or in ways that make him feel uncomfortable.  Gizmo will not be adopted to anyone with children in the home under 18.  Gizmo likes to be with people on his terms.  He will crawl in your lap and to ask for belly rubs or pets.  He can be food and toy aggressive, so an experienced handler is preferred.  Gizmo is great with other dogs of all sizes.  He likes to sleep on the bed by his foster momâs feet.  He loves cheese and can jump really high!!   For more information on him, please text his foster mom at (702)366-6391.  Heâs chipped, up to date on shots, and neutered.  There is an adoption fee.

name: Dog
description: Meet DOG!  This super sweet guy was rescued from the shelter and recently had a mass removed from his chest. He is 8 years young and weighs approx. 14lbs.  He is healing and doing well and is now looking for a loving forever home.  Dog is neutered, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines.  To meet this handsome boy please text Diana at 702.239.7986

name: Tum Tum
description: Tum Tum is a 4 year old Basenji/Chihuahua mix. He's a little nervous with new people at first, but once he knows you're ok he just wants to be your buddy. Tum Tum is full of energy, enjoys playing with toys, and walks great on a leash. His favorite activity is whatever his people are doing. Currently he lives in a foster home with both large and small dogs and does well with all of them. No small children please and unsure on cats at this time,  For more information text or call Chris 702-540-2018

name: Jake
description: Meet Jake! He is a sweet little guy looking for love! Jake is a Chihuahua mix and is 8 years old and weighs 20lbs.  He gets along with other dogs and loves to play!  A home with older children would be ok and dogs of similar size.  Jake is neutered, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines.  Fo more info please contact his foster mom at 702-771-4143. I love this dog!!!

name: Buddy aka Max
description: Meet Buddy aka Max this dog takes the best pictures, Buddy is about five years of age does well in a car and love his walks . Appears to get along with the other dogs his size. text 702 239 7986

name: Petey
description: Hi! My name is Petey, I'm a 5 year old Dachshund/Chihuahua mix and weigh 15lbs.  I came to A Home 4 Spot after my previous family dumped me at our local shelter. I know its sad, but honestly its ok.  I am going to find the right home for me this time!  I am a typical Doxie mix and can be a little feisty at first, but don't let that stop you from meeting me!   Once I know you're good people I will trust and love you forever.  I get along with other small dogs, love to go on walks, and car rides are my favorite thing! My foster mom likes to take me to Starbucks for puppacinos and I won't say no to a good time like that.  If you are looking for a handsome, independent, and smart little dog to join your home, I am your guy! I am neutered, microchipped, up to date on vaccines, and house trained.  For more info or to meet me please contact my foster mom at 702-239 7986

name: Max
description: Meet Max! He is a cute little guy and is 3 years old and weighs 10 pounds.  Max is a huge toy lover and challenges you to find him one that he cant destroy.  He is very sweet and loving and is happy to just be near you. . Max was rescued from our local shelter and is now looking for his forever home.  He is neutered, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines. For more info or to meet him please contact Tyara at 702-466-7594 or  text 702 239 7986.

name: Destiny
description: Meet Destiny!  She is an 8 year old female chihuahua and weighs 8lbs.  Destiny was rescued from the local shelter and is now awaiting the perfect forever home! She is a little shy at first but warms up quickly.  Destiny loves to be held and will make a great companion.  She is spayed, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines.  For more info or to meet her please contact Tyara at 702-466-7594  There is an adoption fee.

name: Felix
description: Meet Felix! Felix is a male Chihuahua mix and is 1 1/2 years old.  He was rescued from the local shelter for being scared and is now looking for a loving forever home. He is a super sweet dog and is easily treat motivated and a quick learner.  He knows his basic manners including sit and will jump and dance  for a treat! Felix is neutered, chipped, and up to date on vaccines.  For more info or to meet him please text 702-239-7986.

name: Jarid
description: Jarid is new to AH4S as we learn more about him we will update. He is 5yrs old and 22.8 pounds. So far he seems pretty friendly. text 702 239 7986

name: Bella aka Candy
description: Bella/Candy- Does she want smooching from children.  Hmmm no.   Sheâs a independent gal thatâs 5 years old and 8 pounds.  Great with dogs of all sizes.  Bella needs someone willing, able and genuinely committed to work on building her confidence, socialization and positive experiences in general.  Someone with experience with positive training and various realistic dog behaviors.   She is housebroken, great on a leash and loves car rides.  She is with ahome4spot.  Call 702 239 7986

name: Lucy @
description: Meet Lucy!  Lucy is a 10 month old Carin Terrier/Yorkie mix and weighs 11 lbs.  She Is a sweet and very busy little girl who loves everyone and loves to play.  She is very friendly right off the bat and would make a great addition to any home.  She is great with other small dogs her size. Like most terriers she is high energy and likes to talk to everyone passing by.  Lucy is spayed, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines.  She will need basic manner and potty training as all puppies do.  For more info or to meet her lease text 702-239-7986 or 702-525-0518.  If interested in adopting please fill on an adoption interest form on our website at www.ahome4spot.com prior to contacting us.  Thank you!

name: Simba
description:
Simba!  A adorable Pom/Chi 
A absolute sweetheart of a boy Simba is affectionate and quiet.   He is looking for a fairly quiet home where he can get daily walks and where he can be allowed to live inside as a close member of the family. He has basic obedience and is very well behaved.  He is 4 years old and 8 pounds. He is crate trained and gets along well with other dogs his size.  He does enjoy to play with them.  Mature children is a must with a secure yard. He also rides well in the car. He is low shedding and does well with bathing and nail trims yourself.  Call Diana with ahome4spot at 702-239-7986.  There is a fee and all dogs require a leash, collar and name tag

name: Angie
description:
My name is Angie and Iâm about 2 years old. I was recently surrendered to A Home 4 Spot after my owner realized she didnât have the skills to handle me. 
After going through a lot of hard work and training to be a service dog, it didnât work out for me. I was heavily drugged, put in a crate, lived in a prong collar and received zero exercise or down time. 
I love people of all sizes. However, due to my energy level, no small kids please. 
The same goes for dogs. I love them all, but Iâve got too much energy for smaller dogs. Iâve also lived with cats. 
I need a German Shepherd experienced owner. My new owners need to follow up with my trainer.  No apartments or condos.
If interested in meeting me, contact my foster mom. Genie Joyce 317/701-6196

Genie Joyce

name: Pongo
description: On hold until 9/27 when second set of shots are given. $50 deposit can hold. Non-refundable deposit can be made by going to www.NevadaPaws.org and following the link
