description: Meet Max cute little guy weighs 10 pound seems sweet enough. Just picked him up from our local shelter he was very happy to get the heck out of there ,as we spend more time with him we will update. text diana 702 239 7986 Max is 3 years old

name: Finnegan
description:
Meet Finn
Finn is a DOGO looking for a new home with experience owner only. These are amazing dogs , At this time no other dogs the trainer is working with him. Trainer believes he is very trainable. You will have to work with  the trainer a few time that is a must. He loves car rides does well on a leash. He has been around children older kids only. He is about 14months old. Text diana if you would like to meet him.

name: MJ
description: Meet VSRâs newest heartthrob, MJ. Extra large sized, 3 year old MJ was picked up as a stray, guess when? If you guessed July 4th you would be correct. Poor MJ searches every car looking for his family. Heâs a sweet, friendly guy when he isnât whining for his family. Today he was able to play happily with a ball, and even gave some big wet kisses to a couple of his new friends at the vet clinic. He was previously neutered and he was obviously well fed, so why didnât his family come looking for him??? We are still getting to know this gentle giant, and when we know more about him, we will update his bio.

name: Nilla
description:
I am a sweet mature gal who just loves to cuddle. I like other dogs and don't mind cats at all. I do have a little trouble hearing and seeing in my golden years but that doesn't stop me from adventuring around the yard and house. I'd love to find a new family who will give me the best years of my life. Is that you?

For interest in me please email info@havlv.com

name: Homey
description:
Homey was with the same owner since a puppy but she passed away and he was then with the family members, until recently when they lost their home, Now he is with us but looking for his forever home who will take him the distance. He is a nice boy with beautiful markings. He has an awesome bay. He is a bit upset and having some struggles with what happened to him and his family and goes to the door often looking for them as well as not fully eating. We are giving him time to adjust but he is such a nice older man at almost 12 yrs of age, we hope someone will see his value and give him the lasting home he deserves.

description:
Her name is MIMI and she might weigh 5# and was surrendered. She is an older gal who just likes to chill in a quiet environment and be sweet with all people.  She really needs a foster, is potty trained, appears to be fine with other dogs, did not even notice the cats, and is totally content to be crated in a large crate.  Please call/text A Home 4 Spot Diana 702-239-7986 and fill out an interest application at www.ahome4spot.com to learn more. 
www.ahome4spot.com

name: CLYDE
description: Meet Clyde! This 5 year old has the most outgoing personality. He's very friendly and enjoys getting attention.  We pulled him out of the shelter because he was getting very depressed. Clyde is an easy going, playful guy, who seems to love life no matter what's going on around him!  He may do well with other dogs, if given a proper introduction.  If you are interested in him, please email AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com.

name: BONNIE
description: Meet Bonnie! She is the shy, very friendly and enjoys getting attention.  We pulled her out because she was beginning to get very depressed.  She is a 3 year old sensitive soul.   She may do well with other dogs, if given a proper introduction.  We would love to find her a loving home. If you are interested in this cutie, please email AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com.

name: Odin
description: Iâm Odin! An energetic and playful 1 yr. old German Shepherd. I love to play with all my four-legged friends. I need a someone who will set boundaries for me right away and will continue with my training. Iâm very vocal and need a job, so a very active family who will give me all the love and attention I need.  I am currently enrolled in the Pups on Parole program at the women's correctional facility where I am learning my basic commands. Upon completion of the program, I will be brought out for viewing at Saturday adoptions at Bogarts Bone Appetit, 4985 S. Fort Apache at Tropicana. Â  Please call about my status at 702-227-5555 if you are interested in adopting. Please checkout our Facebook page to see who is making an appearance to Saturday.Â Be advised that I may have a waiting list.I like to sleep on Kuranda Dog beds, but we don't have enough for everyone.  If you would like to donate a bed at a special wholesale price for me to sleep in comfort, please click here.https://kuranda.com/donate/3894

name: Lucy
description: Lucy is a 1 1/2 year old friendly Dobergirl looking for her forever home. Her original dad moved out of the country and could not take her with him. She was adopted but surrendered when she was just too interested in the kitties. She is very social, has lots of puppy energy and loves to play with dogs but needs obedience training.  To be considered to adopt Lucy, please go to www.drnv.org and complete an application.

name: Maggie May
description:
Maggie May is such a sweet Spraussie who is in Las Vegas. She is only between 2-3 years old. 

She is a smart and adaptable dog, who needs a loving home with preferably a male dog to play with or a devoted owner who where she can go to work with them or be with them most of the time.  She likes to be with her humans or a canine companion. 

She is in a foster home where she has an older foster brother, who loves to play with her.  They lay together often.

She has been trained to sit, stay, shake hands, give you five and heel.  

She looooves belly rubs, likes getting her hair brushed, loves going on hikes and running off the leash, and she loves playing with the dogs and kids.


She knows lots of commands: sit, stay, down, high five, spin and a few more we haven't discovered.
We are looking for a home where there is another younger Springer to play with her.
Adoption fee:  $375  Apply at www.springerspanielrescue.org to adopt sweet Maggie May.

name: Kuma
description: Kuma is a 9 year old Boxer that is extremely friendly, high energy, obedient, crate trained, good with cats and children. We think he would do best as the only dog because he is so high energy. He has no known medical conditions, and does not act like a senior dog at all ! His owner  surrendered due to relocating. Ideally we would like Kuma to go to a family that has experience with Boxers.

name: Paco
description:
Paco is a sweet boy who is ready to find a gentle and loving home. His mom and dad passed away and I'm sure he misses them, but he still has lots of love to give. Paco has a heart condition that is managed with medicine. He loves to eat so giving his pills twice a day is a breeze. Paco likes other dogs and is friendly with cats. He loves to cuddle and is very calm and quiet.

If you are interested in giving this 12 years young gentleman the best years of his life, please email info@havlv.com

name: Jainie
description: Janie is mixed breed about 7 pds 2 years old, Appears to be dog friendly full of life seems to do well in play groups with dogs his size. As we learn more will update. get 702 239 7986

name: Shelby
description: Shelby was originally adopted from us over 4 years ago as a very dog friendly dog and recently returned morbidly obese and no longer socialized with other dogs. We are working on training with her to reintegrate her back with other dogs, but in the meantime she is desperate for a foster or adopter. She does come with free training for life! Shelby is also working on losing a LOT of weight!

name: cooper
description: Copper is a tiny little 2 yr old male chi mix.  He is 6lb of love when he warms up and has a happy little personality.  He does all in a group of playmates his size and is ok with humans if they take their time and let him build up a little trust when meeting.   He is great on a car ride and likes to look out the window. text 702 239 7986

name: Gracie
description:
Gracie is about  8  yrs old.  These sweet adults are a bonded pair who were left with only each other after their owner passed away. These girls have been waiting SO SO long and are overlooked every weekend. 

Taking on two dogs may be intimidating but these girls are 8 years old so they are more laid back, they are house trained, and they have basic manners you wonât typically find with a young pup or many former strays. Wheezy (Lab) is the rock in this relationship, she barks to alert you when they both need to potty. And she leads the way for Gracie (staffie) who follows her sisters every move. We canât stress enough how SWEET these pups are. Last weekend one of our volunteers climbed into their kennel with them and was smothered with kisses from shy Gracie. These girls just need a spot on your couch and some head scratches, and you will undoubtedly receive endless love in return.   More will be known about me soon.

Peanut is a senior dog, would do best in a quiet home with NO children, and prefers women.  He's a sweet guy that likes attention and to be brushed.  Peanut is selective about his choice of dog friends... likes some; others not so much... so a meet and greet would be essential!

He has not been taken out of walks very often, so is learning the leash, and does still pull quite a bit, but we are working on that.  He does have lots of playful energy and enjoys romping around. description: Very sweet and lovable Likes to cuddle. Her back legs are wobbly but she is mobile and gets around very well.

Manny is my name and I am the happiest girl in the world to be out of the shelter and in a loving foster home. I'm about 8 yrs old but I don't feel a day over 5. I like to do zoomies and have fun with toys, but my very favorite thing to do is cuddle with my human friends. There are other big dogs in my foster home and I get along with them just fine. I'm not sure I ever met a cat, but the nice people at Hearts Alive said we can test for that if a home comes along with a feline kid. I enjoy walks and car rides and am a pretty mellow lady. She is trying to be a tough girl and will now come running up to you bark then run off again. Loves her treats.

But their other dog got snippy with me over food and wanted all of the family's attention, so I got sent back.  The folks at FFDR took me in to see if they could find me another home.  I can be a bit shy and loud men make me nervous, but I do warm up once I feel safe.  Also, small kids give me the jitters.  I think I'd do best in a home that's kinda quiet and less stressful.  I do love to play and cuddle.  My very favorite thing of all is belly rubs!

They are both so well behaved and what great smiles they have, I don't know how they can be so happy being locked up all day. Please come and visit both of them.

name: Roxy
description: Roxy is very special, she just loves people and is so easy going, it seems nothing bothers her. She would really love a new home and someone to take care of her. Please come spend time with her, see if you think she is a great lady.

name: Cooper
description: Cooper was adopted and the people changed their minds, their loss is your gain. This is one special dog. He just loves people and he likes nothing better than to give hugs. He would love for you to come visit him, he has lots of hugs to give you.

name: Boss

name: Tipsy

name: Duke
description: Duke is a young fun guy looking for an active family with at least one other big dog to play with. He already has all of his basic obedience training including being house and crate trained.

name: Humphrey
description:
Humphrey is a handsome boy who has been troubled with skin issues for many years. He's 8 years old and our amazing vets are helping to get his skin in better shape. 

Visit www.onmywayhomerescue.com to donate to Humphrey's care

French Bulldogs do not need a lot of exercise, but they do need daily walks to keep them at a healthy weight.
French Bulldogs do not handle heat very well and need to be monitored on hot days to ensure that they don't overexert themselves.
French Bulldogs can be easy to train, but they can also be stubborn. Be firm and patient when training this breed.
If you value cleanliness the French Bulldog may not be the dog for you, since he is prone to drooling, flatulence and some shedding. He can also be difficult to housetrain.
French Bulldogs can be a quiet breed and are not known as a breed that barks frequently although there are exceptions to every rule.
Because they don't tend to be excessive barkers, French Bulldogs make exceptional apartment dogs.
Although it is important to always supervise young children and dogs when they are together, the French Bulldog does very well with children.
French Bulldogs make wonderful watchdogs, but they can become territorial. They also like being the center of attention, which can lead to behavioral problems if they are overindulged.
French Bulldogs are companion dogs and thrive when they have human contact. They are not a breed that can be left alone for long periods or left outside to live.

name: Elliott
description:
We don't know how many years Elliott had to live with all of his toenails so long that they curled into pads, but it was long enough that he doesn't walk normally and it damaged the disks in his spine, his feet, & the joints in his legs. In fact, there doesn't seem to be an area on his body that wasn't affected by the agony of having to try to walk on circular nails digging into his flesh.

This doesn't even address the other major problem of his mouth that had been allowed to rot so completely that pus and abscess infection is coming up through his eyes as well as through the skin on his cheek.

His ears were packed with chunks of dirt and debris.

Elliott has a comprehensive treatment plan that has been initiated and we're watching him closely for quality of life but he wants to eat, wags his tail, explores, & enjoys cuddles.

Donate to support Elliott's care at www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Marley
description:
Help us to welcome a special pair of bonded seniors into rescue. 13 year old Duke is a Welsh Pembroke Corgi boy and 7 year old Marley is a chocolate Chihuahua girl. They were surrendered to the shelter by their family but are figuring things out with us and adapting. They need a home together.


You can apply to adopt or foster at www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Alice
description:
Tiny Alice is sweetness personified. This darling senior weighs only 7 pounds dripping wet. Her age is estimated at 10+ years. As soon as she is ready, we'll be removing her mammary tumors but for now she has a fresh mouth, a great appetite, and nice pep in her step. She was even doing a little old lady run in her foster home! She's an incredible old gal.

www.onmywayhomerescue.com


Quick Dachshund Facts
Dachshunds are in the hound dog breed group.
Theyâre known for their short legs and long bodies.
Common nicknames are: doxies, dachsies, sausage dogs, wiener dogs, and hot dogs.
Pronunciation of the word âdachshundâ is DAK-sund and not âdash hound.â
There are four sizes: toy dachshund (smallest), miniature dachshund, tweenie, and standard dachshund.

name: Max
description: Our Max.... This boy has been through a lot and he is finally ready to be adopted. When Max arrived from Puerto Rico, he had Erlichia and then when we took him for a wellness exam, and we found out he had a suspicious mass. Max Just had surgery and the cancerous mass was removed. He is now healthy and ready to get out of the vet hospital and into his first home ever. Max is a 3 year old Boxer mix. He is neutered and up to date on his vaccinations. Max has a very fast metabolism - he is eating 4 cups of dog food daily !! The way to his heart is through his stomach ! Please network this most deserving boy

name: Ranse
description: Ranse is a 2 yr old mixed breed dog.  He bonds with his human very deeply and is very excited to see you.   He loves to play fetch with toys and sometimes heâll run around you to tease you before he gives it to you.  Ranse is still young and has a good amount of energy and so will need someone who will give him the exercise he needs.   He came to us from our local shelter system where he had a hard time being adopted because he was scared.  For more info on Ranse, please contact Diana at +1 (702) 239-7986 or go to www.ahome4spot.com

name: Hemes
description: My name is Hermes and Iâm a spunky lil guy who loves to follow you around. Donât let the 12years get in the way as I love to run around with my foster sisters.  I love running up and down the stairs. Iâm working on using the doggie door but canât quite push it open. When you open the door for me I run right outside and find my spot. Iâm looking for someone to love me as much as I love them. If youâd like to meet me please contact a home for Spot. He just had a dental. more info text 7022397986

name: Forever
description: Meet Forever . This adorable girl is a 1 1/2 year old Maltipoo. Sheâs about 14.1 lbs. Wee wee pad trained. Rescued from a private home in Las Vegas.

name: Harry Potter
description: Harry Potter is a fun guy to live with as he's pretty laid back in the home, well trained and eager to please! He is EXTREMELY food motivated, house and crate trained! He wants nothing more than to snuggle with his human! He's a big strong guy looking for a home that will adore him.

name: Stewy in Denver
description:
If you like a dog who communicates with you, Stewy is talkative. When excited, he will whistle/whine. He makes some other cute noises in different situations. He is not an obnoxious barker (he has a baritone bark); he may bark if you are outside working in the front yard, but it does not last that long.

The first night here he hopped up on the fosterâs bed, but since then he has preferred to sleep on the floor even over a doggie bed.

He walks well on a leash, but he has playfully lunged at a cyclist, and he acts protective and territorial when there are other dogs on a leash nearby. So attention and firm control with a maximum 6-foot leash is needed.  He does not act this way when at a dog park â heâs very social with new people and dogs.  

Stewy adjusted to a home with two older male Spring Spaniels quite easily. It took him a day or two to be comfortable with a doggie door and now heâs a pro with it. 

Stewy appears to be deaf or very hard of hearing as he does not respond to his name or any other verbal commands, but he is learning some hand signals like waving for him to come.  Many dogs lose their hearing but their sense of smell is even more important. 

Adoption fee- $200

name: Lucky
description: This dog has beautifull amber eyes. He is a calm loving boy. Walks nicely on a leash and knows commands. Found out wandering in the desert. Who will give this loving boy a home. Beware he is a snuggler. We are not sure why no one is looking at this great dog. His foster from before he came to us says he's a sweetheart

name: Felicia
description: Felicia is a great puppy. She is a little timid of strangers but will come out of her shell once she gets to know you. Loves to play with her litter mates. She likes to snuggle once she gets to know you. Felicia is a gentle dog and well behaved.

name: ATLAS
description:
ALL ANIMALS are placed on a legal stray hold per Bullhead City Ordinances for the to owner reclaim. If the animals are not claimed they will be placed up for adoption based on the available date provided.

* All animals MUST be spay/neutered before leaving the shelter *

Adoption Fee is $100

I'm available for adoption on 05/02/2019

Adoption fees cover vet exam, spay/neuter surgery, rabies vaccine, first core vaccine (DA2PP or FRCP), and if you reside in Bullhead City your first 1 year license is on us!

I AM ALREADY NEUTERED AND CAN GO HOME TODAY!

I was jumping the fence at my old house, but in my defense it was only a 3 foot wall. I am super sweet but my owners have decided I need to find a home that can keep me busy. I lived with other dogs and children. Come find me and we can travel the world.

name: Norma Jean
description: Hi!  My name is Norma Jean.  Iâm one of the newest pack members here at FFDR.  My foster mom is happy to report that I seem to get along with all of my packmates, young and old, big and small, which puts me ahead of the game!  I do prefer my 2-legged family members at least in their teens and know how to mind their manners.

name: Minnie Mouse
description: My name is Minnie Mouse and Iâm looking for someone who will let me spend the rest of my life with them in quiet comfort.  Iâm a sweetheart who gets along with just about everyone.  Iâve been diagnosed with double hip dysplasia and my age keeps me from having it surgically repaired.  Itâs not too bad â Iâm on medications that keep me comfortable.  But Iâm not going to be running any marathons in the near future and couches look really good to me!  If you like the quiet life, letâs talkâ¦

name: Spike
description: Meet Spike! Spike is 6 years old and a male Chihuahua mix.  He is good with other dogs  but prefers dogs his size. He was another one who ran from the bad living situation straight into our van and never looked back! Spike is a handsome boy and becomes attached very easily. He loves his people more than anything and is happy to just be with you. He had a dental cleaning and is neutered, microchipped, and up to date on vaccines,  As we learn more about his personality, we will up date. For more info please text 702 239 7986

name: Lady
description: Lady is a sweet, shy female who would really like to go to a loving home.  She is eager to please and would make any happy home even happier.

name: Linda
description:
Mayteâs Rescue
Our Linda !! Such a great dog !! This girl was saved from an abusive life in Puerto Rico. Her jaw was kicked or somehow knocked out of alignment. Our Vet says there is nothing that can be done for her jaw. Thankfully Linda doesnât seem affected by it. She is able to eat normal and is a sweetheart. 
Sheâs a two year old Yorkie Mix. About 12 lbs. Great with all. She just wants to be loved.

name: Daisy (8)
description:
The most beautiful thing in the world to see a fragile, broken down, near death little creature begin to blossom. Tiny Daisy weighed only as much as an 8 week old kitten when she came to us through The Animal Foundation. She had a hernia where her bladder was poking out, her poor uterus was full of cysts, her teeth were a horror show, she had a large deflated tumor on her chest, and her blood sugar was 734! She had a serious will to live! She is a survivor and a senior blind, diabetic little lady who has conquered so many challenges
. She has gained 1.5 lbs, is eating great and taking her little injections 2x a day like a champ. She is a quiet girl and isn't any trouble. Daisy sleeps a lot and loves to lay in the sunshine and give sweet kisses. If you might be interested in adopting please email info@havlv.com

name: Tim
description: Meet Tim, he is just 11 lbs 3 years old terrier wire haired Dachshund  mix.  Very friendly to people but Still getting used to the other dogs he is dog selective so he would be good as an only dog. He will need lots of patience and understanding he is still very shy.  Still working on  basic commands. To meet him please text Diana at 702-239-7986 or thru ahome4spot.com

name: Israel
description:
Happy-go-lucky, enjoys playing with litter mates.  Will fit right in to an active family life!  Come see him!
DOB: 2/19

name: Mali
description:
Happy-go-lucky, enjoys playing with litter mates.  Will fit right in to an active family life!  Come see her!
DOB: 2/19

name: Ozzie
description:
Meet 4 year old Ozzie!! 
This super silly guy was recently rescued from our cityâs shelter and is seeking a foster or forever home!
Heâs a great walker and loves to play in the water! 
His goofy personality and fancy face will keep you entertained all day long! How can you not love that face!!!
Ozzie does well this well behaved dogs his size, and Ozzie is approx 70 lbs. 
Please fill out an app on our website to meet him! 
www.animalhelpalliance.org

name: Star
description: At approximately 2yrs of age, little Star found herself wandering in a strangerâs front yard, far from her home.  Star was then taken to Animal Foundation where her family did not show up to bring her home.   Star is such a happy and beautiful little girl and the stranger wanted to be sure Star would be okay so they reached out to A Home 4 Spot who brought her into rescue.   This friendly girl likes to run and play in the kiddie pool, she enjoys her exercise or walk followed by a nice nap.  Although friendly, Star can get a bit nervous when small children are running around playing and making a lot of noise so a home with older, mature, children is necessary.  As far as other pets, we are still getting to know Star but she does seem possibly receptive towards meeting other dogs.   Please complete an interest application at www. ahome4spot.com  and then text Diana at 702-239-7986 to inquire about Star.

name: Cowboy
description:
Name:  Cowboy
Sex:  Male
Age:  About 3
Breed:  Cattle Dog mix
Weight:  35 pounds
Vaccinated

Howdy!  Yep, Iâm missing an eye.  I was found hiding under a car after Iâd been in one heck of a fight (I lost).  Luckily, someone took me to The Ranch where I was able to get medical care.  Iâve healed up pretty well and am now ready for my forever home.  Even with an eye missing, I am extremely good-looking â just look at my markings and my perky ears!  Iâm also friendly and exuberant.  Iâd be a great companion for someone who wants a walking partner.Text for more info 702 239 7986

name: Champ
description: Champ is a super affectionate dog. He loves to be outside and just running around. Champ loves people. All of them. Not so much other dogs. He would be a great one man/woman dog.  He is very affectionate with people. A home with older children would be great for this super dog. He is a good guard dog and your home will be safe with this hero.

name: Jake
description: I hope you have a big heart and a lot of patience.  My name is Jake and I havenât had it easy.  I came to FFDR from a rescue in Salt Lake City and my past is a bit of a mystery.  I wish I could tell you more, but all I can show is that people make me nervous, so I hope to find a furever family who will take the time to work with me so I feel safe and secure.  Small kids scare me, so Iâd be better off in a house without them.  Iâd really do great in a house with another small, calm dog.  Do you have what it takes?

name: Diego
description: Hola!  Mi nombre es Diego.  And I speak English â just playing with you!  I am as fierce as my picture, even though Iâm a senior.  I got lucky when the rescue I was with in Salt Lake City faced closure because of money trouble and the folks at FFDR brought me to Las Vegas so I could have a second chance.  I have a heart murmur, but I donât have to take any medications for it.  Iâd do best in a home with no small kids or large dogs.    I donât take up much room.  What do you say?

name: Doc
description: My name is Doc and my brother Charlie and I are 11 year old brothers and are looking for a soft place to land because our momma has to go into full time care and is very sad.  She loves us so much and used to hand feed us hot dogs, so a diet change will need to happen.  We get excited when our person gets home and love to be chased and played with.   We love to cuddle and spend all our time together.  We have been together our whole lives and would like to spend the rest of them together.  We are microchipped, neutered and have all our shots.  We will also have clean teeth when you adopt us.  Give us a chance to show you how much life we have left.  If you think youâre our hero, please go to www.ahome4spot.com or text Desirea at 702-525-0518.

name: Daisy
description:
Daisy is about  2  yrs old. She was turned in by her owner with 3 other dogs.    More will be known about me soon.

name: Ricco
description:
Ricco is about  2  yrs old and weighs 52 lbs.   Ricco is about  2  yrs old and weighs 52 lbs.  Ricco aka Lucky is an energetic dog that needs to play, walk and run. He is curious and puppy-like and is happy-go-lucky, playful, and a little bit of a klutz. He likes to be around people and his tail is always wagging. He is friendly with family members, visitors, and kids (we have a six -year old).

Ricco aka Lucky needs basic house training and to learn commands. We have been working on potty training, but he is not yet house-broken. He has already learned to âsitâ for meal service, and now willingly goes into his kennel when told âkennelâ. He has been working on âcomeâ and âstayâ, but not quite there yet. He is motivated by treats. Lucky needs a patient family who can teach him all he needs to know about âhouse rulesâ. Lucky does well on a leash and does very well on walks. He is a great jumper, so if you keep any ball-shaped fruit on the counter, he will retrieve it and play ball; until he learns that counters are off-limits! (real-life situation!)

Lucky appears to be a great family dog due to his playful nature and would be a good guard dog due to his loyalty and human resource-guarding instinct.

Lucky is curious about other pets. We have a tortoise and a cat. He will bark at the cat and sniff the tortoise.  I believe Lucky would do well as an only pet. He will defend himself quite vigorously if threatened or attacked by another dog and will not easily give up.  More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Ricco, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Redman
description: Mr. Redman has a personality that is a big as he is (and he's a big boy at 75 lbs)!  He was rescued from the shelter and needs a new forever home.  Mr. Red has great manners, he will sit, stay.  However, due to his size he needs a strong person.  He is around 6 years old and loves all people but we believe that he will do best in a home with older kids.  He is dog selective so a meet is a must if you have another dog.

name: Shilo
description: Life happens, and unfortunately sometimes it just doesnât go the way we plan or expect it to. Shilo is being returned to VSR after 3 years through no fault of her own. After much soul searching, and endless hours of trying to find a different solution, Shiloâs family has decided to do whatâs best for Shilo, instead of thinking only of themselves. Shilo is a beautiful girl, about 5 years old. She bonds very hard to the one person in her family that she decides is hers. Shilo lives with older children and goes to doggy daycare occasionally. Shilo can be an escape artist and has been known to clear a 6 foot fence, so a secure yard, and supervision while outside is a must for this beauty who loves with all her heart. Shilo will need a family with shepherd experience or experience with herding or working dogs. She will need daily mental or physical stimulation to help her be the best she can be. If you would like to bring beautiful Shilo into your family and home, please fill out our online adoption application. Itâs the first step in our adoption process.

name: Pinkie
description: Hi I'm Pinkie! I am a total lover girl. Take me home for fun walks and tons of kisses and cuddles!

name: Mikey
description: Mikey is a great little guy to pass the hours with playing fetch with a tennis ball. (yes he brings it back). Be prepared to love tennis!  He is looking for someone patient and realizing that being with humans is not so bad. He gets along with other small dogs very well. He has met a few big dogs that he likes as well. He will do really well in a home with single person because he picks his person but if you are a patient couple then he will do well there too.  Mikey will make a great companion if you give him a chance. He is up to date on shots, micro chipped, and neutered. Please call 720-352-5487 or Diana at 702-239-7986 to set up a meeting.

name: Luna
description:
Luna is settling into her foster home and less stressed after her month in the shelter. Her leg wounds have been tended and will mend in time. She also has some mammary tumors and some growths on the sides of her face that need to be removed. We'll tackle that surgery in another week or so. It's hard to believe that this vibrant girl came so close to losing her life at the shelter, but we understand that her stress level there was off the charts. We're just glad that we were able to pull her and help!

Luna will not be available for adoption until her medical is taken care of but in the meantime, you can apply to adopt her www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Steve
description:
And the Cutest Snaggle Tooth Award of the Day goes to...Steve!

A 13 year old boy looking for love, Steve is sweetness personified. Add a delightful senior boy into your life. You won't regret the love!

apply to adopt Steve at www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Bernard
description:
Bernard is a sweet 12 year old chocolate dachshund who was found as stray. Bernard loves other dogs, uses the dog door and is crate trained. In fact, when heâs ready for bed, heâll go outside and then put himself to bed in a crate. Donât let his cloudy eyes fool you, he can see most things. We donât expect his vision to be a problem in the future although he does bump into things every now and then. Bernard loves getting cuddles from a human and doesnât mind sharing the cuddle space with other dogs.

You can apply to cuddle Bernard for the rest of his life at www.onmywayhomerescue.com


Quick Dachshund Facts
Dachshunds are in the hound dog breed group.
Theyâre known for their short legs and long bodies.
Common nicknames are: doxies, dachsies, sausage dogs, wiener dogs, and hot dogs.
Pronunciation of the word âdachshundâ is DAK-sund and not âdash hound.â
There are four sizes: toy dachshund (smallest), miniature dachshund, tweenie, and standard dachshund.
Their average weight is under 11 pounds (toy dachshunds and miniature dachshunds),  11 to 16 pounds (tweenies), and 16 to 32 pounds (standard dachshunds).
Their average life span is 12 to 15 years.
There are three varieties of dachshund fur: smooth or shorthaired; longhaired; and wire-haired.
They come in many colors and patterns.
They were bred to dig and they will dig holes in your yard if you let them.
They have a loud, deep bark that people will assume is coming from a large dog. That makes them great guard dogs!
Theyâre considered clever, intelligent, and mischievous.
Dachshunds are very affectionate. They often bond most with one person and can become clingy, in a cute way.
Theyâre stubborn and notoriously hard to housebreak. Vets and trainer recommend crating them on a schedule to solve this.
Theyâre not easy to train. It takes a lot of patience, and will include a lot of laughter.
Theyâre brave. They show it by barking and sometimes by lunging at other dogs.
When theyâre puppies especially, theyâll chew up your shoes, book covers, and other objects.
Dachshunds are prone to becoming overweight. To keep your doxie healthy youâll need to monitor his food intake carefully and take him on daily walks.
Dachshunds love to jump on high things. But they can also develop herniated or slipped disks because of jumping down. So you need to keep an eye on them and place them on the ground.
When you hold them, you need to give support to their backs with your hand.
You should only get a dachshund from responsible breeders and rescue organizations, which you can research in advance on the Internet.

name: Caleb
description: Caleb is a sweet senior. He has a unique walk, lovable personality and gets along with other dogs. He will need to take an anti-inflammatory daily. (the rescue can provide if needed) He loves children, other dogs and being on your lap. He is waiting for his forever home.

name: Mack
description:
Mack is about  2  yrs old.   He is good with other dogs.  More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

name: Franky
description: Hi I am Frankie I am Felicia's brother. Also I'm looking for a very special family who will love me and take care of me for the rest of my life. Please come and meet me. Frankie is a great dog. Not pushy but gentle appriach. He loves his pool and toys. He just needs his own humans.

name: LADY GAGA
description: Look at that face!  What an absolute sweetheart! Lady Gaga is a very friendly and mellow girl.  She would be perfect as a companion dog.  She loves going on walks and is very calm on the leash.  Her father was a purebred german shepherd.  She would do best in a home as the only dog, or with another submissive male dog.  She is an alpha female.  She loves people of all ages and would love to find a new home!  She is 5 years old, and is housetrained and well mannered in the home.  She can be a bit shy at first, but does warm up with new people.  If you are looking for a mellow companion who will love you unconditionally, then look no further than sweet Lady Gaga!

name: JJ
description: Hey there! Iâm JJ and I came all the way from Salt Lake City to find my furever home.  I may be a senior dog, but I outlast my younger pack mates at adoption events!  They slack off in the shade while I walk around looking for a playmate.  I have a heart murmur, but I donât take any medications.  I get along with kids, cats and other dogs, so long as they can keep up with me!  Are you up to the challenge?

name: Mandy
description:
Mandy's owner became and adult and moved out of her home. She took Mandy with her but then was working two jobs and barely home. Mandy became distraught and anxious and began to bark with anxiety. She decided to surrender her.

We noticed Mandy does get anxious in new environments and it will take time for her to adjust. We found that giving her sedatives and CBD oil helps her cope until she get acquainted with her new surroundings. Then she can come off of these aides.

She will do better with someone who is home more often. She is a sweet easy going 12 yr old female beagle. She gets along with other dogs. She will be a great companion to those willing to help her adjust and make her comfortable.

adoption fee is $100. Adoption fees go back to and cover all of the medical for all of the dogs. All dogs are spayed/neutered, vaccinated and micro chipped upon adoption and many have received further treatment for such things as lump removal, severe ear infections, leg injuries, etc.. **Free T-Shirt with adoption, please let us know your size**
For more information or to submit an adoption application, please visit our website at http://www.southernnevadabeaglerescue.com . We are also on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/SouthernNevadaBeagleRescueFoundation . Come meet and play with our available dogs at Las Vegas area dog parks. Times and locations can be found at http://www.meetup.com/beagles-207/ . Contact us or check our Facebook updates ahead of time if you are interested in meeting a particular dog. All our dogs are in foster homes so not all are available to attend all our park meetups.
Our meetup group playdates allow you to socialize your beagle with his/her own breed at dog parks with large fenced areas where the beagles can run and play off-leash. Beagle enthusiasts, come bay with us..... AROOOOOOOOOOOO!
9/16/19 4:08 PM

name: Ursula
description: Ursula is a 3 year old, female, chocolate Shar Pei. She is very sweet, and likes to be near you. She loves to play with toys, and rides nicely in the car. She will need an experienced owner and training, especially on leash manners. She is reactive to other dogs and should be the only pet in the home. She is being treated for skin issues with high quality food and medicated baths. She is spayed, up to date on vaccines, is microchipped and has had entropion eyelid surgery already. To learn more, fill out an application at www.peipeople.com 9/19/19 7:42 PM

name: Coolie
description:
The shelter named me Coolie when they found me on the streets. FUPI has come to my rescue and is finding me a new home.Â Â I'm a 7 year old male, Chihuahua mix, and weigh about 19 lbs.Â  I can be an only dog or be with other dogs.Â  I Love to play ball and snuggle up next to my human.Â  I am House trained.Â  I'm good with people and kids over 12.

Adoption fee $225.00

If interested, please complete an application at:

https://forecloseduponpets.org/dog-adoption-application/

name: Kiseki
description:
Female
Akita - Purebred
White
Well behaved, obeys commands.  Leash/House/Crate trained.  Cannot be in a home with other dogs - she has never been around other dogs.

name: Lemontree
description:
Lemontree is about  2  1/2 yrs old and weighs about 10 lbs.   He was owner surrendered into a shelter because they were caught with over 20 dogs.   He is very good with other dogs and would do best with a friendly companion.  He is a little shy, but not nippy.   More will be known about me soon.

name: Sox
description:
Sweet Sox came into rescue when another dog in the home was bullying her and it became unsafe. Sox is 10 years old and just wants to be loved. She is great with other dogs and loves to explore. Although she is 10. she is far from an old lady and loves to play with younger dogs and with toys. 

Apply to adopt Sox at www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Milky
description: Another one of our dogs that we have rehabilitated. Milky..... This sweet boy was kicked and abused by his owner. When he first came to us he needed a wheelchair. Now with laser therapy, he has made such great strides. He has a limp, but heâs very happy to be a part of our pack. Milky suffers from intermittent urine incontinence. Heâs a 3 year old Lab Mix, about 22 lbs

name: Schmooze
description:
Schmooze is about  6  yrs old.  She came into the shelter as a stray.   She seems friendly with respectable male dogs.   She is blind, not sure if she can see shadows yet.   She is very friendly, loves to lean in for love.  She is very playful and will make a toy out of anything she can find.    More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Schmooze, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Schmooze is spayed/neutered, has current vaccinations and includes a microchip, deworming and 2 free vet visits.  Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information listed on the homepage for requirements and restrictions. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Mercury
description:
URGENT INTAKE: Meet Merc (formerly Slim Jim). We picked him up from the shelter and he is joining the PAWS On My Way Home Rescue family. This poor boy is skin and bones. He can stand but can't walk by himself. He's only 1 year old and has a body scale score of 1 out of 9 (meaning they don't get any thinner than this.) We absolutely had to help this boy. We rushed him to the vet for care and will know more shortly. 
To donate to his care, feel free to donate through our website www.onmywayhomerescue.com or through our PayPal email address of rescuequestions@gmail.com or through Venmo of @pawsonmywayhomerescue. Thank you for always supporting our rescue mission to help dogs like Merc throughout Southern Nevada.

name: Mack
description: Mac is a sanctuary boy in the rescue.  He is a 12 year old double dapple who was born blind congenitally due to irresponsible breeding practices. If you would like to sponsor Mack's monthly care in rescue, please visit our website at www.onmywayhomerescue.com.

name: Poppa
description: Poppa is a senior Italian greyhound who arrived in rescue from a hoarder situation and was later adopted. He came back into rescue when his family changed their lifestyle and he's in an experienced and loving foster home getting the royal treatment. A big boy, he came back into rescue a bit chunky so he's on a diet to make sure that he trims back up! Apply to adopt Poppa at www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Lola
description: Lola is a very happy girl with lots of playful silliness. She will be your special partner on all of your adventures and will make sure to cuddle you sweetly every day. Apply to adopt this 2 year old girl at www.onmywayhomerescue.com.

name: Jelly Bean
description: This handsome little guy is Jellybean! An absolute sweetheart with one of the best underbites. Wouldn't you love to have this devoted pal join you through your life? Apply to adopt him at www.onmywayhomerescue.com.

name: Egon
description:
Recent addition to the On My Way Home Rescue family is Egon. Previously in a hoarder situation, Egon is the most shy out of the 4 Italian Greyhounds that we've taken into our rescue program. . The psychological damage to Egon was severe. With the help of his dedicated foster mom, Kristine, he has been learning how to be a dog instead of a ghost flitting around scared constantly. The process can be long and involved, but seeing the progress inch by inch is so rewarding. He's working on recovering in our Make Me Brave program and he's already revealed a quirky and fun side, despite his shyness. We look forward to discovering more about this 2 year old boy as he improves his socialization skills with humans.
You can sponsor his care or apply to adopt him at www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Jaki
description:
Jaki is about 1   yrs old.   She was brought into the shelter by animal control after being abandoned with 5 other dogs and her litter of puppies.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Jaki, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Jaki is spayed/neutered, has current vaccinations and includes a microchip, deworming and 2 free vet visits.  Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information listed on the homepage for requirements and restrictions. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Valor
description:
Valor is a recent addition into rescue. He was completely shut down at the animal shelter due to extreme fear. After arriving in rescue, he had no real belief that humans would be kind to him and he was even scared of other dogs. His head would stay tucked in a corner so that he wouldn't have to see anyone. We gave him his space and let him decompress. Weeks later, he has decided to take a chance and his let his guard down. Since he's incredibly food motivated, we've been able to use his love of food as a motivator. Valor still has a journey ahead of him, but we welcome him into our Make Me Brave program. 

You can sponsor Valor by donating on our website (*Type Valor in the notes with your donation.) at www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Dixie
description: Dixie is 4 years old and so loving. She wants to be walked every day and spoiled to perfection. She had a rather severe ear infection currently but we're working on helping her to feel better. Dixie has known nothing but love and just needs more attention in her life. Apply to adopt her at www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Macha
description:
Macha in a Nutshell

I'm bossy...but I keep you laughing.
My hair never grew back all the way...but my foster mom tells me I'm so beautiful I don't need much hair.
I will drink from your cup if you leave it sitting for me. (Coca-Cola is a favorite)...but I'm trying to save you from drinking too many calories.
I will jump up and steal food from your hand...but (again) I'm trying to help you not eat too many calories.

I'm a handful in the funniest ways.
That's okay. I've earned it after what I've been through. A human tried to starve me to death and I LIVED instead. So, my life is being lived on my own terms. I'm currently interviewing humans to see who is good enough to love me forever!

you can apply to adopt her at www.onmywayhomerescue.com

name: Morgan
description: Gorgeous and sweet Morgan is about 2 1/2 years old and ready for forever happiness. She is reserved initially before giving you her whole heart, but a few days is all it takes. Morgan is like a gift that keeps giving because she opens more parts of her heart every single day. Share this joy with her by applying to adopt her at www.onmywayhomerescue.com.

name: Vlad
description: Vlad is one of our sanctuary dogs.  He is a Mexican hairless dog who came from an unfortunate background and lived on a property with other hoarded dogs.  His experiences have rendered him not able to be adopted, but you can sponsor Vlad by making a monthly or a one-time donation.  Thank you for your support and caring.  http://www.OnMyWayHomeRescue.com

name: Doug
description: Meet Doug, a 4yr.old Lab mix witha  loving personality.  Doug had a rough life before join the Pups on Parole Program.  He was living out at Mount Charleston for several months as people attempted to catch him with no success until one day a couple decided to go back out and try to catch him.  It was their lucky day, the pup angels was on their side and they were able to get Doug off the mountain. After several weeks of adjustment, Doug has greatly improve on his social skills with humans, but enjoys playing with his four-legged friends especially the little ones.  Weight: 50lbs .Doug is currently enrolled in the Pups on Parole program at the women's correctional facility where I am learning my basic commands. Upon completion of the program, I will be brought out for viewing at Saturday adoptions at Bogarts Bone Appetit, 4985 S. Fort Apache at Tropicana. Â  Please call about my status at 702-227-5555 if you are interested in adopting. Please checkout our Facebook page to see who is making an appearance to Saturday.Â Be advised that I may have a waiting list.I like to sleep on Kuranda Dog beds, but we don't have enough for everyone.  If you would like to donate a bed at a special wholesale price for me to sleep in comfort, please click here.https://kuranda.com/donate/3894

name: Bria
description: Bria is a very unique girl who was born with a special need.  You see, she was born without elbow joints.  Because of this, her front legs are crooked and she is unable to straighten them out completely.  She army crawls on her elbows or walks on her back legs in the meantime.  Nothing slows down Bria's spirit and she is a smart and sassy girl.,  After she is fully grown, she will require a fusion surgery so that her legs will be able to be straightened.  In the meantime, she is enjoying life and would love a forever family (with the understanding that the rescue will be performing her leg surgery when she is old enough).   If you feel that your family is the right one for this special and wonderful 5 pound girl, feel free to submit an adoption application anytime on our website at www.onmywayhomerescue.com.

name: SKY
description:
Those eyes!  Sky's family had to move and were unable to take her with them. 
 So here she is with us on the hunt for a new home. Sky is a sweet girl. 
 She is very shy, but is warming up.  We are still learning about her, but from what we can tell, she is a friendly, submissive and loving girl. 
 She will take a little time to warm up, but once she is comfortable, her sweet personality will come out.  We are estimating her to be around 2 years old. 
 If you would like to meet this sweet girl, please email AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com

name: PeeWee
description: Meet PeeWee he is a little guy 7 years old 6 lb Chihuahua mix. He was an owner surrender to our local shelter along with his brother Rudy. Sadly his brother Rudy did not make it. Among other issues Rudy, his brother was in excruciating pain from a fractured back. Little PeeWee is finally out of the hospital! After weeks in the hospital being stabilized and, having surgery to remove his eye, adjusting to diabetes treatment (Twice daily injections) and recovering, he finally got the clear to come back home.  He lost his eye and his brother, but is making a new friend in foster MerlÃ­n and is going to be treated like the little warrior prince he is. PeeWee will be up for adoption soon. For more information on PeeWee, text his foster mom at 702-525-0518 or thru ahome4spot.com

name: Pancho
description: Look at our Angel Pancho enjoying life his at his fosterâs house. We want this sweet boy to find his forever couch ! Heâs a 3 year old Yorkie wired terrier mix. Heâs a little guy weighing about 9.4 lbs. Heâs neutered and ready to go. Originally from Puerto Rick.

name: Lucy
description: Meet Lucy.... She is a two year old Shitzu Mix, about 15 lbs is a sweetheart. Sheâs great with other dogs, but she is nervous around young kids.

name: Johnny
description: Meet Johnny.... This big guy is a 7 month old Lab Mix, about 34 lbs and neutered. He would make a great family dog. Originally from Puerto Rico...

name: Bonny
description: Meet Bonny... The cute boy is a one year old Dachshund Mix, about 14 lbs, neutered and ready for a home. Originally from Puerto Rico

name: Peewee
description:
Meet PeeWee!
This adorable laid back 7 year old dude is looking for a family that will love him forever! 
Pee Wee is good with other laid back friendly dogs and is as sweet as can be. 
He is also looking for a foster home while looking for his forever home! Fill out an application on our website to meet him. 
No Apts 
www.animalhelpalliance.org

name: Julie
description: Meet Julie, she is 5 yrs 15 lb Chihuahua mix. She came to AH4S after being confiscated by animal control along with 3 other siblings. She is a sweet girl and good with other dogs. We need a little time to get to know her better and we will update her information as we learn more about her. To meet her please text Diana at 702-239-7986 or thru ahome4spot.com

name: Blitz
description: Meet Blitz! Blitz came to us as a stray so we aren't too sure of his past. Blitz does have a very shy personality at first. But with a little love and trust, he will warm up to his new family.  Blitz will require a very high fence as he is still a little shy of people it is important all precautions are taken so he can transition into his new home nicely. Blitz is a very loving and sweet boy who just needs someone to show him what love really is. Is there room in your heart and home for Blitz? We really would like to see Blitz in a loving home. He adores playing with other dogs.

name: Speedy
description: Meet Speedy! Speedy came to us as a stray so we aren't to sure of his past. Speedy does have a very shy personality at first. But with a little love and trust, he will warm up to his new family.  Speedy will require a very high fence as he is still a little shy of people it is important all precautions are taken so he can transition into his new home nicely. Speedy is a very loving and sweet boy who just needs someone to show him what love really is. Is there room in your heart and home for Speedy? He absolutely loves ther dogs and comes completely out of his shell when he can play with other dogs.

name: Poppy
description:
Poppy is about  2  yrs old and weighs about 49 lbs.   She is very shy and timid, as she was found running with a pack of dogs at a landfill.   She will need a patient, quiet home.   She would do best with another social dog in the home.   She has alot of potential just waiting to burst out.    More will be known about me soon.

name: Lil Mama
description:
Lil Mama is about  3  yrs old and weighs about 37 lbs.  She is very friendly and knows her basic commands.   She came into the shelter as a stray so more will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)
