name: Beah
description:
Beah is about 2   yrs old and weighs about 77 lbs.  She is a bit bossy with other dogs, and would do best as the only dog in the home.   She knows some commands and is as friendly as her pictures show.   She would do best with children over 10 yrs old.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Beah, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Beah is spayed/neutered, has current vaccinations and includes a microchip, deworming and 2 free vet visits.  Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information listed on the homepage for requirements and restrictions. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Tasha
description:
Meet Tasha! This mature lady is in need of a warm, safe, and mellow home to spend her senior year's. Tasha is about 15. 2018 was a really hard year for her. Both of her people passed away within 6 months of each other

I cannot imagine how worried she was for them through their illness and how lost she must have felt when they'd gone away. Luckily Tasha found a wonderful temporary foster home for the last few months. They healed her heart, changed her food so her hot spots
went away, and gave her furry siblings and a comfy place to rest and recover. Well, Tasha is feeling so well now that she is making some preferences known. One very important objection is to small children. It's heartbreaking because the kids have really tried to be her friend, but she is not having it. Tasha gets along with other dogs and is tolerant of cats if they leave her alone. She just doesn't want to snuggle with them. We are looking for a child free home to help Tasha be as comfortable as she deserves. She is a senior but has not presented with any health issues. For interest in fostering or adopting please email info@havlv.com

name: Rosie
description: Thatâs me, Rosie, just soaking in some rays.  Iâve come a long way since joining FFDR last September.  I didnât get much socialization beforehand and humans make me a little nervous, but Iâm doing better. Still, Iâd do best in a quiet house with no kids.  I do get along with most dogs â in fact, Iâd prefer it if you have another small dog who would help me to learn the ropes.  Once I know I can trust you, you can trust me to be a loving dog who loves nothing more than to sit in your lap and spend time with you.

name: East
description:
East is a beautiful 5 year old girl. She has not shown any negative reaction toward large or small dogs. She also should do well in a home with mellow cats. She has a cat for a foster sibling right now.

East is a very smart and receptive girl who wants to please her humans. She is at near pro level with her basic command skills and loves to show off her paw shake heart stealer move.

East

is crate trained and was an easy girl to give a refresher course in potty training.

East

was pretty mellow at the shelter and just wanted to be close to human friends. Since she left the shelter, she has discovered that doing fast speed zoomies and playing with her toys is so fun. Happiness!!

East

enjoys people and loves to be a shadow. She does ask for additional patience and understanding when she meets men. She is building her confidence as she learns that she is safe and will not be in a vulnerable position again. All she needs is love and guidance as she continues on the path of her full potential of greatness.

To express interest in meeting

East

, please contact Melissa at 702-301-8926 or send an interest email to

info@havlv.com

.

name: Cha Cha
description: More info coming soon.

name: Knight
description: Meet knight, a handsome 5 yr 65 lb intelligent Flat Coated Retriever mix looking for a loving home. Due to a rough start in life, he needs his companion to be a calm and strong leader. He has showed courage and resilience as he is learning through training to trust people again. Once you build a relationship with this boy, it is easy to see what a gem he is inside. With the right family and ongoing training, he will be a goofy and loyal companion who lives up to his amazing potentials. We welcome you to come and meet this beautiful boy. He needs an   adopter with experience and no small children. We will update his information as we get to know him better. For further information please text Diana at 702-239-7986 or thru ahome4spot.com

name: MARVEL
description: Such a sweet heart!  Marvel ended up with the shelter with a litter of 10 puppies.  Of course we had to pull her and her puppies out of there!  Marvel is such a good mama, but now it's time for her to find her own home.  Marvel is around 3 years old and only 44 lbs.  She is a happy, friendly girl.  She walks nicely on a leash and rides nicely in a car.   If you would like to meet this sweet, playful girl, please email AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com.

name: Betty
description:
Betty is a sweet chihuahua mix female.  She is looking for a forever home. Betty is not always a fan of other animals, especially ones that get in her face. She would do best as an only pet.

She loves to be with her human. She enjoys car rides and walks. If you are looking for a companion, she's your girl.

Dogs are available for adoption Saturday from 11am to 4pm and Sunday from 11-3pm at PETSMART (9869 S. Eastern Ave at Silverado Ranch, in the Target plaza, Las Vegas, NV 89123).  

Visit us online at www.HappyHomeAnimalSanctuary.org.

Volunteers and/or donations are always welcome!  Thank You for your support.

name: Jojo
description:
Jojo is cute, sweet, and funny.  He is a terrier mix that is approximately 8 years old.  Just look at that cute face! He gets along with other dogs and likes to play tug-of-war and chase.  He likes people and kids.  He would love to have a forever home.

If you are interested in meeting Jojo, then call or text Amber at 702-203-4134.

Visit us online at www.HappyHomeAnimalSanctuary.org.

Volunteers and/or donations are always welcome!  Thank You for your support.

name: Carmella
description:
Carmella is a sweet chihuahua mix female.  She is looking for a forever home.

Dogs are available for adoption Saturday from 11am to 4pm and Sunday from 11-3pm at PETSMART (9869 S. Eastern Ave at Silverado Ranch, in the Target plaza, Las Vegas, NV 89123).  

Visit us online at www.HappyHomeAnimalSanctuary.org.

Volunteers and/or donations are always welcome!  Thank You for your support.

name: Maggie
description:
Maggie is about 8 1/2 yrs old. She is a quiet diamond in the rough. She is easily overlooked because she doesn't demand attention like alot of the other dogs. She is calm, always happy to see you and does have alot of zip and playfulness when taken into the play yard. She came in as a stray to a shelter with another dogs.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Maggie, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Maggie is spayed/neutered, has current vaccinations and includes a microchip, deworming and 2 free vet visits.  Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information listed on the homepage for requirements and restrictions. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Pudge
description:
Pudge is looking for an active household who will spend time on walks, running, hiking and playing fetch in the yard.

Crate and house trained, she is best as an only dog.  A home with Heeler experience is preferred.  With a committed family, Pudge can be a great dog and her true sweet funny personality will shine through.

name: Tyson
description:
Hobbies: catching balls, chasing balls, throwing balls in the air, swimming to get balls.

Favorite Food:  Don't care about food unless it's the shape of a ball.

Favorite Things:  Balls and more balls.

I would like to find a family that will play ball with me in the yard and buys me lots of balls; all kinds of balls.  I'm very easy going and a good listener when I'm not playing with balls.

Can we meet?  I love play dates!

Application, home visit and adoption fee required.

name: Mr. Toad
description:
Mr Toad is a short nugget with a big personality who would be a great family dog. He lights up when children are around because it reminds him of his former family. He has been a long timer of the rescue but never lost his spirit. He loves attention, meeting new people, perfect dog to bring to work, he will just lay under the desk, he can be a couch potato with a fun playful side.
He does well being left home alone and will walk right into his kennel. He knows commands and walks great off the leash. He can do well with a low key female dog but wouldn't mind being the only dog at home to suck up all the attention. No cats, please!

name: Jack
description:
Aka: Gentleman Jack
Hobbies:  Netflix and chill, getting belly rubs, playing with toys, a lover of everyone he meets.
Favorite Food: A Kong stuffed full of cookies and peanut butter.
About Jack:  He's looking for a forever foster family that will shower him with love and a nice bed to rest his old bones on. Don't let his age fool you because he is still a goofy guy who loves to play.  Amazingly, 4 years ago Jack couldn't walk.  With some TLC and medicine for arthritis he fully recovered and is the first out the door for a walk today.

Our Foster Forever Program means we pay for Jack's food, supplies and Vet care, you provide the love.

Adopting or fostering Jack means giving him the love and comfort he craves and deserves for the rest of his days.

An application and home check are required.

name: Issa
description:
Isis loves to have fun.  A sweet girl who gets along with other dogs she is crate and house trained.  

Isis has lots of life and love to give and is looking for a warm comfy bed, good food and a committed forever family.

name: Heidi
description: Heidi is a sweet girl who walks great on a leash and likes people and dogs with a similar energy level.  Crate and house trained she lovers her car rides.  Heidi can jump some walls so a high fence is a requirement.  No small pets or children.

name: Foxy Roxy
description: Foxy Roxy has lots of energy and would be best with an active family to help her use it all.  she listens well, walks well on a leash, loves people and kids and gets along with other dogs after proper introduction.  Foxy loves car rides and hanging out with the family.  She had ACL surgery in 2017 and has healed well.  This does mean that she is not a candidate for a runner but would love regular walks to keep her muscles strong.

name: Elvi
description: Elvi has lots of energy and makes her a great dog for an active family who likes to walk, run and hike.  Crate and housetrained, she loves her toys.  A little work on her basic commands will go a long way.  Elvi doesn't realize how big she is so no small children or other pets.

name: Candy Roo
description:
This old girl has had a tough life and was obviously used for nothing more than breeding by some irresponsible human and her body shows it.  She still has lots of energy and loves her humans.  A little play time in the yard and walks every few days would be a dream come true for this senior.

Candy Roo is in our Foster Forever Program.  We provide the food, supplies and Vet care; you provide the love.

Senior dog rock.

Application and home check reguired.

name: Paige
description: Paige is a very sweet girl.  Sheâs approximately 4 years old and a Dogo Argentino mix.  Sheâs a big, strong girl, so no small kids, but she loves older, respectful kids.  She knows her basic commands, is potty trained, crate trained, and we are working on her leash skills.  Sheâs happy to go on walks, or chill on the couch with you.  Sheâs a goofy, playful girl who wants to do whatever you are doing.  She does enjoy doggy friends with a proper introduction.  She will need an EXPERIENCED adopter. Contact either Diana at (702) 239-7986, or her foster mom, Dawn, at (702) 218-8081 to meet this special girl.

name: Josie
description:
Josie is about  2  yrs old.   She is very friendly, very active. She came into the shelter pregnant and had 10 puppies (be up for adoption the 29th) after Christmas. She also fostered 4 week old pups along with hers until they found a bottle feeding foster mom.  More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Josie, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Josie is spayed/neutered, has current vaccinations and includes a microchip, deworming and 2 free vet visits.  Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information listed on the homepage for requirements and restrictions. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Diego
description: Meet Diego.... This boy is a two year old long hair chi Mix. 2 Years Old  14 lbs

name: Cupcake
description: Meet Cupcake... She is as sweet  as her name !! A total joy ! Sheâs a 6 month old Lab Mix.

name: Buttercup
description: Meet Buttercup...She is as cute as her name !! A total joy ! Sheâs a 6 month old Lab Mix.

name: Pantera
description: Meet Pantera.....She is a really good girl. Sheâs house trained, spayed, loves cats but needs to be the only dog in the home.  Playful and sweet. She is a 11 mth old Lab Pit Mix and about 51 lbs.

name: JAX
description:
Jax is very affectionate. He loves to snuggle and give kisses, aka lick faces. He is seriously handsome, enthusiastic, happy, active and super friendly. 70 pounds of athletic fun. He loves the outdoors, riding in the car with his head in the wind, running, going for walks and taking naps. He needs to be in an adult home until he training is complete because he loves to jump up and hug you. Jax would LOVE his very own fenced-in back yard
Very friendly and Animal Network is getting social training, he use to go to doggie park until a big dog picked on him. Please contact AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com

name: Lilly
description: Lilly or as we affectionately call her silly Lilly has been with us since September last year. Shes still a young dog and loving and wants affection. She has had training twice a week and has learned so much.   Lilly would be better as an only pet as she is not friendly with all dogs. But we are always willing to do a meet and greet to see if she would get on with a dog you already have.  We recommend no small dogs. She seems to really love her neighbour Mallory. She needs someone who is willing to continue teaching her good doggie manners. She is a super smart dog and learns fast. A home with older children would be better. With the right training and love, Lilly will make a perfect dog for your family! Lilly would really love to have a family with a large fenced in yard so she could run off some of her energy and chase a ball all day! Come out and meet Lilly and see if you are the fur-ever family for her! Is there no one that will give loving Lilly a home??

name: Ash
description: Ash is a sweet girl who has just finished recovering from a broken leg.  She needs some training and patience to bring out the best of her personality.  Truly an indoor dog.  She is afraid of loud noises and thunder.  Ash is a great walking buddy.  She has never been around children and would do best as an only dog. She is crate trained.  Ash needs a patient adopter or foster to help her with her fear of noises.

name: Ginger
description:
Ginger is about  2  yrs old and weighs about 40 lbs.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Ginger, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Ginger is spayed/neutered, has current vaccinations and includes a microchip, deworming and 2 free vet visits.  Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information listed on the homepage for requirements and restrictions. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Daisy
description:
We love Daisy!  She is one of the most fun dogs we have known. She loves swimming, playing fetch, going for walks and hikes, car rides - you name it! She's super athletic and down for anything. She would love a family with a pool or who loves to go adventuring (even if it's just to the local park for walking and sniffing). She has been formally trained but will need a refresher, but for now her leash skills, along with all the basics, are pretty rock solid.

She is 6-7 years old, loves kids and adults, and gets along with some dogs with proper introductions. She is crate trained and is up to date on all her vaccines as well as being spayed and microchipped.

name: Pablo
description: We are very excited to update you on Pablo !! If you remember Pablo had feces & urinary incontinence due to severe abuse. After several laser therapy treatments and because of an amazing foster ~ Pablo is ready for his fur ever home! The laser treatment has reduced his incontinence to a minimum. After living with a foster, he now is house trained. The only special need he has is to be taken outside right after he eats. Other than that, this 2 year old Yorkie Mix who is about 12 lbs is one of the sweetest, most loving dogs in the history of our rescue. Gets along with other dogs and children. Mayteâs Rescue will pay for two additional laser treatments upon adoption. Originally from Puerto Rico

name: Apollo
description:
Apollo is about  1 1/2  yrs old.  I was rescued from a local shelter where I was brought in as a stray.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Apollo, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Apollo is spayed/neutered, has current vaccinations and includes a microchip, deworming and 2 free vet visits.  Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information listed on the homepage for requirements and restrictions. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Shelby
description: Meet Shelby! Shelby is a very sweet young boy who is a year old. He is so full of personality as his photos show! He has been in foster since 11/18 and is really ready to have his own special people and a place yo call home. Could this loving boy be the final piece of the puzzle your family is missing? Come and meet him today! Look at how cool he looks in his sun glasses. Such a great fun dog.

name: Dillon
description: This boy is a special one.. meet Dillon. This 3 year old has cherry eye but dont let that scare you. He is full of love and wants his forever home. We want to raise money to get rid of this cosmetic flaw so if you'd like to help please donate in his name. He is great with other dogs and children. Let's find him a home !

name: Bella
description: Bella is a sweet and lovable 2 year old Pocket Pittie. She is energetic, playful and would love to be with another dog or human with her energy level. She needs an active home that would be able to give her lots of exercise. She would do best in a home with 1 dog with the same energy level. She doesnât quite know her strength so other pup should be at least 50lbs. No cats. Sheâs good with responsible kids over 10 years old. Sheâs under 50lbs, chipped, fixed and current on all shots. Located in Las Vegas. 89113

name: Doobie
description:
Say hello to Doobie!!
Doobie is a 4 year old Mastiff/Shepherd Mix. 
This boy came to us when his owner dropped him off at the shelter because she was moving. 
Terrified & withdrawn Doobie bounced around before he landed himself in a wonderful Board & Train program and heâs never been a better version of himself!

Doobie has learned to trust other dogs and has bonded with quite a few in his foster home, heâs a typical Mastiff and is very protective of his home and humans so a Mastiff experienced home is needed to adopt or foster Doobie!
Doobie is truly a wonderful boy and deserves a home that will give him the love and guidance he needs. 
He also comes with FREE TRAINING FOR LIFE!
If youâd like to meet Doobie, please visit our website and fill out an application! 
www.animalhelpalliance.org

name: Falcor
description: Falcor  has environmental allergies so he does best as an indoor dog. He has gotten a slow introduction and is now living indoors with two other dogs and a cat. He is doing amazing and loves to go.

name: Rosie
description:
Rosie is a big girl with a big personality! Rosie is gorgeous and loves to play, is great in the car (she loves to sit and just look out the window,) and she can't wait to find a forever family of her own. Rosie LOVES to swim!  She  is a young, active dog who deserves an active family to spend her days with. Don't worry, though, she knows how to be calm and loves a good day of lounging around the house. Sounds perfect!
 
Rosie is around 3 years old, 80lbs, spayed, microchipped, and is up-to-date on vaccines and deworming. She would do best as the only pet in the home.

name: Meghan
description: We would like to re-introduce to you Meghan. She has been waiting ever so patiently to be adopted. She is so very deserving. Sheâs such a good girl. Great with kids and other dogs. Bouncy & happy. Meghan is a 1 Year old Pomeranian mix, about 9 lbs and spayed. Oh and she is a Houdini ! She needs a secure outdoor space !

name: Gigi
description:
Gigi is a rockstar! Her foster says,

\"This sweet girl has a good heart and good behavior to match!\".

She is already trained in basic obedience, and is fine to stay home by herself if you have to leave and is happy to great you with lots of love when you get home. Don't let this senior's age fool you, even at 11 years young she still plays and runs across the park just fine. She is also good with both dogs and cats with a calm introduction. If you would like to make her a part of your family, please contact info@havlv.com.

name: Mika
description:
Meet beautiful Mika!
Mika was abandoned by her family at the rescues vet & we fell in love with her playful, fun personality.

Mika is looking for a foster or forever home. 
Sheâs an athletic girl  between 4-5 years old 50 lbs whoâs awesome on car rides and walks well on leash. 
She enjoys the company of other friendly well behaved dogs of all sizes outside of the home only .
She is best suited with a highly active human and is a great running and hiking partner. 
She loves kids with all her heart but is best with older children as sheâs a little bit of a power house and could knock a small child over. 

Mika Is undergoing training via the rescue:) 

Please visit our website to complete an application to meet Mika!

name: Angel
description:
Angel is about  6  yrs old.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Angel, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Yogui
description:
Do you guys remember Yogi? We saved him from Puerto Rico and he was adopted by a family in Las Vegas last November. 

His family surrendered him back to us because a member of the family developed allergy induced asthma. 

This poor boy is wondering where his family went. We are showering him with lots of love. 

Yogi is a 9 year old Schnauzer Poodle Mix. Unless heâs changed, we recommend that he be the only dog in the home. Heâs a jumper so he needs a secure yard. 
rescue@mayte.com
kim@maytesrescue.com

name: Mari
description: Mari is a happy, active adult who would make a great companion for an older adult.

name: Beanie
description:
Beanie WAS STOLEN!! HIS FOSTERS REFUSE TO GIVE HIM BACK. We are so sorry to share this news! 

Located In Vegas 

http://pekespawsandtails.com/

Image may contain: dog, outdoor and nature

name: TOBY
description:
TOBY is around 5 years old. Heâs a Maltese - Pekingese Mix. Good with other dogs and children. Toby is new to the rescue but seems very sweet.  TOBY is friendly and easily handled. Learning to walk on a leash. Trained to pee pads but is doing well with going to bathroom in the yard. . Adoption Fee $250 

Pekes Paws and Tails
Clark County
Las Vegas, Nevada

name: Coby
description: Coby is a loyal friend once he gets to know you. He just has to know that you are a trusting person who is going to love him. He does prefer men and is person specific. He would not be good with children and hands that are everywhere. Coby loves to play with his blanket and carries it around like a baby. Coby is the best and just needs a chance to show his true self. He just has to be introduced properly and then your going to be in love with him. He likes other small dogs but does not like BIG dogs. Please give this little guy a chance. He will come with free trainer if needed.

name: Athena
description: My name is Athena and Iâve been here at FFDR since I was 1 Â½ years old.  I had a rough life at first and it makes me a little nervous around new people, but Iâm doing better.  I have arthritis in my knees and Iâve had ACL surgery for which I take anti-inflammatory meds.  It would be best for everyone if youâve had some experience with Rotties as we can be a bit pig-headed!  Iâm not the best fit if you have kids, but I do well with other dogs as long as theyâre not in my face all the time. I love car rides and I like to play with my tough ball!

name: Penelope
description:
Her favorite volunteer likes to call her Penelope Cruz.  She is indeed the shiniest of stars. Always greets you with a mega watt smile and vigorous tail wag. She adores all of her fans and graciously signs autographs with the sloppiest of kisses. If youâd like to meet this one of a kind celebrity, contact us before she gets scooped up by someone else. 

She is approximately 4 years old and 60 pounds. She is smart and knows her basic commands. She is a starlet, just waiting for her big break.

name: Maui
description:
Somewhat shy, but very affectionate when familiar with people
Not adequately socialized before coming to FFDR
Can be vocal

name: Maka
description: My name is Maka and Iâm a lucky girl.  I was a stray found just before Christmas a couple of years ago (my name is short for Mele Kalikimaka, which is Merry Christmas in Hawaiian).  I was starving and very, very pregnant.  I gave birth 3 days after FFDR took me in and they found homes for all of my 9 puppies.  Now itâs my turn!  Iâm not a fan of other female dogs, and male dogs need to be my size and pretty chill.  I am very sweet and loving to my 2-legged pack members, although I prefer them to be teenaged or older.  Iâd love to meet your family to see if I fit in!

name: Johnny
description:
Needs calm family atmosphere
Needs canine companionship
Needs consistant live style
No kids
Likes to play and cuddle

name: Gloria
description:
Extremely shy
Requires patient owners willing to socialize
Okay with dogs her size

name: Chloe
description: Iâm Chloe and Iâm an overgrown puppy!  I love to be the center of attention â not because Iâm greedy, but because Iâm just that lovable!  Since I think Iâm still a puppy, Iâm better off with older kids and bigger, more mellow dogs â I tend to roughhouse when I play because I donât know my own size.  Iâm to be too much for cats to handle, too. Iâve been with FFDR since I was just 9 months old and while theyâve been very good to me, Iâm ready to find a family of my own.

name: Icing
description: This little white cutie is Icing, a 10-year-old Jack Russell Terrier mix.  Heâs got all the energy and drive you would expect for his breed.  He is obsessed with balls and will play for hours, often throwing it for himself for entertainment. He needs a patient owner who will set boundaries in the home. He is potty trained and loves to swim more than anything.  He would be a great sporting dog and has an amazing drive.  He is very intelligent and knows his basic obedience commands.  For more information on Icing, call Diana at (702) 239-7986  or go to A Home 4 Spot Animal Rescue

name: Momma Gallant
description: Momma Gallant is very smiley sweet young girl who came to us originally in summer of 2018 very pregnant. She raised her babies and is now learning how to be a dog. One thing is for sure, Momma LOVES other dogs. She is very fearful of new people and places, but if she has a dog friend to go with her she warms up very quickly. Momma really wants to live with other dogs in her forever home so they can help her continue to build confidence. She wants a lot of attention and would do best in a quite home that is willing to continue her training that comes free for life with her adoption.

name: POOKIE
description: These pictures just don't do Pookie justice on how cute this little petite girl is in person. Her records says she is 2 years old and 58 lbs, she is short to the ground and only medium size. Poor Pookie thought she got lucky when she was adopted from the shelter only to find herself looking for a new home again when her owner passed unexpectedly. A family member would love to take her but is over the limit in her home and wants to make sure Pookie finds a safe and a forever home. Please contact AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com if you would like to meet sweet Pookie.

name: Stewart
description:
Stewart is a 11 year old chihuahua/terrier mix.  His owner passed away and his family could not keep him.  He is a sweet boy looking for a forever home.  Stewart has had a dental cleaning.

Dogs are available for adoption Saturday from 11am to 4pm and Sunday from 11-3pm at PETSMART (9869 S. Eastern Ave at Silverado Ranch, in the Target plaza, Las Vegas, NV 89123).  

Visit us online at www.HappyHomeAnimalSanctuary.org.

Volunteers and/or donations are always welcome!  Thank You for your support.

name: Lucky
description:
Very good with people, but apparently not other dogs or cats.
She was rescued from a breeder in California. Food possessive; she probably didn't get enough to eat where she was previously.

name: Dublin
description: Dublin is a super loving mellow 7 year old guy who wants nothing more than some toys and his people! He loves to get out and about, but is just as happy to lounge on the couch too! Dublin is very well behaved in the home and has no problem being left unattended. He prefers to be the only animal in the home. If you're looking for a fun chill guy to great you when you get home from work he's definitely your boy!!!

name: RED
description: Look at this big fella!  All 75 pounds of him!  Red was rescued from the shelter after being there a long time.  He was being passed over again and again, so we pulled him out of there to hopefully increase his chances of finding a home.  As stated previously, Red is a large guy who is also very strong.  He will need a strong new owner to handle him.  He is around 5 years old.  He is friendly with people.  He is particular with other dogs, so a home where he is the only pet would be best.  If you would like to meet Red, please email AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com.

name: JoJo
description: Woof....woof it is me JoJo. I am a 11 lb male Chihuahua mix. They keep saying I am a senior, I still disagree. I am still full of life and I still have alot of energy. I am set in my ways and can get a little grumpy but I will give my owner lots of love and attention. I am hard of hearing so please dont sneak up on me because it could scare me. I do good with older kids, I love going on car rides, walks and playing with toys. I am good with other dogs and even a cat. So if you would love a loyal cute companion guess what I am the dog for you. If interested contact my foster mom at 702-466-7594  or Diana at 702- 239-7986 or thru ahome4spot.com

name: Opie
description:
UPDATE 10/21/18. Unfortunately, Through no fault of his own, Opie has been returned to VSR. Our little man came back looking wonderful! His coat is clean, soft and very shiny! Heâs developed a very lean and muscular physique! Opie lived with 4 kids under the age of 6, and did great with them. He can be very particular with other dogs. Opie was a huge hit at our big event recently. If you are interested in meeting Opie and possibly making him a permanent member of your family, please fill out our online adoption application! 


Meet VSR âs latest faux shepherd, or fepherd, Opie. This little 2 year old shepherd mix peanut came into the local shelter with wounds covering both his back legs. Was he hit by a car? Attacked by another dog? We may never know. But what we do know is that this little 40 lb bundle of joy is a sweet, happy dog no matter what. Heâs still recovering from his neuter surgery and his wounds are healing nicely. Once heâs ready, we will get to know more about him and post an update.

name: RYDER CUP
description: Ryder has been in his foster home for a year now.  He's doing fabulous!!  He's a very sweet boy who does very well with a consistent routine.  Ryder is deaf but has learned some hand signals.  He also does great in the car, knows how to use the doggy door, and loves visiting Home Depot but snoozing on the couch is the ultimate relaxation for him!!  He loves people and knowing where they are.  He just wants to be with you.  He is best suited in a home where he's not left alone too much and would be best as an only dog.  He does get along with other dogs, but it takes a lot of time and patience to get him used to them especially if living together in the same house.  So, are you able and willing to give Ryder that cushy loving retirement home he deserves?  If interested or have questions about Ryder, contact us at AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com.

name: Beautiful
description: This precious girl is Beautiful. She is 4 yrs 15 lb Pomeranian Chihuahua mix. She was found as a stray along with her best friend Tater. These two are inseparable so they must be adopted together. The perfect home would be an all female household because Tater does best with female humans. They are houstrained to a doggie door, good with older kids and are good with other dogs. To meet them please text Diana at 702-239-7986 or thru ahome4spot.com

name: Tater
description: Meet Tater is a little fella at just 5 lbs 3 yrs old Chihuahua. He was found as a stray along with his best friend Beautiful. These two are inseparable so they must be adopted together. The perfect home would be an all female household because Tater does best with female humans. They are house trained to a doggie door, good with older kids and are good with other dogs. To meet him please text Diana at 702-239-7986 or thru ahome4spot.com

name: Kiwi
description: Meet Kiwi owner surrender relearning about him will update.

name: Cowboy
description: Meet cutie-patootie, Cowboy. This little dumpling was turned in as a stray to the local shelter. As you can imagine, heâs pretty confused right now. We believe he is about 2 years old. We are letting him decompress for a few days, then we will start working on getting to know him. I can tell you that he is very sweet and takes treats very nicely. But stay tuned for more updates as we learn more!

name: Paulie
description:
Paulie needs his very own special person.  With lots of life left he would make a great pool side and tv watching companion.  At 8 years old, Paulie needs a comfy dog bed, safe environment, toys to play with and a committed life long family.  He recently had surgery for skin cancer and is now under our Foster Forever Program.  We pay for everything until he slips away to the Rainbow Bridge.  You provide the love, care and affection.

Application and home check apply.  Only serious inquiries please.

name: Buddy
description:
Buddy is a 6 yr old sweetheart and gets along with other dogs and finds comfort in doggie friends. A home with no cats would be best for him. Fine with tortoises :)

Buddy is very insecure and timid and does take time to warm up and does not like to be forced to be affectionate but he is a lover. He likes to sleep on the bed or couch to be close to you and sleeps like no other. Older children are fine if respectful due to him getting nervous with fast movements and is sensitive about his tail being touched. He is very playful with toys and runs fast laps. He absolutely loves going on walks/hikes and does well on leash. He is receptive. He is a low maintenance dog but does have some separation anxiety due to his abandonment fear. No crate for him without a very focus effort to positively train. Right now, he panics if he is placed in a crate or kennel. He loves to be a shadow and he follows from room to room. He likes car rides but is uneasy if he is left along in car and out of sight of his human. For interest, please email info@havlv.com

name: Chauncey
description:
Chauncey is about  1  yrs old and weighs about 61 lbs.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoptions at C-A-L Ranch, located at 232 N Jones Blvd, Las Vegas, right off the I-95, on the weekends from 10-4. Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet ( if applicable ). 

If you are interested in Chauncey, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com will be at adoptions this weekend. We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to adoptions.

Chauncey is microchipped and comes with a free vet visit. Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information below before contacting one of our volunteers. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed please contact us regarding how you can foster or volunteer for our organization.

name: Shadow
description:
I am an 9 year old, male Min Pin mix, weighing 16 lbs.  My  \"Dad\" passed away unexpectedly, so I have to find another home, which should be adult only.  I get along well with people and other small dogs, but cats are unknown.  I do enjoy my daily walks or trips to the dog park.  I am house trained and will use a doggie door, and am good in the car.  I am affectionate and just love to cuddle up for a love fest. 

Adoption fee $200.00

If interested, please complete an application at 
https://forecloseduponpets.org/dog-adoption-application/

name: Vivian
description:
Vivan is about 1  1/2 yrs old.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoptions at C-A-L Ranch, located at 232 N Jones Blvd, Las Vegas, right off the I-95, on the weekends from 10-4. Foster homes & volunteers are always needed please contact us regarding how you can foster or volunteer for our organization.

name: MAJOR
description: What a face!  Major is around 5 years old.  He was rescued from the shelter because his time was up.  Major walks nicely on a leash and is well mannered.  He loves his treats and toys!  He would do best in a home with kids over the age of 12.  If you would like to meet this playful boy, please email AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com.

name: Dakkar
description:
Dakkar is a very energetic \"senior\"!  He has lots of good years left to be an active part of your household.
Our adoption fees are deeply reduced on all our seniors and include the following:
 Spay/Neuter
 Immunizations (up-to-date at time of adoption)
 Bag of food
 Toys
 Treats
 Coupon Booklets to Petco and Blue Buffalo
 Doggie \"Poop\" bags
 Vitamins
 Dog Bed
 Stainless Steel Bowl
 Collapsible Travel Bowl
 Shampoo
 Collar & Leash
 Certificate for a Free Bath at the Paw Spa
 Medical Records

name: Cayenne
description:
Cayenne is a \"senior\" who still has several good years left.  He needs to have a job and feel secure in his home.
Our adoption fees on all our seniors are dramatically reduced and include:
 Spay/Neuter
 Immunizations (up-to-date at time of adoption)
 Bag of food
 Toys
 Treats
 Coupon Booklets to Petco and Blue Buffalo
 Doggie \"Poop\" bags

name: Jamocha

name: Blake
description: Meet Blake, a 3 year old St Bernard mixed with Great Pyrenees. He is looking for his forever home with NO small children. He would do best in a calm quiet home as he can be a little nervous. Blake is very dedicated to his human and can be a bit protective at times. He needs a handler dedicated to helping him gain some confidence so he can be the best dog he can be. He would be ok with a calm dog around his size. For more information or to meet him please text Diana at 702-239-7986 or thru ahome4spot.com--

name: King
description:
King is about  6  yrs old and weighs about 54 lbs.   More will be known about me soon.

name: Oscar
description:
Oscar is about  2 1/2  yrs old.  He is good with other dogs and children.  He is loving and playful and likes riding in the car.  He is learning the leash but is learning fast.   He is very protective of his family and home.  More will be known about me soon.

name: Ty
description:
Ty is about  8  1/2 yrs old, born Sept '09.  He is extremely well trained and even had agility training.  He has all good qualities (hundreds of them) except one flaw.   He does overly protect his owner.   He would need to be crated when you have visitors.  Other than that one item, he will be the best guy you have ever had.  He loves fetch and you will wear out before he does.   More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoptions at C-A-L Ranch, located at 232 N Jones Blvd, Las Vegas, right off the I-95, on the weekends from 10-4.  Please email us to confirm the dog you are interested in will be attending that particular weekend.   We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to adoptions. Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet ( if applicable ). 

If you are interested in Ty, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com will be at adoptions this weekend. We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to adoptions.

Ty is microchipped and comes with a free vet visit. Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information below before contacting one of our volunteers. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed please contact us regarding how you can foster or volunteer for our organization.

name: Panda
description:
Panda is a volunteer favorite!  First of all, she's adorable, but beyond that, she's just a pleasure to be around. She's sweet and well mannered but loves to play and is so smart. We keep teaching her tricks and she picks them up so fast! She's one of the dogs we take to adoption events because in all the chaos she can stay calm and collected in addition to being one of our more outgoing and charming dogs. She sure does love meeting new people! She loves going shopping and picking out new toys and she's content to play with you or by herself. Panda loves car rides, though she is usually passed out snoring before we've even pulled out of our parking spot! She's a great dog and we know she's going to make a family so happy!

Panda is around 3 years old, 65 lbs, spayed, microchipped, and is up-to-date on vaccines and deworming. She gets along with dogs with proper introductions. No cats, unfortunately.

name: Duke aka Onyx
description:
Duke is about 3 1/2   yrs old and weighs about 62 lbs.  He needs a quieter home with no young children.   He gets over stimulated with screaming, running children.   He would do best in a home without other dogs.  He went thru professional training but was not worked with so he needs refreshing.  

His ideal home would be with an all female home, he is very defensive with men.  More will be known about me soon.   

A Path 4 Paws holds adoption events EVERY Saturday & Sunday from 10am-4pm at C-A-L Ranch,  located at 232 N. Jones Blvd right off the I-95.   Please bring your dog(s) for a meet and greet (if applicable)

If you are interested in Duke, please contact dogrescuelv@hotmail.com to confirm the dog you are interested in,  will be attending that particular weekend.  We have limited space at the store, therefore we can not take every dog out to the event.

Duke is spayed/neutered, has current vaccinations and includes a microchip, deworming and 2 free vet visits.  Adoption fee applies.  Please make sure you have read the information listed on the homepage for requirements and restrictions. 

Foster homes & volunteers are always needed.  Please contact us regarding how you can help by fostering or volunteering for our organization.

name: Vader
description: Meet Vader, he is a Dachshund mix 6 years old and weighs about 18 lbs. What we know so far about Vader is he was turned into our local shelter as an owner surrender. He needed to be rescued to save his life. He is good in the car, appears so far to be house trained. He needs to have a home with no small children. He would do best as an only dog and  have an experienced adopter or someone willing to do some training with him. We will update his information as we get to know him. To meet Vader please fill out an interest form at www.ahome4spot.com

name: Flower
description: Sweet little Flower is looking for a home of her own, and a family for her to love. She enjoys long walks where she can sniff everything out and explore! Friendly Flower LOVES people, likes other dogs, and always has a \"Happy Tail\"!

name: Fivel (Lucky)
description: This is Fivel, a 8 year old, 7 lb. Chihuahua.  He was found wandering as a stray and taken to our local shelter with no sign of responsible ownership.  Fivel is now looking for his forever home where he can feel safe and secure.  He is sweet, loves people and gets along with other dogs.  For more info on Fivel, contact Lance at 720-352-5487 and complete an interest application at www.ahome4spot.com.

name: Ducky
description: Ducky is a quirky guy that just wants to go for a run or a swim, destroy some toys and snuggle all day long. He's roughly 3 years old and is working hard on his training which comes free with his adoption. He lives well with other dogs of all sizes, but does require a proper introduction. He goes swimming at Canine Bodywork and Aquatics and is treadmill trained! He's make a great adventure buddy, but he loves to lay in bed on a lazy Sunday too!

name: Catori
description: Catori is so sweet and eager to please! When you meet her, you will fall in love with her happy smiling little chops and loving disposition. She would rather lean against you for lots of hugs and kisses than go for a walk. The Samadhi Legacy Foundation believes she should be given the tools of training to set her up for success. Catori needs the perfect home with a responsible owner, to protect her, love and train her. (Good with large dogs, just not small dogs or small animals.)

name: Chance
description: Is the strong silent type more your speed? Chance is such a sweetheart that is looking for a home where he can LOVE on his people! Great on a leash and a good listener, he is eager to please, and would need an experience handler that could help him build his confidence. If you give him a CHANCE, you will not regret it!

name: Sprocket
description: Sprocket is a special needs senior dog who is looking for someone to share his golden years with.  He prefers an adult only home and he gets along well with other dogs and cats.  His medical condition requires some medication and routine doctor visits.

name: Spirit
description:
Spirit is an enchanting and energetic Border Collie about 30 pounds and 5 years old.  She's deaf but her vision is fabulous.   Spirit is a double merle, a type of pattern that results in blindness or deafness in dogs.  Even though she can't hear, she is incredibly adaptive and is absolutely dedicated to the art of fun!  She loves to play catch, chase balls, bring the ball back to you, and toss it to you too!  Spirit also loves walks and will keep up with your pace and adventuring.   Her adoption fee is $300.00.

If you are interested in adopting this dog, please complete an adoption application at http://www.onmywayhomerescue.com.  You will be contacted to answer any additional questions you may have regarding the dog and the adoption process.  Thank you for your interest!

name: PJ
description:
NOTE: Due to private donor sponsorship, adoption fee reduced by $50!
PJ was born October 2014.  He is loving and energetic.  He enjoys human company and would be a great companion for someone who is active.

name: Keats
description:
Keats is amazing. We can't say enough good things about this boy. He is athletic, funny, affectionate, smart, eager to please - the whole shebang. His smile is infectious, and he has the best time doing anything as long as he's with his people. He's good looking, the perfect size, and has a great demeanor! He knows how to walk politely on a leash, knows all his basic obedience, and has been in swim class for several months now. He loves to play fetch, go for walks and runs, swim, ride in the car, everthing! He's been a staff favorite for a long time, but we know his perfect forever family is out there, they just haven't found him yet. Is it you? 

Keats is around 6 years old, 70lbs, neutered, microchipped, and is up-to-date on vaccines and deworming. He gets along with large dogs with proper introductions. He would do best in a home with older kids because he is rowdy and large. No cats, unfortunately.

name: Rocket aka Bella
description:
Rocket is about 2 yrs old.  This sweet spunky baby has so much love to give.  Her tail wags so hard you'll think it hurts. Born September 14, 2016 she has tons of energy. She is definitely a Mama's girl! She's looking for a loving single animal home and will promise to be a loyal, brilliant companion for years to come.

We believe she is a Staffordshire Bull Terrier known for its character of fearlessness and loyalty this coupled with an affectionate nature its off-duty quietness and trustworthy stability make it a formost all-purpose dog.  She is available with A Path 4 Paws holds adoptions at C-A-L Ranch, located at 232 N Jones Blvd, Las Vegas, right off the I-95, on the weekends from 10-4. description:

name: Smokey
description:
Hello, my name is Smokey. I'm a 2 year old neutered male Pit Terrier mix that is looking for a forever home. I am looking for an active home that doesn't have any cats. I love squeaky toys! While I'm waiting for my forever home, a foster home is needed for me or my other rescued friends.

I was rescued from a shelter on my last day on earth .

For quicker response, email us at dogrescuelv@hotmail.com  

PLEASE visit our homepage for CURRENT updates to adoption locations, Adoption requirements, restrictions and information

Adoption fees  include the spay/neuter, rabies, vaccinations, microchip, deworm and free vet visit.

name: Janis
description: Janice is a sweetheart who likes to snuggle with her humans.  A little shy, she has come out of her shell a lot in the past couple of months.  She continues to get lots of time out in the public.  Janice knows her basic commands and needs a nice backyard, doggie door, a comfy doggie bed and a little patience while she worms her way into your heart.  She isn't getting any younger and deserves a committed forever home.  She is also crate trained and gets along with other low key female dogs.  No children though, she is afraid of them.

name: Spartacus
description: Spartacus is 6 and can be in a home with other calm dogs.  He LOVES activity and in fact, helped his former mom train for a marathon.  He can also chill and is a love bug who loves to cuddle with his human. He helped his former mom through a very hard time, recovering from cancer.  The neighbors dogs and Spartacus didn't get along and the dogs were always barking through the fence.  One day Spartacus bit the dog and the neighbor reported him saying that she no longer felt safe.  Spartacus has since been in training and lives with a pack of dogs, doing very nicely with his manners.  His mom wants him back, but the stipulations for his return were too restrictive to him and she wants him to have the best life.  She asked us to rescue him from a high-kill shelter and find him his forever home.  He is a dog that bonds very strongly with his human.

name: Ferdinand
description: Ferdi is a young calm quiet boy looking for his person. He loves to love! We donât know his history, but it is clear that he was not exposed too much of anything. Because he was so under socialized he is still learning to be with other dogs. He would be okay with some dogs, but he would prefer to be an only dog. He is great on leash and a lower energy dog. He is fully vaccinated, neutered, microchipped, and comes with 2 free training sessions as well as lifetime discounted boarding by Jennifer Gray at Sunny Day Acres.

name: Kevin
description: Kevin is 4-5 years old. He requires a knowledgeable handler. He has been in Board & train and is ready for someone who has patience & is willing to continue with training (free to his owner). Heâs a great dog who just needs someone to give him a chance. He is a very independent and active dog who loves toys & car rides!

name: Cody
description:
Cody is about  4 yrs old and weighs about 55 lbs.  He lived with small dogs and children.  More will be known about me soon.

name: Madison
description: Madison is a beautiful sweet girl.  She is a real athlete and would love to become your running partner.  Madison is currently in training and progressing quickly.  She is a smart girl who just wants to please everyone.

name: Hollywood
description: Hollywood might be in his senior years but he has lots of life to live and love to give.

name: Duke
description: Duke is one of the most handsome, dogs you will ever meet! His gorgeous subtle, tiger brindle coloring is like nothing you've ever seen!   He is a low-maintenance, laid-back dude, that is great on a leash and loves to play fetch. Duke would love to meet you, so contact us today to meet the love of your life!

name: Raven
description: Raven is super friendly, has that pittie smile and tail wag that makes you love pitties the most. She is well behaved, though some leash training would always be helpful. She lives with two other dogs.. She is great with all people and loves attention, but isn't needy. She would love to hike, hang out at the lake or cuddle to Netflix. She is the quintessential family dog.

name: Buckeye
description:
Buckeye is about 3  yrs old and weighs about 43 lbs.  He is good with other dogs.  He is a bit shy, but very loving guy.   He is allergic to all proteins (meat) except for Fish and Duck.  The food also needs to be grain free with no rice, peas or potatoes.  This is not on a prescription food, so you have several choices in brands that he eats.

name: Tilly/Clover
description:
An adoption application can be completed anytime at http://www.OnMyWayHomeRescue.com. Tilly is a lucky girl! This adorable Shiba Inu mix came to us from a high kill shelter on her last day and she was very overwhelmed and frightened in the shelter. Once she was able to settle into a loving foster home, she has positively blossomed. Even though she has more confidence to gain, Tilly is very smart and figures things out very quickly. She is playful and a little darling. She weighs about 16 pounds and is only 7 years old. Her adoption fee is $300. An adoption application should be completed at http://www.OnMyWayHomeRescue.com and we will contact you after the application has been received.


If you are interested in adopting this dog, please complete an adoption application at http://www.onmywayhomerescue.com.  You will be contacted within 24-48 hours to answer any additional questions you may have regarding the dog and the adoption process.  Thank you for your interest!

name: Dolly
description:
Dolly is about 6  yrs old and weighs about 60 lbs.  She was rescued from a shelter with newborn puppies.   She and her family are now ready for their new families.

name: LELE
description: This is beautiful Lele who is just looking for a home to call hers forever. Lele was dumped by her owner after a family member moved back in with their dogs when she was 9 months old. We thought we had found the perfect single home but the situation has changed due to no fault of Lele.  Lele would do  best in an all adult  home with no other pets. Lele is very energetic at the age of 8 years, loves to jog, walk and hike but her favorite hobby is to lay and watch TV with someone. If you would like to meet Lele and can open your home to share with her please contact animalnetwork.lv@gmail.com

name: Snowflake
description:
My name is Snowflake. I am a sweet girl, Chihuahua mix.Â  I am 5 years oldÂ  and around 21 lbs.Â  I was a FUPI dog once before, and now I'm back, but I'm not sure why.Â  I'd love a home with someone who will love me FUREVER.Â  If you have other pets, I am kind of bossy, so they need to understand that.Â  I am house/doggy door trained. I love walks and snuggles.Â  I am learning to play ball.  If someone is home most of the time, that would be perfect. 

Adoption fee $225.00

If interested, please complete an application at:

https://forecloseduponpets.org/dog-adoption-application/

name: Ginger
description:
Ginger enjoys people and other dogs. She has a gentle personality.  As a young 'senior', she still has many good years left to be a part of your family.
Our adoption fees are deeply reduced on all our seniors.  In addition, included with the adoption fee is the following:
 Spay/Neuter
 Immunizations (up-to-date at time of adoption)
 Bag of food
 Toys
 Treats
 Coupon Booklets to Petco and Blue Buffalo
 Doggie \"Poop\" bags
 Vitamins
 Dog Bed
 Stainless Steel Bowl
 Collapsible Travel Bowl
 Shampoo
 Collar & Leash
 Certificate for a Free Bath at the Paw Spa
 Medical Records

If you are interested in adoption, please come visit us! You may go to our website at www.fortheluvofpaws.org, which gives directions on the 'Contact Us' page and print out an application from the 'Adoptions' page.

name: Buddy 2
description:
Buddy is a cheerful old fella who is 13 years young.  He gets along with everyone he meets; human and dog.  He even tolerates obnoxious puppies.  He is fully house trained and will let you know when he wants to go outside.  He loves to cuddle and snuggle on your lap.  Buddy sleeps all night in his bed without a single peep. 

His adoption fee is $150.00.

If you are interested in adopting this dog, please complete an adoption application at http://www.onmywayhomerescue.com.  You will be contacted within 24-48 hours to answer any additional questions you may have regarding the dog and the adoption process.  Thank you for your interest!

name: ZEUS
description: Drake now Zeus is a happy big boy, 79 lbs and had a bad start. Found in the desert abandoned at only 7 months old we thought we found the perfect home for him in 2014. Unfortunately, he was returned.  So here he is again, on the hunt for a new home at the age of 5-6 years old.  He has a lot of playful energy.  He is also house trained.   We are looking for an adult home that can make Drake-Zeus feel safe and loved. If you are interested in meeting Drake with his trainer please contact AdoptAnimalNetwork@gmail.com

name: Prince
description: Prince is a 6 yr old pit bull. He is an excellent dog and listens very well. He is very protective once he gets to know you so would be a good family dog. No male dogs and only submissive females. Best with teenagers and above. He is very good with people once he gets to know them but does play a little rough. Would be an excellent running dog or a dog that you could play with frequently. He is healing from skin condition. He has to be on a special diet to help him get through it. Can get destructive if you don't give him a job and leave him alone for long periods of time.

description:
Winnie's Willow aka Bentley is about  7  yrs old.  Bentley is an easy going love bug. She loves walks and jogs, minus her need to smell everything. She knows sit and shake. Bentley, is not aggressive towards small dogs but doesn't understand other dogs personal space and can be in their face to much. She enjoys lounging and would be in your lap all the time. Nestled against your chest getting petted is a favorite. She also loves giving you hugs. Say the magic word of walk and she is waiting at the door. Uses a doggie door, even ones not meant for her size. Bentley is ready for a super loving home.   More will be known about me soon.

name: Blue Boy
description:
Blue Boy\" is a 7 year old, male Pit Bull Terrier. He is an very outgoing, friendly guy who loves to go on walks and play. He is housebroken, learning basic obedience, and working on leash training. He'll do best as an only dog 

Blue Boy\" came to us after being rescued by a good Samaritan who saw him being thrown from a moving car! His ordeal thankfully didn't cause him any long term physical or mental trauma, as he is very loving and trusting of people. He'll make an ideal companion for someone who enjoys a lively dog to take along on walks and hikes. Although energetic, he also enjoys cuddling in a lap and just hanging out with people that care about him. 

While I'm waiting for my forever home, a foster home is needed for me or my other rescued friends.

description: This is Spud.  He is a gentle Giant. Please come in and meet him and see if he would fit into your family.

name: June Bug
description: June Bug is a 6 month of Bulldog/mix. She has lots of puppy energy. She is good with kids and other dogs. She would need a family that would take her out on walks and is willing to train her. If interested please come meet this sweet girl.

name: Penny
description: Come in and meet this tiny little Penny. She is sweet, gentle and from what we can tell she doesn't bark much. She is good with kids

name: KATARA
description:
Katara is a 9mo Husky/German Shepherd Mix. She is house trained, crate trained & knows how to Sit & Wait. Katara does great with dogs large & small, and kids. She has such a sweet, playful and cuddly personality! She enjoys playing with stuffed toys and toys that let her work her brain. Katara LOVEEES Ice cubes, and will stand there next to you while you get ice & water out of the fridge waiting for you to drop her one. Katara also loves her belly being rubbed, chasing her tail, hiking and anything outdoor. She is very active and will need a person or a family that can keep up and enjoys spending their time outdoors. She will need someone who wonât lock her up alone for more than 4hours at a time while sheâs still young. When people approach her she is sweet, & doesnât barks. Katara will be the most loyal companion, sticking by your side and doesnât run off.

Please contact  Aubrey at 858-200-6800 to get more information or to set a time to meet Katara.  Katara's adoption fee is $150.

name: Lady
description:
Meet Lady, a super sweet young pup (guessing 7-9 months) that just wants your love.  She has the cutest little tufts of hair on her head and cool brindle coloring on her legs. 
 Lady is still a bit anxious in the shelter surroundings but seems to find a bit more of her personality each day.  She was rescued as a stray so will need some time and training but is a great size (30 lbs) for a family dog.   Come see if Lady isn't that furever friend you've been looking for.

All RSQ Dogs are chipped, fixed and up to date on shots before adoption.
To learn more about RSQ Dogs or to fill out an adoption form for any of our animals, check out the RSQ Dogs website at https://www.rsqdogsutah.org/animals-for-adoption.

To find out more about Nakita or to meet her, call or text Julie at 435-773-5209.  Her adoption fee is $125.

name: Springfield
description: Adopt a friendly, playful, snuggly puppy! All Best Friends puppies are already spayed or neutered, microchipped, vaccinated, and infused with extra love and cuddles. They need to be taught all those good things that puppies need to learn in order to grow up to be adult dogs, of course. A puppy is a project! But there's nothing these little ones would love more than to grow right up into your family. This puppy was born in July 2019 and came from an animal rescue group in Arizona. If you're in love, please fill out an adoption survey and let's get started!

name: Daisy 2
description: Our pets are spayed/neutered and current on vaccinations before their adoptions are finalized. Please call PAWS at 435-688-9748 for more information about this pet. If you are interested in adopting, please visit www.dixiepaws.org and submit an application.

name: Lizzie
description:
Lizzy is a happy, easy going little girl. She gets along great with other dogs and with people. She weighs about 13 lb and she's about 8 years old. She came as a street dog with matted hair and a perforated eye.  So her eye has been removed but she does great. She loves to go on walks she is the perfect little lady on a leash.

If you would like to meet Lizzie in person she will be at PetSmart on Saturday from 12 to 4.

If you're interested in adopting Lizzy you can find an application link on this site.

name: duke
description:
Adoption Fee:  $40 for dogs

Ivins Animal Shelter and Adoption Center
474 North 200 West
Ivins, Utah 84738
435-628-1049  or email bsleppy@ivins.com


Hours: Monday - Saturday 8:00 AM to 3:00 PM

name: Mo
description:
MO is a five year old Yorkie. He about 13 lb. He came to us, surrendered by his owner in a diabetic condition that have gone untreated for quite some time leaving him blind and in terrible condition. He has been under constant veterinary care and is finally balanced on insulin and doing great. 

He is now looking for someone to love him and make a commitment for the rest of his life. He is a fun little dogs very happy and loving. We walk him with seven other dogs every night and he goes about a mile and a half. 

MO is a rockstar. if you would like to meet MO in person he will be at PetSmart on Saturday from 12 to 4. If you are interested in adopting him you can find an application on the link on this page.

name: Ellie
description: Ellie is friendly and gentle. She has gotten along well with the other dogs that she has interacted with at the Sanctuary. Ellie is currently working on crate training and loose leash walking, and this will need to be continued in her forever home. She would love a chance to show you how affectionate she can be.

name: Stephanie
description: Stephanie is a young, curious girl. She's timid at first due to lack of socialization earlier in her life, but she's willing to trust you if you go slow, have patience, and use baby talk along with a few hot dogs. Once Stephanie warms up to a new person, she loves to put her paws in your lap and sniff your face with curiosity. She willingly accepts petting then, and she seems more confident when she's with a canine friend. Stephanie does not feel comfortable walking on leash yet, but she's starting to learn by watching some of her dog friends. Stephanie is looking for a home where she can feel safe so she can let her sweet, silly side start to show. She'll also need time and patience so she can continue to learn to walk on leash and experience other everyday things, like car rides and play time.

name: Ron
description:
Ron is about 5 months old and he weighs about 25 pounds.  We don't  know how big he will be, but he will be a medium sized dog.  He is a sweet, playful puppy who needs a family to help him be the best he can be.

If you would like to meet Ron in person, he will be at Petsmart on Saturday from 12-4.  

If you are interested in adopting him, you can find an application at the link on this site.  :)

name: Daisy
description: Our pets are spayed/neutered and current on vaccinations before their adoptions are finalized. Please call PAWS at 435-688-9748 for more information about this pet. If you are interested in adopting, please visit www.dixiepaws.org and submit an application.

name: Chestnut
description: Adopt a friendly, playful, snuggly puppy! All Best Friends puppies are already spayed or neutered, microchipped, vaccinated, and infused with extra love and cuddles. They need to be taught all those good things that puppies need to learn in order to grow up to be adult dogs, of course. A puppy is a project! But there's nothing these little ones would love more than to grow right up into your family. This puppy was born in June 2019 and came from an animal rescue group in Arizona. If you're in love, please fill out an adoption survey and let's get started!

name: Pistachio
description: Adopt a friendly, playful, snuggly puppy! All Best Friends puppies are already spayed or neutered, microchipped, vaccinated, and infused with extra love and cuddles. They need to be taught all those good things that puppies need to learn in order to grow up to be adult dogs, of course. A puppy is a project! But there's nothing these little ones would love more than to grow right up into your family. This puppy was born in June 2019 and came from an animal rescue group in Arizona. If you're in love, please fill out an adoption survey and let's get started!

name: Yukon
description: Adopt a friendly, playful, snuggly puppy! All Best Friends puppies are already spayed or neutered, microchipped, vaccinated, and infused with extra love and cuddles. They need to be taught all those good things that puppies need to learn in order to grow up to be adult dogs, of course. A puppy is a project! But there's nothing these little ones would love more than to grow right up into your family. This puppy was born in May 2019 and came from an animal rescue group in Utah. If you're in love, please fill out an adoption survey and let's get started!

name: Gina
description:
Gina is about 3 years of and weighs about 30 pounds.  We think she is a Border Collie/Schnauzer cross.  She came to us surrendered by a local family with her two puppies.  The family had came to a local vet clinic asking that all three dogs be euthanized. 

Gina is very loving but can be selective about some other dogs.  She is high energy and would make an excellent hiking buddy.  She needs a fenced yard with an active home.  She is not a couch potato!!!

If you would like to meet Gina in person, she will be at PetSmart on Saturday from 12-4.  If you are interested in adopting Gina you can find an application at the link on this site.

name: Jackson
description:
Jackson is a gorgeous Shepard/Pyrenees mix who is full of fun and energy.  He's still a youngster who could use some training and a knowledge of the breed would be helpful.  An active loving family would make a perfect furever home for this big boy.
All RSQ Dogs are chipped, fixed and up to date on shots before adoption.
To learn more about RSQ Dogs or to fill out an adoption form for any of our animals, check out the RSQ Dogs website at https://www.rsqdogsutah.org/animals-for-adoption.

name: Finn
description:
Handsome Finn is a big boy who likes people and playing fetch. Probably about 2 years old, he walks well on a leash and knows some basic commands.  He can be dog selective so if your home has other pups, a meeting or two would be recommended prior to bringing him home.  Come see if Finn is the dog who makes your family complete.
All RSQ Dogs are chipped, fixed and up to date on shots before adoption.
To learn more about RSQ Dogs or to fill out an adoption form for any of our animals, check out the RSQ Dogs website at https://www.rsqdogsutah.org/animals-for-adoption.

name: Woody
description: This Hurricane Harvey survivor is always extremely wiggly and happy. Woody enjoys attention and cuddling with his friends once he has time to bond with them. He loves to play with toys and enjoys learning new tricks through training. Swimming in the pool is his favorite summer time activity and in winter he loves romping through the snow. He has done well with dogs the same size or bigger than him at Dogtown, though he takes a bit to warm up to new dogs. He would love to meet any potential new dog housemates at the Sanctuary.

name: B.B. King
description: This senior pup is convinced that he is still young! BB King may be 7 years old, but he has the energy of a puppy, he just moves a little slower. His favorite thing is going for walks, and he'll bounce around excitedly when he sees his leash. Once he's on the trail, he takes his time, sniffing the flowers and making sure to get lots of attention from the volunteers. He is a people dog and loves attention and pets. He lives with dogs here at the sanctuary and happily coexists with his runmates, he saves most of his energy for his people. BB King would probably love a soft couch to hang out on after his walks and someone he can snuggle up with at the end of the day. If you're looking for a sweet companion, BB King is waiting for you!

name: Gino
description: Gino is young and active yet still very wary of the world around him due to lack of socialization earlier in life. Gino takes time to warm up to people, but he likes treats and will take them from your hand. When he has a dog friend nearby, Gino feels more comfortable and confident. He will press his nose against your leg to solicit petting then and he's really starting to enjoy it. Gino tends to feel overwhelmed when he's outside in an enclosed area and will try to find an escape route so it's important that he has a safe, secure yard along with a family who will take it slow with him when it comes to being in large outdoor spaces. A confident dog friend could really show Gino the ropes and help him feel more comfortable. Gino is a scruffy little teddy bear and his eyes show he really wants to learn all about the world, he just needs some time and patience from his new family.

name: Marvin
description: Active, friendly, and fun all describe one-year-old Marvin. Marvin is always ready to hit the trails in Dogtown and have some fun with new people that he meets daily. He enjoys the company of people and dogs. When with dogs Marvin spends a lot of time wrestling and playing chase. Marvin is very smart and picks up on new things quickly. If you're looking for an active companion, come meet Marvin!

name: Muddy Waters
description: Hanging out with people must be one of Muddy Waters most favorite things. Never one to turn down affection, Muddy much prefers people to other dogs. Right now Muddy is working on walking calmly near other dogs and checking in with his handler. He's catching on quickly and is very smart. Muddy already knows how to sit and he's learning down. Muddy rides nicely in the car and although he was born in 2010, he's still up for long walks. Don't let Muddy's handsome frosty face fool you, he's still young at heart and ready to be your new buddy!

name: May
description: May is so pretty to look at, and she has a delightful personality to match.. She loves to train and run around, but then she can calm down with her human friends on the couch. May would love to meet any potential dog friends at the Sanctuary to make sure they will be friends before going home, but she would also love being your one and only.

name: Etta James
description: Let me tell you about a sweet dog named Etta James. She loves people especially ones who give her gentle massages and let her snooze in the sun. Etta James is hospice so she would rather not spend her time jogging or wrestling with energetic dogs since she is really a mellow mature gal. She would like a house full of soft beds, people who like snuggles and give her yummy treats. She would love a family that would share experiences and memories that are important to her. This amazing girl makes us smile every single day and she would be a wonderful soul-mate dog.

name: Elijah
description: Elijah can not wait to go home with you! He is a happy go lucky, energetic and playful young man. Elijah thinks that everyone he meets is a long lost friend. Elijah would love to show off his little tricks for you! He is food motivated and ready to learn. He is definitely a people pleaser. He also enjoys car rides, hikes, toys and cuddling. Elijah loves life and is looking for someone to share it with. Elijah has made many dog friends here at the sanctuary and is very playful with them. If your dog or dogs are looking for a playful and loving companion then Elijah is your man. He also tends to think that every dog he meets is a long lost friend. He is a bit of a goofball and if he might be what you are looking for please contact Best Friends. Elijah can't wait to meet you!

name: Jack
description: Our pets are spayed/neutered and current on vaccinations before their adoptions are finalized. Please call PAWS at 435-688-9748 for more information about this pet. If you are interested in adopting, please visit www.dixiepaws.org and submit an application.

name: Barley
description: Barley is an outgoing little fluff ball who loves to go on adventures. His short little legs and his age have never held him back! He's always up for romping around, rolling on his back, and simply having a grand ol' time. Barley enjoys the company of his people friends and does very well after some relationship building. He would need his potential new family to come meet him at Dogtown to make sure it is a good fit. Although guarding has been a challenge for him, as a single dog in the home and patience from his people, he thrives! A couple of his all time favorite things to do are playing fetch with a rotation of squeaky toys and get pets when he's comfortable and ready.

name: Avery
description:
