name: HELENA
description: She is friendly and social towards people but has no interest in animals her size or bigger. She would do best as an only animal in the household. Any interested parties should be counseled on on resource guarding. She is showing low level guarding, because of this a household with younger children (5 and under) is not suggested. She is a quick leaner and would be a great family dog with training.

name: RAINEY
description: Rainey is big squishy teddy bear who really loves nice people and nice dogs. She loves attention and affection and would be a great addition to any family. He does have a strong personality when meeting new dogs so she would do best with a dog that has experience being around other dogs and can tolerate her strong personality

name: CLAIRE
description: Claire is a little bit shy of new people but once she gets to know you she is as sweet as could be. She will need a confident and patient new owner who can help her relax and see the world can be a fun place. She is very nervous around other dogs so a slow introduction and D2D is necessary to find her the best fit. She seems to do better with small dogs. Due to her unsure nature we reccomend no kids under 10 in her new home.

name: DUDE
description: The Dude abides - he is calm, mellow, and chill. If you're looking for a pal to hang out with you on your porch while you sip sweet tea and ponder life's mysteries, this is your guy. He isn't too interested in toys or play time but he would enjoy regular walks. He would do best in a calm household that would match his laid back lifestyle. He seems to do well with other dogs and would like to meet any potential doggy housemates here at the shelter before adoption. Come meet Dude today! (P.S. He really doesn't like the album Desperado by The Eagles).

name: MARVIN
description: Overall Marvin is a calm dude, He is a little fearful in new situations so we suggest a slow introduciton to new people and things in his new home. He can become very interested in movement so we suggest no small animals in his new home. He should also not go to a home with children under 6 due to his timid nature

name: DejaVu aka “Deja”
description:
Meet âDejaVuâ this beautiful gray lazy hippo who has quite a story to tell. She is approximately 8 years of age, has more than likely lived on the streets for ALL her life being bred, litter after litter. She is what the vet and rescue community refer to as a âthrow away mamaâ as horrible as that sounds. Being used only to breed puppies and nothing more. 

DejaVu was found on the streets of Stockton, in the middle of busy traffic, dodging cars while barely able to walk. Fully covered in road rash and blood, no one stopped to help her. Until, her now foster mama spotted her, stopped traffic, picked her up and rushed her to the nearest emergency vet to be treated. 

She is now ready for adoption and looking for her FURever home. When you look into her eyes, you can definitely see how appreciative and happy she is to have a stable place to sleep, eat and play. She does AMAZING with kids, people, dogs of all sizes and ages. She is the epitome of  a âLOVEBUGâ. She does love to cuddle and sleep a lot. She loves short distance walks and will plot down when sheâs tired. 

Deja will do best in a quite home, where someone will be with her and not leave her alone. She does a bit of separation anxiety tendencies and as long as she smells or sees you, she will just sleep. 

We canât imagine the type of life sheâs had, but we know it was a horrible one. Now we promised her to keep her safe and never left feeling unloved. 

If interested in meeting or adopting Deja, please contact her foster mama. 

Cynthia 209-483-3543
ResQpibbles@gmail.com

name: DUKE
description: I love to play fetch! I also love the company of people and I am looking for someone that wants to engage in activities with me, when I'm tired or done playing, I will lay down by your side. I think I would be a great addition to any family! Since I am a senior guy, one of the perks about me is I know what I like which is people and getting attention from them and although I do not like to spend time with other male dogs I do enjoy the company of social female dogs. I can provide all the love and attention you are looking for and if you have a social female dog let's meet and see if she approves of me, I know you will.

name: OZZY
description: Ozzy has been in foster, this is what the foster parent has to say about him: Ozzy is about 2 years old Golden Retriever Mix with special needs, originally came to us as LT. Dan. Ozzy made us realize how unique and special he is, always showing everyone his unconditional love. Despite his disability he helped many of our fosters who were hurt and traumatized to recover, always showing his support and love. His magic personality makes every single person and animal fall in love with him to the point that you never want to leave his side. Once you touch his silky soft cashmere fur, you will always want to have that feeling every time you are near him. He reminds us of Falcor from movie Never Ending Story. Ozzy is a goofy little boy with sunshine in his eyes and a funny little bear walk, because he uses his front legs most of the time. He deserves a special family who will love him as his own child. We believe he can change someone else's life bringing lots of joy and happiness. We think Ozzy will fit into a low/moderate activity lifestyle, being around family members sometime during the day to keep him company, so he is not alone all the time and has a healthy amount of interaction. You can visit our FB page https://facebook.com/TDSChance/ Youtube video: https://youtu.be/QvRe-JaKIQg If you are interested in becoming a foster parent, please visit our website at frontstreetfosters.weebly.com

name: DAPHNE
description: Daphne loves everyone! Catch her on your street and she'll show you super sweet. You need a dog to lay in your lap, snuggle you, and cuddle you forever? This is the dog for you. She can be slective with dogs but with the right fit she will integrate well! Come meet this sweet bean. She will make you smile!

name: MERIDA
description: Merida was to make her own fate, but she needs your help. If you want to cuddle the world's sweetest master archer, look no further. Merida is shy toward new dogs and needs a companion that is socially appropriate.

name: GORDO
description: Gordo is a big goofy lug who loves to be with his people. He is very playful and enjoys chasing down toys and just having a blast. He does get a little hyped up while playing with balls but settles quickly. He can be a little selective with new dogs so if going home with a new dog friend a D2D needs to be done here at the shelter to ensure the best possible match. He prefers friendly females over males.

name: KIELLA
description: Kiella is part of the Doggie Day Out Program, this is what some participants had to say about their experience with her. She attunes herself to your speed and activities, sits well in the car, and stays near on the leash. She is good with children and has even ignored a cat. She is a good shopper and does well at Walmart even in the dog isle, cheeses, and meats! She does enjoy the cool linoleum floor when it is hot outside. Absolutely house trained and waits for permission to sit on the couch or bed, gladly resting on the floor. Not excessively active inside, in the car, or shopping, and will enjoy a good pace on a walk or jog.-Moira We walked by a daycare and she smelled the grass and stayed calm. She saw a cat on my patio and when she tried to get close to it the cat ran off. We saw two other dogs on our walks and Kiella wanted to approach them and tuged on her leash. She was very calm but excited with other dogs. She enjoyed being around kids and let them pet her while she lied down. Her house training level was good and she had no accidents in the house.-Shonquinta She mostly ignored dogs but at Burgers and Brews she was very friendly to every dog that passed by. We were outside all day and Kiella would sometimes pull on her leash and stopped often to smells things. Kiella was quiet, chill, very strong, and likes being petted. She did good in the car and at reasturants. -Valentina If you are interested in participating in our Doggie Day Out Program, please visit our website at cityofsacramento.org/Community-Development/Animal-Care/DoggieDayOut for more details.

name: HITCH
description:
Here is little HITCH! He's a bundle of fun in a tiny 6.5 pound package. Hitch loves other dogs so much that we are only going to adopt him out to a household with another playful pooch of his general size or slightly larger. Hitch also says a big NO to cats and does not enjoy small children, though he adores playing with older kids. HITCH is about 2.5 years old and is a lovely Pomeranian/chi/terrier mix. His re-homing fee is $200 CASH ONLY PLEASE

 If you're interested in adopting one of our dogs, please visit our website kritterkamprescue.com and fill out an adoption application. Adoption fee applies.  Kritter Kamp Rescue dogs and older puppies  are spayed/neutered, micro-chipped, and current on all vaccinations. These services are included in the adoption fee. $120-$260 is the USUAL adoption fee based on sex, age, and breed of the dog or puppy. Young pups are at the high end of the price range. Adult Chihuahuas are most affordable at about $80-$120

Please visit our website at kritterkamprescue.com for more information and to fill out an adoption application. You can also contact us at kritter.kamp@yahoo.com or call (916) 691-1364. Thank you!

name: PIPER
description: Piper is part of the Doggie Day Out Program, this is what some participants had to say about their experience with her. Piper was gentle with treats. She saw children of all ages at the parade and was interested in them but did not have any interaction. She was very interested in passing dogs and would pull on the leash. She runs at your side well and doesn't pull ahead of you. She would make a great running companion, and is a ready-to-go explorer.-Amanda Piper was good around other dogs, she was interested but friendly. She does very well on leash and doesn't pull. Piper is a shy yet affectionate dog who loves to explore and be active. She has a pretty smile.-Marika She was very good around all people we came across. She was perfect in the house, no accidents. She would stand by the slider door if she needed to go outside. She was quiet, friendly, reserved, quiet, she does not give kisses, but loves to be right by your side. She loves to snuggle with you. Loved the grass and rolled around. She was very gentle taking treats out of your hand-Heather and Brenden If you are interested in participating in our Doggie Day Out Program, please visit our website at cityofsacramento.org/Community-Development/Animal-Care/DoggieDayOut for more details.

name: Leo
description:
PLEASE READ BIO BEFORE APPLYING

My story didn't start out like most stories. My story started with me living in a home with 40 other dogs and my only companions were my dog friends. I didn't have a lot of companionship from my human. I am making so much improvement with my foster humans who shower me with love and attention. I will need a home where my people are willing to give me as much time as I need to flourish into the great little dog that I am working on becoming. To get me on the right path, I need to go to a home with another dog that will help build my confidence and a mommy or daddy that are home a good part of the day. If you think you might be my forever family, please email ResQpaws at info@resqpaws.org for an application.

Breed: Chihuahua Mix
Sex: Neutered Male
Age: 1-1/2 yrs.
Size: 8 lbs
Arrival Date: 6-26-19

Leo is up to date on shots, microchipped, neutered and heart worm tested negative.

If you would like to meet Leo, please email ResQpaws at info@resqpaws.org. â at ResQpaws Community Page.

description:
PLEASE READ BIO BEFORE APPLYING

My story didn't start out like most stories. My story started with me living in a home with 40 other dogs and my only companions were my dog friends. If you would like to meet Charlie, please email ResQpaws at info@resqpaws.org. â at ResQpaws Community Page.

name: Rosie
description: Rosie is a 4 year old Deer Chihuahua. She is a very delicate flower and is looking for an owner that she can be with as much as possible. She has some of the biggest eyes you've ever seen. She tends to be shy, but will bond with that special person and gets along great with men too. This fragile sweet girl needs a quiet home and a place to call her own and she will reward you with amazing loyalty and love. Rosie is up to date on her vaccinations.  If you are interested in adopting this wonderful dog, call us at 530-695-3814 or you can visit our website at www.sbk9rescue.com and fill out an online application. Thank You

name: Hudson
description: Hudson is a 13 month old Black lab. This handsome man is full of personality. Hudson is very active, and loves running in the yard playing with his ball. He is eager to learn, and will do anything to please you. Hudson would make a great companion for someone who is active and enjoys being outdoors. He is up to date on his vaccinations. If you are interested in adopting this wonderful dog, call us at 530-695-3814 or you can visit our website at www.sbk9rescue.com and fill out an online application. Thank You

name: Bailey
description:
PLEASE READ BIO BEFORE APPLYING

Bailey is up to date on shots, microchipped, neutered and heart worm tested negative.

If you would like to meet Bailey, please email ResQpaws at info@resqpaws.org. â at ResQpaws Community Page.

name: RANDY
description: Randy has been in foster, this is what the foster parent has to say about him: Randy is the most loving, happy and affectionate boy. He is very smart and eager to please. He is potty, kennel and house trained and is very quick understanding your house rules and restrictions, and is very obedient. Randy loves small plush toys and balls that he likes to hold between his paws like a teddy bear. He adores children and has been gentle and loving around his foster mom's 9 year old. Randy is very tender and devoted. He will follow you around the house and lay by your feet when you work, cook or eat. When you lay down to rest or read, he'll cuddle next to your couch and in hopes of some belly rubs. Randy was gentle with backyard chickens living with him. He was very good walking with other dogs on the leash, but is missing appropriate dog to dog play manners, therefore we recommend him as a single dog, or will require an appropriate slow dog to dog introductions that will be necessary for another resident dog. Randy is very friendly to new people he meets on his walks, or when you have friends visiting, but will bark at a stranger trying to enter your yard uninvited. He is very calm and low energy at home, and didn't chew on anything, but he has relentless energy on walks and runs. He is making good progress on proper leash walking, and is a great running and hiking buddy. If you are interested in becoming a foster parent, please visit our website at frontstreetfosters.weebly.com

name: Duke
description: Duke is a 5 year old Great Pyranese/Anatolian mix. This big guy is filled with nothing but love. Duke absolutely loves people, and enjoys playing in the yard with you even more. His favorite activity is fetch, and could do it for hours on end. Duke knows how to sit, shake, and lay down and performs these tasks eagerly when asked. This guy lives to please the people he loves. Duke would make an awesome companion. He is neutered and up to date on his vaccinations. If you are interested in adopting this wonderful dog, call us at 530-695-3814 or you can visit our website at www.sbk9rescue.com and fill out an online application. Thank You

name: ANDRE
description: Andre is a 55 lb, very affectionate, American Staffordshire mix. He loves to be around people he can trust and will relax quietly by your side. He rarely barks and quickly learned to be housebroken. He is excellent on leash and loves his walks where he can take in the neighborhood smells. He has not met any children yet, but he is gentle and not mouthy or jumpy. He can be shy with larger/louder groups of people, but his confidence is growing as he meets more people who are kind to him and give him treats. He gets along very well with my 60 lb female pit, is respectful of her space, and does not guard his food. He is calm walking past other dogs (even small ones) and likes to just continue on his way rather than meeting. However, he does think cats are fun to chase so no cats please. Andre will melt your heart when he leans up against you with his head and smiles, or just wants to have a paw on you when sitting with him.

name: JACKIE
description: Jackie is a sweet and energetic. She loves her toys and stinky treats. Jackie is very protective of her family and her loved ones. She will need to slowly meet and begin to trust new people. Jackie can be a little grumpy with her food so we recommend a new home with no kids under 13 or cats.

name: ROXANNE
description: Roxanne is a young energetic dog who is looking for a family to have lots of fun with! She would be great for an active family that likes to spend time outside. She would make a great running partner too! She will need training as she likes to jump up on people and pull on the leash. Due to her behavior and personality we are recommending a home with no children under 8 for her.

name: CASH
description: Cash is part of the Doggie Day Out Program, this is what some participants had to say about their experience with him. Cash really enjoyed his treats. He didn't react to any kids he saw. When he saw another dog, he would start to pull towards them but didn't bark or growl. He did not seem reactive around any people or dogs. He does pull on leash, and loves to run. He is very affectionate and loves to be petted.-Joseph Cash ate plenty of treats and took them gently. He was excited to meet his resident dog and wasn't aggressive, he just was excited to sniff her. He is friendly to all people he meets. Cash doesn't get too tired, even on a long walk. He walks well on leash and enjoys his outdoor time. He can be a heavy breather, but he doesn't make much other noise. He is friendly and excited to be around you, and enjoys playing and going on walks. Cash loves to give kisses and will lick the back of your ears when you drive-Matt If you are interested in participating in our Doggie Day Out Program, please visit our website at cityofsacramento.org/Community-Development/Animal-Care/DoggieDayOut for more details.

name: Pretty Face
description:
\Hi my name is pretty face, I also perky up when my foster daddy calls me pookie and pretty for short. I would enjoy walks on the beach but I've never been. I like lounging on my days off. I currently dont work, but if being in a house full of other dogs than I'm a nanny. I have 3 big dog foster siblings that I like to sometimes play with. They are respectful of not jumping on me cause I was in a bad accident, I'm healed mostly but I'm no gymnastic marathon running athlete. I'm more of a lay in my bed Netflix and chill type of girl. I'm also currently in my foster home with a cat I dont bother with and two small birds that are weirdos but I mind my own business. I'm also learning simple commands like when my foster mom and dad say \"come....come here...come pookie...come\ I then walk inside the house or wherever they try to herd me. Yup that's it about me, so if I sound like your kind of girl then shoot my peeps a DM. 

PS other dogs and small kids have to be respectful of my body, super loud noises scare me, and people yelling that scares me too.\"
"45656175

name: DOLLY
description: This is what Dolly's foster has to say about her: Dolly is a very sweet and loving girl who enjoys cuddles and naps. She sleeps the majority of the day on over-sized dog beds and clothing piles that she's made a nest in. She likes to be near you when you're home and will give you gentle taps with her paws when she's ready for more love! She has a hard time seeing and hearing, so she needs a home that can help her patiently conquer each day. Dolly is an older lady that is not fond of larger dogs, primarily because they end up surprising her when she finally realizes they are there, but she doesn't mind the smaller friends. This little lady is not a barker or whiner, but she is a definite snorer when she gets her snooze on! She is also potty-, doggy-door-, and puppy-pad-trained! This well-mannered bundle of love is ready for her forever home and will definitely make a warm addition to your home!

name: PEPE
description: Pepe is a shy guy that needs to be in a quiet, loving household. He takes after his grandfather Pepe Le Pew in that his level of affection for his fellow pups is over the top, thus we recommend a home without current canine family members. Pepe is currently unsure and a bit scared while being handled as well so we recommend a home without children under 10. If you are a family that wants to bring a loving, shy Pepe out of his shell, come meet this sweet heart.

name: SPLINTER
description: Splinter is a sweet old senior who cant get enough attention and love. She wise beyond her years but is not ready to hang it up and go into retirement just yet. Splinter is counter surfer and knows how to get into high places. She has no problem with other dogs but she prefers the company of those with 2 legs so we recommend a home with no other dogs. Due to her age we recommend a home with kids over 6 years old.

name: Cassie
description: Diamond is a German Shepherd/Anatolian Shepherd mix. This sweet girl loves being around people, and is very playful. Once you get her out into the yard she lets loose and runs like the wind. Diamond will put a smile on your face in a matter of seconds. She is up to date on her vaccinations. If you are interested in adopting this wonderful dog, call us at 530-695-3814 or you can visit our website at www.sbk9rescue.com and fill out an online application. Thank You

name: Hans
description: Hans is a 5 year old Jack Russell/Yorkie mix. This handsome guy is a total sweetheart. He tends to be a little shy at first, but once you sit down and let him check you out, he warms up quickly. Hans tends to be a more independent dog, but he doesn't mind just hanging out with you. He is up to date on his vaccinations. If you are interested in adopting this wonderful dog, call us at 530-695-3814 or you can visit our website at www.sbk9rescue.com and fill out an online application. Thank You

name: Jack
description: Jack is a 1 year old Chiweenie. This cute little boy is a total bundle of joy. He adores people and would love to spend every second of every day with you. Jack loves to run and play, and wouldn't mind getting some energy out in the backyard. He is up to date on his vaccinations. If you are interested in adopting this wonderful dog, call us at 530-695-3814 or you can visit our website at www.sbk9rescue.com and fill out an online application. Thank You

name: BUBBLE GUPPY
description: Im Bubble Guppy! I love walks and adventure! I can be a little shy at first but if you lead the way and give me some time Ill be your best friend. Come check me out!

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is about 12 weeks old. She will be around 30-40 lbs as an adult. she is playful, sweet and loving. She is ready for her forever home and family. Call 530-777-8550

name: Puddin
description: Puddinâ is looking for her forever home. Sheâs about 1 1/2 to 2 years old. This sweet girl has nothing but love to give. This poor girl had a rough start just being used for breeding and then tossed away like trash and having to fend for herself and her babies. But that doesnât stop her from giving everyone love. She does great with other dogs and kids. We are not sure about cats but can test her with them. She is spayed, UTD, microchipped, dewormed, flea/tick treated, heartworm tested. If you would like more info on Puddinâ please email us at findingabestfriend@gmail.com

name: Boris
description:
Boris  Is approximately 5-6 months old. He is Terrier mix. Her weigh is 20lbs. HE is sweet, loving, energetic, smart, & eager to please. Does great with dogs of all ages and size that are well matter dogs and well mannered children. HE is crate trained and potty trained. HE comes from a very neglected background, but is so ready for a new start. HE is a very happy dog and with proper training and secure loving stable home and family she will thrive! Boris is a great baby looking for a great family! So if you qualify please let his rescue know. â¢â¢â¢ HAS TO BE A INDOOR DOG!!!â¢â¢â¢ OUR RESCUE DOGS ARE NOT Guard dogs or meant to be a backyard dog. They need a family and should be seen as a family member.

name: Zipper
description:
Our sweet Zipper is a year old and weighs about 11 lbs. He has the cutest face and a friendly heart. Zipper would be perfect for anyone looking for their forever best friend. His re-homing fee is $140 CASH.

If you're interested in adopting one of our dogs, please visit our website kritterkamprescue.com and fill out and adoption application. Adoption fee applies. Most Kritter Kamp Rescue dogs and older puppies  are spayed/neutered, micro-chipped, and current on all vaccinations. If not, it is due to young age or only recently being acquired by KKR. Adult Chihuahuas are most affordable at about $80-$120
. You can also contact us at kritter.kamp@yahoo.com or call (916) 691-1364 for more information.. Thank you!

name: Chiquita II
description:
Chiquita II is approximately 8 years old. She is Chi mix. Her weigh is approximately 7lbs. She is sweet, loving, MELLOW , smart, & eager to please. Does great with dogs of all ages and size that are well matter dogs. Does great with well mannered children as well. She comes from a very neglected background, but is so ready for a new start. She is a very happy dog and with proper training and secure loving stable home and family she will thrive! Chiquita II is a great baby looking for a great family! name: Smiley
description:
Meet Smiley, this precious lil lady is a diamond in the rough. She's approx 4-5 yrs old, a pit bull terrier mix, spayed female.  She's such a happy girl, full of love, energy and spunk! She enjoys playing with her toys,  especially balls and tug-o-war. Smileys had a tough start at life, she deserves a loving family that will take amazing care of her in best years if her life. 
If you have any current pets we would need to see if they get along and any current pet in the home will need to be spayed/neutered and vaccinated. 

The adoption fee is $250. The background check fee is $25 per person in the house over the age of 18.

If your interested in meeting Smiley please contact us at findingabestfriend@gmail.com. We receive several emails for each dog, please be patient in waiting for a response.  

Thank you for your interest!

name: MONICA
description: Monica lives life to the fullest. Its almost as if her motto is go big or go home. She is goofy and very entertaining. She will do fine as an only in the home but will also get along with another dog providing that they are the right fit. She is an active and playful dog but will be ok entertaining herself if provided with enough chew toys or bones to keep her busy. Once she is done her playtime, Monica enjoys joining her people for a good snuggle and a nap.

name: BETTY
description: Betty has been in foster, this is what the foster parent has to say about her: Betty is a very happy, cheerful little dog that loves her walks and cuddles. She has got along great with the other 5 small breed dogs of vaious ages in my foster home. She has been great around visitors, and people while out for walks. Don't let her age fool you, she has a lot of spring in her step! If you are interested in becoming a foster parent, please visit our website at frontstreetfosters.weebly.com

name: STAN
description: This is what Stan's foster mom has to say about him: Stan is still doing wonderful in our home. Always curious, seeking our attention, working on his polite walking and boundaries. He does wonderful when meeting new people and has no fear...just an inquisitive boy with no aggression issues! We do have a sneaking suspicion that he might have some Boxer in him...the lean athletic body, his playful energy at the ripe old age of 7, his fierce loyalty, always wanting to be near us and the fact that he quickly learns a new routine/command without food or a toy. He is most definitely a boy who deserves a family that will love him as much as he will love them. With his abundant energy and curiosity about the small and furry we don't recommend a home with cats or smaller dogs. If this sounds like your new family member, contact us!

name: BILLIE
description: Billie has been in foster, this is what the foster parent has to say about her: Billie came into our shelter as a new mom. She did a great job at raising four happy puppies and now she is ready for a home of her own. Billie got her name for her cute billy goat hops. Billie loves to play, be it with toys, chasing or with you! She would do best as an only animal in the household. She is great on walks or jogs and very mannerly throughout. Billie loves to please and will try anything you ask! She is very patient and enjoys training even more than toys or treats! This girl is one smart cookie and would love to learn with you. She also loves affection and will ask you for it with her beautiful soulful eyes and a sometimes a few loves taps for good measure. Meet Billie today!

name: SUKI
description: She shows as a more independent dog who will engage every once in a while. When she does get affectionate she likes to climb on you. She shows potential to be a low maintence family pet but would greatly benefit from further training. We recommend a dog to dog prior to adoption due to her pushy introductions. We also highly suggest taking it slow when meeting her for the first time as she can be shy with strangers.

name: BART
description: Bart is a strong young man, He is still learning leash manners so a confident handler would be best for him in his new home. He enjoys the company of people over other dogs and can become pushy. Due to his timid nature with handling we recommend no children under 10 in his new home. If going home with a new dog friend a D2D is required to find the best match

name: DOTTIE
description: Dottie is part of the Doggie Day Out Program, this is what some participants had to say about their experience with her. Dottie grazed her dry food. She was super friendly with other medium to large dogs. When she was around other people and dogs she was curious and excited to meet, smell and greet. She is a loving and intuitive dog. Dottie did great in the house, and appears house trained. She walked well on leash but tugged when she wanted to go meet another dog. Dottie is a loyal, friendly dog who loves human interaction. She is a great navigator, and loves rididng in the car. A real treat of a furry pal-Mina Dottie showed her energy by pulling on the leash, but was able to be redirected. She is a quiet, friendly, affectionate dog who enjoys exploring and being pet. She was very good in the car. They went to the park and she behaved well. She was reluctant to go into a crate at night but was fine once she got in it.-Cecilia She was quiet on the trip. She jumped into the car ad put her feet on the console to see where they were going. They walked to a quiet residential area-Kristi Some kids under five passed by and Dottie was interested. Dottie was very curious about other big dogs and had friendly interactions with them. She was very friendly with other people and sat with a wagging tail as they pet her. She is a very quiet dog. Dottie is very curious about the world and enjoys being pet. She also loves to people watch. Dottie did well sitting on a restaurant patio. She did get very excited when food was delivered and gave adorable puppy eyes, once she realized she wasn't getting any people food she layed down and waited patiently.-Carol She is very quiet. Dottie is a friendly, active explorer. She wanted to say hello to everyone and loved all the pets and attention. She wasn't into treats. She does the cutest little dance when she rolls over onto her back-Emily If you are interested in participating in our Doggie Day Out Program, please visit our website at cityofsacramento.org/Community-Development/Animal-Care/DoggieDayOut for more details.

name: Elsa
description: Elsa is about 4 yrs old. She is a poodle/terrier. A mix, Please if you have allergies, or don't like shedding--pass. (She is a mix and will shed and you  will have allergies with her.)  She weighs around 10-12 lbs. She is mellow, easy going and just want to follow you around, lay with you and wants her person, family. She is amazing. I am so in love with her. She would do well in a calm home. She is quiet and mellow and is looking for a home similar. If you can offer this amazing little lady a forever, loving home please call 530-777-8550

name: Lily
description:
Lilia is about 5-6 mos. She weighs 47 lbs right now but will probably get a little bigger. Around 60 lbs or so. She is a love! Sweet, playful and loves attention. She follows and wants to be with the family.

Lilia had a tough start. She had puppy strangles. Its an autoimmune condition but once treated--which it has been, she will have no lasting effects. She looks amazing now and considering how she looked when she came in we are thrilled. 

She is ready for her forever home and family. Call 530-777-8550

name: Starr
description:
Starr is a 2 year old Jack Russell terrier. Starr was a mother of 3 Jack Russell puppies along with 2 other puppies that weren't hers that she nursed and raised. She was a great mom to her babies. She gets along with other dogs but she is definitely queen bee. She has had a rough past and can be a little cautious with new people. She needs someone to be very patient with her and is willing to work with her. Starr would also do best in a quite home without any children. Once she is comfortable with you, her whole face lights up with love and appreciation. 
If you are interested in adopting this wonderful dog, call us at 530-695-3814 or you can visit our website at www.sbk9rescue.com and fill out an online application. Thank You

name: Alma
description: Alma is a 2 year old Chihuahua mix. She has several siblings with us, and she gets along great with other dogs. Like her other siblings, she doesn't have a mean bone in her body. Her owner could not keep her, so we need to find a loving home for her. She is on the shy side, and needs a gentle, quieter home. Alma will definitely come out of her shell once she gets to know you and gets into a permanent home atmosphere. Alma is up to date on her vaccinations and will be spayed at the next available date. If you are interested in adopting this wonderful dog, call us at 530-695-3814 or you can visit our website at www.sbk9rescue.com and fill out an online application. Thank You

name: MaMaMeeA
description:
COURTESY POST.  PLEASE CONTACT LYNDA AT 530-343-5171 or e-mail wannaberun@gmail.com

Meet MaMaMeeA. She is approximately 10 years old.  Came from a shelter in Sacramento about a year ago and was lactating so had puppies somewhere.  I could tell by her torn ear and few scars on her front legs that she had some run ins with other dogs.  But oh she loves people and loves to play fetch.  She is 19 lbs; housebroken; current on vaccinations to in rabies, heart worm negative and on heart worm prevention; spayed; fecal clear; and on no medications.

name: Danee
description:
COURTESY POST.  PLEASE CONTACT LYNDA AT 530-343-5171 or e-mail wannaberun@gmail.com

Meet Danee.  She is a sweet 8 year old Boxer. She is very well trained with multiple performance titles.  She has too much energy for small children but would do great with older children and she does not do well with small dogs or cats.  She travels great!  She is spayed; house trained; current on vaccinations to include rabies; heart worm negative and current on heart worm prevention; fecal clear and in good health and not on any medications.

name: Athena
description:
Sweet Athena loves everyone. She is a happy, happy pup. She really loves playing with her dog friends but is also happy to sit with her human (especially on your lap if you let her). She's a fun girl that would love a yard and a family to call her own. Athena is deaf but that doesn't stop her from anything. This beautiful girl loves life!  She is so smart and knows several hand signals and is eagerly learning more. 

Breed: Pit Bull mix
Sex: Spayed Female
Age: 1 year
Size: 50 lbs
Arrival Date: 6-22-19

Athena is spayed, up to date on all shots, microchipped and heart worm tested negative.

description:

If you let her she really enjoys hanging out and lounging on the bed. Lola also likes to be outside running around in the backyard. If she had it her way she'd just be in your arms all day.  

Lola is ready for her furever home!

If your interested in meeting this cutie please email her foster mom directly at findingabestfriend@gmail.com

name: Simon
description:
Meet Simon. He loves to cuddle and hang out with his people. He enjoys the company of other dogs. He needs a person who will take the time to help him grow his confidence. Once he warms up to you, he will be your best friend forever. 

Breed: Chihuahua Mix
Sex: Neutered Male
Age: 3 years
Size: 9 lbs

Breed: Chihuahua Mix

name: Baby
description: Baby is about 5-6 mos old. She will be small as an adult--around 10 lbs or so. She is sweet, playful and ready for her forever home and family. Call 530-777-8550

name: Brandy
description:
Meet Brandy. She is our 1 year old Chihuahua. When Brandy first came to us, she was very scared and shy. She would lay in her bed and hide her face. Now she has made a complete turn around! She seems like a completely different dog now that she is comfortable and running around with her other doggie companions!  She is happy, healthy and most of all very spunky. She is a tiny girl, only weighing around 5-7lbs. Brandy is spayed and up to date on her vaccinations. 
If you are interested in adopting this wonderful dog, call us at 530-695-3814 or you can visit our website at www.sbk9rescue.com and fill out an online application on the adopt me page. Thank You

name: Max
description: Max is about 13 weeks. He will be small but has those long adorable legs. He is a sweet guy, playful and silly. He is looking for his forever home and family. Call 530-777-8550

name: PICCOLO
description:
PICCOLO is a 1-2 year old terrier mix. He has a vivid white and black coat! PICCOLO weighs 14 pounds. PICCOLO is a little particular with other dogs and can be bossy, so he might do best alone :)  We're not sure how he is with kids. It would be a good idea to bring your children in to meet PICCOLO before adopting him (or any other dog). This is a gorgeous and fun dog who would make a good pet for the right person, an adult owner with some experience in caring for and loving a Terrier like our Piccolo :)
 If you're interested in adopting one of our dogs, please visit our website kritterkamprescue.com and fill out and adoption application. Adoption fee applies. Most Kritter Kamp Rescue dogs and older puppies  are spayed/neutered, micro-chipped, and current on all vaccinations. If not, it is due to young age or only recently being acquired by KKR. These services are included in the adoption fee. $120-$260 is the USUAL adoption fee based on sex, age, and breed of the dog or puppy. Young pups are at the high end of the price range. Adult Chihuahuas are most affordable at about $80-$120
. You can also contact us at kritter.kamp@yahoo.com or call (916) 691-1364 for more information.. Thank you!

description:
Bronson is a very playful 1 year old old wire haired terrier/pointer of some sort. He weighs about 45-50 lbs.  He absolutely LOVES kids and other dogs.  He is extremely playful so he would need to be with kids 8 plus or/and another playful dog.  He loves giving kisses, playing in water, and playing with his toys. description:
Bino is a 2 year old terrier mixed with some kind of breed that gives him tons of very cute, black spots on his ears.  He weighs 16 pounds. Bino must be an only dog, he tends to become dominant over other dogs and is food aggressive. We also believe Bino should be in an adults only home. BINO loves to play and go for walks. He seems to prefer the company of men. The ideal home for Bino would be an adult male without pets or kids, who is seeking a companion for excercise and cuddles. RE-HOMING FEE $120 CASH

description:
Meet Socket. This handsome American Staffordshire Terrier is approximately 6-8 years young. He has a loving, loyal, chill personality. Socket would be an excellent outdoors companion. He loves people and is well socialized. The ideal home for Socket would be with a loving family who is home and not left alone while at work. Heâs been neglected of affection and deserves all the love in the world. Although he loves kids, we prefer his home is with older kids that know to respect and know boundaries.

Findingabestfriend@gmail.com

name: FELIX
description:
FELIX IS A HANDSOME LITTLE FELLOW! He is a terrier mix, we think with Yorkie and some other type. Felix a little over a year old and weighs 15 lbs. He is a people person and only likes other dogs if they are not overly aggressive towards him.  His only downfall is is that he is resource aggressive, meaning he will not let you touch what is his if he's eating/playing with it.  He is also a little particular with you carrying him in your arms, he prefers walking by your side or off leash at a beach!  We feel that Felix would do best in a home with kids over 15 years old for safety. Felix is fairly energetic & really enjoys going for walks and exploring his world! His adoption fee is $200.

description:

description:
Meet âSmokeyâ, this handsome diamond in the rough is a gem. He is so full of amazing surprises. Heâs not only handsome, but very smart and wise. Smokey knows many commands & is very food/treat motivated. Smokey loves to shower everyone he meets with hugs and kisses. He is an amazing listener and knows, stay, sit, hand shake, roll over, etc.. Another great trick he has is he likes to hide his poppies in bushes. Lol heâs so silly and adorable. This loveable senior is only 7 years young and has many more years of love to give a loving family.

name: Diego
description:
Diego is looking for his forever home. He is about 6 months old. He is neutered, vaccinated, microchipped, dewormed, and flea and tick treated. He has a very sweet, shy personality. He loves to play and cuddle and give kisses. He is very food motivated. If you would like more info on Diego email us at 

findingabestfriend@gmail.com

name: Chuck
description:
Hello! My name is Chuck and I am looking for a nice home to call my own. I am pretty laid back but also have a playful side. I love to go for daily walks, ride in the car, and even take a dip in the kiddie pool. And don't forget about my bellyrubs!  I sleep in my bed and can even tuck myself in. I am a very smart boy who loves training and learning. I am potty-trained and use the doggy door. I am very loving but can be selective about my people and animals friends, therefore, a single home with one person and no other pets would be best for me. Then it will be me and you - just us two! 

Breed: Chihuahua mix
Sex:     Neutered Male
Age:     8 years
Size:    19 lbs
Arrival Date: 7-16-18

Chuck is up-to-date on shots, neutered, microchipped, and heartworm-tested negative. He has a Grade 3 heart murmur with no symptoms, and a small hernia that does not bother him. He is on medication for anxiety.

If you would like to meet Chuck, please email ResQpaws at info@resqpaws.org.

name: NEO
description:
Here is little NEO. This fellow is very shy, but really wants to be loved. NEO will need an adopter who is willing to work with him to gain his trust. NEO and his 2 sisters came from a backyard breeder where he spent the first 11 months of his life is a small wire pen with a dirt floor. He was not given any human attention, so he is frightened but curious. NEO needs a hero! Will it be YOU?? Neo's price has been reduced to just $80/ $40 to a senior in hopes that someone will give him a chance for a loving home and family of his own. He doesn't have a mean bone in his body. He is just afraid of strangers. You can pick him up and hold him, but he is very nervous. We feel he will come around if given a chance!

description: Judith is looking for her forever home. She is a year old. She is very active but very eager to please. Very treat motivated. Is great with other dogs. If you are interested in her email us at findingabestfriend@gmail.com

name: Jager
description:
Hello there! Iâm a handsome brindle boy who can roughhouse all night and then sleep in with you in the morning! Youâll win me over in a minute with rump scratches! I love to play games like tug-of-war and racing. I would love an active home that takes me for walks, or plays with me in the back yard. I am working very hard on my leash manners, and I promise I will try so hard to listen to your directions. I love my little human sibling, but I would need kids who understand Iâm an active puppy and can jump!  With proper introduction and training Iâm sure I could love having a little dog sibling too. I am so ready to be your pal!

Jager is a neutered male bulldog mix who will be adopted with his current rabies and DAPP vaccine. Jager is a little older than a year. Jager will be microchipped at the time of adoption. Jager is up for adoption as a courtesy post through Finding a Best Friend Abandoned Animal Rescue with P.A.W.S. His foster owner Salena will be requiring a home check as well as the back ground check done through FABFAAR. Salena will also require all adopted pets to be licensed through their county or city.

Please complete the application for the pet you are interested. If you have any questions about Jager you can reach out to his foster owner, Salena, directly at salena361981@yahoo.com.

description: Bugsy is a young active boy. He is about 7 months old. He gets along with other dogs. He's ok with cats just very playful. He is a big goof. If you are interested in Bugsy email us at findingabestfriend@gmail.com

name: Blue RBR
description:
********CONTACT HEATHER @ Royalbluerescue@gmail.com or text 209-294-5965 ***********

This handsome guy is Blue, He is in need of a foster or foster to adopt home asap! He is super sweet and loving, He is great with all dogs (any size) and good with cats (ignores them) great with kids and all people but is a little shy at first (he was rescued from an abusive situation) he does have seperation anxiety so we are looking for someone who has the time to give him. He is smart, potty trained, crate trained, and listens well. Also does good on leash.

name: TAYTAY
description:
Taytay is a little tiny, yet chunky dog.  She's about 8 years old and would be perfect for any seniors or someone that has a quiet home.  If you have this and lots of love, she's the one for you!  Sooner or later, once she knows you, she will come around. Taytay is pretty shy with people and will need some work in order for her to get comfortable with you, but she's worth it.  She is a little play bug once she feels comfortable.  If you're interested in potentially meeting/adopting little Tay, please read the information below.  TAYTAY is available free of charge to seni

Sincerely,
Betty & staff :)

Application: www.KritterKampRescue.com

name: Benjamin
description: Benjamin is looking for his forever home. He is about 4 years old. He is neutered, UTD, and microchipped. He gets along with other dogs. He is an indoor dog. He is crate trained and potty trained. He is a big playful goofy boy! He is also very sweet. If you would like to fill out an application for Benjamin email is at findingabestfriend@gmail.com

name: Chop
description: Meet Chop!! He's a handsome guy with a lot of personality and energy! He's had a rough go at life until rescued so he does have some quirks but he's amazing despite all he's been through. Chop does well with all people, he's never come across a person he didn't like. He goes to work with his foster mom everyday and enjoys all the attention he gets there. He is a very fast and strong dog and would be a great running partner or agility dog. Chop was raised with dogs however we recommend he goes to a home without any other animals. Chop deserves a wonderful home and we will search until the right one comes along for him. He is neutered, vaccinated, microchipped, dewormed and flea treated. If you'd like more information or to meet Chop please contact Jennifer @ 209-298-2433. There is a application process/home check and adoption fee. Thank you!

name: Miley
description: My name is Miley. I am a special kind of girl. I am deaf but that doesn't stop me from being a happy, playful, loving girl. I love to play fetch and cuddle. I am ok with other dogs but I must have a proper introduction because since I can't hear them they tend to startle me if they come from behind. But I am a sweet girl I love everyone I meet. I am spayed, UTD, and microchipped. I am crate trained and potty trained. I am an excellent walker as well. If you would like more information about me you can send my fosters a text at (209)395-9549 or email them at findingabestfriend@gmail.com

name: LYNUS
description:
LYNUS is a \"project\" dog who likes people and attention but...won't let you pick him up. He is energetic and gets along with other dogs. Lynus will need a forever home with someone who will give him time and space to learn to trust.

If you're interested in adopting one of our dogs, please visit our website kritterkamprescue.com and fill out and adoption application. Adoption fee applies. Most Kritter Kamp Rescue dogs and older puppies  are spayed/neutered, micro-chipped, and current on all vaccinations. If not, it is due to young age or only recently being acquired by KKR. These services are included in the adoption fee. $120-$260 is the USUAL adoption fee based on sex, age, and breed of the dog or puppy. Young pups are at the high end of the price range.

Please visit our website at kritterkamprescue.com for more information and to fill out an adoption application. You can also contact us at kritter.kamp@yahoo.com or call (916) 691-1364. Thank you!

name: Falcor
description:

He can be a little shy when first meeting new people. He is a handsome, quiet, older gentleman who would make a nice companion for a senior or any calmer type of home.

description:

He loves to get loved on, and will put his little paws up on his ex-pen and ask for attention when you come by to say \"hey!\" He has super duper long legs and we estimate that he weighs about 10-11 pounds. He is cute stuff! Come meet him soon!!

description:
EVIE is a loving cuddle bug who is about 7 years old. She loves people and would make a great companion for a retiree or other senior! Evie is a bit on the quirky side, however. If she is sitting on your lap, you cannot put her down or she may snap! You just need to stand up and let her jump down of her own accord. It's Evie's world, we just live in it :D

description:
SESI is a Jack Russell Terrier mix female who is a lot on the shy side. She is a project dog which means she needs an experienced dog owner with patience, time, and love to give.  SESI is about 8 yrs old and 8-10 pounds. She would be available at very low cost or free to a senior with experience in difficult dogs. She does love her caregiver, so is trainable. 

Adoption fee applies. Most Kritter Kamp Rescue dogs and older puppies  are spayed/neutered, micro-chipped & current on all vaccinations. description:

This happy boy is super ready to find a loving family to call his own! UPDATE: Poor little Racer has been waiting OVER 4 YEARS for a loving home of his own :(( Won't you please give this little guy a chance at a forever home of his own?

description:
Rashel is an adorable Chi/terrier mix pup of about 2 yrs. old. She is very playful and sweet! Rashel's mom is a super tiny long haired Chihuahua, her father is unknown. Rashel is an adorable little lady sturdy enough for a family with gentle kids.

name: Tyson
description: This adorable little man is Tyson, a 6 year old, 8 lbs ;Chihuahua/Rat Terrier. Tyson is extra cute, with a darling face including slight underbite, and beautiful taupe colored patches on his sparkly white fur. He is very thin and needs some TLC! Tyson is shy and unpredictable so he needs an experienced owner. Adoption fee applies;Most Kritter Kamp Rescue dogs and puppies are spayed/neutered, micro-chipped, and vaccinated. If not, due to young age or only recently being aquired by KKR,;these services are included in the adoption fee. Two week money back trial period. name: Cadbury
description: Please contact Betty ( kritter.kamp@yahoo.com ) for more information about this pet. Cadbury is a 2 year old, neutered, male Chihuahua. Cadbury was brought to Kritter Kamp by some people who found his mother having puppies on their porch! Cadbury's mama has long since been adopted but he is still waiting for a loving home and family of his own. This cutie pie walks well on a leash and is a little shy when he is first introduced. Given the chance he will warm up quickly and is a real sweetheart! Adoption fee applies. Most dogs and puppies are spayed/neutered, micro-chipped, & up to date on vaccines & rabies. If not, due to young age or only recently being aquired by KKR, these services are included in the adoption fee and will be completed ASAP. Please contact Betty @ kritter.kamp@yahoo.com or 691-1364 for an application and appointment. Thank you!

This boy was found on Cherrywood Way and brought here for safe keeping. He is looking for his owners as he would love to go home. He is a younger boy that has a lot of potential and would love to have someone to spend time with him. He will be needing a new forever home if his owners don't find him here and would love to meet you if you're interested in adopting him. Please come to the shelter if you know his owner or are interested in adopting him.

name: 42760796 / Callie
description: This adorable girl is looking for a new forever home as her owners can no longer keep her. She is super sweet and loves to crawl onto your lap. She would do best in a home with a gentle hand to show her the world is not a scary place. If you are interested in meeting her, come on down to the Elko Animal Shelter today!

This adorable girl is looking for her owners or a new forever home if they don't find her here. She is super sweet and loves attention. If you are interested in meeting her or know her owners, come on down to the Elko Animal Shelter today!

This girl is a new addition to the shelter. She is looking for her owners or a new forever home. She is a little shy at first but has a very sweet and gentle personality. She is looking to be someone's great companion. She would love to have a new home where they will get her use to new things. If you know this girls owners or are interested in adopting her please come to the shelter.

This boy was found on Arena Way and is looking for his owners or a new forever home. He is about 6 months old and is the sweetest boy. He is very happy but is a little nervous in the new environment. He is looking for a great forever home. If you know his owners or are interested in adopting him please come to the shelter.

name: Pancho
description:
Pancho is about 6 months old, Unknown breed, possibly some GSD in there, lol He is a happy boy, a little shy at first. He has gotten along fantastic with the other dogs, he needs basic obedience training, he is very willing to learn. He is neutered, chipped, deworming and vaccines in progress. He had a skin issue which has been resolved and his hair is growing back nicely. He is also gaining more weight as he was very skinny due to a lack of groceries.  

All adoption fees are $350

Please do not email the rescue asking if he is available, all our dogs are available for adoption unless their ad states adoption pending next to their name.

description:
Female GSD 3 yr old will be available later in the month of Sept.. She is people friendly (adults, children unknown) She is reactive with other dogs and puppies, kennel trained and potty trained using a dog door. She is  spayed chipped, vaccines and deworming started. She needs to go with someone with prior dog handling experience and continue her training. Applications are being accepted now, we will review them as we get them. We do not adopt on a first come first serve bases.

name: Kaslo
description:
Kaslo is a 3 yr old male. He is one amazing dog! He has tested excellent with all types of dogs (hyper, calm, senior) and tested excellent with cats! He knows all basic training commands and has the intelligence to learn more, as he is very willing and eager to please the humans around him. He is leashed trained and has done excellent when told to heel. Car rides are by far his favorite activity! Kaslo is very loving and loyal, he does not seem to have a high drive to work, but he absolutely loves to cuddle in bed with you. Kaslo would do best in a home with another dog, GSD experienced home and has a secure fenced in yard.

All adoption fees are $350

He does have seasonal allergies which is easily controlled with medication. He is a very sweet boy but needs an experienced owner and one who doesnt have dogs or can separate him until he can become better trained around them.
