name: Jelly
description: Jelly.  This 2 year old is a driven girl.  She loves to run and is vocal about it.  She has been tried in lead at her foster home and did pretty good for her first time. In order to adopt an SCL dog, see \"\"How To Adopt\"\" and download an Adoption Application%3B we can't consider you without one!

name: Bing
description: Bing is a pointer mix that is HIGH energy.  He eats his house, flips it around and is just all around excitable.  But his foster parent says he is a different dog in harness.  He is calm at the start, no crazinessâ¦.but then is HARD on the line and loves to run. He would make a great skijor dog and in the off season will need someone to run and hike with him.  He is a great dog. In order to adopt an SCL dog, see \"\"How To Adopt\"\" and download an Adoption Application%3B we can't consider you without one!

name: Falene
description: Falene is a high energy girl who loves to run.  She is a pointer mix with a shorter coat so she would probably love somewhere she can sleep where it is warm.  She is gung ho to go anytime she is hooked up.  She is fitting in well at her foster home. In order to adopt an SCL dog, see \"\"How To Adopt\"\" and download an Adoption Application%3B we can't consider you without one!

name: Suki
description:
Suki is a delightful girl.  She came from a village and is doing well in her foster home.  She is bossy with other girls but everyone seems to respect her.  She is a great puller and enjoys working in a team.
 In order to adopt an SCL dog, see \"\"How To Adopt\"\" and download an Adoption Application%3B we can't consider you without one!

name: Nebesna
description:
Nebesna is from great bloodlines that was relinquished when his owner died.  He is shy and timid but came a long way at the shelter and was almost jumping on people wanting pets.
He is doing well in his foster home and once the spring weather clears up (no more mud!) his foster person will run him with a 4 wheeler. In order to adopt an SCL dog, see \"\"How To Adopt\"\" and download an Adoption Application%3B we can't consider you without one!

name: Jim
description: Jim is a young husky found near Healy and no one claimed him.  We are excited to hear from his foster parent how he is settling in. In order to adopt an SCL dog, see \"\"How To Adopt\"\" and download an Adoption Application%3B we can't consider you without one!

name: Mario 31488
description: Mario is a 3-year-old male Aussie (Australian Shepherd) who must be neutered before he is adopted. He came to PAHS as a stray from out in the county and his owner never came looking for him. Mario is a very handsome fellow whose long coat is mostly black with white and brown markings. He was badly matted when he came in. The staff clipped out his mats to make him more comfortable; but he really could use a grooming to get him back to being as handsome as possible. Mario currently weighs 41 pounds so he is considered to be a medium sized adult dog. This is a very nice dog who would be great in a home with children and other dogs. Mario is well behaved and calm so he could fit in just about anywhere. If you are looking for a wonderful family dog--come meet Mario!Dogs may be adopted for $120. Cat adoption fees are $50. Our adoption fees cover a microchip, microchip registration, discounted spay/neuter certificate, deworming, vaccinations (as age and law requires), and a courtesy vet exam at participating offices. Unless otherwise indicated under 'special needs' our dogs have screened heart worm negative.

name: Daisy
description:
Daisy is a 3 1/2 month old lab, possible husky mix puppy.   She is loving, affectionate, and sweet. She lives in a foster home with other dogs and cats.  She is the perfect age for training and bonding with her family.  Daisy has a sweet temperament, however she is a playful puppy. 

Application w/references, home visit and adoption fee required. Sheâs absolutely worth it! 

Vet reference required to adopt a puppy.  Please email for an application to adopt Daisy   

were4dogs@gmail.com

name: Blondie
description: Miss Blondie is a sweet old gal looking for a warm, fuzzy bed to nap in and a loving home to spoil her rotten.  She has not had the best care in the past, so now we are searching for a wonderful person or family to provide the care and unconditional love that Blondie most definitely deserves.  She does have some ongoing health issues that will require medication, but ultimately, she needs someone to accept her into their home and allow her to relax in style in her golden years.

name: Mason
description: Mason is estimated to be 6-7 months old and weighs 37.6 lbs. He came in with quite a bit of missing hair. Most of that has filled back in. He still has a few thin spots. He is sweet and playful. Plays well with other dogs. Our dog adoption fee is $85 and covers one set of vaccines including rabies, vet exam, neuter fecal, and general dewormer.

name: Hercules
description: Hercules is 1 1/2 yrs old and weighs 29 lbs. He is sweet but a little shy. He gets along well with other dogs. Our dog adoption fee is $85 and covers one set of vaccines including rabies, vet exam, neuter, fecal, and general dewormer.

name: Lilly
description:
Spayed, completed all vaccinations and microchipped.  Lilly is healthy and in need of a forever home.  Please consider giving her the life she deserves.  
   If you have any questions you can contact us via email at caawarescie@yahoo.com

name: Cooper
description:
Cooper was found with his Husky German Shepherd mix mom and several siblings.   He is neutered, microchipped and completed all vaccinations.  He is 16 lbs st 15 weeks.   If you want to know more. Bout this sweet guy you can email us st caawarescue@yahoo.com.   
    Pkease consider giving this sweet boy the home he is longing for.

name: Ranger
description: Ranger is a sweet boy full of puppy energy and fun that is easy to fall in love with. He wants most to be with his people and will follow you everywhere you go to prove he wants to be your best friend forever. Ranger is a very intelligent pup and is quickly learning basic commands and house training skills.  Until comfortable, he may experience separation anxiety so he's looking for a family that can give him attention and structure. Est. DOB April 10, 2019, vaccinated, neutered, microchipped. Adoption fee $200.00. Please submit an application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Albert
description: Albert is a sweetie pie, great on the leash, calm but was happy to get out of his kennel and explore his surroundings and get some fresh air and sunshine in the play yard. He was affectionate with me and will make a great lap dog at his perfect size. He almost has a fox-like appearance with a beautiful tan coat, super cute and cuddly!Observations made by volunteer S. Shaffer 8/29/19

name: Hinata
description: Oh, hi. My name is Hinata and I am gorgeous!  Well donât you agree?  I am a two-year-old husky mix that recently landed at the shelter.  I had an owner, but I kept escaping my yard and he said I should find a new home.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  If you want to adopt me please make sure you have a secure yard.  Oh and let me stay inside with you most of the time.  Itâs so hot, I really prefer the air conditioning anyway.  You know us huskies our coat is made for cold weather, not the Alabama heat!

name: Penelope
description: Hi, I am Penelope!  I am a one-year-old terrier mix that is so glad to be at the shelter.  I was picked up by a kind stranger who saw me lost and confused. She searched for my owners, but had no luck.  She brought me here to wait safely for my owners or to find a new home.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  I am a nice medium size girl that is cute as a button.  I bet you would love taking me for walks each day or playing with me in the yard with some dog toys!

name: Serena
description: Hello, my name is Serena!  Oh such a pretty name for a pretty girl like me!  You wonât believe this, but I was picked up by Animal Control!  I was glad for the ride in to the shelter. I knew I would be safe while I waited for my family to claim me.  No one ever came and now I am up for adoption.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed. I am a one-year-old retriever mix.  If they took a vote at the shelter, I know I would be voted the sweetest and most loving dog at the shelter by the employees and volunteers. Why donât you come out and see for yourself!

name: Lady
description: OH myâ¦hello! I am Lady! I am a three-year-old terrier mix that is cute as a button!  When I came to the shelter I was in terrible shape. I had been removed from a neglectful situation by the Humane Deputies and I was a bag of bones! Every bone on me seemed to be showing! As soon as I arrived the great folks in intake started to work.  They knew first of all I needed some good nutritious food to help my body get stronger.  They gave me all of my vaccinations, a microchip, and had me spayed. One little problem did show up on my health check up. I am heartworm positive. Whoever adopts me will need to have me treated. I have GREAT NEWS! My heartworm treatment has been fully sponsored!  Now all I need is a foster or adopter! I want to say thank you to Amber who is my special friend in intake. She took extra time with me and made sure I had all the right food so my body would recover from my neglect. She named me Lady because I was so âlady-likeâ when eating my food taking small bites and very neat! Oh one more thingâ¦.I am OK with cats! I actually spent lots of time recuperating with a room full of cats!!

name: Cooper
description: Hey Yâall!  My name is Cooper!  I am a big fellaâ that is looking for a new home.  I had a home that I loved, but I guess I can get a little âexuberantâ when I am around little kids!  Yea, I am OK with bigger kids I just kinda let the âtail wag the dogâ I guess when I get excited and happy!  I love âem, I just canât stop myself when I get goinâ!  Anyhooâ¦.I am a one-year-old retriever mix and I have all of my vaccinations, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered. One little problem did show up on my health check up. I am heartworm positive. That means whoever adopts me will need to have me treated. If you would like to donate to my treatment then call or come by the shelter. If you would like to foster me or adopt me during treatment, then come by for a meet and greet with me! You got bigger kids?  Welp, I might work out well in your home!  You got another dog? Bring him along too!  I have done just great with all of the dogs here at the shelter! You wannaâ give me try?

name: Daisy Mae
description: Hiâ¦..I am Daisy Mae. I bet you can look at my picture and see that I am related to a golden retriever! Yep thatâs what everyone thinks and I guess itâs true!  I was picked up as a stray by Animal Control.  I was so glad to be off the streets and safe in a large dog run with a bed and bowl of food!  I could finally relax!  I was never claimed by my family and now I am up for adoption.  I am about four months old and I have all of my vaccinations for my age, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  Remember if you adopt me I am still a young puppy. I will require time, patience, and lots of love! Do you have time for me?

name: Alyssa
description: Hi there!  Alyssa here!  I am a little sweet heart that is sitting at the shelter hoping to find a new home.  I know I had a home at some point.  A kind stranger found me wandering and picked me up. She tried to find my owners, but had no luck so she brought me here.  We were all hoping my family would find me, but no such luck.  I have now waited my allotted time and I can look for a new home.  I am a one-year-old terrier mix. I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  I am an active girl that loves to play. I hope you want to get some exercise, because I will need lots of playtime and walks in the neighborhood!  Are you up for that?

name: Lyla
description: Hi there! I am Lyla!  I am a gorgeous two-year-old Weimaraner mix that is having to relocate! I had a home that I loved, but I just didnât get along with the other dog at our house!  You know how some people you like and some you just donât? Well I guess itâs that same with dogsâ¦.some I like and some I just donât!! Now we have that out of the way I can tell you that I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  I am a sweet pretty girl that has done well with other dogs here at the shelter! I love to play with toys and be with my âpeople!â Why donât you come out for a visit? I bet you would fall in love with me!

name: Van
description: Welp! Howdy!  My name is Van and I am mighty proud to be sitting here at the shelter.  I was picked up by Animal Control and brought to the shelter for my safety.  I have waited my allotted time and now I can go up for adoption.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered. I am a retriever mix that is about five months old.  I am a cute fellow that will need more training in good manners and leash walking. I am a smart boy that loves to be with people and other dogs.  I hope to see you soon!

name: Sugar
description: Sugar here!  I am a four-year-old terrier mix that arrived at the shelter in the Animal Control truck!  I was glad to be safe at the shelter! I have a big clean cage and a bowl of food!   Ahhhhhâ¦.. I was never claimed by my family so now I am up for adoption.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  I am a small dog that would fit nicely in an apartment or garden home. Do you think a little ânuggetâ like me could fit into your family?

name: Smith
description: Welp Hidy Do!  My name is Smith!  I am a goofy, long-legged fellow that was recently rescued by some of the great employees at the shelter.  Yep, they saw me pretty much just âdancingâ in traffic! I had no idea what I was doing or how to get away from the cars and to safety. They pulled over and were able to get me to their car! Whew! I was so relieved! After getting me back to the shelter they discovered that I was actually adopted from here.  After contacting my family, we waited for them to come claim me.  They never came and now I am looking for a new home. I am a ten-month-old shepherd mix and I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered.  I am a big loveable guy that wants a home and family again!! Come see me!

name: Lexie
description: Hey!  My name is Lexie!  Just take a look at this beautiful little girl!  I am a five-month-old terrier mix that needs to find a new home. I had a home that I loved, but my family moved to a new place and they had âbreed restrictions!â  What does that mean? I canât be cute or playful or fun?  I donât get it!  Anyway I need to find a new family.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed. Remember I am still a puppy and will need training, lots of exercise, and a ton of love from you!

name: Lucy
description: OH, hello. My name is Lucy!  I am an adorable two-month-old chocolate Labrador retriever mix that is looking for a home.  I was found as a stray and never claimed by my family.  I am hoping to find a great new home and family.  I have all of my vaccinations for my age, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  One thing you need to remember if you want to adopt me.  I am still a young puppy.  I will take up lots of your time and attention.  Do you have time for a beautiful puppy like me?

name: Chickie
description: Shy

name: Scar
description: 6 weeks old. very sweet

name: Mufasa
description: 6 weeks old very sweet

name: Logan
description: Cute american bulldog puppies all looking for their forever homes. Logan is a white and brown male and is 8 weeks old. His adoption fee will include age appropriate vaccinations, worming, microchipping and neutering when he is old enough. Come meet Logan and his siblings today.

name: Lani
description: Cute american bulldog puppies all looking for their forever homes. Lani is a white and brown female and is 8 weeks old. Her adoption fee will include age appropriate vaccinations, worming, microchipping and spaying when she is old enough. Come meet Lani and her siblings today.

name: Lenny
description: Cute american bulldog puppies all looking for their forever homes. Lenny is a white and brown male and is 8 weeks old. His adoption fee will include age appropriate vaccinations, worming, microchipping and neutering when he is old enough. Come meet Lenny and his siblings today.

name: Laci
description: Cute american bulldog puppies all looking for their forever homes. Laci is a white and brown female and is 8 weeks old. Her adoption fee will include age appropriate vaccinations, worming, microchipping and spaying when she is old enough. Come meet Laci and her siblings today.

name: Lexus
description: Cute american bulldog puppies all looking for their forever homes.  Lexus is a white and brown female and is 8 weeks old.  Her adoption fee will include age appropriate vaccinations, worming, microchipping and spaying when she is old enough.  Come meet Lexus and her siblings today.

name: Everest
description: Everest is a white German shepherd mix male dog.  He is 2 years old, weighs 61 pounds and is heart worm negative. His adoption fee will include vaccinations, worming, microchipping and neutering.  Everest needs his new owner to be experienced in this breed.  He needs someone that will invest some time and training  to make him the awesome dog that he has the potential to be.  He already knows how to sit on command but his leash skills could use some practice.  If you come see him, understand that he has some pent up energy staying in his kennel, so take him out in the yard and let him run around a bit before you judge him. He is going to be a loyal and protective canine.

name: Bear
description: Bear is a tri-color shepherd mix male young dog.  He is 5 months old, weighs 36 pounds and is heart worm negative. His adoption fee will include age appropriate vaccinations, worming, microchipping and neutering.  Bear is a good dog with a sweet and loving personality.  He sits on command but could use a little training in leash walking.  He is attentive and really likes people.  Bear would love to be your stress reliever at the end of a hard day....so come to the Center and see if Bear is the dog for you.

name: Petey
description: Petey is a black and brindle hound and pit mix male puppy.  He is 5 months old and weighs 25 pounds.  His adoption fee will include age appropriate vaccinations, worming, microchipping and neutering when old enough.  Petey is handsome and sweet and will probably be good with kids and dogs.  Because of his age, he might be fine with cats with some adjustment time.  Petey is on the hunt for a forever family that will love him always...so come to the Center and ask to see him.

name: Delilah
description: Delilah is a black lab and flat coated retriever mix.  She is 1 year old, weighs 34 pounds and is heart worm negative.  Her adoption fee will include vaccinations, worming, microchipping and spaying.  Delilah is an amazing dog and seems very smart.  She is attentive and is treat driven.  She sits on command though her leash skills are weak.  She seems very smart and will probably be a good fit for kids and other dogs, not sure about cats.  Delilah hopes to find a family that will include her in all their outdoor activities.  Hurry to the Center if Delilah may be the one to fill your life with happiness.

name: Nala II
description: I'm a tall drink of water (\"A man or woman or a pup that is tall, gorgeous, and super delicious. Like on a hot day, a tall drink of water is absolutely appealing\")!  My name is Nala, a long-legged 4 year old southern beauty with a grin that will make you smile.  I weigh 94 pounds, I'm heart worm negative, spayed, vaccinated and microchipped.  My owner is disabled so sadly I was turned into a shelter and AGB came to my rescue.  I'm a sweet and very gentle girl and I believe I really like cookies.  Do you have cookies?  Why don't we find out?  I'm tall enough that you don't even need to bend down to pet me which, of course, you'll want to do!  I like attention and being close to you.  Think how good we'll look strutting down the street together.  Don't forget to ask about me!  I cannot wait to start my new life in a new home!

name: Brody
description: Brody is a tri-color hound male puppy.  He is 3 months old and weighs 12 pounds.  His adoption fee will include age appropriate vaccinations, worming, microchipping and neutering when old enough.  He is friendly and outgoing and would make the perfect canine for a young family with kids.  Hurry to the Center and see if Brody is the one to fill your life with happiness.

name: Brooklyn
description: Brooklyn is a tri-color hound female puppy.  She is 3 months old and weighs 15 pounds.  Her adoption fee will include age appropriate vaccinations, worming microchipping and spaying when old enough.  Brooklyn is not as outgoing as her brother and she is a little more reserved and timid here at the Center....that will change when she finds a home.  Brooklyn wants to be loved and cherished and part of your family...come meet her today.

name: Bunny
description: Bunny is a black and white hound and pit mix.  She is about 5 months old and weighs 19 pounds.  Her adoption fee will include vaccinations, worming, microchipping and spaying.  Bunny is hoping that after you see her pictures, you will hurry to the Center and meet her.  She is sweet natured and will be good with kids and other dogs.   Because of her age she will probably be good with cats too with some adjustment time.  She wants to be your constant source of love, affection and entertainment.....so come meet her now.

name: Harvey
description: Harvey is an adorable labrador retriever male puppy looking for love and a place to call his own.  He is about 6 months old and weighs 20 pounds.  His adoption fee will include vaccinations, worming, microchipping and neutering.  Harvey is a little timed at first but he warms up to you fast...the loud noises and dogs constantly barking have got him a little scared.  Come meet Harvey and see if he might capture your heart and be the canine of your dreams.

name: Albie
description: I am a sweet, big bundle of love. I love everyone and everything including other dogs and small children. I'm under a year old and still working on my manners, but learn quickly and aim to please. I'm great on a leash and love to go on walks with my foster mom. I also LOVE water! Give me a creek to play in or big puddle and I'm as happy as can be! I am the kind of dog that would do well in a variety of environments! To apply to adopt me, go to https://www.bamabully.org/steps-to-adopt/

name: Sippi
description: House and crate trained, sweet Sippi has lived with other dogs.  She's currently undergoing heartworm treatment in a foster home but will soon be ready for her forever home. Adoption fee $200.00

name: Hub
description:
Adorable Hub lives in a foster home where he enjoys snuggles and playtime with other dogs.  Cats are Ok by him too.  He's super sweet and likes to be around his people.   This very smart little fella is doing great with crate and house training. Hub is really impressing his foster mom!  Est. birthdate is July 15, 2019, is up to date on vaccines, neutered and microchipped.  He's ready for a family to call his own!   Please submit an application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

Adoption fee $200.00

name: Cap
description: Precious Cap lives in a foster home where he enjoys snuggles and playtime with other dogs. He's ok with cats too.  Est. birthdate is July 15, 2019, is up to date on vaccines, neutered and microchipped. Adoption fee $200.00. He can't wait to grow up with a family to call his own!  please submit an application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Brutus
description:
Brutus is around a year old. He's sweet, loving, and has puppy energy.  He's great with other dogs, kids, and adults; he even likes to chase our cat! Brutus gets bored when he's left alone so he'll need toys to keep his attention. He knows some commands and is great on a leash. His former family couldn't take him when they relocated, but he was great with their ten year old boy. He's become calmer since he we've given him attention and exercise. He'd be great with a family or an active person.

Email for an application:

were4dogs@gmail.com

name: Buttercup was Miss Furbulous
description: Buttercup is a timid, sweet and petite gal. She warmed up to me once I got her out of the shelter and into the sunshine and fresh air and just needed a little love and reassurance and then she became cuddly. She didn't pull a bit on the leash and is a very gentle and loving little dog. Love her beautiful tan coat, expressive eyes and curly tail. She will be a great lap dog for someone. Come meet Buttercup and let her personality blossom for you too!Observations made by S. Shaffer volunteer 8/29/19

name: Ace
description: During my time spent with a volunteer I was found to be: Did I come to the front of the kennel to greet you? 	SOMEWHATWas I easy to get out of the kennel? YES 	Was I outgoing? 					SOMEWHAT	Was I afraid to go thru doorways? NO 	 Did I bark at you? 				NO		 Did I pull a lot on the leash?			SOMEWHAT		Was I super interested in other dogs?		YES	Was I nervous about other people?		NO		Was I nervous about kids?				NO	Did I have a lot of energy outside?		SOMEWHAT		Did I play with toys outside?		N/A			Was I cuddly?			NO				 Did I go to the bathroom while I was outside?		YESDid I have pee/poop in my kennel before I went out?	NONOTES: Ace was great with my two kids. He allowed them to pet him and hug him. He would do well in an apartment or a house. He was very calm. Observations from VOLUNTEER: GLORIA COOK 09/07/19

name: Big Boy
description: This sweet brindle boy is great on the leash, calm and loves to explore his surroundings. Even though his name is Big Boy, he is a great medium size and will make a good walking buddy. He did his \"bathroom business\" outside like a good boy and was super gentle.Observations made by S. Shaffer volunteer 8/29/19

name: Monte
description: Observed by volunteer John C Sanford on 9/10/19Did I come to the front of the kennel to greet you? YesWas I easy to get out of the kennel? YesWas I outgoing? YesWas I afraid to go through doorways? SomewhatDid I bark at you? NoDid I pull a lot on the leash? NoWas I super interested in other dogs? SomewhatWas I nervous about other people? NoWas I nervous about kids? N/ADid I have a lot of energy outside? YesDid I play with toys outside? NoWas I cuddly? YesDid I go to the bathroom while I was outside? NoDid I have pee/poop in my kennel? NoAdditional Comments: Monte is just a puppy (6 months). He had good energy outside but not too much - just right for a puppy. Lved treats and seems to be a happy, playful pup. Should make a nice family pet.

name: 191305 Stitch
description:
Stitch is a twelve week old Schnauzer/Heeler mix boy who is beyond adorable. He will be in the 40 lb range when fully grown. Who can resist those ears!
Before you just go gaga over his undeniable cuteness, please go do a bit of research on the temperaments, good & bad points of both Schnauzers and Heelers (Australian Cattle Dogs). Many a Heeler has been turned in to a Shelter for just being a Heeler, meaning they were nipping at the children's heels when playing which is simply what Heelers were bred to do, although to Cattle. But without livestock to 'heel' they will then find the next best thing which can be you, your children, your cats, your other dogs, etc. Schnauzers are wonderfully active, intelligent and funny dogs that were bred to be vermin killers so have to be careful around any kind of pocket pet (hamster, guinea pigs, birds, etc) or even potentially kittens. They can be talkative so something to think about if you are in an apartment or a quiet neighborhood. And they need good exercise of both their body and brain to keep them happy and well adjusted. What traits of each breed will Stitch have - hard to say but any potential adopter should pay more heed to their thoughts on both of these breeds over just how cute and photogenic Stitch is - that way he will be in a loving home for the entire of his life.

ADOPTION FEES Dogs & Puppies.....$100.00. This Adoption fee includes: mandatory spay/neuter which will be done before you can take your dog or puppy home with you; basic canine immunizations (DHPP-CPV & Bordatella Intranasal); de-wormings; one-year rabies vaccination if old enough; heartworm test if over five months old; microchip from 24-Pet Watch; certificate for free health examination at your participating veterinarian; and a goodie bag chocked full of information, toys, and more.
Yes, there are sometimes exceptions to our normal fee for older dogs or special cases or adoptions of two dogs together. Some of our pets have also been lovingly sponsored by caring people and we will let the approved adopter know about that at the point of adoption. Visit our Website at: http://www.elmorehumane.orgThe staff would also like to remind you that for faster response to inquiries about adoptable animals to have the animals ID#, name & description.This way your questions will be answered in a timely manner.
You can also expedite the adoption process by filling our Adoption Application which you can find at: http://www.elmorehumane.org/HSEC_FORMS/AdoptionApplication.pdf and sending to us either by scanning and emailing to hselco@bellsouth.net or faxing to 334-567-8774.
All pet adoption websites & our shelter management software require that we choose a primary and/or secondary breed for our dogs. While our staff is quite breed knowledgeable, in many cases we are truly making our best guesses as to their breed(s) based on many factors but cannot promise that what we have said is accurate. So taking into account your own parameters for things such as size, coat care, activity level, etc please come and get to know our dog(s) as individuals to see if their personalities and yours are a forever match.
Thank you!Phone: (334) 567-3377 Fax: (334) 567-8774 E-mail: hselco@bellsouth.net

name: 191376 June
description:
June is a two-year old Rat Terrier/Chihuahua looking girl who was found (along with Joey a male) on a busy road and brought to us. They are very sweet, love tummy rubs and just loving in general.

name: 191216 Ranga
description:
Ranga is a three month old pup who came to us a stray puppy with a very bloated tummy. She is all well now and looking for her forever home.

name: 191603 Cooper
description:
Cooper is one year old and came to us he has some separation anxiety. That might be because he was originally rescued after being thrown out of the window of a car as a young pup which caused a fracture in his pelvis that has since healed. He is a little guy - only about 12-15 lbs. He is not housetrained and has had challenges learning. He does not care for a leash but good chance he was tied in his previous life and had a bad experience. He is a sweet boy who deserves a better rest of his life than the start of it. He is good with other dogs & children.

name: 191305 Lilo
description:
Lilo is a twelve week old Schnauzer/Heeler mix girl who is beyond adorable. She will be in the 40 lb range when fully grown. Who can resist that face!
Before you just go gaga over her undeniable cuteness, please go do a bit of research on the temperaments, good & bad points of both Schnauzers and Heelers (Australian Cattle Dogs). Many a Heeler has been turned in to a Shelter for just being a Heeler, meaning they were nipping at the children's heels when playing which is simply what Heelers were bred to do, although to Cattle. But without livestock to 'heel' they will then find the next best thing which can be you, your children, your cats, your other dogs, etc. Schnauzers are wonderfully active, intelligent and funny dogs that were bred to be vermin killers so have to be careful around any kind of pocket pet (hamster, guinea pigs, birds, etc) or even potentially kittens. They can be talkative so something to think about if you are in an apartment or a quiet neighborhood. And they need good exercise of both their body and brain to keep them happy and well adjusted. What traits of each breed will Stitch have - hard to say but any potential adopter should pay more heed to their thoughts on both of these breeds over just how cute and photogenic Lilo is - that way she will be in a loving home for the entire of her life.

description:

MEDICAL STATUS - Undergoing assessment; spay
HOUSETRAINED - No
CRATE TRAINED - Unknown
GOOD WITH OTHER DOGS - Yes
GOOD WITH CATS - Unknown
GOOD WITH CHILDREN - Unknown

Weimaraner (or similar) breed ownership experience is required due to their traumatic background and lack of socialization. 

These 5 precious pups are about six months old. There are two boys (the grays) and three girls (the blues). They have all gained substantial amounts of weight since receiving proper care and we are addressing all their medical needs as quickly as we can. 

While we are accepting applications for their adoption, we do not know exactly when they will be ready for their forever homes. They need to be spayed and neutered, which will be done as soon as they are healthy enough. Priority will be given to previous WRS adopters and we will only place them in homes with at least one other dog; they cannot be only dogs. Weimaraner (or similar) breed ownership experience is required; due to their traumatic background and lack of socialization, these puppies are not suitable for inexperienced owners.

If interested in adopting one of these puppies when they are ready, please submit an application at www.weimrescue.com.

name: Trixie B
description:
Meet Trixie... she is a female 2yr. Old Chihuahua mix . She is about 10 to 12 lbs. She is very sweet , quiet , and calm. She is housebroken. She is great with other dogs. She came into rescue pregnant, and heart worm positive. . All her puppies have been adopted, so its her turn to find a loving home. She has went through her treatment . She is doing great!SB posted 9/15/19
**It is rare that we know with certainty the ages or mixes that make up our wonderful dogs, but we do our best to be as accurate as possible based upon our many years in rescue.
** Adoption: $325 which covers quarantine, shots, worming, food, medical records, spaying/neutering,microchip and an Alabama State Health Certificate. Transport, if needed : $120.00 We consider the transport to be of great importance and, as such, take particular care of the dogs during the trip from Alabama. We make every effort to arrive with healthy and minimally stressed dogs.

name: Promise
description:
Promise is the most beautiful, loving girl.  A few of her favorite things include toys,  and going for boat and car rides. She is easy going, low energy, a lover of all people including kids. Even though she's crate trained, it's not required as she has perfect lady-like manners. Promise dreams of a home where she will be your only pet, but she does well in social situations around other dogs,  like on group hikes or when seeing another dog in public.  This pretty lady is also intelligent obeying comands sit, stay, and down.  Her est. DOB is February 2016, house trained, vaccinated, spayed, microchipped and promises to be the best friend you could ever ask for. Adoption fee $200.00
Please submit an adoption application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Zephyr
description:
All of our dogs are housed in private homes, we do not have a store or a shelter. We do not show dogs to interested parties until they have an approved adoption application. If you are interested in adopting one of our dogs, please fill out an adoption application on our website www.helpingshepherdsofeverycolor.com You may also find us on facebook: Helping Shepherds of Every Color Rescue.

Zephyr is a sweet dog who just wants a loving family to hang out with. He's mellow and rides great in the car. Zephyr is good with other dogs and people. He's just an all around great guy.

name: Cinderella & Peaches
description:
Cinderella and Peaches are looking for their forever home! They are 7 and 4 year old bonded pair. Peaches has been watching her weight and walking to slim down. They are fully vetted, heartworm negative, spayed and microchipped. One adoption fee for two sweethearts! 

Email for an application to adopt this pair! were4dogs@gmail.com

description: 6 months old maybe 25 pounds. very sweet

name: Bolo
description:
INTAKE DATE - 9/11/19
ADOPTION STATUS - Available. Accepting applications at www.weimrescue.com
AGE - 2 years old
SEX -Neutered male
SIZE - Large breed standard (85 lbs)
MEDICAL STATUS - Healthy
HOUSETRAINED - Unknown
CRATE TRAINED - Unknown
GOOD WITH OTHER DOGS - Unknown 
GOOD WITH CATS - Unknown
GOOD WITH CHILDREN - Unknown

Bolo is a very handsome, blue two year old. He is a sweet, gentle giant at 85 lbs. We know he LOVES to play ball! We're giving him time to settle in, relax, and learn to trust our volunteers before we delve into his assessments.

name: LJ
description: \"L is for lofty, your ambitions are high! J is for joy, that you always bring.\"  My name is LJ and it's my 'ambition' to get a new home and it will be my 'joy' to find somebody to love who will love me back.  I'm a senior boy, age 11, who has lost his home because my former owner lost their home.  I'm kind of bewildered because I've been living with my owner since I was a puppy.  I'm not eating a lot right now.  I weigh 64 pounds.  I'm house trained, I've just received all my vaccinations and I'm neutered.   As you can see, I don't look like I'm 11; I have that puppy face and I like to dance around when I'm getting attention.  I was raised with cats and I'm okay with other dogs but don't like it if they jump on me.  I prefer a calmer companion.  I love to ride in the car and I always call \"shotgun\"!  I currently have an ear infection and that's probably why I'm a little head shy because it hurts.  You also have to be cagey with me and outsmart me to take pills because I'd rather not take them, thank you very much.  I'm available for the senior to senior program.  I'm really hoping that my handsome self will find a new home right away because it's scary and lonely to be homeless.  Goldens like me do so much better with people.  Please don't let me be lonesome for long.  Thank you.

name: Leon
description: Yikes!  My name Leon and I was rescued by a kind stranger who saw me standing in the middle of a busy road! He was able to get me in his car and he brought me right to the shelter so I would be safe while I waited for my family to claim me!  No one ever came and now I am up for adoption. When I came in I was a little bag of bones!  I was so thin you could count all of my ribs!  After a few weeks of good nutritious food, I am beginning to put on some pounds!  While I have been here I have gotten all of my vaccinations for my age, I got a microchip, and I was neutered.  I am a terrier mix that is about three months old.  Do you have time for a young puppy like me?

name: Jonah
description: Hidy do!  I am Jonah!  I am a three-year-old retriever mix that was recently lost.  I was looking for some help and chose the perfect yard to stand in!  When the homeowner came out, he saw me and knew he needed to help me find my owner.   After checking with the neighbors he discovered that no one knew me! He decided it was best to take me to the shelter in hopes that my family would find me there.  No one ever came and now I am looking for a new home.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered. Say I donât know if you can see in my picture or not, but I have a cute stub tail!  When I am happy or excited, my little tail goes back and forth like a metronome!!

name: Kyrie
description: Kyrie here! I am sitting here at the shelter hoping to find a new home soon.  I was found by a kind stranger who took care of me for a while trying to find my owner.  She had no luck, so she brought me here to find a great new home.  While I have been here I have gotten all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  I am a terrier mix that is about eleven months old. I hope you will come in for a visit with me. I think you will like me and hopefully you will want make me a member of your family! I canât wait!!

name: Major
description: Oh, hi, my name is Major. I am a five-month-old Catahoula mix that is super adorable!  I had an owner for a short time, but for some unknown reason he brought me to the shelter to find a new home.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered.  Please remember I am still a puppy and I will take up lots of your time and patience.  I will need training in good doggie manners and lots of exercise!  You know the old sayingâ¦.A tired dog is a good dog?  Well itâs true!!

name: Selene
description: Well Iâm back!  Iâm happy to be back with my friends, but I really just wanted to stay in my home.  I was with my family for a short time, but then they were moving and I couldnât go with them.  So I am looking for a new beginning!  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  I am a ten-month-old retriever mix.  I am a sweet and silly girl that loves to be with people and other dogs. Are you looking for a four-legged family member? Well here I am!!

name: BJ
description: Hey there!  BJ here!  I am a cute little fellow that needs to move on to a new home.  I had a home that I loved, but my owner moved to a place that didnât allow pets!  What kind of place doesnât allow pets?? Would you really want to live there?  Well I guess my owner did, because I am out of a home and looking for a new place! I am a seven-year-old Jack Russell terrier mix.  I have all of my vaccinations, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered. One little problem did show up on my health check up. I am heartworm positive. Whoever adopts me will need to have me treated.  If you would like to donate to my treatment then call or come by the shelter. If you would like to foster me or adopt me during treatment then come by and meet me!! Since I am a senior dog, I wonât require lots of activity!  A nice morning stroll, a nap at lunch, and maybe an evening walk after dinner would be nice. Does that sound like a schedule you could live with??

name: Scrappy 31315
description: Scrappy is a 6-month-old male Lab/Boxer mix. He is brown with white markings; and he has the most adorable ears. Scrappy has a very expressive face--you can almost tell what he is thinking! He currently weighs 32 pounds and we believe he will be a medium sized adult dog (30-60 pounds). Scrappy is a sweetie pie who gets along with everyone--children and other dogs. He is active and playful but he is well behaved. Scrappy is also VERY loving and sweet. He is going to bond quickly with his adopter. Scrappy is smart and eager to please. You can't beat that in his willingness to be a good boy. Don't miss out on your chance to adopt this awesome young dog. ****Please note that when introducing a new dog into a home with children and other pets adult supervision is strongly recommended until the new dog settles in with the family.****Dogs may be adopted for $120. Cat adoption fees are $50. Our adoption fees cover a microchip, microchip registration, discounted spay/neuter certificate, deworming, vaccinations (as age and law requires), and a courtesy vet exam at participating offices. Unless otherwise indicated under 'special needs' our dogs have screened heart worm negative.

name: Reba
description:
Meet Reba, a 2-year-old Dachshund with a sleek and short coat of red. She weighs only 15 pounds, and they're all filled with fun! Reba greatly enjoys playing and has a wonderful temperament. She loves running and playing. She loves attention, too! She's wonderful with people and other dogs, too! (posted 9/11/19, ME)
**It is rare that we know with certainty the ages or mixes that make up our wonderful dogs, but we do our best to be as accurate as possible based upon our many years in rescue.
** Adoption: $325 which covers quarantine, shots, worming, food, medical records, spaying/neutering,microchip and an Alabama State Health Certificate. Transport, if needed : $120.00 We consider the transport to be of great importance and, as such, take particular care of the dogs during the trip from Alabama. We make every effort to arrive with healthy and minimally stressed dogs.

name: Tigger 31375
description: Tigger is a 2-year-old male Boxer/Lab mix who has already been neutered. This handsome guy is brindle with some white markings. Tigger currently weighs 52 pounds so he is considered to be a medium sized adult dog. He is a friendly guy who loves people and would be fine in a home with older children. Tigger seems to be okay with other dogs but if you have another dog it might be a good idea to bring your dog out for a meet and greet with Tigger. Please come out and meet this handsome guy. Tigger will make someone a wonderful new companion and friend. ****Please note that when introducing a new dog into a home with children and other pets adult supervision is strongly recommended until the new dog settles in with the family.****Dogs may be adopted for $120. Cat adoption fees are $50. Our adoption fees cover a microchip, microchip registration, discounted spay/neuter certificate, deworming, vaccinations (as age and law requires), and a courtesy vet exam at participating offices. Unless otherwise indicated under 'special needs' our dogs have screened heart worm negative.

name: Koba 31462
description: Koba is a 2-year-old male Red Heeler who must be neutered before he is adopted. This handsome boy is white with gorgeous red markings that are typical for Red Heelers. Koba weighs 49 pounds so he is considered to be a medium sized adult dog. He is a playful guy who loves to jump and play so we know he would appreciate a nice fenced yard where he could safely romp. Koba is leash trained and very well behaved when he is being leash walked. He is also crate trained and house trained. Koba would make an excellent family dog who would be good with children. If you have another dog we would suggest you bring your dog to the shelter for a 'meet and greet' with Koba. He seems to get along fine with some dogs but not with others. Please come out and take Koba for a walk and you will see what a nice fellow he is. ****Please note that when introducing a new dog into a home with children and other pets adult supervision is strongly recommended until the new dog settles in with the family.****Dogs may be adopted for $120. Cat adoption fees are $50. Our adoption fees cover a microchip, microchip registration, discounted spay/neuter certificate, deworming, vaccinations (as age and law requires), and a courtesy vet exam at participating offices. Unless otherwise indicated under 'special needs' our dogs have screened heart worm negative.

name: Coleman 31383
description: Coleman is a 3-month-old male Shepherd/Boxer mix. He is brown with white markings. Coleman is a very handsome guy. He is laid back and very calm. Coleman is super sweet and loving. He would be just fine in a home with children and other dogs. We believe Coleman will be a medium sized adult dog (weighing between 30-60 pounds). Come meet Coleman soon and see for yourself what an awesome guy he is! ****Please note that when introducing a new dog into a home with children and other pets adult supervision is strongly recommended until the new dog settles in with the family.**** Dogs may be adopted for $120. Cat adoption fees are $50. Our adoption fees cover a microchip, microchip registration, discounted spay/neuter certificate, deworming, vaccinations (as age and law requires), and a courtesy vet exam at participating offices. Unless otherwise indicated under 'special needs' our dogs have screened heart worm negative.

name: Moric
description:
What a sweet boy Moric is! A 1-year-old mix of Lab and Hound, he will weigh 45 pounds when mature. His short and sleek coat is mostly white with a bit of tan/red here and there. (Check out that ear!) Even better than his good looks, though, is his gentle temperament and loving nature. He gets along well with people and loves to play with his doggie pals. Oh, and he really loves playing with his toys! In fact, while he was posing for his pictures, he even used one to lie on so that we could get just the right shot of him! A fine boy! (posted 9/11/19, ME)

**It is rare that we know with certainty the ages or mixes that make up our wonderful dogs, but we do our best to be as accurate as possible based upon our many years in rescue.

Transport, if needed : $120.00 We consider the transport to be of great importance and, as such, take particular care of the dogs during the trip from Alabama. We make every effort to arrive with healthy and minimally stressed dogs.

name: Barbee 31461
description: Barbee is a 3-month-old female Shepherd/Boxer mix. She is tan with gorgeous white markings. This little sweetheart weighs about 10 pounds and we think she will be a medium sized adult dog (weighing between 30-60 pounds as an adult). Barbee is quite playful and active. She would be great in a home with other dogs and children. Come check out this little darling soon. ****Please note that when introducing a new dog into a home with children and other pets adult supervision is strongly recommended until the new dog settles in with the family.****Dogs may be adopted for $120. Cat adoption fees are $50. Our adoption fees cover a microchip, microchip registration, discounted spay/neuter certificate, deworming, vaccinations (as age and law requires), and a courtesy vet exam at participating offices. Unless otherwise indicated under 'special needs' our dogs have screened heart worm negative.

name: Bert Loves to snuggle!
description:
Bert is a 2-year old Chihuahua mix who weighs only 9 pounds (no small children, please) and sports a medium length coat of black and brown. What's most important about him, though, is that he is a gentle, sweet, and loving boy who needs a lot of TLC. You see, he was in really bad shape when he came into rescue; he had been DUMPED and ended up in a kill shelter. This boy needs you; he needs your love, and he needs to have someone to give his love to. Sweet! Sweet! Sweet Boy! (posted 9/11/19, ME)
**It is rare that we know with certainty the ages or mixes that make up our wonderful dogs, but we do our best to be as accurate as possible based upon our many years in rescue.
** Adoption: $325 which covers quarantine, shots, worming, food, medical records, spaying/neutering,microchip and an Alabama State Health Certificate. Transport, if needed : $120.00 We consider the transport to be of great importance and, as such, take particular care of the dogs during the trip from Alabama. We make every effort to arrive with healthy and minimally stressed dogs.

name: Gypsy Girl
description:
Gypsy Girl is a 4-year-old, 15-pound Chihuahua mix. She wears a short coat of red/tan and white with an especially fetching white tip on her tail. She is gentle and loving, good with other dogs and people, and, although she can be a bit shy when she first meets you, she comes around quickly and looks up at you with loving eyes. She's a fine little girl! (posted 9/11/19, ME)
**It is rare that we know with certainty the ages or mixes that make up our wonderful dogs, but we do our best to be as accurate as possible based upon our many years in rescue.
** Adoption: $325 which covers quarantine, shots, worming, food, medical records, spaying/neutering,microchip and an Alabama State Health Certificate. Transport, if needed : $120.00 We consider the transport to be of great importance and, as such, take particular care of the dogs during the trip from Alabama. We make every effort to arrive with healthy and minimally stressed dogs.

name: Keyla
description:
All of our dogs are housed in private homes, we do not have a store or a shelter. We do not show dogs to interested parties until they have an approved adoption application. If you are interested in adopting one of our dogs, please fill out an adoption application on our website www.helpingshepherdsofeverycolor.com You may also find us on facebook: Helping Shepherds of Every Color Rescue.

Keyla is a very pretty girl. She is good with other dogs, loves the water and although interested in cats, she will listen if you tell her no. If you live or visit the lake or the river, she is the dog for you.

name: Jack
description: Meet Jack....he is a big brown hound.  Jack is about 3 years old, weighs 70 pounds and is heart worm negative. His adoption fee will include vaccinations, worming, microchipping and neutering.  He is good on a leash and is friendly and has an outgoing personality. Hurry to the Center if you would like to meet Jack and make him a part of your family...he is waiting patiently for the right person to find him and fall in love with him.

name: Dottie
description: Dottie is a white and black pit bull terrier.  She is 4 months old and weighs 27 pounds.  Her adoption fee will include vaccinations, worming, microchipping and spaying.  One look in Dottie's soulful eyes and you will see a pup that has had a hard start in life.  She came in covered in fleas but she has been treated and the skin problems will heal.  She does not walk on a leash yet and is much more timid than her sister.  This angel and her sibling Josey are in desperate need of a guardian angel to show them love and give them a chance in life.  They are both very sweet natured and trusting.  Someone needs to step up and give these girls a chance to show you how loving and faithful they can be.

name: Josey
description: Josey is a white and black pit bull terrier.  She is 4 months old and weighs 26 pounds.  Her adoption fee will include vaccinations, worming, microchipping and spaying.  One look in Josey's soulful eyes and you will see a pup that has had a hard start in life.  She came in covered in fleas but she has been treated and the skin problems will heal.  She walks fairly well on a leash considering she has probably never seen one before. This angel and her sibling Dottie are in desperate need of a guardian angel to show them love and give them a chance in life.  They are both very sweet natured and trusting.  Someone step up and give these girls a chance to show you how loving and faithful they can be.

name: Pretty Boy Floyd
description: 6 pounds of love and cuddles. He is recently retired from making babies and decided rather quickly he sorta likes being the baby now. Neutered, current on vaccines, and microchipped. His recent dental resulted in the extraction of all his teeth, his mouth was a mess but don't worry, this fellow has no problem eating kibble soaked in broth or warm water. If you are looking for a loving companion you may have just found him. And while it is not required, hop over and look at Pretty Girl Patty, you may decided you want both.

name: Pretty Girl Patty
description: Pretty Girl Patty is simply a treasure.  Recently retired from making babies it is her time to be babied. She will sit in your lap as long as you will let her and just leans into you. She is spayed, current on vaccines, microchipped, heartworm negative and just had a dental, sadly she did have a few extractions. She weighs right at 11 pounds. If you are looking for a companion and don't want to go the puppy route, you have found her. You should also check out Pretty Boy Floyd, while we do not require they be adopted together it would be extra special if they could.

name: Olivia (& Mellie)
description:
Olivia is the lighter golden German shepherd! Sheâs an angel. She and her sister both are precious!! Snuggles for dayssss! They are approx 16-22 weeks old. They are super smart puppies...already learned basic commands.
They like to play tug o war with rope toys. And enjoy snuggling with any human as long as a human is holding them sweetly. 

Mellie is the black one. She has a profile on here too! Both are available to be adopted together or separately. 

Yes we do out of state adoptions!

Complete an adoption application on our website! Then email to us. 

WWW.4Legs4Justice.org

name: Mellie
description:
Mellie is the black German shepherd! Sheâs an angel. She and her sister both are precious!! Snuggles for dayssss! They are approx 16-22 weeks old. They are super smart puppies...already learned basic commands.
They like to play tug o war with rope toys. And enjoy snuggling with any human as long as a human is holding them sweetly. 

Olivia is the light tan one. She has a profile on here too.

Yes we do out of state adoptions!

name: Comet (In Foster Home)
description:
All dogs adopted through Troy Animal Rescue Project are up to date on vaccinations, spayed/neutered (age appropriate), and heartworm negative. All dogs are given monthly flea/tickpreventative, monthly heartworm preventative, and are dewormed regularly. Dogs adopted through Troy Animal Rescue Project are microchipped. Adoption fee is $50. Home visit and vet reference required. Applications can be put in online at http://www.troyanimalrescueproject.org/adopt.php or in person at our rescue center.

The address for our rescue center is 34 County Road 2266, Brundidge, AL 36010. We are one turn off Hwy 167. If you use Google maps, type in Troy Animal Rescue Project and it will take you right to us. Hours of operation are from 10-3 daily. We are open Saturdays and Sundays. No appointment necessary for pets that are located at the rescue center. Appointments must be made to visit pets in foster homes. Location information will be listed beside the pets name if they are at a location other thanour rescue center.

Questions can be emailed to troyanimalrescueproject@gmail.com or call 334-508-2367.

description:

name: Luca
description: Luca is the calmer of the two male puppies. He and Piper, his sister, are alike and Raven (sister) and Coal (brother) are alike. I have never seen puppies this identical in looks and personalities.

name: Coal
description: Coal was the larger of the male puppies but now since they have gotten healthy they are about the same size. I have never had a litter of puppies that were so marked identical. Coal is very energetic and might be too much for small children or smaller dogs. Cats would only be with an experienced \"dog\" cat and one that would put him in his place if he got too rough. Very playful and craves your attention.

name: Raven
description: Raven is a little larger than her sister, Piper, but you can barely tell them apart in looks or personality. Raven I think is a little stronger personality wise than her little sister.

name: Piper
description: Piper is the smaller of the litter and is a little shy at first. But she is becoming more confident everyday. She is very sweet and loving but needs room to run as she is a typical puppy.

name: Willow
description: Willow is a super sweet energetic young lady. She came to us with her 5 puppies Koda, Luca, Coal, Piper and Raven. She is house trained and very sweet but can be excitable. She loves to jump and would require a 6 foot fence or would need to be leash walked. She would make an awesome flyball or agility prospect. She LOVES people and craves your attention but might be too much for small children at first. But she settles down and will snuggle too if given enough exercise.

name: Koda
description: Koda is a very laid back sweet young man. Typical of the Pyr breed. He would rather be petted and cuddled than eat. He can be active but settles down quickly. Loves everyone!

name: Tiny Tim B 5 lbs of love
description:
This boy is full of personality! He thinks he is big as the rest of his rescue friends. Look at those ears... bless him they are as big as he is...lol. He loves playing, and wrestling. He also loves being held, and attention. He is 15 wks. old. He is a tiny boy so no kids under 8 please. Tiny will bring so much joy to your life.
VB posted 8/ 28/19. Updated 9/7/19

**It is rare that we know with certainty the ages or mixes that make up our wonderful dogs, but we do our best to be as accurate as possible based upon our many years in rescue.
** Adoption: $325 which covers quarantine, shots, worming, food, medical records, spaying/neutering,microchip and an Alabama State Health Certificate. Transport, if needed : $120.00 We consider the transport to be of great importance and, as such, take particular care of the dogs during the trip from Alabama. We make every effort to arrive with healthy and minimally stressed dogs.

name: Narles
description: Narles is a sweet, happy boy who knows basic commands and is very smart! Come meet this boy today!

name: Scared Burt
description: This sweet boy's name doesn't describe him at all! He is timid at first but once I got him outside and away from the shelter noise and into the fresh air and sunshine, he warmed up to and trusted me quickly and even became relaxed and playful! He absolutely LOVED other dogs when he encountered them. His tail wagged wildly and he almost seemed to smile and wiggle with joy with the anticipation to be able to interact with them, so I feel confident that outside of the shelter, he will thrive optimally in a loving home with a family who has other dogs and be a sweet cuddly companion to his humans! Please come meet Burt in person and see for yourself! He has a sweet nature, adorable perky ears with those melt-your-heart eyes! Please give Burt a chance at life! Observations made by volunteer S. Shaffer, 8/22/19

name: Mercury
description: This pretty little girl lives in a foster home where she enjoys snuggles and playtime with other dogs. Est. birthdate is 6/26/2019, $200.00 adoption fee includes vaccines up to date, spay, and microchip. She can't wait to grow up with a family to call her own!   Please submit an adoption application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Neptune
description:
Neptune lives in a foster home where she enjoys snuggles and playtime with other dogs. Est. birthdate is 6/26/2019, $200.00 adoption fee includes vaccines up to date, spay, and microchip. She can't wait to grow up with a family to call her own!
Please submit an adoption application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Saturn
description: Saturn is the sweetest little pup! She lives in a loving foster home.  Her favorite things are cuddling, playing outside, chew toys, and playing tug of war with her littermates.  She likes playtime with children too. Est. DOB 6/26/2019.  Adoption fee of $200.00 includes vaccines up to date, spay and microchip. Saturn can't wait to grow up with you!   Please submit an adoption application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Luke
description: Luke is a young pup that is fun, playful, and all puppy.!! He is 3 months old. He loves to cuddle and to be held. He is almost done with his puppy shot series. He is microchipped and will be neutered soon. If your interested in this sweet boy, please apply here: www.nhrescue.com

name: HOMER
description:
Homer is Mr Personality! Homer doesn't know a Stranger, only friends he hasn't met yet.  Homer loves splashing in the kiddie pool with his brothers and sisters. He loves being held and cuddled. Homer's an all around well balanced and confident guy. Currently living in a Foster home with lots of TLC and excellent nutrition while being socialized with other dogs of varying ages and sizes learning doggie manners.  Homer is expected to be a Medium size dog. (Less than 60 pounds) with short hair for minimal grooming.
Please remember Homer is a puppy and will need someone's time, patience and training to reach their potential. If you think Homer may be just what your life needs, please complete an adoption questionnaire here : www.nhrecscue.com 
PLEASE READ TO THE END.  Included in NHR adoption Fee with all dogs and Puppies: UTD with Vaccines, Micro-Chipped, Spay/Neuter included, Treated for internal parasites, and living in a loving Foster Homes learning socialization and house manners, not a stressful Kennel environment. New Hope Rescue is a 501-C3 Not for Profit, All Volunteer Organization. All Proceeds are going to be used to help other rescue dogs and not to pay salaries.  Because we are a small rescue we cannot transport out of our immediate area, however if you would like to arrange transportation we may be able to work with you. WE WILL ONLY CONSIDER HOMES THAT WILL MAKE THEIR DOG(S) A PART OF THE FAMILY. To schedule a Meet and Greet please fill out an application HERE: www.nhrescue.com  
Come and meet NEW HOPE RESCUE and some of our Fosters at PETSMART in Tiger Town Shopping Center (next to Home Depot)  Opelika, AL from 10am-2pm CT on the 2nd Saturday of each month!

name: LETA
description:
Leta is as beautiful as a Black Swan. Reserved, dignified, and such a cuddle bug! Leta loves playing in the kiddie pool with her brothers and sisters but loves nothing more than to snuggle with you. Beautiful, sweet, calm and loving. Leta is expected to be a medium size dog (Under 60 pounds) with short hair for minimal grooming. Leta is a dream. So, if your ready for your puppy dreams to come true, fill out our Adoption Application and schedule a meet and greet with Leta!
Please remember that Leta is a puppy and will need your time, patience and training. With your devotion, Leta will be an exceptional companion.
PLEASE READ TO THE END. name: HELEN
description:
Helen is as beautiful as her namesake. (Helen of Troy) Very calm, sweet and playful, Helen will be an excellent addition to a home and family. Helen loves splashing in the kiddie pool with her brothers and sisters, and she loves snuggling too. Helen is currently in a Foster home receiving lots of TLC,, excellent nutrition and socialization. Helen is with other dogs from 10 pounds to 80 pounds learning \"Doggie manners\". The Foster Home is trying to teach them some \" living with people manners\". Helen is expected to grow to a medium size dog. (under 60 pounds) Helen has short hair for minimal grooming. If you are looking for a sweet beauty to bring love into your life, here she is!
Please remember that Helen is a puppy and will need your time, patience and training to grow into her potential as a exceptional companion. 
PLEASE READ TO THE END. description:

Troy just wants to be close to his person/people and and  have adventures. Already an experienced car rider, he just puts his head in your lap and naps. Troy loves playing in the kiddie pool with his brothers and sisters. Troy has that \"It's all good\" Lab personality.  Currently living in a Foster home with lots of TLC and excellent nutrition while being socialized with other dogs of varying ages and sizes. description:

Currently living in a Foster home with lots of TLC and excellent nutrition while being socialized with other dogs of varying ages and sizes. Sparta is expected to be a medium size adult. name: Snickers
description: Hi! My name is Snickers, but I'm sure you could call me anything and I would come to you! I love to love. Come meet me today, I love making new friends, and I've never met a stranger!

name: Pepper B
description:
Meet Pepper... she is the sweetest baby, so loving, and fun. Look at that sweet face, you just want to give her a kiss, She has a beautiful coat, and such loving eyes. She is great with people, and other puppies. Pepper is about 22 wks. old, and 18 lbs. This girl will bring so much joy to your life. She is ready for her forever family... She is fully vetted, and ready to go!ME posted 9/6/19

description:

name: Fuji
description: Fuji is very loving, plays great with dogs big and small, and children too.  She walks nicely on leash, and is crate trained but not a fan of being left alone in it. But Fuji's foster family is working with her on that.  Her house training is going very well. Good girl!  Fuji's est. DOB is 4/4/2019, is vaccinated, spayed, microchipped. Adoption fee $200.00.  Please submit an adoption application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Shadow 31432
description: Shadow is an 1-and-1/2 year old female Pointer mix who must be spayed before she is adopted. She came to the shelter as a stray and her owner never came looking for her. Shadow's short length coat is mostly white with black markings. This good looking girl currently weighs 53 pounds so she is considered to be a medium sized adult dog. Shadow is friendly and sweet. She is getting along well with the other dogs at the shelter. We think she would be best in a home with older children only. From what we have observed about Shadow we believe she will quickly bond with her new family. Shadow seems to get attached to staff quickly and we know it would be the same with her adopter. Come out and meet Shadow soon. ****Please note that when introducing a new dog into a home with children and other pets adult supervision is strongly recommended until the new dog settles in with the family.****Dogs may be adopted for $120. Cat adoption fees are $50. Our adoption fees cover a microchip, microchip registration, discounted spay/neuter certificate, deworming, vaccinations (as age and law requires), and a courtesy vet exam at participating offices. Unless otherwise indicated under 'special needs' our dogs have screened heart worm negative.

name: Jupiter
description: Precious Jupiter lives in a foster home where she enjoys snuggles and playtime with other dogs.  Est. birthdate is 6/26/2019, $200.00 adoption fee includes vaccines up to date, spay, and microchip.  She can't wait to grow up with a family to call her own!    Please submit an adoption application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Sarah
description:
Meet Sarah, she is approximately 2 years old and is looking for her furever family.  She is house trained, loves other dogs and cats. Not sure about children since we have no knowledge of her being around any however with her personality we donât see her having any issues but would prefer no children under the age of 8. 

She is current on vaccines, spayed and on HW preventative.  

If you would live to meet Sarah please go to our website and submit an application.

http://m.mustlovepawsrescue.com

name: Adler
description: All of our dogs are housed in private homes, we do not have a store or a shelter. We do not show dogs to interested parties until they have an approved adoption application. If you are interested in adopting one of our dogs, please fill out an adoption application on our website www.helpingshepherdsofeverycolor.com You may also find us on facebook: Helping Shepherds of Every Color Rescue.

name: Cher
description:
All of our dogs are housed in private homes, we do not have a store or a shelter. We do not show dogs to interested parties until they have an approved adoption application. If you are interested in adopting one of our dogs, please fill out an adoption application on our website www.helpingshepherdsofeverycolor.com You may also find us on facebook: Helping Shepherds of Every Color Rescue.

My name is Cher because of my beautiful hair. It is so black that it is almost blue! My foster-mama calls me Lightfoot frequently because my feet barely make a sound as they touch the ground.
I am a survivor of being a teen mom, but I don't really know how old I am because those early days are a blur. A girl as pretty as me should not have had to live that life. I am petite, weighing about 50 pounds, but I'm working on adding a few more with all this good food and treat
s!

I think I can be dog, cat, and kid friendly if I have a strong leader. I don't know how to make friends yet, but I am trying. Cats are soooo exciting! They smell so good! I want to ... no, I'd better not. I'm very sweet to my people.
My favorite thing in the whole world is treats. Treats are even better than a bowl full of kibble! I will do anything, a-n-y-thing, for a treat. I have learned Potty, Sit, Down, Kennel, and NO! I'm doing great with all those, but especially NO. It's so hard not to find the cat and get to know it better, but I am learning! I saw a chipmunk this week and enjoyed chasing it through the yard. WHERE did it go?
I like to get my leash on to go outside, there is so much to sniff! I don't have good leash manners yet (I pull), but I am learning! I like my crate, my safe space, because when my foster-mama says \"Kennel,\" she delivers the treats! I'm not really house-trained, but I haven't had any accidents in the house, either. All of these rules are new to me! I'm smart and a fast learner, especially when there are treats involved.
If I had a human job, it would be Safety Patrol. I'm always alert, checking on every little disturbance in The Force. No movement, no sound, no scent goes unnoticed. I am also VERY good at binge-watching Netflix. My adoption fee is $250. I'm spayed, up to date on shots, microchipped, heartworm negative, and current on heartworm and flea prevention.
The adoption application is at the website: www.HelpingShepherdsofEveryColor.com

HOME W/OTHER DOGS      MALE:  Yes    FEMALE:  Yes
HOME W/ CATS:  Yes
MICROCHIP BRAND and #:  911Petchip    #991003911056094     
MONTHLY HEARTWORM DATE:   28th of each month
FOSTER HOME:  Angela,    lucybug15@yahoo.com
RESCUE #:  2019-08-23-01
BIO:  
Cricket came from Western Kentucky when his owners surrendered him to the local shelter.  Cricket:
â¢	Has a sweet, friendly personality.
â¢	Loves to curl up on an available lap.
â¢	Is very active and curious but also enjoys napping next to his person.
â¢	Sleeps all night in in his crate (with just a bit of initial fussing).
â¢	Gets along well with other dogs and cats.
â¢	Is working on sitting and waiting when its treat time.
â¢	Is potty trained.  He hasnât had any accidents.  Cricket loves the doggie door and goes pretty regularly with the word âpottyâ.  Of course, he runs right over for his treat after.     
â¢	Loves being outside exploring but checks in frequently using the doggie door.  A large fenced yard would be preferable.

Cricket is adorable and has the sweetest personality!  If you want a constant companion, he is your boy. Complete an application because this little cutie won't be with us long.

============== Information for All Dogs/Adopters ==============

If you have questions about this dog, please feel free to contact the foster home at the email address listed above.  They have the most up-to-date information concerning the dog and would be happy to answer any questions about the animal. 

We welcome out of state and Canadian adoptions, but we will not ship any dog via cargo.  You will have to make arrangements to pick up the dog or for them to go by ground transport.  If you choose transporting by either volunteers through our organization or by paid transporter, there will be an additional $45 fee added for the required Health Certificate. 

We will not adopt into CT, RI, NH, ME, or MA due to strict laws regarding importation of dogs into those states.  If you have an issue with this, you need to take this up with your legislatures.

To understand the adoption process through AADR, please review the Adoption Information on our home page.  Transportation options are outlined on that page in Step 3.

If you are interested in adopting this Dachshund please review Read Before You Adopt and then you can complete an Application.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR INTEREST IN A RESCUE.

Please don't let the distance stand in your way of finding your newest best friend. We have volunteers that will help your \"new friend\" get up and down the East Coast. We just can't get them from one Coast to the other but some day we hope to have enough volunteers to do that as well.  For now, please look for dogs on your coast.

name: Pope
description: Hello, I am Pope a handsome fellow that is looking for a permanent place to hang my leash. Fortunately I was picked up by Animal Control and brought to the shelter. I actually had a rescuer who worked with Animal Control to finally catch me!  While I have been here I have gotten all of my vaccinations, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered.  One little problem did show up on my health check up. I am heartworm positive. Whoever adopts me will need to have me treated, but I have GREAT NEWS!  My treatment has been completely sponsored!  So if you would like to foster me or adopt me during treatment well come on in and meet me! My new home probably needs to be fenced in and I canât be an outside only dog, because I might get a little too curious about whatâs on the other side of the fence. I am a three-year-old lab/terrier mix. Do you have a home that might work for this big love bug?

name: Lila
description: Well Hi, my name is Lila!  Did they do a good job on my picture? Well I sure hope so!  I am an adorable six-month-old bulldog mix that was picked up by Animal Control.  I was never claimed by my family and now I need a new place to call home.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  You know everyone at the shelter is just crazy about me.  With my sweet disposition, cute face, and funny personality I hope I will be adopted soon.

name: Sue
description: Hellooooo! My name is Sue! I am a five-year-old hound mix that is looking for a great new home! The Humane deputies picked me up and brought me in.  I was really glad to be at the shelter.  You know being out on your own is a little scary!  What with big dogs, cars zooming around, and little or no food available, itâs a hard life for a stray. While I have been here I have gotten all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I got a microchip, and I have been spayed.  By the way did you happen to notice my drop-dead good looks?  You know my beautiful black coat and my striking and gorgeous blue eyes? Well if you missed that go back and take another look at my picture!

name: Brownie
description: Hidy! My name is Brownie! I am a cutie-patootie that is looking for a new home. I had a home that I loved, but I was sick and my family could not afford to take care of me.  Fortunately the shelter was able to treat me. It took a while for me to get well, but I am now A-OK and ready to begin again.  Besides getting treated for my illness, I got all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  I am a five-year-old terrier mix.  If you are looking for adorable small dog, well look no further! You have found me!!

He has a beautiful golden coat, he is on the thin side, so we are working on getting him healthy looking. He found himself in a kill shelter, he had such a great temperament recuse had to save this boy. He is fully vetted, and ready to home to his home.
