name: Pablo
description: Pablo here!  Say are you looking for a medium to large size companion? Well look no further. I am a two-year-old retriever mix that is in need of a new home. I came to the shelter as a stray and I was never claimed by my family. I must have been on my own for a little while because, you can see that I need to put on a little bit of weight. I am pretty skinny.  While I have been here I have gotten all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I got a microchip, and I have been neutered.  Also they have been giving me some extra nutritious food so I can gain some weight.  I know I will soon be back to my old handsome self with no ribs showing!!  One thing the volunteers have discovered about me is that I think I am a lap dog!  Yes, that's right I will climb right up in your lap and make myself comfortable if you just sit still long enough!!

name: Poppy
description: Poppy here!  I am sitting at the shelter wondering why I am looking for a  new home.  I had a home and family that I loved, but they thought I was too energetic for the family.  Well I do have lots of energy and I am just so happy, I guess I can go âoverboardâ with my âenthusiasmâ for life!!  Anywho, if you like energetic dogs, well here I am!  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed.  My family did have nice things to say about me! They said that I would be fine with older children and I was fine with other dogs and even cats!  Do you need anymore reasons to come adopt me?

name: White Paws
description:
White Paws is our male 2 year old Lab â Catahoula (cattle dog) mix.

He was a stray when he was brought to us, and very cautious because he had been on his own. Since then,  he has warmed up to the staff and he will to you, too, if you give him a chance! He just loves to be petted and loved on.

He is very handsome boy with spotted paws and soulful, expressive eyes.

His video: 
https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/634433463691148/
 
Randolph County Animal Shelter, Wedowee, AL. 36278 (256)357-0101  www.RandolphShelter.org

name: Queeny
description:
Queeny is our female 2 year old Pit Bull mix, that just arrived to us. 

She is very quiet and cautious of her new environment. It may take her a little time to warm up, but she is a beautiful girl that will repay you with her love. 

She just needs someone to coax her out of her shell. 

Her video: https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/749210355493872/

Randolph County Animal Shelter, Wedowee, AL. 36278 (256)357-0101 www.RandolphShelter.org

name: Bingo
description:
Bingo is our 1 year old male German Shepherd mix. He has the most soulful eyes and gorgeous two tone brown coat. 

He was a total blast to play with, full of love and energy in the short time he got to play. He will make a wonderful partner in life; you will not be disappointed with the love he has stored up for YOU! 

Bingo's video:
https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/686289511824218/

-- Randolph County Animal Shelter, Wedowee, AL. www.RandolphShelter.org (256)357-0101

name: Ellie
description:
Ellie is our 4 year old female Hound mix. Her marking are stunning. 

And she is as mellow as a Spring day, and ready to be your new BFF! 

Lively and interested in her surroundings, and we know she is ready to have her own family to love. You can tell she used to have that.

Her video:
https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/813686022343611/

Come give her a spin in Bark Park, today!

-- Randolph County Animal Shelter, Wedowee, AL. www.RandolphShelter.org (256)357-0101

name: Teddy
description: Teddy was found as a stray. He was so sick. When we took him to the vet, they estimated him to be around 5 years old. He is HW + and just had his last fast kill treatment. We are just waiting to retest hoping for a neg test result. He is neutered and has had a dental. He is utd on all shots, rabies and microchipped. According to his foster mom, he is more of a ladies man..lol. He seems to choose his \"person\" and loves to just sit and cuddle. He has the attitude of an old man. He doesn't really play or act like a 5 yr old. All he wants to do is sit with his human. He doesn't seem to mind cats. He will tolerate other dogs. We do not recommend a home with kids. If you are interested in Teddy, please apply here: www.nhrescue.com

name: Bravo
description: Bravo gets along with everyone, kids and dogs alike. He's just a super sweet soul! Est. birthdate is 5/18/2017, vaccinated, neutered, microchipped.  Adoption fee $200.00.   Please submit an application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Hannah Belle
description:
Hi! My name is Hannah Belle and my foster mom says I just won the Miss Congeniality award for the best foster dog EVER! I instantly make friends with other pups and people. My foster mom doesn't have cats, but she says I would probably be good with cats too.  I just love everybody!  I am a true Southern lady... I love to daintily take small bites of food from your hand when offered. My  manners are meticulous!  I quickly learned how to sit politely like a lady when asked. I also like to take afternoon strolls around the neighborhood, and enjoy a spa day like any girl does. 
I'm 100% house trained and can be crated at night (but I would rather sleep right next to your side of the bed and be the first thing you see every morning). I like to watch you cook dinner and I'll even clean the floor if you drop something!   My est. birthdate is March 18, 2014,  75 lbs. vaccinated, spayed, microchipped and ready to steal your heart!  Adoption fee $200.00.  
Please submit an application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Harbor
description:
Harbor is sweet, energetic, and very healthy. He is looking for a home where he can play and run inside and outside. He is microchipped, utd on vaccines, and neutered. 
Harbor is a lab mix and is great with kids and other dogs. His birthday is May 17th 2019. Harbor knows sit and knows how to use the doggy door very well to let himself in and out. He loves to play with kids and other dogs. Harbor is fully vaccinated, microchipped, nuetered, and on monthly flea and heartworm prevention. 
Harbor was born in our rescue after we rescued his momma. His momma was very pregnant when we took her in. Harbor is 1 of 7 puppies that were born in that litter. 
Contact us for more info.

name: Ruby
description:
This is Ruby. A very gentle girl who gets along well with other dogs and with children. She loves attention but doesn't jump all over you for it. This kind girl is ready for her forever home.
Ruby is a sweet Golden Retriever Mix, so sweet that she is overlooked repeatedly. This Gentle Soul has been at the shelter since Valentines Day Last Year 2018. Take this Valentine home to love & cherish as she so deserves. Ashland (EastCentral) Alabama /Clay County Animal Shelter

name: Erma
description: Erma

name: Tinman
description: Tinman is a happy fun loving puppy.  He is very smart and loves toys.  He is laid back and gets along fine with the other dogs.  He

name: Joan Jett
description: This is a courtesy post for Helping Shepherds of Every Color Rescue. Please email everycolorrescue@yahoo.com with any questions about Joan Jett. All of our dogs are housed in private homes, we do not have a store or a shelter. We do not show dogs to interested parties until they have an approved adoption application. If you are interested in adopting one of our dogs, please fill out an adoption application on our website www.helpingshepherdsofeverycolor.com You may also find us on facebook: Helping Shepherds of Every Color Rescue. This pretty girl is Joan Jett. SHHHHHHH, don't tell her she's not a shepherd, she doesn't know! She was just hanging out on the side of the road with her BFF and they were both rescued. I mean, we couldn't just leave her. Jett, as I call her, is super duper sweet and she has those rock star good looks. She gets along with other dogs and she loves people. She is energetic and smart and would benefit greatly from doggie games like nosework or agility or other things to keep her mind and body busy. Jett does best with lower energy dogs so she doesn't get all hyped up. Inspite of her activity level, she is very gentle with her 3 yr old human foster sister.

name: Nina
description: Beautiful Nina will simply be a wonderful best friend and companion. She is fine with dogs, full of playful energy, enjoys being your side-kick on car rides,  enjoys chew bones, crate and house trained!  Est. birthdate is February 2017,  67 lbs., vaccinated, spayed, microchipped. Adoption fee $200.00.  Please submit an adoption application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Gamora
description:
Info from Gamora's foster mom:
- Moderate energy level, likes to play but will settle down well with something to chew like a hoof or bone.
- Good-natured and even-tempered in her personality.
- She minds well and seems to be house trained. Has not had accidents.
- Not destructive inside or outside, some unstuffing of toys but hasn't chewed furniture, cords, or anything like that. Doesn't dig in the yard or bother outside furniture, garden hoses, etc.
- Easy to contain, doesn't try to climb a fence or dig out.
- Not too bad about barking but she will bark in a crate. I haven't had to crate her since she's been so good in the house.
- Doesn't jump up on people - good manners
- Gets along with other dogs. Will stand up for herself but doesn't really want any trouble. She is tolerant of big and small dogs. She likes to play if the other dog invites it.
- Some reactivity toward other dogs about her personal space and her food and treats. None of this attitude with people. Would need to manage if she lives with another dog.

name: Brik great with dogs, and kids
description:
Brik is extra snuggly and ready to be your best friend ever!  He loves car rides, playing with other dogs and kids (but doesn't do well with cats).   He seems to have reduced hearing, responding to some tones better than others, but it doesn't pose any problems for him at all. Vaccinated, neutered, microchipped, est. birthdate Feb. 2017.  Adoption fee $200.00
Please submit an adoption application https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: 190605 Ducky
description:
Ducky is 2-3 years old and is with us for killing chickens. He is about 55 lbs, super sweet, playful and just a happy-go-lucky boy. Fences make neighbors, dogs and chickens happy so Ducky is looking for a non-chicken family he can join and be a part of. Yes, Ducky & Rooster came in together.

ADOPTION FEES Dogs & Puppies.....$100.00. This Adoption fee includes: mandatory spay/neuter which will be done before you can take your dog or puppy home with you; basic canine immunizations (DHPP-CPV & Bordatella Intranasal); de-wormings; one-year rabies vaccination if old enough; heartworm test if over five months old; microchip from 24-Pet Watch; certificate for free health examination at your participating veterinarian; and a goodie bag chocked full of information, toys, and more.
Yes, there are sometimes exceptions to our normal fee for older dogs or special cases or adoptions of two dogs together. Some of our pets have also been lovingly sponsored by caring people and we will let the approved adopter know about that at the point of adoption. Visit our Website at: http://www.elmorehumane.orgThe staff would also like to remind you that for faster response to inquiries about adoptable animals to have the animals ID#, name & description.This way your questions will be answered in a timely manner.
You can also expedite the adoption process by filling our Adoption Application which you can find at: http://www.elmorehumane.org/HSEC_FORMS/AdoptionApplication.pdf and sending to us either by scanning and emailing to hselco@bellsouth.net or faxing to 334-567-8774.
All pet adoption websites & our shelter management software require that we choose a primary and/or secondary breed for our dogs. While our staff is quite breed knowledgeable, in many cases we are truly making our best guesses as to their breed(s) based on many factors but cannot promise that what we have said is accurate. So taking into account your own parameters for things such as size, coat care, activity level, etc please come and get to know our dog(s) as individuals to see if their personalities and yours are a forever match.
Thank you!Phone: (334) 567-3377 Fax: (334) 567-8774 E-mail: hselco@bellsouth.net

name: Ashes
description: Meet Ashes! This outgoing fella is estimated to be just under a year and a lab mix. He loved going for a walk today! Come meet him Tuesday-Sunday 11am-3pm. Ashes is friendly, likes dog friends, up to date on his shots and FULL OF LOVE. Come meet this young, little (about 20lbs) sweetie

name: Ray
description: Hello, my name is Ray! If you look at my picture you can tell that I am a little cutie pie! I am a six-month-old retriever mix that is in need of a new home.  My family brought me to the shelter to find a new home, because I kept getting out of my fence!  Well I get bored and then I start looking out the gate at all of the things going on outside of my fence. And then I figure out how to get out of my fence and check out my neighborhood!  I know I shouldnât, but I canât help it!  In case you might be interested, I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have microchip, and I have been neutered.  If you think you might like to adopt me, please remember I need a secure yard with a good fence. That way I wonât even be tempted to look for a way out!!  I love you!!

name: Tony
description: Tony here!  I am a good-looking seven-month-old retriever mix that is in need of a new home. I had a home that I loved, but I think I was just too high energy for my family.  I am a very active guy that runs âwide openâ all of the time!  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered.  Oh, my family gave me great recommendations! They said that I was good with kids, other dogs, and I am a pretty good leash walker. If you are thinking about starting an exercise program I could be your training partner. Come on, a run would do us both some good every day! Do you have time for an active boy like me?

name: Harvest
description:
Harvest arrived Sept 26.  She was dumped by the highway.  Here she is, proud & pretty but lonely.   She loves meeting new human faces & so wants one to take her home.  Harvest sits here posing for a possible photograph & marquee that a nice volunteer drew up to make her famous.  Her room mate, Belle, got adopted, so Harvest is even more ready to be home playing with her new family.
Come meet our future famous lady.  Make your season completeâ¦ Come to your Volunteer Animal Shelter & sweep Heather off her paws.

name: Blanche
description: Blanch, Rose and Dorothy were all surrendered together to a shelter. The surrender form had no information of the dogs. No names, ages, nothing. They were scared and older dogs. So we pulled all 3. Blanche is HW positive, but utd on all shots and she is now microchipped. She will be undergoing her HW treatment in 2 months. Then 2 months after that, she will get spayed. **Puggy (Blanche) is social, loving and quite energetic for her age. She is protective of her pack of humans and other dogs. She knows how to use a doggie door and i s almost perfect with her potty training. She would be great with a family.

name: Rose
description: Blanch, Rose and Dorothy were all surrendered together to a shelter. The surrender form had no information of the dogs. No names, ages, nothing. They were scared and older dogs. So we pulled all 3. Rose is HW positive, but utd on all shots and she is now microchipped. She will be undergoing her HW treatment in 2 months. Then 2 months after that, she will get spayed. ** Wolfie (Rose) is shy, timid and appears to have been abused bc she doesn't trust well. She LOVES, immensely loves, her foster mom. She is great with dogs and cats and children. She is not very trusting of men. She prefers snuggling on the couch all day long. Wolfie can also use the doggie door and is 90% potty trained.

description: All dogs adopted through Troy Animal Rescue Project are up to date on vaccinations, spayed/neutered, and heartworm negative. All dogs are given monthly flea/tick preventative, monthly heartwom preventative, and are dewormed regularly. Adoption fe is $50. Home visit and vet reference required.

description: Hey I'm Oakley! I have an injured back leg, but I don't let it get me down. I have that contagious type of happiness and hopefulness for the future. Will you be my furever human? Adopt me!

description:
Princess and Susie are a bonded pair of Mother and baby Chihuahaâs. Princess is 3 years old and 8-9 pounds. Susie, with the short coat, is 10 months old and weighs 6-7 pounds. They do everything together.  This pair of sweethearts lost their home when they lost their pet parent. They were spayed in rescue. 

$300 adoption fee helps to recoup some of the medical expenses for this pair of dogâs. They are worth it.

name: Brownie (TN)
description:
If you are interested in Brownie, please complete an online application first. Once you have had a phone interview, you may contact foster mom, Michelle, for more information at mmccror1@gmail.com.
Brownie is a five year old male that came to SLR as an owner surrender being fostered in Knoxville, TN. He has juvenile cataracts and the owners could not afford the surgery. He also has a dominant personality and because of this, was aggressive towards his brother.

Brownie3Brownie is neutered, heart worm negative, and up to date on shots and heart worm and flea preventative. He weighs around 20 lbs and is liver and cream colored. Brownie has juvenile cataracts and neurological issues and through the rescue has been able to see both an ophthalmologist and a neurologist. 

It is believed that Brownie has had his cataracts since birth and because of this, he is not a candidate for surgery. He also has some neurological issues that cause him to have awkward eye movements and walk/run in circles. He had blood work, an MRI, and a spinal tap performed which all came back normal and it is believed that his neurological issues are due to a traumatic event from his puppy years. We do not know if Brownie can see or how much, but he has adapted well and has a great quality of life.

Brownie6Brownie came to his foster home with little training, but things have improved dramatically. He is mostly house-trained and does okay if he is given enough time outside to do his business. He does well on a leash, but tends to make big circles around his person and a harness is preferred. He does growl and bark at other dogs and people walking by, but a squirt with a water bottle will calm him down. He will need more work on this, but he is highly trainable.

Brownie can come off as aggressive at first, but due to his sight, he is very intimidated which causes the fear aggression. He needs someone that will give him time and patience to show them what a truly amazing and sweet boy he is. Once he realizes he is safe, he turns into a cuddle-bug and just wants his belly rubbed. He has lots of energy and loves to play. Brownie5

He does need to be a one dog, no children household, as things that startle him may cause him to growl and snap. Previous schnauzer experience is preferred.

We do believe that Brownie has had a rough past, but thanks to SLR we know he will have a wonderful future. 


Designed by RocketTheme

name: Patches
description: Hi. My name is Patches. I'm the sweetest girl. I'm very social and I get along with everyone. I'm 6 years old and I need a new family. I love to cuddle and give lots of kisses. I know how to sit and stay. I simply love all creatures (minus chipmunks and squirrels, they don't stand a chance). She has some quirks due to pass abuse and neglect, but she isn't a bad or violent dog. She has helped foster kittens and puppies. She loves playing with kids. She loves kisses and hugs. She just loves all positive attention. She would be a great dog for a family with young kids. She would be a good dog for a single person who just wants a best friend. She would be good for an older couple who just want a companion to keep them company. She's a good fit for everyone. Her only negative is she has some separation anxiety, fear of loud noises and she has extreme fear of storms. She needs to be kenneled when left alone. She's scared of a leaf blower. They terrify her. She has been known to break through a door to get away from one. Lawn mowers, vacuums, weed eaters, etc are fine, just leaf blowers. During a storm, she feels she needs to get away from it. She might try to get out of her kennel if she's left alone in a home. But if she's with someone, she is ok. I would love to place her with someone who can spend a lot of time with her and not leave her alone for long periods of time. She's great if she has another doggie friend to play with. If your interested in Patches, please apply here: www.nhrescue.com.

name: Baby Girl
description: Baby Girl was rescued from a shelter last year and adopted into a loving home. Her family is moving and due to new housing restrictions, she couldn't go. So she is back with NHR. Baby Girl is 9 years old now. She is the sweetest, most lovable dog. She is currently HW Positive and taking monthly treatments. She will be reevaluated by our vet to see if she can be a candidate for the fast kill treatment. She also has a skin condition that she is currently on antibiotics for 2 times a day. She has been in an only dog home environment for the past year. We don't know how she will do around other dogs. We are going to test her in the coming weeks to determine if she needs to stay an only dog or not. In her previous home, she was never kenneled. She was always with someone. So she could go out when she wanted. She is house trained and kennel trained. She knows how to sit, stay, lay, shake. She is really good around kids and older people. You would not believe she was 9 because she is still very playful. If your interested in BabyGirl, please apply here: www.nhrescue.com

name: Sally
description:
Sally is our oh so gentle 1.3 year old female Hound mix.  She is light on her feet and prances around with such grace and beauty. She is still gaining weight with us. 

Her markings are very distinctive too, including her white leggings and chest ! She will be a great house or yard dog as well as a companion.  

Her video: 
https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/609919309488036/

Randolph County Animal Shelter, Wedowee, AL. 36278 (256)357-0101 www. RandolphShelter.org

name: Lola
description:
Hi, I'm Lola! I'm an energetic girl who loves to run and jump and play!  I'm very inquisitive and smart. I'm learning my basic commands and have mastered a couple.  I am house trained and crate trained.  I don't mind spending time in my crate, especially if I have a toy to play with.  I'm sweet and love to be around people.  I definitely enjoy quality cuddle time with my people!  I am good with kids but may have to much energy for smaller children. I get along great with my foster family's dogs which are big, but I don't like small yappy dogs. If you're looking for a goofy and fun loving friend to play with, come and meet me, Lola!!

Part of my adoption fee has been sponsored so my adopt fee is only $100.00.

name: Trixie
description:
Located in Bessemer. 

Meet Trixie... she was surrender to MLPs after she could no long be breed and the owner was going to have her euthanized.  She was given to a family friend which spared her life.  However a few days later she was posted needing a home because it wasnât working out. 

We were told Trixie is an 8 year old pure breed boxer. She has lived her entire life outside and was breed multiple times but has adapted to living inside rather quickly.  She has been in an amazing foster home since she joined MLPs trying to help her work through her fears.  She was doing amazingly well however she was taken for her spay and has seemed to have taken a step back.  

The foster is willing continue and is helping her overcome her fears but we come to the conclusion that it would be best to go ahead and post her as available since she will go through another transition period once adopted. 

Trixieâs adopter will need a secure fence (underground fence isnât an option) and another dog that she can bond with.  She loves playing with the Lisaâs pups which has helped her overcome her fears. Trixie May bolt if given the opportunity until she feels comfortable and secure in her surroundings so an experienced adopter is a must. 

If you are interested in adopting Trixie and can meet the requirements please go to our website and complete an application.  

http://MustLovePawsRescue.com

name: GILBERT
description:
Gilbert is a love bug. He had to have surgery to repair his hip, but he has healed up and is doing great. He loves everyone and does well with dogs, cats, kids!! He is up to date on vaccinations, fixed, and is on heartworm preventative. 

Gilbert will need a fenced yard for playtime. 

If you would like to meet him, please let us know at sugarbellefoundation@gmail.com

He is located in the Birmingham area!!

name: Chester
description: So I donât know exactly what happened, but I had a home.  Then for some reason I was turned in to a different shelter.  Fortunately, they tracked down the shelter I was adopted from and sent me back.  So I guess you could say I have come back âhome!â  Anyway I am getting ready to try that âfamilyâ thing again! I hope it works out this time!  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered.  I am a six-year-old retriever mix that doesnât really understand why I am without a home.  I know I will be my old self again when I have a new family I can count on through good times and bad! FYI...I am not a big fan of cats or other small animals in the house or in the yard.

name: Bonnie
description: Meet Bonnie! Bonnie is a very sweet and loving girl looking for a family to adopt her. She is estimated to be around 2 1/2 years old, a lab mix, and spayed. Bonnie gets along with most dogs. Come visit the shelter Tuesday-Saturday 11am-3pm.

name: Potato
description: Potato is a 2 year old, female, lab/pit mix who is looking for a loving FURever home. She specializes in giving hugs and doing zoomies in the back yard. Potato is a little timid at first when meeting new people, but once she feels safe then she is a very affectionate and loyal girl. Potato has been treated for heartworms and is also microchipped, spayed, and up to date on her vaccines. Call (205) 902-9247 or email jill@wagshomewood.com for more details on adopting sweet Potato!

name: LEO
description:
Leo (first photo, darker color)
Great Pyrenees/Labrador Retriever Mix

Shepherd Mix

name: Jackson Brown B
description:
Please contact Vickie (dvbrooks57@gmail.com) for more information about this pet.*
this is Jackson. He is approximately 2 years old. He is a lab/bulldog mix weighing about 65 lbs. Jack is black and white. He loves attention and is happiest with his head in someone's lap. This big guy gets along well with other dogs, is fully vetted and ready to be someone's best friend. DS 4/9/19

*It is rare that we know with certainty the ages or mixes that make up our wonderful dogs, but we do our best to be as accurate as possible based upon our many years in rescue.** Adoption: $325 which covers quarantine, shots, worming, food, medical records, spaying/neutering,microchip and an Alabama State Health Certificate. Transport, if needed : $120.00 We consider the transport to be of great importance and, as such, take particular care of the dogs during the trip from Alabama. We make every effort to arrive with healthy and minimally stressed dogs.

name: Raven
description:
Meet Raven! This sweet girl was surrendered due to her owner moving away. She is current on vaccines, spayed & microchipped.  

Raven is being fostered right now and her foster mom says she is amazing and very laid back!She is wonderful with other dogs and also enjoys being on the couch with her human. She is crate and house trained and one of the sweetest girls you will ever meet. 

If interested in Miss Raven please go to our website and submit an application.

name: Blinken
description: Blinken is an energetic playful pup.  He's very shy until he assesses the situation and then he's happy and full on play.  He will need patience and an adjustment period in order to bond with his forever family but once that occurs you will have an amazing four legged friend.

name: Winken
description: WInken is a playful outgoing pup.  He's shy until he gets to know someone but treats speed the process along. Winken is a small pup weighing in at less than 15 lbs but he is accustomed to playing with dogs of all sizes, ages and breeds.

name: Patti
description:
Peppermint Patti is a three-year-old, 35 pound medium terrier, lab mix. 

Patti is looking for a home with no other animals or kids.

To adopt Patti, please email Connie at were4dogs@gmail.com

name: Panda
description:
I am a Panda Bear of Love!!  Panda is our 1 year old female Lab mix. She has beautiful markings and a shiny coat.  She is very curious and playful and she will be a fun play buddy. She loved playing with her pal Daisy Girl in Bark Park.  Very lively little girl that will bring a smile to your face, every day!

Panda's slideshow vid: 
https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/2058275731140891/

name: 191080 Nala
description:
#190202 Nala is a 2 year old white Shepherd/Husky looking gal who wouldn't stay in an invisible fence. She is a higher energy gal who just wants to run and play. Approx 55-60 lbs. Nala seems to be very selective as to which dogs she will get along with. She is not good with small dogs or cats and the best chance will be a laid back adult male dog her size. Very loving to humans!

ADOPTION FEES Dogs & Puppies.....$100.00. This Adoption fee includes: mandatory spay/neuter which will be done before you can take your dog or puppy home with you; basic canine immunizations (DHPP-CPV & Bordatella Intranasal); de-wormings; one-year rabies vaccination if old enough; heartworm test if over five months old; microchip from 24-Pet Watch; certificate for free health examination at your participating veterinarian; and a goodie bag chocked full of information, toys, and more.
Yes, there are sometimes exceptions to our normal fee for older dogs or special cases or adoptions of two dogs together. Some of our pets have also been lovingly sponsored by caring people and we will let the approved adopter know about that at the point of adoption. Visit our Website at: http://www.elmorehumane.org The staff would also like to remind you that for faster response to inquiries about adoptable animals to have the animals ID#, name & description.This way your questions will be answered in a timely manner.
You can also expedite the adoption process by filling our Adoption Application which you can find at: http://www.elmorehumane.org/HSEC_FORMS/AdoptionApplication.pdf and sending to us either by scanning and emailing to hselco@bellsouth.net or faxing to 334-567-8774.
All pet adoption websites & our shelter management software require that we choose a primary and/or secondary breed for our dogs. While our staff is quite breed knowledgeable, in many cases we are truly making our best guesses as to their breed(s) based on many factors but cannot promise that what we have said is accurate. So taking into account your own parameters for things such as size, coat care, activity level, etc please come and get to know our dog(s) as individuals to see if their personalities and yours are a forever match.
Thank you! Phone: (334) 567-3377 Fax: (334) 567-8774 E-mail: hselco@bellsouth.net

name: Apollo
description: Well hello!  I am Apollo! As you can see in my picture I am a fine looking boxer mix.  I had a family, but they received a military transfer and I could not go with them.  In case you might be interested in adding me to your family I am about three years old and I have all of my vaccinations, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered.  One little problem did show up on my health check up.  I am heartworm positive.  Whoever adopts me will need to have me treated.  If you would like to donate to my treatment just call or come by the shelter.  If you would like to foster me or adopt me during treatment, then please come by and meet me in person.  My previous family said that I was great with kids and other dogs!

name: Daisy
description:
Daisy is a 3 year old terrier possible Chihuaha mix.  She was found stray in the country.

Daisy is great around children, she has lived with other dogs, but she has not been exposed to cats.  Daisy weighs 16 pounds, she spayed, up-to-date on all of her shots, and taking flea, tick, heartworm prevention. 

 Adoption fee for all small dogs or puppies is $250. 

Please email Connie for an application to adopt Daisy. were4dogs@gmail.com

Definitely had a home with toys and knows how to use them!! Got toys?

description:
Salsa is a sweet, energetic little guy who needs a home to share his love with. He loves tennis balls and rope toys. He would love a home with someone who likes to go for long walks, runs, or who likes to play fetch. He prefers not to share his love with anyone but his people so a single pet household would be best. He is very energetic so we recommend a home with older children.

Salsa is located at our rescue center.

name: Nelson
description: Meet Nelson. Nelson is very calm and well mannered. He likes to be close to caregiver and gives lots of love. He is trained on the leash and potty trained. He tends to tell you if he needs to go but a good indicator is when he has gas. Good with other dogs but was told he doesn't like cats. It takes him some time to warm up to new people, especially males but is never aggressive about it. He just acts shy and uncertain. Once he's comfortable l, his tail will wag and you can tell he's happy. Honestly the best dog and companion to have! Very low maintenance! He loves squishy squeaky toys. As you can see he loves to take naps too. LoL If your interested in Nelson, please apply here: www.nhrescue.com.

name: Bill Charley
description:
Bill Charley, fondly nicknamed BC, is the BEST snuggle buddy on the planet, couch or bed.  He's a true sidekick!  You could say BC stands for Big Cuddler.  If you need someone to binge watch Netflix with, he is your guy.  You won't need a body pillow at bedtime because he'll be pressed beside you all night.   BC will put his paw, head, and 1/2 his body on you for cuddles.  BC wants a quiet home with patient, gentle, humans that understands that  he can be nervous meeting new people in new situations. Loud noises can be scary too, so he just wants you to be mindful of that. BC is fantastic with other dogs and will thrive best, and really needs , a good-natured doggie friend in his home. He is respectful of kitties too.  His foster mom knows this happy lover boy will be a wonderful companion. 
Est. birthdate May 2017, vaccinated, neutered, microchipped, crate and house trained. Adoption fee $200.00.  Could you be Bill Charley's happily ever after? Please submit an adoption application, https://www.shelterluv.com/matchme/adopt/TBTR/Dog

name: Trader Joe
description:
Trader Joe awaits your friendship! He is looking for a family or person that believes in his favorite motto...Live the Life You Love!  When asked what he thinks about the game of fetch, his enthusiastic response was \"yes, omg yes! pretty please!  Show him a ball and his ears perk up in .5 seconds!  Ask him if he wants to go outside..... he jumps high in the air...no Air Jordans needed!  He smiles with so much excitement it's like he's laughing- for real!    Basking in the sun is also a favorite pastime, besides fetching balls of course.   He's a true blue loyal fellow that will shadow you about staying by your side.
Trader Joe obeys basic commands, is a champ on leash, gets along with other dogs, likes kids, about 50 lbs. of super cool!    Let Trader Joe show you how fabulous life can be when shared with him!   He's vaccinated, neutered, and microchipped.  Est. birthdate 8/15/2015.  Adoption fee $200.00.  Trader Joe is ready to be your best bud and have a ball!   Please submit an adoption application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

Please submit an adoption application, https://www.shelterluv.com/matchme/adopt/TBTR/Dog

name: B-Dawg
description:
Bruno is a people person, a Bully who is super friendly and loves to play.  Approx 1-2 years old, he has been neutered, current on his vaccines, heartworm negative, and ready for a forever family.
For more information on Bruno, please contact us
at adopt@rescuek911.com

name: Johnny Walker
description:
Johnny Walker is one beautiful Walker Hound with a wonderful personality.  Approx 2 - 3 years old.  Neutered and current on his vaccines.  Friendly and up for any adventure. He is ready to go.  Looking for a family to call his own.  For more information on Johnny Walker, please contact us at: adopt@rescuek911.com

description:
Bella is a beautiful Chow-Chow Mix. Approx 5-6 years old.  She is good with other dogs and with people.  True to her breed she is looking for a family to bond with and love forever.  She did come in pretty bad shape and is heartworm positive.  She has been spayed and current on her vaccines and is receiving monthly heartworm prevention.  For more information on Bella, please contact us at: adopt@rescuek911.com

Adoption Application: www.rescuek911.com
Adoption Donation: $100.00

name: Heidi
description:
Hello! My name is Heidi and I am the most good natured, smart, and loyal girl dog around! I am wanting to be adopted so I can have a human forever to love!

Breed:  German Shepherd


Gender:  Female, spayed


Age:  3 years old


Size:  55 pounds

Personality


I love to be around people. I love to go on walks. I love to look adorable until someone cuddles me. I am active when I get to play outside but am usually pretty calm once I get somewhere with a human. I am very affectionate. I love to lay my head against my human and snuggle as close to my human as possible. I am very smart and willing to learn new things for snacks. 

Heidi is a beautiful German Shepherd. Approx 2-3 years old. True to her breed she loves people and just wants a family to give all her love too. Heidi did come into rescue in pretty bad shape.  Found along the roadside, she had been eating roadkill and had to have surgery as bones were lodged in her throat..  She also is heartworm positive but has been receiving monthly prevention.  Please consider Heidi for adoption, she is worth it. For more information on Heidi, please contact us at: adopt@rescuek911.com

Adoption Application: www.rescuek911.com
Adoption Donation: $100.00

name: Domino
description:
Happy, goofy, extremely intelligent, a lover of belly rubs, toys, hiking, exploring - a champ on leash..... Domino is a wonderful companion!  This silly boy will bring you his football when you get home because he can't wait to have some fun with you.  Domino loves to play fetch and we bet he'd be a good Frisbee catcher too.   Just say sit and he gladly obeys, especially if a treat is involved.  He'd love to learn more tricks, maybe you could be the one to teach him. It would be fun!   This handsome boy delights in going for rides and his big ol' smilie face hanging out the window is proof!  Domino will be all you need as he should be your only pet, and with older considerate children only.  Est. birthdate is Aug. 2013,  about 62 lbs. vetted, neutered, microchipped, and ready to be your big baby for life!  Adoption fee $200.00.
Please submit an adoption application, https://www.shelterluv.com/matchme/adopt/TBTR/Dog

name: OREO
description: Oreo is about 2 years old. American Pitbull Terrier, neutered, fully vetted, and on Heartworm preventative. He is smart, sweet, affectionate, and playful. He has high energy. He is house trained. He will do best in a home with no small children.

name: Mercy great with dogs, cats and kids
description: Oh sweet Mercy!  She has an amazing spirit to be admired and emulated.   Mercy is grateful and excited about her new life.   She loves laying her head in your lap to soak up all the petting you'll give.  The look in her adoring eyes is priceless!   She enjoys playtime with children and dogs, while ignoring cats.  Mercy wants a home with an active lifestyle where she would be included on family adventures and fun.  Other dogs and kids would be a big plus for this 55 lb. energetic young sweetheart.  She is house and crate trained, vaccinated, spayed, microchipped and ready to be the love of your life.  A knd and generous person has sponsored her adoption fee.  Are you the one to return her love?  Please submit an adoption application, https://www.shelterluv.com/matchme/adopt/TBTR/Dog

name: Penny
description:
Penny is so full of life.....
She wasnât so very long ago. She came to us when she was nothing but skin and bones and merely defeated. 
She rose above that and is so forgiving and ready to love again!!!

name: Shelby
description:
Name: Shelby

Age: ~ 2 yo

Sex: SF

Weight: ~ 50 lbs

Ear/tail: natural ears and natural tail

HW Status: Negative

Available: NOW

Likes: to be with her person and get all the attention

Dislikes: animals smaller than her and NO cats. 

A Little about me: Hi, I'm Shelby! Pleased to meet you!

Not a lot is know about my past, just that I was brought in to Shelby County Humane Society as a stray.  I had puppies at some point in my short life, though the Humane Society doesn't know what happened to them.  I spent four whole months in the pen, and the folks there thought I was a super special girl! 

It took me a little while to adjust to life in a home, but I'm doing so well! I'm learning about going potty outside on the grass (it feels weird on my feet), and I learned how to sit for treats (I'm very smart)! I have become my foster mom's shadow, so my ideal person will give me lots of one-on-one attention! My favorite thing is snuggling! I'll even fall asleep on you lap while snuggling! I'm a playful girl who loves to talk, so don't be surprised if I bark to communicate that I want to play! I LOVE TOYS!! Extreme durability is the best.  I'm not aggressive toward people about food, I\"m just super curious and EVERYTHING SMELLS AMAZING! I'm still a puppy learning what is and isn't okay to chew or eat, so please be patient with me!

According to my foster mom (and everyone who meets met), I'm a lovey dovey sweetheart. I would prefer to be your only furbaby even though I am ok with some other dogs.  I love kids and I do well around them, but they need to be older kids because I have high energy! I like to roughhouse and I want them to be able to play and exercise with me as I get older! I am a fast learner and I want to be loved on all the times.

If you have room in your heart and your home for a playful, snuggly, intelligent, soulful girl like me who wants and deserves true love, please ask about me on your application! I am ready for my furever home!

This dog is being fostered near Jacksonville, AL. YOU MUST BE WILLING TO DRIVE PART IF NOT ALL OF THE WAY TO PICK UP THIS DOG FOR ADOPTION. 

Please visit Rockin' P Rescue, Inc. to submit an online adoption application. 

A part of Shelby's adoption fee has been sponsored so her adoption fee is only $150.00. 

Adoption contributions are as follows: 
* $300.00 for a dog 6 months and under
* $250.00 for a dog aged 7 months to 1 year 
* $225.00 for a dog over one year

name: Gerdie
description: This well mannered lady rides in the car like a champ, is crate and house trained, and walks nicely on a leash. Gerdie has been a perfect angel with the grandkids in her foster home. She is super sweet!   She loves your touch and wants nothing more than to be by your side to get lots of petting.  She prefers to be the only dog, but can be in a home with another laid back dog.   Gerdie is a 72 lb. lump of sugar ready to prove her love to a family to call her own.  Est. birthdate is July 2016, She is vetted, spayed, and microchipped. Adoption fee $200.00

name: Anastasia
description:
All of our dogs are housed in private homes, we do not have a store or a shelter. We do not show dogs to interested parties until they have an approved adoption application. If you are interested in adopting one of our dogs, please fill out an adoption application on our website www.helpingshepherdsofeverycolor.com You may also find us on facebook: Helping Shepherds of Every Color Rescue.

Anastasia is a very sweet and playful girl. She loves to cuddle. Anastasia is great with other dogs and would probably be fine with children.

name: Cooper
description:
Cooper is our gentle and sweet male, 1.5 year old Red Heeler mix. He is very humble when you meet, but it doesn't take long before he livens up when the toys come out! 

That's when we saw his true personality, in Bark Park, during our photo shoot.

He is spunky, playful, and my he sure did love being caressed and scratched. He had that love before, you can tell, and he is ready to share it with you too!

His slideshow video:

description:
Grady is our male 1.6 year old German Shepherd mix.  He is a playful and curious boy with a lot of personality for you to enjoy.  

He needs room to run with those long legs, and at the end of the day he will be happy to rest by your side in contentment.

name: Nellie
description:
Nellie is approximately a year old.  We have not had her very long so we can not attest to her housetraining.  She is social, loving and playful.  She can be a bit timid the first time she meets someone but that goes away very quickly.  She is in a kennel situation currently but is getting a lot of love and attention.  
   Her story:  She was found as a stray on a county road in Cullman County Alabama near Smith Lake.  She was at t local church following some to the men around but no one could get her into their vehicles.  The men at the church said she had been moving down the county road for weeks that they know of but no one could catch her, even though she seemed to want to be with everyone that stopped to get her.  She was clearly hungry but she was having difficulty eating and drinking what the locals were trying to feed her....upon closer inspection, it became clear her collar was way too tight and was close to being imbedded.  All it took was someone that was alittle more patient to get her into a vehicle and get her to one of our Veterinarians.  Her collar was removed and all was well with Nellie...she was left with not ill effects and loves human attention. 
   Please consider giving this sweet young girl a loving forever home.   Our adoption fee is $125... she is spayed, all vaccinations, heartworm negative and microchipped.

name: Mann
description:
Mann is a 50 pound one year old Akita/shepherd mix. He is super attentive, smart, and a bit shy at first. He loves walk and walks exceptionally well on a leash staying right beside you without pulling at all. He is still in a playful puppy phase that also requires a fenced yard. LOVES you to throw twinkle balls and will actually roll them back you you!! Favorite thing in the world... BELLY RUBS! He does require another large playful dog in the home. Please submit a questionnaire from our website if you are interested in meeting him. 
www.sanctuaryanimalrescue.com

name: Daphne
description:
Daphne is our 10 month old female Hound mix. She and her sibling Velma were brought in as strays.  They have come a long way in a short time, and are now ready to meet and greet their new life partners, YOU!!  

They were so much fun to interact with in Bark Park!  Perhaps you will take the pups in there and choose one, two?   After all, they are all socialized and love each other!! 

Her video slideshow:
 https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/663319247413429/

-- Randolph County Animal Shelter, Wedowee, AL. (256)357-0101 www.RandolphShelter.org

name: Trooper
description: *Trooper is our sweet neutered and SPONSORED male 3 year old Lab mix. He loves attention and is very playful and loving.  He even enjoys baths, and his fur is so soft then. He sits quietly as you brush him. He is just waiting to see what you want to do, like \"What now, Boss?\

name: Bailey
description:
*Bailey is our spayed and SPONSORED female 2 year old Rottweiler mix. ?? She is a gorgeous girl with beautiful markings. She is gentle, with a tiny tail and a big heart!

She has been quietly waiting her turn, with no fuss. VERY easy going.  She needs a home where she will have a secure place from storms that frighten her. .....Do you need a companion as much as she needs you?

Add some Bailey love to your life!!

She and her siblings Tracy and Stacey were part of a litter of strays we received, and they all have come such a long way!  Very playful, with each other, but once they are separated they need reassurance and a kind teacher. 

 As you can see, they are yard, porch, and dog friendly!!

name: Shy
description:
*Shy is our spayed and SPONSORED gorgeous brindle female 1.2 year old Mountain Cur mix. She shimmers in the sunlight,  and will provide your sunlight on a cloudy day. She will dress up your couch/porch! She is humble and loving. 

She has come a long way from arriving as a stray, and hiding in her dog house. Now when you give her a chance to come to you, she warms up. She wants to please, if she knows what you want. Nobody ever taught her, so she is unsure of everything. 

Some dogs have a harder time in a shelter with all the noise, and we think when she has a home of her own, she can relax and come out of her shell. 

Her slideshow video:
https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/282099296037396/

name: Bernard
description:
Bernard is our 1.7 year old dashingly handsome neutered male Great Dane mix. He was brought in as a stray.Â  He is all dressed upÂ  Â with his 'white shoes' !!!Â

name: Moonlight
description: MoonLight is a young guy.  He is so, so friendly and loving and sensitive.  He loves to be close. He is so ready for a family.  He is very good in his crate, waits for commands and watches your movements.  He responded well to housetraining, as he waited till we went out and took advantage of the time to take care of his business before returning to his kennel.  Moonlight does not bark much, until he knows you want him to sing.  Check him out TODAY.  He is packed and ready to come HOME.

name: Cooper
description: Cooper is so responsive, attentive and loving.  He looks like a guard dog & acts like a Lover dog.  He is very sweet and sensitive.  In these photos he was so responsive to the stranger taking his photos, but then sad when he realized she was not there to take him home.  You see it in his eyes.  Cooper is so easy to read... as his emotions come out of his eyes, heart and expressions.  Take this man and enjoy him as your new family.  He deserves your Love.

name: Jinx
description:
All of our dogs are housed in private homes, we do not have a store or a shelter. We do not show dogs to interested parties until they have an approved adoption application. Jinx is a pretty little girl who found herself lost and starving until a good Samaritan took her in. She is dog and cat friendly and people friendly but still a little shy. She has a great personality and will be a great companion for someone.

Jinx has to be fed in an upright position and she comes with her own feeding table. She is a quirky, silly girl who loves to cuddle.

name: Loving Luna
description:
Luna is a sweet senior in search of a home. She would do best in a home with older children due to her age. She would also do well in a home with mostly females. She adjusts to men, but at times is fearful of them. 
Luna does have a heart condition which requires medication. She is crate trained, but prefers hanging out with people. 
She would do great in a home with a retired person who has lots of love and time to give.

name: Mia
description: Mia has a lot of energy and can play with herself for hours. She loves to swim and also loves to play with her food bowls, or a ball, or a toy... she always needs something in her mouth to be happy. Mia needs a home with lots of love and maybe some teenage children to play with to help her exert her energy. She would be a good candidate for obedience training!

Splenda.

name: Buck bird
description: BuckBird, heâs a big ol silly boy. He enjoys the company of other dogs and loves to put his nose to the ground and investigate all the lovely smells of the world. When he not sniffing out the wonders of the world, he offers his goofy self for some fetch, cuddles, and giving the best hound dog eyes.

name: Foxy
description:
All of our dogs are housed in private homes, we do not have a store or a shelter. We do not show dogs to interested parties until they have an approved adoption application. If you are interested in adopting one of our dogs, please fill out an adoption application on our website www.helpingshepherdsofeverycolor.com You may also find us on facebook: Helping Shepherds of Every Color Rescue.

Foxy is a super sweet, medium size dog. She is good with dogs, cats, loves people and is just a great dog. She just finished Heartworm treatment and is ready to go to a new home.
Foxy is also good at rodent control, she will catch mice and rats. If you are into the sport of barnhunting, she would be a good prospect.

name: Jolie
description: Meet Jolie. Jolie is about 3 years old. She weighs 75 lbs. True to her breeds, Jolie is very well behaved, listens to every command and is very smart and personable. She will need someone with strong, gentle leadership skills, as most Catlle dogs she believes it is HER job to keep order in the home. For this reason Jolie will probably do best in a mature couples home with no small children and as an dominant dog. Jolie will offer companionship and protection. Jolie has never shown aggression towards a person, but would protect those she loves. Currently living inside a Foster Home where she has learned house manners. She is house trained, friendly and a good guard dog. She has been socialized with other dogs of all ages and sizes. Jolie needs a fenced in yard or a very active person family to keep her physically and mentally exercised. She walks great on a leash and would love activities such as hiking and exploring. Jolie needs her own person and/or Family to help her blossom to her true potential. She is spayed and UTD on her vaccines, micro-chipped and current with monthly heart worm preventive. Jolie is a dog who will need to be inside with you and outside for physical and mental stimulation. We will only consider homes that make their dog(s) a part of the family. IMPORTANT! PLEASE READ TO THE END. Included in NHR adoption Fee with all dogs and Puppies: UTD with Vaccines, Micro-Chipped, Spay/Neuter included, Treated for internal parasites, and living in a loving Foster Homes, and not a stressful Kennel environment. New Hope Rescue is a 501-C3 All Volunteer, Not for Profit Organization. All Proceeds are going to be used to help other rescue dogs and not to pay salaries. Because we are a small rescue we cannot transport out of our immediate area, however if you would like to arrange transportation we may be able to work with you. We will only consider homes that make their dog(s) a part of their Family.

name: Flower
description:
Flower is a sweet, calm,quiet, gentle girl that turns into a wiggle butt you come home- she gets so excited to see you. She loves cuddles!  Flower is very food motivated and appreciates her meals.
This beauty is 2 years old, best as your only fur kid, house and crate trained, fully vetted, spayed, microchipped and ready to blossom in your heart.    Adoption fee $200.00.
Please submit an adoption application, https://twobytworescue.com/adopting/

name: Jack
description:
****Jack is a little shy at first but warms up quickly. He has some weakness in his back legs that make his gait unsteady. This was a condition that he was born with. He is a little slower than other dogs, but he runs and plays just like any other. Come meet him and fall in love!***

name: Joan Jett
description:
All of our dogs are housed in private homes, we do not have a store or a shelter. We do not show dogs to interested parties until they have an approved adoption application. If you are interested in adopting one of our dogs, please fill out an adoption application on our website www.helpingshepherdsofeverycolor.com You may also find us on facebook: Helping Shepherds of Every Color Rescue.

This pretty girl is Joan Jett. SHHHHHHH, don't tell her she's not a shepherd, she doesn't know! She was just hanging out on the side of the road with her BFF and they were both rescued. I mean, we couldn't just leave her. Jett, as I call her, is super duper sweet and she has those rock star good looks. She gets along with other dogs and she loves people. She is energetic and smart and would benefit greatly from doggie games like nosework or agility or other things to keep her mind and body busy.
Jett does best with lower energy dogs so she doesn't get all hyped up. Inspite of her activity level, she is very gentle with her 3 yr old foster sister.

You'll see from my pictures that I love to spend time with my human on the couch.  But I also love playing with my foster family siblings!  I'm a pretty mellow boy, quite smart and quck to learn even if I do say so myself.  I'm ready from my forever home!

description:
Grace is a small girl who is very sweet. She is the most lovable dog that I have met,   She gets along and plays well with her dog friends and humans .  She will probably be happiest where she is not the only dog tho she still loves one on one attention.  She has a lot of energy so small children probably aren't the best match as she might accidentally bump into one.

She has come a long way in the crate and has learned to enjoy it with continued training and reward for being calm..  A home where she can be with her people often will be ideal as she forms strong relationships with her humans and will need patience during her transition to her forever home so she can develop that strong relationship with you.

He  is an amazing young dog who has been raised well in a loving foster home. Jayne was born in our rescue to a full Siberian Husky momma (Sesi) who was already pregnant when we pulled her from a shelter.  Thanks to his wonderful foster and trainer, he is learning tons of obedience and agility/obstacle training.   Jayne is part Siberian Husky part mystery.

name: Margot
description:
Meet Miss Margot! Margot is a lovely beagle girl, about 6 years old and approximately 30 lbs. Margot is even-tempered and good-natured in her personality. She prefers to be indoors most of the time and only goes outside for potty breaks. She has some separation anxiety and will bark and cry when left alone. Margot is not destructive, but she will try her hardest to steal a snack. Even by beagle standards, Margot is highly food-motivated and very possessive of her food and treats. She gets along with other dogs, but she does not want to share food or treats with them at all and can be rude about it. She is crate trained. Margot has dry eye and will need artificial tears type eye drops 2-3 times a day for the rest of her life.
Margot is microchipped, up to date on vaccines, spayed and current on flea and heartworm prevention. Please email rescue@alsosbeagles.com for more information for more information about her or complete an application at http://sosbeagles.org/adoptionform.php (send to AL chapter).

name: Book
description:
Book is so smart! And don't you just love those ears!    Book is a smart young dog who has been raised well in a loving foster home. Thanks to his wonderful foster and trainer, he is learning tons of obedience and agility/obstacle training.   Book has been very quick to learn in his training.  Book was born in our rescue to a full Siberian Husky momma (Sesi) who was already pregnant when we pulled her from the shelter making him half Siberian, half mystery. .

name: Arctic B lower fee
description:
Please contact Vickie (dvbrooks57@gmail.com) for more information about this pet.With his medium length, white coat and his love of life, this 7-year-old, 41 pound White Shepherd is a fine, fine boy! He loves water and bounces like a kangaroo in it! He walks well on a leash and is excellent in the car, so he would probably make a good travel partner. He is crate trained but has had free roam of the house while family is at home. He isn't only good looking, mind you. He is intelligent and active, enjoying his play with children, his foster says, \"like there's no tomorrow!\" In other ways a gentleman, Arctic can be picky in choosing his canine buddies. Such a good boy would make a wonderful companion! ME
Adoption fee: 200 This all includes microchip, all vaccines, neutering, and complete medical records.

name: Stefen
description:
Meet Stefan! A true gentleman that knows how to treat a lady but prefers a good man-date any day.  

Stefan bonds best with men! He loves a good bromance and wants nothing more than to be the only dog in your life. No kids, no cats..Just a man & his dog... Together, going for hikes, long walks (on a beach would be great but not required), watching the game in matching jerseys... You could have these moments with Stefan! He definitely wouldn't judge you for eating pizza three nights in a row or for leaving your underwear on the floor. Not that Stefan doesn't love the ladies too but the lady might get jealous of being the third wheel! :D 

Stefan needs a fenced in yard to burn off those calories from game day snacks. He should be the only pet in the house but promises you won't miss those other 2 - 4 legged creatures. He's housebroken & good on a leash but does require a strong leader as he's very much a shepherd. 

Anyone interested in adopting or fostering this this fun loving pup should fill out an app at santuaryanimalrescue.com/adoption-questionnaire.

name: Leda
description: Leda is loving and playful!! She's very social and enjoys going new places and meeting new people.  She's moderately energetic but magnificentally snuggable!

name: Liem
description: Liem weighs approx 30 lbs. He's a laid back guy but loves to play!  He loves toys and treats and has moderate energy.

name: Betty Lou
description:
Betty Lou is marred and scarred but its only physical scars, she is extremely affectionate and wants to please.  She was found with puppies at a construction site.  The puppies are gone but she remains and is looking for a loving family to care for.  She rides well in the car but is quick to want to jump in the back of a pick up truck.  She is 64 pounds and is estimated by be between 2-4 years old.  
   If you have any questions about Betty Lou you can email us at CAAWARescue@yahoo.com or visit our website at CAAWARescue.com.  Our adoption fee is $125 which covers her spay, all vaccinations, she is heartworm negative and on monthly protection and she will be microchipped prior to leaving for her forever home.  Please consider giving this sweet girl the loving home she deserves.

name: Hoss
description:
Hoss is a BIG boy who needs a home to share his BIG heart with. Hoss is a 2-3 year old mastiff mix, weighing in at over 90 lbs. He is playful and sweet. Hoss does better with girl dogs than boys, as he is big and intimidating to most male dogs. Hoss is great with people, but would do better in a home with older children due to his size and playful nature.

name: Clover
description: Clover has been at the shelter since June 2016.  She came in at 4 months young.  She is stately, tall, proud, timid, loving & hungry for her family.  People don't come in looking for dark black tall beautiful dogs.  \"I get overlooked every time.  Since i was a pup, all i remember was being careful & respectful to humans.  So, I wait for humans to give me the 'ok' to come & love them.\

name: Licorice
description: Licorice is a Lab mix who has been with us waiting for a fun family to love & enjoy her.  She is very playful and full of energy and will need a large space to run.  She is good with her kennel mates, has been spayed and is up to date on all shots.  She is 50lbs of fun!

name: Tank
description: Tank is a lovable boy who loves to sit on your lap if you will let him. He has a sun allergy so would need to be kept indoors on hot sunny days.

name: Petee
description:
Peetey...
This girl is full of life. Full of excitement about everything in life. 
Shebis an adorable little petite girl just eager to get on with forever...

name: Abby
description:
Abby is an absolute love. If you want to come home everyday and feel like youâre the only person in the world that has ever mattered....Abby is your girl. But...sheâll make all your friends and everyone you know fell equally as special. 
Abby is a special girl....who has a special way of showing so much love for all walks of life.

name: Maximus
description: Hey to you! My name is Maximus!  I am a four-year-old bulldog mix that arrived at the shelter as a stray with Animal Control. Then my lucky day arrived and I was adopted!  I was with my family for almost a year, then for some reason they brought me back. I am still scratching my head trying to figure out what went wrong!   Now I am officially up for adoption again!  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip and I have been neutered.  As you can see in my Petfinder pictures I am very photogenic!  Good looking, sweet, and smart!  Whatâs left?  I am pretty much perfect!

name: Peter/Buddy
description:
âTHE best dog in the worldâ is how Peteâs foster mom describes him!  She says he is so much fun, has personality for days and is very little trouble. 

Peter/Buddy has finished Heartworm treatment and is finally adoptable!!  He is ready and waiting for his forever family!

He is 2-3 years old. Heâs thriving in his foster home. Pete/Buddy is playful, enjoys car rides and gets along well with EVERYONE. When we say everyone we mean adult humans, toddlers, cats, pet rats, giant bunnies and most importantly other dogs. Pete adores other dogs and always wants to have a 4 legged âbuddyâ with him (hence his foster family now calling him Buddy). 

Buddy loves to be outside but MUST live inside. He needs plenty of outside time to potty and play but when heâs ready to go inside he must have access. When heâs out, he likes to dig. A great family for Buddy will not be upset by digging and understand Buddy digs just to be digging. A securely fenced yard for Buddy is a must. 

The family who adopts Pete/Buddy will hit the doggy jackpot!

Contact us at k9resqofal@gmail.com with any questions.

Interested adopters MUST fill out our online Adoption Application that can be found at k9resqofal.org under the Adopt tab.

name: KITA
description: Loves to be petted; will dig out from fence, but stays within bounds of electric fence; barks when he hears someone come around, but stops when he sees them; does not like thunder and other loud noises. We believe Nita is 8-9 years old and he weighs 56 lbs.

name: Lila
description:
Please meet Lila, a sweet Pocket Pittie.  So very beautiful with her chocolate coloring.  We are not sure of her heritage, maybe some Basenji in there, Kelpie??? But she is sweet and well socialized.  Does not like certain dogs, so maybe a home without other dogs might best fit this little renegade. Has been spayed and current on her vaccines.  Heartworm negative.  For more information on Lila, please contact us at: adopt@rescuek911.com

Adoption Donation: $100.00
Adoption Application: www.rescuek911.com

name: Bonnie
description: OH, hello. My name is Bonnie.  I am a nine-month-old retriever mix that recently lost her home.  My owner brought me here to find a new home, because I was just too active for him.  Well I am still a puppy and we do need lots of exercise!  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been spayed. If you think you would like to adopt me, please remember that I still need training in good manners, lots of love so I will feel secure, and a ton of playtime with you!  Are you ready to add some fun and activity to your life?  FYI...I do better with older children!

name: Bear
description:
Hello!  I am Bear!  I am an eighteen-month-old shepherd mix that has found himself out of a home!  Gee whiz!  I donât know what I did!  My owner suddenly decided that she didnât want me anymore!  I will say, I did escape several times from the yard.  But you know I get bored and start looking for things to do.  Also I do have lots of energy so I think if I had regular exercise that would help a lot!  Say I have an idea, what about me and you start an exercise program together? I would feel better and I know you would too! Take me for a run or several walks every day.  Why donât you teach me how to play fetch with a tennis ball?  Boy that will burn off lots of energy!  Also take some time with me and teach me some basic commands and some leash walking skills!  I am really a great dog, but I do have a ton of energy that needs a way to be released!  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered. If some one will just take some time with me and teach me how to be a well-mannered dog I know I will be a loyal family member for the rest of my life.

description: Yo! Hey to you! My name is CJ.  I am a three-year-old retriever mix that has an excellent resume and recommendations from my previous owner.  She said that I was friendly and playful.  Also she said that I was great with adults, kids, and other dogs.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered.  I am hoping to find another great home!  I think if you meet me, you wonât be able to leave without me!!  FYI...I can be a bit of an escape artist, so I would do best in a home with a tall privacy fence!

description:
My foster dad tells everyone one how incredibly sweet and pretty I am, so it must be true! Dogs are ok by me, but honestly, I prefer being with people.  I don't have experience being with cats. I appreciate your attention and will sit when asked, especially if a yummy treat is my reward.   Being a lady I always use the outdoor powder room.  I'm vaccinated, spayed, and microchipped, est. DOB 9/11/2016,  and ready to be the love of your life.   My adoption fee is $200.00.   
Love, Jordan

name: Joyful Jacob
description:
Jacob is an 8 month old boy who is full of life and energy! After all, he is still a puppy. His best friend is a dog weighing only 4 1/2 pounds... He loves to play fetch, go for walks, play in the yard, ride in the car, and sleep. 
He would do great with an active family who has a fenced yard for playtime. 
If you would like to meet this precious boy, let us know at contact@sugarbellefoundation.org

name: Tulip
description:
Tulip,
Smart, smart, smart. This girl is eager to learn all about the ways of life. She is super friendly. Loves romping around playing with all her doggy friends. She also loves settling down and snuggling.
Looking for a laid back, easy going, kind of girl...here is your girl.

He is a husky so he is not recommended with cats. Nanook is great with everyone he meets, even children. Nanook has lived in a home and is house/crate trained. He likes to spend most of his day relaxing and napping in the sun. He would like a laid back household that he could spend his retirement in.

description:
*Tabbie's smile says a lot about her personality. This sweet girl loves everyone she meets. Tabbie is 5-6 years old and is a cur mix. She is great with dogs, both big and small. She is also great with children. Unfortunately, she has one arch enemy - cats - so we do not recommend a home that has them. Tabby is house trained and crate trained. She walks with a slight limp on her back leg due to a car accident injury, but it doesn't slow her down. She loves to play with other dogs and would love a home with a friend.

name: Whitney
description:
This little puppy had been thrown out at a house & left to fend for herself around a week or so ago, so we have her in a foster home and she is scared at this time from being around other dogs she's not use to.  If you are interested in this precious girl, email kbailey772@gmail.com.
Anyone interested will have to fill out an application and be okay with a home visit along with a vet & personal reference.

name: Wendy
description:
Meet Wendy, a sweet almost-beagle mix with striking coloring. Wendy weighs about 40-45 lbs and definitely has some non-beagle DNA mixed in her ancestry. However, she is a terrific dog who we think will steal someone's heart. Wendy has a moderate energy level and is pretty chill about hanging out in the yard or the house. She is not a big barker, and she is not destructive inside or outside. Wendy is crate trained and house trained. She loves, loves, loves toys. She is about 7-8 years old. She gets along with other dogs but does not like to share her food or treats with them. She does best with dogs who have a calm demeanor like her. She has not lived with cats in her foster home but she was tested with them and she did not seem to be reactive..
Wendy is microchipped, up to date on vaccines, spayed and current on flea and heartworm prevention. Please email rescue@alsosbeagles.com for more information, or complete an application at http://sosbeagles.org/adoptionform.php (send to AL chapter).

name: Alex
description: Meet Alex, he is quite the guy! Alex has been at the shelter since August 2017. He was brought in as a puppy so all he knows is shelter life. He is seeking a furever home to find out how nice that is. He is around 2 years old, Labrador/hound mix, and neutered. He will pose for you. He is quiet the animated Guy. Come love on Alex... He will warm your heart.  Come visit with Alex at the shelter Tuesday-Saturday 11am-3pm.

name: Journey
description:
Journey is a beautiful Dutch Shepherd/Black Mouth Curr Mix.  Approx 1-2 years old.  Very Loving and playful.  Has been spayed and current on her shots. A very giving soul, she will bring you presents of whatever she can find to give to you.  Heartworm negative and ready to give all her love to one lucky family.  For more information on Journey, please contact us at: adopt@rescuek911.com

Adoption Application: www.rescuek911.com
Adoption Donation: $100.00

name: Chica
description:
Chica, is a beautiful Shepherd/Black Mouth Cur. Approx 1-2 years of age.  Spayed and current on her vaccines.  Just a fun loving girl in search of a forever family she can call her own.  For more information on Chica, please contact us at: adopt@rescuek911.com

Adoption Donation: $100,00
Adoption Application: www.rescuek911.com

name: Bernie
description:
*Bernie is our neutered and SPONSORED male 2.5 year old Lab mix, with the sweetest face. \"I look you in the eye to show my love for you!\"  He is a man on the move, and oh yes, he LOVES treats! Won't you treat him to a new home full of love and tasty snacks??

He's a funny boy and such a delight to play with. And he entertains himself with toys in Bark Park, for sure. He is very alert and curious. He is a \"Long Timer\" here, through no fault of his own. He needs to be the only male dog.  Please come visit this loving boy who is 'on special' for that someone special!!

His videos:
https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/379504239654920/ and

https://www.facebook.com/1902156960029671/videos/903384896702793/

-- Randolph County Animal Shelter, Wedowee, AL. www.RandolphShelter.org (256)357-0101

name: Hercules
description:
Hercules is such a great dog. This Hound/Black Mouth Cur is between 1-2 years of age.  Is going to be a big boy full grown.  Has been neutered and current on his vaccines.  Is very friendly and playful.  Just in need of a family to call his own. For more information on Hercules, please contact us at: adopt@rescuek911.com

Adoption Application: www.rescuek911.com
Adoption Donation: $100.00

name: Apollo
description: Well howdy! My name is Apollo.  I am a one-year-old retriever mix that is looking for a new home.  I had a home and an owner that I loved, but he had some landlord issues. Well you know what that means when you have landlord issuesâ¦.the dog has got to go!  So I am starting over and hoping to find a new family soon.  I have all of my vaccinations, I am heartworm negative, I have a microchip, and I have been neutered.  I am an active guy that would love to be part of a family that enjoys outdoor activities like running or hiking. Say, could that be your family?  Oh, I hope so!!  FYI.....I already know some basic commands!!

name: Buddy
description:
Meet Buddy!  Full of love, a fast learner, and ready for the perfect forever family! 


Buddy is approximately 2 years old and in wonderful health.  He bounces around like a little puppy in the morningsâ¦ He wags his tail wildly when it's time to eat. He gets excited when you show him the leash. When walking him he loves to sit down and nuzzle up against you.


Buddy is a cuddle-bug and really enjoys providing comfort to his human companions.  He has shown no signs of food aggression.  He has proven to be exceptionally good with children and even functions well in crowds.


Buddy has a beta personality.  He thrives with other dogs (large and small).  He seems to fall right into the pack and rather enjoys being a part of the pact. 

For more information on Buddy, please contact us at: adopt@rescuek911.com

Adoption Donation: $100,00
Adoption Application: www.rescuek911.com

name: Remington
description:
Remington is a big beautiful boy.  Approx 3-4 years of age.  True to his breed very active and social. Loves people and needs an active family of his own.  A true hero at heart. For more information on Remington, please contact us at: adopt@rescuek911.com

Adoption Donation: $100,00
Adoption Application: www.rescuek911.com
