name: Bella - 1909333 / 2019
description:
Bella
Bella is a 3 year old German Shepherd mix who is a bit on the chunky side. She firmly believes that the scales are wrong because there is no way she could weigh nearly 90 pounds. This sweet girl is in need of a new home, hopefully one that can trim off some of the weight. She has a thick coat, a home indoors preferred. Unknown about cats. Dog friendly / selective. Human approved. Date of Intake: 9/6/19
Bella is located at Maumelle Animal Services, 425 Cogdell Drive, Maumelle Arkansas. Open M-F 10-5, Sat. 12-4:30. Email us at Dogs@maumellefoa.org for more information. Online adoption applications available at www.Maumellefoa.org. Our adoption fee is $80. Included in the fee is shots, sterilization, microchip, dogs are given a dewormer at time of intake, placed on monthly flea/tick preventative, if heartworm negative then they are placed on heartworm preventative, if heartworm positive then they are treated once an adoption finalized.
We are always at the NLR PetSmart with our available pets on every Saturday of the month. 10:30 - 3:15 ish.
Find Maumelle Friends of the Animals on Facebook!

name: SHILOH
description:
SHILOHâ READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
Shiloh is the sweetest little boy! A breeder had abandoned him and 2 other Chihuahuas in a field them when they were no longer needed. Shiloh is thought to about 2-3 yrs old and and is a little sweetheart of a boy! He is now happily living in a foster home with other dogs, cats and birds! Shiloh loves to be in your lap and close to you! She is a snuggler, a cuddler and a lover, especially when he sleeps with you at night!

name: SAM & SALLY
description:
SAM AND SALLY â READY FOR THEIR FOREVER HOMES AND FAMILIES
Two peas in a pod! Sam and Sally are adorable little Chi-weenies! They love each other and would love to stay together â they play all day and snuggle at night. Sam weighs 8.5 lbs was born in May, 2019 and Sally weighs 9 lbs., born in Jan, 2019.  These two are staying in a foster home where they might be getting just a little bit spoiled! They are great with other dogs, cats and birds! Such little cuties who just love to sit in your lap when they are not playing! It would be wonderful if they could stay together but may be separated.

name: BONNIE
description:
BONNIE â READY FOR HER NEW HOME & FAMILY
This sweet little girl is a cuddle bug! Bonnie (aka BJ) is a little Chi Weenie puppy girl who was born in June, 2019 and weighs just 6 lbs. She is currently living in a foster home where she happily plays all day with other dogs (big and small) and cats. She is very loving and will make a wonderful family fur baby!

name: BUTTONS
description:
BUTTONS â READY FOR HER NEW HOME & FAMILY
Isnât she a little sweetheart? Buttons is just a tiny little girl, weighing 5 lbs at 3 mos of age! She is a black and white Chi-Weenie with lots and lots of spots dancing all over her little body! She is currently living in a foster home where she plays and has fun all day long! She is great with everyone she meets â people, other dogs (big and small), cats and even birds!

name: General
description: stray found in the dollar general parking lot. very nice little boy appx 30 pounds and 1 year old

name: Dixie
description: Appx 2 year old pregnant female shepherd/pit mix.

name: Nolen
description: ...We would love for you to come visit our animals. We are open Wednesday-Saturday, noon-4pm.

name: Juliet
description:
Juliet was found wandering the streets, her teats still swollen with milk from nursing her babies. Of course, she was dumped without her babies, which happens so often. She was limping, tired and hungry, but she is getting better every day! No longer limping & no longer tired & hungry.

After all she has been through, Juliet is the sweetest dog! All she wants & needs is to find a wonderful home where she will be loved forever. She is up to date on all her shots & will soon be spayed & microchipped.

For more information about Juliet, please contact Susan at daiseymaggie@yahoo.com.

To make the best possible match for you and the pet, please click below to complete the Adoption Application. 

Once your application has been processed, we'll be in contact. 

We cannot schedule a meet and greet without a completed application. 

If you are viewing this page through PetFinder, Adopt-a-Pet, etc., please go to http://ootwrescue.org/adoption.html to fill out an application or review our Adoption Process.

name: Moose
description: Moose came in as a stray so we do not know much about him.  He does love people and is a sweet boy.

name: Tiger
description: Tiger would do great as an only dog so that he could have all your attention.  He is a very sweet boy and looking for his forever home.  He had issues with a neighbor dog who was not the friendliest neighbor.  We think that has made him less tolerant for other dogs.

name: Miley
description: Miley has been adopted and brought back to the Shelter twice.  Neither time was it anything that was her fault.  The 2nd time she was brought back, they had adopted her as an outside pet.  She has allergies when out all day/night.  Just being outside to potty, walk and play does not seem to bother her.  She is a very sweet sweet girl who just needs a break and find someone that will keep her and love her and let her love you forever.

name: DIXIE
description:
DIXIE - READY FOR HER FOREVER HOME & FAMILY
Isn't she a cutie?? Sweet Dixie is a little Dachshund mix, weighing just 12-15 lbs. This little girl has the prettiest brindle markings on her head and the sweetest smile and disposition! Found as a lost or abandoned dog, Dixie loves everyone she meets and playing with other dogs. She is 1 to 2 yrs old, and loves to snuggle with her foster mom. Such a little cutie, who can even sit up nice and tall, will make a wonderful family fur baby! So sweet and loving!

name: Luna
description:
I would love a new home!  Come see me at the shelter and see if I'm the right pet for you!  I'm house-trained, good with kids, cats, and other dogs.  I need some room to play and I'm ready for adoption NOW!
(My ID number is 14)

name: Yoshi
description:
I would love a new home!  Come see me at the shelter and see if I'm the right pet for you!  I'm good with kids and I'm ready for adoption NOW!
(My ID number is 1)

name: Tiger
description: Tiger is used to living with an older lady. She had to go into a nursing home. He would do best in a home without children....We would love for you to come visit our animals. We are open Wednesday-Saturday, noon-4pm.

name: MUFFIN
description:
MUFFIN - READY FOR HER FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
A very sweet little girl - a 'love Muffin!' Muffin is a Rat Terrier Mix, weighing 25 lbs, who was born in March, 2019. She is currently living in a foster home and having a wonderful time playing with kids, other dogs and cats. Muffin sleeps in the house every night but is so excited to go out in the morning to play with other foster dogs and kids! She is a tiny bit shy until she knows you and then - just a little girl who loves everyone! Such a cutie who will make a wonderful family fur baby!

name: BART
description:
BART - READY FOR HIS NEW FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
Isn't he a handsome boy?? Bart was found searching for someone to help him - very hungry and just wanting to be loved. He is a gorgeous black Lab, about 2 years old. His foster mom says he is a 'WONDERFUL DOG - one of the best boys I've had in a while!' He is great with other dogs, very loving and loves to be with people. He will walk nicely beside her. Bart will make a wonderful addition to any family.

name: BEAUTY
description:
BEAUTY IS READY FOR HER FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY

Beauty is the perfect name for this gorgeous German Shepherd mix. This sweet girl is a smaller Shepherd who is 9 years young. She is so good with people and loves other dogs  but has had other dogs dogs attack her in the past, so for her peace of mind, it would be nice for her to be an only dog child. Her foster Dad says she is the sweetest girl ever - just loves to be loved, so gentle and calm.  A precious girl who is so pretty! She is staying in a foster home while she waits and prays for her forever home and family. Are you the one who will make Beauty the happiest girl in the world??? We guarantee you will fall in love with this precious girl.

name: Tic
description: Tic and Tac were picked up as strays. They are very attractive older puppies. These lovely dogs are friendly and easy to handle. They appear to be reasonably healthy. They will grow up to be great family pets. If he is not claimed by his owner he will be available for adoption on 9-11-19. Please make an appointment to meet this deserving dog. Adoption Fee: $75 Contact Information for Adoptions: Ruth Ann Vowan- ravfcahs@gmail.com; Adoption Fee Includes spay/neuter, microchip, HW test (if of age), 5-way vaccine, rabies vaccine (if of age), bordatella, and basic deworming.

description: If unaltered, will be scheduled for spay/neuter before leaving LRAV. To see all our animals, click here. For adoption or rescue information, click here.

name: CJ
description:
Hey there...CJ here...that's short for...CJ. I am a neutered male Labrador mix about 4 yrs old and I weigh 60 lbs. I've been here about oh...3 hrs or so....my owner surrendered me because they were moving and I couldn't go. I am THE total package if I do say so myself! I'm energetic, friendly, love to play and even get along with other dogs and cats too! Just know that I prefer to stay in the house with my hoomans....and of course I'm housebroken....better come quick....packages like this don't come around often! I'm available now! name: June
description:
Howdy...my name is June and you may have met my little brother Carter....Yea I know. Anyway I am a 3 mth old spayed female Heeler mix and I weigh 13 lbs. As my brother may have mentioned we haven't been here very long but wanted everyone to know we were here in case our owner doesn't come. We like doing the things that most pups enjoy...you know...eating, playing, sleeping....if our owners don't come for us we will be available 9/11/19. I haven't been here very long at all but I'm the most laid back pup you will ever meet...if fact we both are pretty easy going. We like doing the things that most pups enjoy...you know...eating, playing, sleeping....if our owners don't come for us we will be available 9/11/19. name: WENDY
description:
WENDY - READY FOR HER FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
Isn't she a pretty girl? Wendy was rescued from a kill shelter just a day before she was to be euthanized. This sweet girl is a Hound mix, born in July, 2018. She has been staying in a foster home and she is having a wonderful time! Wendy is good with kids, other dogs, cats and she is both house and crate trained. She will make a wonderful family fur baby - fitting right in with everyone!

description: ...We would love for you to come visit our animals. We are open Wednesday-Saturday, noon-4pm.

name: Waldo
description: Available for Adoption after 9/3/19Thank you for considering me for adoption! Our adoption fee's include: spay/neuter, vaccinations, including Rabies, de-worming, flea/tick preventative, HW or FeLV/FIV Testing and Heartworm Preventative for the first month. Adoption fees vary, please contact us for more information.

name: Little Max (Max)
description:
Little Max is a Catahoula and Great Pyrenees mix pup. He will be two years old in September 2019. Super mellow, very sweet, submissive and slightly shy, great with dogs and cats. Hasn't been around children but may do fine with well-behaved quiet kids who know how to be respectful around dogs. He scares easily and is nervous in new situations, so a calmer home is best. Kennel trained, potty trained, great on a leash, rides great, and very well behaved in the house. Great with other dogs and cats, and wants to be outsidechasing squirrels in the yard when he sees them from the windows. Loves to play and romp with other dogs but he's not over the top about it, loves to play chase in the yard. He learned to ring sleighbells on my back door to go outside. He's got a very short coat in a mix of black, dark brown, dark brindle and white, and has the double dewclaws of a Great Pyrenees, so he mayneed a warm coat during super cold weather, but he's not a wimp. ; ) He weighs 56 lbs full grown. I only kennel when I'm going to be gone for a few hours, but honestly he might be fine without being kenneled -- I work from home, so I'm home all day with him (I'm his foster). Sleeps quietly in the kennel at night if I tell him to, but prefers tosmushup against me in bed. He's very loyal and is a Velcro dog -- when I go to another room he follows. You lay down for a nap, he's laying on the couch beside you. You sit at your desk, and he's at your feet. He's not a big barker but he will bark at people walking past my house if my dogs are barking. He will sometimes counter surf if given the opportunity, and has occasionally picked something out of the trash, but all in all he's a VERY good pup and listens well. He's very sensitive and gets his feelings hurt easily, so he takes a solid \"NO\" to heart. He rarely gets into trouble other than a little digging if he's left outside for more than an hour or so. Loves crinkle toys and bones. He takes treats VERY gently from your fingers. He's a really good dog!

He is fully vetted, neutered, microchipped, heartworm negative, kennel trained, potty trained. His adoption fee in Arkansas is $175.

Little Max is currently in a foster home in Conway, Arkansas with two other dogs and two cats. He has met several new dogs and does great with them.

name: Lola
description: Meet Lola! She is a very sweet younger dog needing a great home! She loves everyone she meets. She is good with other dogs, but not sure about cats. She is great with children too. She is a very loving and gentle dog. She would make someone a great dog. Lola can jump a 4 foot fence so she will need to be walked on a leash or have a 6 foot fence. If you would like to meet Lola, please visit the Stone County Humane Society shelter located at 17379 Highway 9, Mountain View, AR or call 870-269-5200. You can also go on-line and complete an adoption application at our website schspets.org.

name: Misty
description: Meet Misty! She is a very sweet puppy needing a great home! She loves everyone she meets. She is good with dogs, but not sure about cats. She has never been around children so probably older children would be best. She really likes to run and play. She is still young and has a lot of energy. She would make someone a great puppy. If you would like to meet Misty, please visit the Stone County Humane Society shelter located at 17379 Highway 9, Mountain View, AR or call 870-269-5200. name: Paisley - 1908324 / 2019
description:
Paisley
She will make you smile for sure! Paisley is precious she's mix who is about 8 months to 1 year old. She uniquly has one blue and brown eye. Paisley was found along our border area and she wasn't claimed. She is described as being super seeet and friendly. Eager to please! Paisley is possibly dog selective, she will be further tested soon. Date of Intake: 8/30/19
Paisley is located at Maumelle Animal Services, 425 Cogdell Drive, Maumelle Arkansas. Open M-F 10-5, Sat. 12-4:30. Email us at Dogs@maumellefoa.org for more information. Online adoption applications available at www.Maumellefoa.org. Our adoption fee is $80. Included in the fee is shots, sterilization, microchip, dogs are given a dewormer at time of intake, placed on monthly flea/tick preventative, if heartworm negative then they are placed on heartworm preventative, if heartworm positive then they are treated once an adoption finalized.
We are always at the NLR PetSmart with our available pets on every Saturday of the month. 10:30 - 3:15 ish.
Find Maumelle Friends of the Animals on Facebook!

name: Kalua - 1909328 / 2019
description:
Kalua
She likes cats!!!!! That! Right there! Is enough to adopt... right?? Kalua is a precious girl who was turned in the the Police Department. She has a few bumps and bruises on her and a mild skin irritation. She likes other dogs and loves people. She appears very social and she knows a few commands. Kalua is a few years old, we will know more once she see the vet. We believe she may very well be a ridgeless Rhodesian Ridgeback. Kalua is looking for a friendly and active home, one where she will will always be part of the family. *** THIS IS NOT JORGIE GIRL, MISSING FROM BATESVILLE PIKE. OWNER CONFIRMED! *** Date of Intake: 9/2/19
Kalua is located at Maumelle Animal Services, 425 Cogdell Drive, Maumelle Arkansas. Open M-F 10-5, Sat. 12-4:30. Email us at Dogs@maumellefoa.org for more information. Online adoption applications available at www.Maumellefoa.org. Our adoption fee is $80. Included in the fee is shots, sterilization, microchip, dogs are given a dewormer at time of intake, placed on monthly flea/tick preventative, if heartworm negative then they are placed on heartworm preventative, if heartworm positive then they are treated once an adoption finalized.
We are always at the NLR PetSmart with our available pets on every Saturday of the month. 10:30 - 3:15 ish.
Find Maumelle Friends of the Animals on Facebook!

name: King Elvis - 1909323 / 2019
description:
King Elvis
Pure Love and Preciousness! King Elvis is everything but a hound dog! This pup is estimated to be close to a year and half old in age. He is very underweight at 25 pounds. King Elvis is a victim of a move but it may have actually been his Saving Grace. This fella is extremely shy and has had poor exposure to the outside world and others. He is slowly coming along and we aim to put a few pounds on him too. King Elvis will be made ready for adoption this week. Date of Intake: 8/28/19
King Elvis is located at Maumelle Animal Services, 425 Cogdell Drive, Maumelle Arkansas. Open M-F 10-5, Sat. 12-4:30. Email us at Dogs@maumellefoa.org for more information. name: Gotti
description:
Saved by some fantastic people after being the unofficial door greeter at a Dollar General, Gotti has an amazing disposition and real people skills! Unfortunately, his rescuer turned out to be allergic to him. He's about 2 years old (we think) and weighs about 75 pounds. He looks to be some Great Pyrenees and something else. He's good with all sorts of people and dogs and couches.

Let him steal your heart and a spot on your sofa!

He'll be neutered and microchipped soon and is up to date on his vaccinations.

Questions? Email Holly at hpayne76@gmail.com. Want to meet him? Fill out our application below!

To make the best possible match for you and the pet, please click below to complete the Adoption Application. 

Once your application has been processed, we'll be in contact. 

We cannot schedule a meet and greet without a completed application. 

If you are viewing this page through PetFinder, Adopt-a-Pet, etc., please go to http://ootwrescue.org/adoption.html to fill out an application or review our Adoption Process.

name: Evan
description:
Evan is a 9 week old Labrador Retriever mix puppy, weighing 9 pounds (on 9.3). He is healthy and has had his first set of shots. He is learning to walk on a leash. He is energetic and animated. He loves to play. If you have toddlers or small children be aware that he's a puppy and chews and has sharp teeth and nails. Evan would do best to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where he can get the exercise he needs.
..........................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: Shadow / Jersey
description: My name is Shadow and my foster mom says she understands why. I love to be with my person so I am their Shadow! Not in an annoying way though. She says I am a delightful boy, smart, happy, friendly, good with dogs and cats. I am housetrained, crate trained and love to go for walks in the neighborhood. I do have a medical problem called Exocrine Pancreatic Insufficiency. I will need to be on a strict diet, probably for the rest of my life and not get people food. I do fine as long as I get my special food with medicine on top. I really hope someone will give me a chance to have a happy life and not be afraid of my condition because I'm really pretty healthy and I have so much love to give. I am just under 4 years old and weigh 38 pounds.You can apply on line at www.hsvawl.org by completing the Adoption Application on the home page.

name: Tazz
description: Are you admiring my beautiful brindle coat or my super cute ears? I hear all of the compliments and I sure enjoy them! Every boy wants to hear nice things about himself. My name is Tazz and people that know me say lots of good things about me. I managed to get lost from my home and was hanging around a neighborhood until some nice people brought me in out of the heat. I really liked the dog and kids that were there. They said I was a very good houseguest and brought me to the shelter in hopes that my family would find me there but they didn't and I am pretty sad about it. I dream at night that a new family will come to meet me. I'm sure they will also love all of my great qualities that everyone else does and make me a part of their family. I will be so grateful and be the best, most loyal pet ever! I am possibly a 2 year old Mountain Cur mix and I'm a perfect medium size of 42 pounds.You can apply on line at www.hsvawl.org by completing the Adoption Application on the home page.

name: Tahoe
description:
I would love a new home!  Come see me at the shelter and see if I'm the right pet for you!  I'm ready for adoption NOW!
(My ID number is 35)

name: Benson
description: 5 week old female possible lab mix found at midnight in the middle of the street in benton, arkansas. Will be vaccinated and neutered before adoption.

name: Ash
description: Ash is a young male lab/pit mix that is very sweet and a BIG pup-35 pounds-for his age! Very sleek and muscular dog!

name: Stabler
description: 5 week old male possible lab mix found at midnight in the middle of the street in benton, arkansas. Will be vaccinated and neutered before adoption.

name: Hope
description:
Her name is Hope. She is approx 5 years old, 43 pounds, and she looks like she has not known one good day in her entire life. Her jaw was broken a long time ago and all of her top front teeth are missing. Hope is heartworm positive and she is starting pred and doxy today. Hope will back for more blood work if she doesnt perk up and start eating better. She is so shut down...she is simply pitiful. She has our whole heart already and we want nothing more than to help her heal her battered body and to find a family who will give her the life she deserves. And for the humans who watched her deteriorate day after day....what is wrong with you?! On a positive note, special thanks to the lovely lady who trapped Hope for us.
Hope, please rise....you can do this girl.

name: MACK
description:
Mack is 35 lbs of Beagle!  About 2 years old, he is a handsome boy.  Has all the Beagle characteristics, loves to hunt with his nose to the ground.  He gets along with everyone.  We believe him to be housetrained, but his foster home is at full capacity with indoor fosters, so that has not been tested.  He does have an old injury to his right front leg, making it a little bowed and favored, but does not slow him down.

He has been recently neutered and rabies vaccinated,  is heartworm negative and on preventative, and is ready to go to a beagle-loving family.

If you are interested in adopting Mack, please go to our website at www.icare-ark.com and click on \"Adoption\" and then \"Application.\"  His foster will be in touch with you ASAP.  Thank you for checking Mack out!

name: Butch
description:
This handsome boy is around 1 year old.  We found him on the end of a long gravel road, skin and bones, and with a temp of 106 degrees.  We vetted him for tick fever and fed him well, and within a week, a major difference could be seen.  We have no idea what his \"puppyhood\" was like, but we bet it wasn't funfilled and full of play.  

Butch is a great dog now, he has responded to attention, affection and good care wonderfully.  He just wants to be around people, is on the submissive side.  His foster has older, less tolerant dogs and when they growl at him, he just walks away.  On walks, he never wanders out of sight.  He is \"low maintenance\" in that he doesn't \"expect\" attention, but always appreciates and loves it.

This boy would be a great indoor/outdoor dog, good with kids and other dogs and weighs around 40 lbs.  He will be neutered 9/3/19 and will receive his rabies vaccination at that time.  Has been de-wormed, had his dhpp vaccination, is heartworm negative and on preventative, and will be ready for a wonderful home very soon.

Butch's adoption fee is $75 for area adoptions (north central Arkansas), and a little more if driving on our part is involved.

If you are interested in Butch, please go to our website:  www.icare-ark.com and complete an application.  (Click on ADOPTIONS) and the foster will get back to you ASAP!  Thank you for checking Butch out!

name: Cleo
description: Beagles! The perfect family dogs. I bet I am the perfect girl for you. I would love for you to visit me so I can show you what a sweet, friendly and good natured girl that I am. I am good with other dogs and will probably like kids and cats too although I haven't met them since I got lost from my home and ended up at the shelter. I am the perfect size of 22 pounds and am 2 years old so I won't get any bigger. One thing you need to know about me is that I love to hunt in true beagle fashion. I am heartworm positive but the AWL is providing my treatment so in a few short months, I will be as good as new. I would love to be able to be with my new family in a nice quiet home as I go through the treatment. Everyone likes to be home when they don't feel well, right? Hurry up! I am waiting for you!You can apply on line at www.hsvawl.org by completing the Adoption Application on the home page.

name: Chance
description: Hi there! My name is Chance and I'm quite sure you must be admiring my model good looks. Go ahead and look at all of my photos and think about how great it would be if I was part of your family photo. What everyone says is even better is my sweet disposition. I'm not sure how, but I got lost from my family. We never found each other so I really want a new family that will keep me from getting lost. I really enjoy walks and visits from the volunteers because I'm a very social boy. I like other dogs but have not met cats. I will need an active family because I am young and active as most all puppies are. I want someone that will teach me good manners so I can be the best boy in the neighborhood. I am still a puppy, about 8 months old, and weigh 31 pounds so I will probably be a medium size dog when I'm full grown. I am possibly a Mountain Cur mix. If you have time to devote to me, I will be the most loyal companion ever.You can apply on line at www.hsvawl.org by completing the Adoption Application on the home page.

name: Rocky
description: Are you looking for a cute little lap dog? Well,l here I am and my name is Rocky. My family is moving and they can not take me so I need a new family. I need one that will buy me lots of squeaky toys and chew toys since I love them! I have lived with cats and older kids and would like to be the only dog and get all of the attention. I am housetrained and crate trained and I really enjoy long walks on a leash. I'm a little afraid of new people, especially men, but I am fine once I get to know them. I really woiuld like to be your cuddlebug if you would take me home with you. I am a 4.5 year old chihuahua and weigh about 10 pounds.You can apply on line at www.hsvawl.org by completing the Adoption Application on the home page.

name: Bristol
description: Bristol is a polite and sweet girl that was found as a stray. Her stunning dark chocolate and white coat is sure to attract plenty of attention, but even more so, those ears! Her ears are adorable! Bristol is really enjoying the kindness of people. Bristol has completed heartworm treatment and is now heartworm negative. What great news that is! She would like a new family that will keep her on prevention. She has lived at the shelter for several months and would love nothing more than a comfortable new home to go to and a new family to love her. She would be so grateful to have those things that she deserves. We know that Bristol will make a great family pet. She is just under 2 years old and her breed mix is unknown. She weighs about 40 pounds.You can apply on line at www.hsvawl.org by completing the Adoption Application on the home page.

name: Oscar
description: My name is Oscar and my foster mom says I am a perfect dog! I'm calm, gentle and love to hang out with my people. I am fully housebroken and my foster mom says I am a perfect gentleman! I get along great with other dogs and kids. She always tells everyone I am the easiest foster she has ever had. I would really enjoy having a fenced yard so I can spend lots of time outside and stay safe. I have completed heartworm treatment and am HEARTWORM FREE! Now it's time to celebrate with a new family and get back to life. I hope my new family will value me enough to keep me on prevention because that treatment was just awful. I promise to be a loyal, loving companion if you will give me a chance to become part of your family. I have a little arthritis but with my new medication, I feel fine. I am possibly a foxhound/beagle mix and am estimated to be about 8 years old. I am a medium sized guy at 57 pounds. Because I am a senior, I qualify for the Senior Paws program.You can apply on line at www.hsvawl.org by completing the Adoption Application on the home page.

name: Hugo
description: Hugo is a sweet coonhound that was wandering alone. He was in really sad physical condition but now looks like a different dog. Isn't he handsome? And that adorable hound face is so irresistible! He has learned that people are nice and is enjoys attention from the volunteers, walks on a leash and enjoys playing with other dogs. He has completed his heartworm treatment and is now ready for a new family that will love him and ensure that he never has to go through that awful treatment again. Hugo would love a fenced yard to keep him safe and another dog in the home to keep him company would be a bonus! Hugo is about 2 years old, weighs 66 pounds and would love to meet you.You can apply on line at www.hsvawl.org by completing the Adoption Application on the home page.

name: Dolly 2
description: My name is Dolly and I know you must be thinking what a great dog I might be for your family. If your family consists of all people, big and small, cats and dogs and lots of fun activity, I am the perfect girl for you. I am doing great in my foster home and get along well with the cat and other dogs. I used to live with kids and like them a lot too because they will play with me. I would love to have another young dog to play with because I am just a puppy and have a lot of energy. My foster mom says I am a very good girl and she will find me a great home that will take me to do fun things and teach me to have the best manners. I am funny and smart and will learn quickly. I am housetrained, crate trained and love to go for walks. I am about 8 months old and am likely part hound and maybe shepherd because of my adorable ears and who knows what else. My foster mom keeps telling me it doesn't matter because I am perfect! I weigh about 34 pounds so will probably not get much bigger. I promise that if you give me a chance to become part of your family, I will bring you so much joy.You can apply on line at www.hsvawl.org by completing the Adoption Application on the home page.

name: Barbara
description: This sweet girl's owner died and family was unable to keep her. She was living with a smaller dogs....We would love for you to come visit our animals. We are open Wednesday-Saturday, noon-4pm.

description:

Please ask staff to visit with me outside of here, so that I can prove to you how irresistible and lovable I am. description:

Please ask staff if you'd like to meet Sugar outside of her kennel.HSPC's adoption fee is $100 with an approved application. Every dog/cat available for adoption is spayed/neutered, microchipped and is up-do-date on vaccinations.

name: WILEY
description:
Wiley is a handsome golden Shepherd Mix. He walks great on a leash, loves treats(!). Wiley will do best in a home with older children and no other animals. Please ask for assistance to meet Wiley outside of his kennel to give him a chance to warm up to you. 

Wiley is sponsored by Kimberly Darnell. Thank you, Kimberly, for your generous donation in honor of Wiley!HSPC's adoption fee is $100 with an approved application. Every dog/cat available for adoption is spayed/neutered, microchipped and is up-do-date on vaccinations.

name: EARNIE SCJC49
description:
10 year old Ernie is another long term resident that is still looking for his person. He is slow to warm up to new people, but once he does there is no dog more sweet and loyal. He's still a puppy at heart. We love Ernie! Please ask staff if you'd like to meet Earnie outside of his kennel.HSPC's adoption fee is $100 with an approved application. Every dog/cat available for adoption is spayed/neutered, microchipped and is up-do-date on vaccinations.

You can visit our adoptable pets at the shelter during adoption hours--7 days a week from 11 AM - 5:30 PM, or you may call 501-227-6166 for more information. (At times, a consultation with our staff veterinarian is mandatory prior to adoption.)

name: ROSA
description:
Rosa's baby's are now in their own homes, so it's her time for family and a home. Look at that irresistible face! Rosa has a calm and a spunky side. description:

description:
Freeway will be your best friend once you spend some time with her. She came to the shelter after being found as a stray running alongside a busy freeway. Freeway really loves taking car rides and going on walks/jogs. Her favorite volunteer has been taking her to Wildwood Park on the weekends, and she loves these little adventures. Freeway loves all people but would do best with adults and older children. She can be a bit picky about her canine friends and seems to do best with male dogs. If you think you might be that special person Freeway has been waiting for, please come meet her at the HSPC.

Freeway is sponsored by her special friend, Alexis Leidigh. Thank you Alexis for your generous donation in honor of Freeway!HSPC's adoption fee is $100 with an approved application. Every dog/cat available for adoption is spayed/neutered, microchipped and is up-do-date on vaccinations.

name: PHIL
description:
Phil is a sweet, handsome boy. While initially shy, Phil warms up to those who give him the space and time to reveal his true personality. He loves most all dogs (large and small) and cats. Since Phil has lived most of his life at the shelter, he would need a home where he is an inside pet. Phil would also require a privacy fence as he can jump over a shorter fence. Phil is considered a special needs dog due to his extended time at the shelter. He would need a gradual transition to life outside of the shelter. Phil continues to work on his socialization skills by spending time daily at the home of a very special friend. If you think a senior dog who is young at heart may be a good fit for your home, Phil may be your match.

Phil is sponsored by Clark Trim. Thank you Clark, for your generous donation in honor of our sweet Phil!HSPC's adoption fee is $100 with an approved application. Every dog/cat available for adoption is spayed/neutered, microchipped and is up-do-date on vaccinations.

Justin is a strong active boy who will need a yard with a privacy fence where he will be able to get plenty of exercise. Please ask to meet Justin outside of his kennel.

name: NYSSA "SUSU"
description:
Meet Nyasa. She is a sweet girl who seems to like all people, but she is aggressive towards other dogs and cats. A perfect day for Nyasa is a full-out run in our fenced dog parks, a long leash walk, and being petted by her special person(s). Nyasa prefers not to grow much older at the shelter confined to a kennel, but she must find a home with an experienced handler that can keep her secure and away from other dogs and cats. Be sure to check BREED RESTRICTIONS for the area in which you would reside with Nyasa. The Pit Bull Terrier breed is banned in some areas, while there are registration requirements in others. There will be a home check before Nyasa can be adopted.
Nyasa is sponsored by Clark Trim and John and Christy Wells. Thank you for your generous donations in honor of Nyasa!HSPC's adoption fee is $100 with an approved application. Every dog/cat available for adoption is spayed/neutered, microchipped and is up-do-date on vaccinations.

name: Sweetie
description:
8 Years Old
Australian Shepherd Mix
Good with kids, other non-aggressive dogs, men, women
House trained, doggie door trained, rides great in the car, leash trained.

Sweetie is absolutely true to her name! This pretty little Aussie is a little shy at first, but warms up quickly. She's smart, housetrained, doggie door trained but does not want to be crated. Sweetie also works great on leash and rides well in the car and loves to go riding. She will shower those she loves with kisses.

Sweetie is presently in a foster home with several other dogs, big and small and she does GREAT with all of them and formerly Sweetie was in a foster home with about 8 tiny little dogs, no issues at all. However, Sweetie was recently placed in a home with another dog who was an Alpha dog and Sweetie did not care to be bossed around, so there would be arguments between them. So, if you have a bossy dog, she probably isn't going to appreciate that. It's not that Sweetie wants to be the boss either ... she's really not an Alpha dog, but she is not going to allow another dog to beat her up. ;) So if you have a dog who doesn't want to be the boss and just lives for fun, Sweetie would probably work just fine. Again, she has given no dogs in her foster home any issues at all. :)

This dog is a pretty girl and has nice markings, she is 40 pounds and is going to be a great addition to some lucky family. She is a bit shy around men at first, but it is just a bit. She minds well, sleeps in a laundry room on a nice comfy bed and does just great! She does not care to be locked in a crate, but she will sleep in one with no problem.

Sweetie would really enjoy another dog in her new home, but it is not mandatory although preferred. A doggie door would be super too! When left alone after placement in her new home, she needed outside and scratched at the door doing some minor damage. She knew she needed out but didn't understand there was no doggie door. :( In her foster home, no issues at all, because there is a doggie door!

She's a GREAT companion, loves to snuggle on the sofa and in your bed with you. But she does love the company of her siblings!

Sweetie is about 6 years old, fully vetted and heartworm negative and on preventative.

If you would like to adopt this great girl, start with our Adoption Application.
 
If you have questions, contact Foster Mom, Georgia, at georgiagriffis@sbcglobal.net

To make the best possible match for you and the pet, please click below to complete the Adoption Application. 

Once your application has been processed, we'll be in contact. 

We cannot schedule a meet and greet without a completed application.

name: Cookie
description:
Cookie just arrived on May 1! This little chocolate lab mix looks as if she will have stand-up ears and grow to be around 35 pounds. She is presently 20 pounds and is about 6 months old. She, along with two siblings, were dumped in Vilonia. Shy upon arrival, Cookie has blossomed into a sweet, playful girl who is enjoying her life in her foster home. This little chocolate drop has just a splash of white on her chest ... adds interest, don't you think?! 

Cookie will make a great family dog but she is a little worried about toddlers, so we recommend kiddos over the age of 6 for this girl. A fenced yard is a must for safe playtime and when you come home, be ready, because she is SOOOO excited to see you! She is just thrilled when you walk in the door! :)

Cookie has been completely vetted. She is microchipped and on heartworm preventative. All she needs is a home! Is it yours?

If you have questions, email case manager, Georgia, at georgiagriffis@sbcglobal.net

Adoption fee is $150 and for that tiny amount, you get the pup AND all the vetting! ;)

Tell your friends!

name: Axel Max
description:
Axel Max is new to our program and a living doll! This little brindle pup is about 10 months old (June 25, 2019), and he's a small guy at only 17 pounds. He has an outgoing personality and, of course, being a puppy, he's playful and full of spunk! We expect Max to stay fairly small, probably topping out at 20 - 22 pounds when full grown at 2 years old. We are not certain of his breed, but possibly some rat terrier in there, maybe some mountain cur (that's a guess). But whatever the mix is, he is absolutely cute as a button!

Little Axel Max is working on his house manners and is being crate trained and leash trained. He is very smart and eager to please. We are very happy with his progress! This pup is going to need a fenced back yard for safe playtime because he is a puppy and will need to burn off some energy and what been way than romping in the back yard with his people, another dog or just a lot of toys! He loves his foster mom and dad and loves being right with them. Even outdoors in the freedom, he is not a bolter, he wants to stay right with his masters. 

Axel Max has been fully vetted, is heartworm negative and on preventative. He has had his rabies shot, is microchipped and up to date on his yearly shots and kennel cough vaccination. 

Adoption fee is $150 and, yes, you get the pup and all of this vetting for that tiny amount! As with all of our adoptions, we offer a 14-day trial period to make sure it's a good match for the dog and the adopter(s). 

If you are interested in this little cutie, please start with the Adoption Application ... just click the link below!

description:

She now has a full tummy & no more ticks & she is ready to find a loving forever family. She is a very sweet & loving dog that loves playing with her foster siblings.

Evelyn is up to date on all her shots & will soon be spayed & microchipped.

name: Lady Red
description:
Lady Red was dumped with 3 of her friends in the middle of nowhere. It seems like that happens way too often around here. She has survived a lot, but is now ready for her forever home! We are not certain what she is mixed with, but even though she does not have the right body shape, her head really favors a Doberman! She is very energetic & would love an active family or another dog to play with!


Lady Red is up to date on all her shots & has been spayed & microchipped.

description: Carmen is a very special pup. She came from a situation of neglect and has flourished in her foster home. She is a happy girl who has never met a stranger. She loves napping on her back, \"talking\

name: Thea
description:

description:
Juniper was found, running down a busy road, dodging cars. She is a sweet, reserved, but trusting puppy, approximately 3 months old (7/28/2019). She has a beautiful black shiny coat with a white chest & white toes! She is a pretty little pup and absolutely loves playing with her toys! She is sleeping all night in her crate & working on her house training.

Juniper has started her series of puppy shots & will be spayed & microchipped when she is a little older.


For more information about Juniper, please contact Susan at daiseymaggie@yahoo.com

name: Annie
description:
Annie was found as a stray. Shes approximately 2-3 years old, well behaved & comfortable in the house, so we believe she was cared for by someone, until she wasn't. :-( She is a perfect car rider & walks well on a leash. She is good with kids & other dogs, dont know about cats yet but shes very submissive, so it shouldn't be a problem. Shes black with a white blaze & markings. She has been spayed, microchipped, & is heartworm negative. She is very sweet & loves to be petted but is not demanding. She would make a great family pet. She is only a medium sized dog, so she is just about perfect!


For more information about Annie, please contact Susan at daiseymaggie@yahoo.com.

name: Hunter
description:
Hunter believes he needs to be your next buddy. He is up for anything as long as its an adventure and its with YOU. He is thought to be a mix of \"Black Faced Mountain Cur\" & Hound. He is going to be a perfect, down south, good old cuddle muffin boy ready for a porch, a yard, a lap or a pond with great potential to tag along with outdoor sports. He is piddle mat trained, will go to the door and whine when he needs to do his business already at 9 weeks. He is on a sleep, potty, eat and play schedule. He can sleep through the night in his kennel with no accidents and is SUPER proud of that. 
He is a happy, confident, plays well with others and that includes, chickens, big dogs,little dogs, little cats and big cats super star. 
He and his siblings love each other very much and survived being thrown from a car when they were around 4 weeks old. They were almost dead when saved, but made it through and have been nursed back to health, wormed, first two sets of vaccinations and LOTS of puppy breath. 
Hunter is ready for your consideration. He will be neutered & microchipped when he is a little older.


For more information, please contact Susan at daiseymaggie@yahoo.com.

Claire is a very friendly dog and loves human contact most of all. Likes to ride in cars, take walks and always ready for an adventure. She has done well in her foster home with other dogs and cats. She would do best in a home without children.

Claire Bear is spayed, up to date on vaccines, microchipped, and Heartworm negative. 
Her adoption fee is $150. If you have any questions, please contact kelleybogan@gmail.com.

name: Monica
description:
Monica came to OOTW extremely pregnant and only 4 days later, blessed us with 6 happy and healthy babies! All of the babies are now adopted and it's Monica's time to find her forever family.

According to the vet, this dog is a Mountain Cur. She has recovered from the birth of her puppies and looks fantastic at 35 pounds. We consider her full grown. She's a beautiful brindle with a splash of white on her chest. She is a low-shedding dog, house broken, enjoys being outdoors in a fenced yard with other dogs and enjoys playing with her foster siblings. Monica also works great on leash and rides in the car perfectly with no drooling or vomiting. 

Monica is now spayed, has all of her shots, including her rabies shot, wormed, and heartworm tested. Unfortunately, Monica tested light positive for heartworms. Such a young dog to already be infected with heartworms! But it's not a huge deal. Out of the Woods pays for slow-kill treatment and Monica will begin her treatment in the next few days. We are going to give her a minute to recover from her spay. 

Monica's foster mom is a dog sitter, so there are different dogs coming and going constantly. Monica has gotten along with everyone beautifully. Never a cross word! Honestly, this dog has everything going for her, she's smart and eager to please her master. 

Adoption fee for Monica is $150. Her vetting includes spay, microchip, rabies, yearly shots, heartworm test and preventative and more! 

If you would like to be considered to adopt this sweetheart, please scroll down and click the link to the Application.

Tell your friends about this sweetheart!

name: Piper
description:
When I grow up I dont want to be a shy orphan. I want a family who will teach me, love me and show me that people are okay. When I grow up I can be whatever you like, I am the perfect age to learn.

Piper was found living in an irrigation pipe dumped with her sister Meryl-Rose. She was so shy it took several weeks of patience, food and kindness before she would crawl out and accept a human touch. 
Piper is sweet, playful and loving. She needs a patient and gentle hand to guide her and help her gain confidence. An ideal home will have a fenced yard and an owner willing to exercise her as she grows up through her puppy stages. 
Direct questions to dogact1260@gmail.com or apply online www.ootwrescue.org

name: Dimer
description:
Dimer is a gorgeous, tall, lanky horse of a pup weighing about 75 lbs and is 3 years old. He was 1 of 11 pups rescued just after birth. He was adopted quickly (oh so cute!) but returned because he had grown weary of city living-- too much traffic and no playmates to keep him company. Dimer galumphs after tennis balls and other tossed toys but will very gently pick them up, turn, and trot back high-stepping gracefully. He has the family trademark bearpaws and has a little lightning bolt of white on his chest. Dimer's mom is a small German Shepherd mix and his dad is a large Rottweiler mix; however, he talks like a hound. Playful, Dimer loves puppies big enough to romp, and can play forever with like-minded dogs. He does hog toys-- which does not go over well with alphas--, will chase cats, and bark at some other adult dogs. Sweet as he is, Dimer might knock over a small child when going after a ball (cat, squirrel, whatever). He is neutered and up-to-date on shots. Contact tendogtattoo@yahoo.com with questions. Adoption fee of $150 will help offset vet bills.

description:
BRADY - READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
Brady is a handsome boy! This sweet guy was brought to a shelter and, sadly, no one came to claim him. He is a hound mix with perhaps some Dachshund  who is 3 to 4 years old. . He weighs 20-25 lbs and he id good with everyone he meets - kids and adults - and other dogs. This sweet boy would LOVE to have his very own home and his own people!

name: ETHAN
description:
ETHAN - READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
Isn't he a handsome boy? This is Ethan, a one year old Pit Bull Terrier who was found abandoned. Ethan is a good boy, who is friendly and good with people and other dogs. He'd love to have his very own home!

name: CHARLIE BROWN
description:
CHARLIE BROWN - READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME & FAMILY
You're a good boy Charlie Brown! This sweet boy is a Red Boned Hound mix who is  6-7 years old. Charlie is a mellow, laid back kind of guy who loves everyone - and everyone loves him! He is good with kids and other dogs. Charlie will be you very special devoted companion  - loving you every day!

name: JOEY
description:
JOEY - READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME
Isn't he a cutie??? This is Joey, a little Cairn Terrier mix weighing about 10 lbs. Joey was found with his Mother and 3 litter mates abandoned in a field when they were tiny puppies. He is a happy puppy boy who loves to play and be loved on! He is adorable and is a precious little boy - just waiting for you!

description: Daisy was found as a stray and brought to the shelter. She is a bit shy, but very friendly. She is not crazy about the other dogs at the shelter. This cutie is about 1 1/2 years oldand will make someone a great pet. Please make an appointment to meet this little munchkin. Adoption Fee: $75 Contact Information for Adoptions: Ruth Ann Vowan- ravfcahs@gmail.com; Adoption Fee Includes spay/neuter, HW test (if of age), 5-way vaccine, rabies vaccine (if of age), bordatella, microchip, and basic deworming.

name: Dixie
description: Dixie is a young heeler mix. She's very cute and has adorable ears. She is housetrained and crate trained. Dixie gets along well with other dogs. She is friendly and loves everyone she meets.

Celebrate his birthday in May (05/11/09). He will sit for a good treat!
Russ is waiting for his adoption day!
Russ is currently under medical treatment that can be continued in his new home.

name: Jasper
description:
Jasper is a big doggy that is very intensely in love with people. He jumps up and holds on to you! Jasper weighed 50 pounds at 10 months. He was born apx. 9/10/17. He is a powerful guy and while loving, he has not had any training so he is not recommended for a home with small children for this reason. 
Because he is so people focused it is impossible to determine if he gets along with other dogs because he only wants to interact with the person he's with. 
When tested with other dogs he ignores them chooses instead to hug and hold the person walking him.
What Jasper needs is a firm but gentle owner/s willing to teach him basic obedience or beyond. Jasper is intelligent, solidly build, impressive and ready to become a great friend! He uses a dog door.
His perfect home has an active adult family that will match his enthusiasm and love of life!!

name: Possum
description:
This dog is ready to be your dog's best friend...

Possum will make the perfect companion for a dog that likes to play with other dogs but does not want to share your attention or affection. 

Possum is an older pup that was born in the spring of 2018. We don't know what has happened in his short life but he is very fearful of people. He will avoid human contact but loves other dogs of all sizes. 

Possum will be happy with a cozy dog house, living in the freedom of the outdoors, with one or more dog buddies. 

This handsome boy is a mixed breed. He is neutered and up to date on vaccinations. 

Here is your chance to truly rescue a dog. Not because you need him but because he needs you.

description:

name: Gabby
description:
Hey there I'm Gabby and I love to have fun...I am a spayed female Shepherd mix about 3 yrs old and I weigh 72 lbs. That's right 72 lbs....I'm a big gal....but I have to be to fit all this fun into one package. Your never too big to crawl in a lap...stop by for a visit and I'll show you! I love to face greet, paw at my hooman and lick faces. I love toys and can even fetch and bring them to you...rope toys are my fav! I'm a good girl when I eat and promise not to growl if you touch my food. I love meeting new dogs and make friends pretty quick. If my owners don't find me I will be available 8/28/19.  Adopting a dog from the Conway Animal Welfare Unit is a fairly easy process. The first step to adopting an animal is submitting an application. The application allows us to individually consider applicants and helps us to properly match our pets with new owners. We want to make sure that our pets are going to homes that are ready to provide for these pets long-term. Adoptions are $50 and this includes vaccinations, heartworm test, spay/neuter and microchip. As with any shelter animal, health is not guaranteed but we do our best to screen out those animals that are showing obvious signs of illness or disclose that information prior to adoption. All dogs are heartworm tested upon adoption. 

If you are interested in adopting a dog and you reside OUTSIDE the city limits of Conway and the dog is less than 12 wks old, the cost is $75 which includes a spay/neuter and micropchip. The spay and neuter can only be performed at Vilonia Vet Clinic or Companion Animal Spay/Neuter Clinic. If the animal is less that 12 wks and you live inside the city limits the adoption fee is $25 dollars and you receive a voucher for $120 to use at select clinics for spay/neuter. The other option is that you provide us with proof of a pre-paid spay or neuter at YOUR vet of choice.

name: LuLu
description:
************please email ark9ranch@gmail.com for more information*************
NOT IN THE SHELTER ~ Fostering in Ward Ar 501-259-1065

Hi there!!! My name is LuLu and I am about 5 months old...small little pickle Lab mix just itching to be part of your family! I am sweet, gentle, neat, pretty quiet and on the low energy type of play.

I love my snuggle time...cookie time...and just hanging out with my foster peeps. On the ranch there are loads of dogs and a few cats..I loves them all!

I am currently fostering in Ward, Arkansas, my family moved and left me to fend for myself. Foster momma got a call and came right out and brought me home to her K9 ranch...where I have been loved and cared for! No worries...I like her house better.

If you had kids I would like that..if you like hikes and camping, I know I would like that as well...oh and I would do really great with a few doggy day care play dates as well as I am a social gal!!

Now if your expecting me to grow to be 80 pounds...NOPE, I am a little gal...and will be on the smaller size! Big at heart though...so please PLEASE pick me! I is ready to have my very own family!

name: Cher
description:
****************please email foster @ ark9ranch@gmail.com*************
NOT IN SHELTER ~ Fostering in Ward, Ar 501-259-1065

Hey there! Thank you for stopping by to meet me! I am Cher...and I am all about singing for joy that I am heading home with YOU. You see my siblings and I had it pretty tough to start life...we had to scramble in rural Arkansas as babies until rescue came for us. I love my peeps for treating us with love and kindness!

I love my couch cuddle time, my yard play and adventures and boy do I love that my food bowl is always full! I would love to do life with you hiking, park adventures, road trips or just chilling out at \"home\" watching Sunday Football!

I play well with others including cats. I am even getting used to sleeping in my crate...can I please have some fleece blankets to snuggle in?

Foster momma tells me not to worry...my people are coming for me as I am a true graceful southern gal looking to share my suga' with you! Oh and she also tells me that I am a natural heating blanket when we are cuddled on the couch, so if your feet get cold in the winter ~ I am your gal to warm them up!

name: Wilma
description:
**************email Foster @ ark9ranch@gmail.com for more details************
NOT IN THE SHELTER ~ Fostering in Ward, Ar 501-259-1065

Hi, my name is Wilma! I am a puppy hound of about 4-5 months. My foster momma calls me a happy hound! HEHE and I am. I really love when momma is able to sit with me...gives me hugs and kisses! I love hanging out playing with my sisters and brother, the ranch cats and some of the other dogs. I like meeting new people of all ages and really like when we get to hang out with foster dad while he watches TV

We all came from rural Arkansas...we was pretty hungry and unsettled due to fending for ourselves in the wild! Foster parents helped us right quick by feeding us plenty of good eats, soft beds and lots of toys to play with.

Now I am ready to become your princess and best gal dog friend. At night I lay in my dog bed dreaming of our hikes, swimming, playing fetch and snuggling up to watch Foot Ball! I just need you to love me...like I am gonna love you! Please fill out my application or contact my foster momma for more details

name: Betty
description:
********please email foster @ark9ranch@gmail.com************
NOT IN THE SHELTER ~ Fostering in Ward, Ar

Greetings!! My name is Betty, foster momma calls me Betty BooBoo when we are cuddling! I love that I am a special loved puppy and FM is hard at work finding me the perfect home...is that YOU? A little about me:

I love soft beds, toys, treats, belly rubs, chasing and playing fetch and FOOD!

I really am praying for a family that will teach me cool stuff as I am a smart girl and one that will take me on adventures. Perhaps camping...or parks!

I also want you to know I live with cats, big dogs and puppies smaller than me and we all get along great!

Do you see how special I am! What ever is going on...I am happy just to be your gal so please pick me!!! We will live happily ever after together doing stuff or just chilling on the couch snuggling!

name: Ginger
description:
********** email foster for more information @ ark9ranch@gmail.com**********
NOT IN THE SHELTER ~ Fostering in Ward, Ar 501-259-1065

Hi, I am Ginger! Sweet soft and uber cuddly. I love toys, snuggling, treats and playing with either dogs or humans...I just am in love with life! I would do really great in a home that wants to explore with hikes...parks...and car rides!

I do need to continue with my puppy training, but my foster momma tells me every day how smart I am and how fast I learn! Together we can build a great relationship and take on the world!

I also will play in water...so camping is on my LONG list of things we can do together..so don't hesitate to pick ME! As I am Ginger...the pretty one!

name: MaryAnn
description:
**************Please email ark9ranch@gmail.com with any further questions******
NOT IN THE SHELTER ~ Fostering in WARD, AR 501-259-1065

Hello my future family! My name is MaryAnn! do not believe Ginger...I am the more beautiful one! I love LOVE people time and playing with other pups, love soft blankets and toys that make squeaky noises.

I play in water and lay in the sun! I am the all american family mix breed hound gal just waiting at my foster mom's ranch until YOU bring me home! Sure do look forward to meeting you!

I would really like to go exploring my home state, visit parks, doggy day care for play groups and then...oh my favorite is to come home and snuggle with you with we watch the Razor Backs on the big thing foster mom calls a TV!

name: Skipper
description:
*********email foster @ ark9ranch@gmail.com for further information*******
NOT IN THE SHELTER ~ Fostering in WARD,AR. 501-259-1065

Hi there! I am Skipper! A 4-5 month old Hound mix from real rural Arkansas! I am one thankful pup for the kind people that scooped up my sisters and I from trying to fend for ourselves! I will tell you I love me some couch cuddles with soft blankets and plenty of belly rubs! Foster momma say's I am doing really well on house manners, yay me!

I would really love some human siblings...play groups...a yard and my humans to take me on hikes. I love to explore and learn new things as my foster mom say's that I am super smart! Just wait until you feel how super soft my giant floppy ears are...they are ready for you to tell me all your secretes!

So what do you say? Am I your next best canine buddy! Packed and ready to make my way home ...to YOU! We have so much time to make up and I have so much to tell you about!

name: Aldi
description: 10-12 month old male possible pit/sharpei mix. found as a stray in mount pleasant, texas.

name: Mazie
description: female pit mix. appx 10-12 months old

name: Luke
description: Gorgeous chocolate boy. Appx 1 year old.Sweet guy. Ok with most dogs. About 45 lb. Neutered, hw neg , all shots, etc. He is currently roommates with Roe!

name: Chocko
description: 10 month old male pit mix

name: SAM & SALLY
description:
SAM AND SALLY â READY FOR THEIR FOREVER HOMES AND FAMILIES
Two peas in a pod! Sam and Sally are adorable little Chi-weenies! They love each other and would love to stay together â they play all day and snuggle at night. Sam weighs 8.5 lbs was born in May, 2019 and Sally weighs 9 lbs., born in Jan, 2019.  These two are staying in a foster home where they might be getting just a little bit spoiled! They are great with other dogs, cats and birds! Such little cuties!

name: CHARLIE BROWN
description:
CHARLIE BROWN â READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME & FAMILY
Little Charlie Brown â heâs everybodyâs friend and buddy! This sweet little boy is a Jack Russell mix, less than 2 years old and weighs about 12 lbs. He is such a good boy! Brownie is living in a foster home where he happily plays all day with other dogs, cats and even birds! He is very well behaved and would love a family of his very own. He loves to run and play and at nightâ¦. well, he is a cuddle bunny in bed!

name: EVIE
description:
EVIE â READY FOR HER FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
Evie is the sweetest little girl! A breeder had abandoned her and 2 other Chihuahuas in a field them when they were no longer needed. Evie is thought to be 3-4 yrs old and she weighs just 10 lbs! She is now happily living in a foster home with other dogs, cats and birds! She might be a little shy initially but she loves to be in your lap and close to you! She is a snuggler and a lover, especially when she sleeps with you at night! She has not been exposed to children but an older couple would thoroughly enjoy her!!

name: Spencer
description:
Spencer is a darling 4 month old Hound mix puppy, weighing 28 pounds (on 8.26). He is healthy, has had all of his puppy vaccines, and has been neutered. He leashes and walks well. He's active and playful. He's affectionate and loves to have his belly rubbed. He gets along well with other dogs. If you have toddlers or small children be aware that he's a puppy and chews and has sharp teeth and nails. Spencer will need to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where he can get the exercise he needs. He would do well to have a buddy dog.
...................................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: Kiba
description:
Kiba is a 6 year old Shepherd mix, weighing 53 pounds. She is healthy, heartworm negative, housetrained, and has been spayed. She leashes and walks well and is easy to handle. She's calm, gentle, and mild-mannered. She knows sit, shake, and down. She gets along well with most other dogs, but can be picky around other females. She's super sweet and affectionate. This is a really nice dog! Kiba would do best to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where she can get the exercise she needs.
..................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: Iris
description: Iris is an adorable young puppy who looks like she may grow up to be a Weimeraner or Silver Lab. She arrived with a fungus that is being treated, and she will soon be good as new. This youngster will be a wonderful family pet. She weighs 4.5 pounds on 8-21. This cutie needs a loving home ASAP. Please make an appointment to meet this deserving dog. Adoption Fee: $75 Contact Information for Adoptions: Ruth Ann Vowan- ravfcahs@gmail.com; Adoption Fee Includes spay/neuter, HW test (if of age), 5-way vaccine, rabies vaccine (if of age), bordatella, basic deworming, and microchip.

name: Bender - 1908305 / 2019
description:
Bender
Bender is a gorgeous lab mix who was found and unclaimed. He is 54 pounds, very calm, knows a few commands. He is very much an observer. Bender is estimated to be at the 1 year old mark in age. He is heartworm positive and will need treatment once adopted but don't let that mess up your chance for a great pet! Bender loves people but can be a tad dog selective. Date of Intake: 8/9/19, 8/30/19
Bender is located at Maumelle Animal Services, 425 Cogdell Drive, Maumelle Arkansas. Open M-F 10-5, Sat. 12-4:30. Email us at Dogs@maumellefoa.org for more information. Online adoption applications available at www.Maumellefoa.org. Our adoption fee is $80. Included in the fee is shots, sterilization, microchip, dogs are given a dewormer at time of intake, placed on monthly flea/tick preventative, if heartworm negative then they are placed on heartworm preventative, if heartworm positive then they are treated once an adoption finalized.
We are always at the NLR PetSmart with our available pets on every Saturday of the month. 10:30 - 3:15 ish.
Find Maumelle Friends of the Animals on Facebook!

name: Gravity
description: Say hello to Gravity! This poor guy was in rough shape when we got him. But now, his skin is beautiful, he feels good and he has more personality than a cruise ship host! He is absolutely the HAPPIEST little dog. Blind? He has no idea, please don't mention it to him. Gravity is heartworm positive and he is on slow kill method which is working for him. It's not expensive and it's easy to maintain. Gravity is neutered, up to date on vaccinations, microchipped, about 9 years old and about 14 pounds. If you want a love with personality-this guy is for you! Gravity's adoption donation is $175. Please email Lizethedog@yahoo.com for an application. Thank you for your interest in a rescue dog!

name: Zero
description: Oh me oh my! Zero! You beautiful little dog!  Your coat is black liquid! You are a star! You can be my Zero! This guy is a doll. He loves to just be with his person. He is totally blind. In one eye he does need daily ointment for dry eye. But don't let him  fool you, he can figure it all out. He is neutered, up to date on vaccinations, heartworm negative, microchipped, about 8 years old and 12 pounds. If you want to give your heart to Zero and find love in return, this is your chance! Zero's adoption donation is $175. For an application, email Lizethedog@yahoo.com. Thank you for your interest in a rescue dog.

name: Romeo
description: It's quite clear why this guy's name is Romeo! He is a little heartbreaker! He knows he rules your heart and emotions and he takes full advantage! Romeo is up to date on vaccinations, neutered, heartworm negative, microchipped, estimated at about 5 years old and 13 pounds. He does have dry eye and will need eye drops daily for life. He will do best in a home without small children. Romeo's adoption donation is $200. If you love Romeo like he loves you, send us an email at Lizethedog@yahoo.com. Thank you for adopting a rescue dog!

name: Isaac
description:
Isaac is a 7 month old Mixed Breed dog, weighing 27 pounds. He is healthy, heartworm negative, and has been neutered. He is working on housetraining. He leashes and walks well and is easy to handle. He gets along well with most other dogs. He's cuddly, affectionate, and likes to have his belly rubbed. Heâll do best to have a fenced in yard where he can get his exercise. Isaac would do well to have a buddy dog.
............................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: Buddy Holly
description:
Buddy had is initial vet visit today.  He is estimated to be 9 years of age and is a husky boy at 8.2 pounds.  He was deemed to be in great physical health.  Buddy does have some impairment in his right eye and no reaction to light. His vet decided that he is probably blind in this eye.  His left eye has normal vision with some evidence of cataract. His vet prescribed steroid drops to his right eye for two weeks.  He has a dental on 10-10.

Buddy is very active and very adventurous.  He loves to explore, he likes to try out all the dog beds, and be with his people.  He does want to be a lap dog and be lose to you.  He is a very quiet dog and  he settled into his foster home in about 2 days with no fear at all.  He loves everyone and makes new friends easily.  He does not really like to be left alone for very long.  He is a super sweet macho kinda little man.

name: Daisy Dew
description:
Daisy had her initial visit to the vet today.  She was estimated to be 11 years of age and in good physical health.  She weighs a mere 5.8 pounds.  It was discovered that both her eyes are light reactive; but there is no reaction to movement toward her left eye.  Therefore, the vet concluded she can see some out of her left eye.  She has  better vision in her right eye. Both eyes have cataracts, but she is not blind.  She does have dry eye and will continue to require Optimmune Ointment in both eyes.  She is scheduled for a dental on 10-10.

This little girl is a joy, she would cuddle all day long if possible.  She loves to lay in your lap or beside you. Daisy is a true companion doggie. She will paw the air with her little front paws to get attention or her well loved belly rubs.  She is a quiet little thing, but does not like to be left alone too much.. She just loves to keep you company and will follow you around the house.  She definitely does not act like a senior citizen and gets around very well. She is sweet as syrup, likes everyone, and will even give strangers kisses.  She is a bit of a flirt and very cute.  She tilts her head when you talk.

name: Magic
description: This wonderful 11 pound neutered 9 mos old male Manchester Terrier mix is full of energy and has lots of love to give. His foster family adores him. He likes everybody and gets along well with other dogs. He loves toys and stuffed animals! He would be the perfect dog for someone who is around most of the time to play with him and show him attention. He has had all his shots and been dewormed. Please make an appointment to meet this little munchkin. Adoption Fee: $75 Contact Information for Adoptions: Ruth Ann Vowan- ravfcahs@gmail.com; Adoption Fee Includes spay/neuter, HW test (if of age), 5-way vaccine, rabies vaccine (if of age), bordatella, microchip, and basic deworming.

name: ACE
description:
ACE - READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME & FAMILY
Ace is one happy, mischievous little boy! He was found abandoned by a Good Samaritan as he limped along looking for help with a dislocated shoulder.  He has now had surgery and is making up for his lost time of inactivity! He is a busy boy who is inquisitive and always on the move! Ace is a German Shepherd and Hound mix, about 2 yrs old. He is currently staying in a  foster home where he has many other dogs to play with. He's a good boy and would love his very own forever home and family!

name: Simba
description:
Simba is a 2 year old Mixed Breed dog, weighing 44 pounds. He is healthy, heartworm negative, and has been neutered. He leashes and walks well and is easy to handle. He came in with his brother, Arsenal. He's really sweet and friendly. He gets along well with most other dogs. He's lively and active. He likes to play. He is learning \"sit.\" Simba would do best to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where he can get the exercise he needs.
.........................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: Arsenal
description:
