He's really sweet and friendly. He gets along well with most other dogs. He's lively and active. He likes to play. He knows \"sit.\" Arsenal would do best to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where he can get the exercise he needs.
..................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: SCRUFFY
description: Oh my, isn't he a cutie! This is Scruffy, a 3 year old Terrier mix, who weighs just 22 lbs. Scruffy is living in a foster home and is thoroughly enjoying being spoiled!  This sweet boy is great with other cats and dogs. Although he loves people, he is easily frightened and becomes very submissive so he would do best in a home with older children. He is adorable!

name: RUBY
description:
RUBY - READY FOR HER FOREVER HOME & FAMILY
Ruby was surrendered by her owner when he moved....Ruby and her 5 little tiny puppies. She was a good mama and is now ready for 'her time' to be loved and taken care of! She is thought to be a Lab / Hound mix with a bark that sounds a bit like a Basengi - a  high pitched sound! She is a sweet girl who will love to be loved by a caring family.

name: SAVANNAH
description:
SAVANNAH -
This sweet Beagle girl, about 18 mos old,  was found abandoned by a kind person who has house trained and crate trained her. She is now in a loving foster home awaiting her forever family. A VERY sweet girl who only wants to please and receive attention. She will make a wonderful family pet.

name: RILEY
description: Riley was surrendered by his owners as they could no longer care for him. He is a gorgeous Red Tick Hound who is neutered and up to date on his shots. Great with kids and will make a great family addition.

name: SPECKLES & SUNNY
description:
SPECKLES & SUNNY - READY FOR FOREVER HOMES AND FAMILIES
These 3 sweet Catahoula mixed puppies were abandoned out in the country. Tanner is a pretty soft tan color while the girls have tri-colored speckles and Sunny has blue eyes!The finder is unable to keep them safe or enclosed in area and they are in danger of being hit by a car. They were born in March, 2019. They may be fostered or adopted together or separately. Tanner has been adopted

name: TATER
description:
TATER - READY FOR HER FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
Isn't she cute? A little 'Tater Tot!'  Tater is a little Chihuahua mix, about 2 yrs old, who only weighs 12-15 lbs. She is a happy, happy little girl who loves other dogs and is so very sweet.  She is staying in a foster home after being rescued from a kill shelter, after her 'time was up.'  She is a happy, bouncy girl who will do best with children about 8 yrs and above because she is 'so bouncy!' She is a love bug! She'll make a great family fur baby!!!!

name: LATTE
description: Isn't she a pretty girl? This is Latte, a 50lb Boxer mix, less than a year old, who is a complete cupcake! Latte's owner has had a death in the family and needs to find her a new forever home. She is a treasure and the perfect family puppy girl! Latte loves everyone she meets - she is kid friendly and loves other dogs and cats! Latte is house and crate trained and is a complete playful delight

name: Jeanetta
description:
Ok so what I was a little resistant at first....we all have skeletons in our closet right? My name is Jeanetta and I am a spayed female Lab mix about 1-2 yrs old and I weigh 46 lbs. Sooooooo back to my story...you see there comes a time in your life you just have to roll with it because you exhaust too much energy being the tough gal...that was me. No really, it's true. I know it's hard to believe...I mean look at me...do I look like fun or what...you should have seen these silly people chasing me around when I got away one morning...I may or may not have hidden behind a tree and laughed at them looking for me. Well these hoomans are sneaky...they caught me...again...so I decided to roll with it...Turns out it's not too bad....and the leash...not so bad....and... I love hoomans and other dogs...it's opened my eyes to a whole new world and I'm so excited! I just need a family to share it with....come see me soon....I'm available now! Adopting a dog from the Conway Animal Welfare Unit is a fairly easy process. The first step to adopting an animal is submitting an application. The application allows us to individually consider applicants and helps us to properly match our pets with new owners. We want to make sure that our pets are going to homes that are ready to provide for these pets long-term. Adoptions are $50 and this includes vaccinations, heartworm test, spay/neuter and microchip. As with any shelter animal, health is not guaranteed but we do our best to screen out those animals that are showing obvious signs of illness or disclose that information prior to adoption. All dogs are heartworm tested upon adoption. 

If you are interested in adopting a dog and you reside OUTSIDE the city limits of Conway and the dog is less than 12 wks old, the cost is $75 which includes a spay/neuter and micropchip. The spay and neuter can only be performed at Vilonia Vet Clinic or Companion Animal Spay/Neuter Clinic. If the animal is less that 12 wks and you live inside the city limits the adoption fee is $25 dollars and you receive a voucher for $120 to use at select clinics for spay/neuter. The other option is that you provide us with proof of a pre-paid spay or neuter at YOUR vet of choice.

name: Ruthie
description: Meet Ruthie! She is a very sweet dog needing a great home! She loves to be around people, and is great with other dogs. Ruthie is a very smart dog. Ruthie is always happy and ready to play. She has not been around cats or children. If you would like to inquire about Ruthie, please call Stone County Humane Society at 870-269-5200 or you can also go on-line and complete an adoption application at our website schspets.org. Ruthie would make a great addition to any home.

name: Rocky
description: Meet Rocky! He is a very sweet young dog needing a great home! He loves to be around people, and is great with other dogs. Rocky is a very smart young dog. He is still young and not done growing. He is going to be a big boy. Rocky is good with kids, but likes to jump. He is not good with cats. Rocky is a very smart boy he knows quite a few basic commands already. If you would like to inquire about Rocky, please call Stone County Humane Society at 870-269-5200 or you can also go on-line and complete an adoption application at our website schspets.org. Rocky would make a great addition to any home.

name: Lucy
description: Meet Lucy! She is a very sweet dog needing a great home! She loves to be around people, and is great with other dogs. Lucy is a very smart dog. She really likes toys and playing with her brother Desi. If you would like to inquire about Lucy, please call Stone County Humane Society at 870-269-5200 or you can also go on-line and complete an adoption application at our website schspets.org. Lucy would make a great addition to any home.

name: Desi
description: Meet Desi! He is a very sweet dog needing a great home! He loves to be around people, and is great with other dogs. Desi is a very smart dog. He likes to play with toys and his sister Lucy. If you would like to inquire about Desi, please call Stone County Humane Society at 870-269-5200 or you can also go on-line and complete an adoption application at our website schspets.org. Desi would make a great addition to any home.

name: Sonny
description: Meet Sonny! He is a very sweet puppy needing a good home! He loves to be around people, and is great with other dogs. Sonny is a very smart puppy. He is a hunting dog and was born to do his job. Sonny is now enrolled in the Paws in Prison Program at the North Central Unit in Calico Rock for 8 weeks of training and TLC. He will learn basic commands, get kennel trained, house trained and will learn some tricks too. If you would like to arrange a visit to NCU to meet Sonny, please call Stone County Humane Society at 870-269-5200 or you can also go on-line and complete an adoption application at our website schspets.org. Sonny would make a great addition to any home.

name: Cher
description: Meet Cher! She is a very sweet puppy needing a good home! She loves to be around people, and is great with other dogs. Cher is a very smart puppy. She is a hunting dog and was born to do her job. Cher is now enrolled in the Paws in Prison Program at the North Central Unit in Calico Rock for 8 weeks of training and TLC. She will learn basic commands, get kennel trained, house trained and will learn some tricks too. If you would like to arrange a visit to NCU to meet Cher, please call Stone County Humane Society at 870-269-5200 or you can also go on-line and complete an adoption application at our website schspets.org. Cher would make a great addition to any home.

name: Bessie
description: Meet Bessie! She is a very sweet dog needing a great home! She loves to be around people, and being petted. She is a Hound mix and walks with her nose to the ground. She also really like to talk (bark/bay). She would make someone a great pet. If you would like to meet Bessie, please visit the Stone County Humane Society shelter located at 17379 Highway 9, Mountain View, AR or call 870-269-5200. You can also go on-line and complete an adoption application at our website schspets.org.

name: SISSY
description:
SISSY 
Sissy was rescued from a shelter and is now safely and happily staying in a foster home! She is a good girl, a Lab and Pit terrier mix, thought to be about 18 mos old. She is friendly, loving and gets along with other dogs. Sissy will make a wonderful family fur baby!

name: Butch
description: You can fill out an adoption application online on our official website.Mom was sightly larger but looked just like a border terrier.. dad was obviously the postman... so there you have it. For more information on how to adopt this baby before 16 weeks, meet and greets, and adoptions apply at GreenerdaysAR.rescuegroups.org. For our rescues safety, Vet references will be checked prior to visitation with any of our animals. Adoption fee will include all vaccines, spay or neuter, microchipping and any age appropriate preventatives.

name: Thumper
description: Thumper is a young terrier mix. He is shy but friendly with other dogs and people. He would love to become someone's lap dog though he may outgrow your lap. Please make an appointment to meet this deserving dog. Adoption Fee: $75 Contact Information for Adoptions: Ruth Ann Vowan- ravfcahs@gmail.com; Adoption Fee Includes spay/neuter, HW test (if of age), 5-way vaccine, rabies vaccine (if of age), bordatella, microchip, and basic deworming.

name: Georgette
description: Yep I am Georgette and I about three months old. I am very cute, sweet and just a very precious puppy. I am growing fast so if you want a puppy you had better come fast and adopt me.  When I am in my cage and someone says \"HI\" to me I just wag and wag my tail. I am really friendly......... I am a puppy you see and most puppies have not been around very many things and seen lots of stuff and so my life is still great and I hope it will always be that way.... I just know you can help make my life a wonderful one so please think about it and want me as your forever  dog. My adoption fee is $90.00 and this includes my shots, worming, spaying, and micro chipping.  I am like Dotty, she and I can't upload our pictures. We must be doing something wrong.... Think I will go play and then try another day with my pictures.  Georgette  P.S. Trust me I am very, very cute.....

name: Dotty
description: HI my name is Dotty and I am about two years old. I am a shy girl when I am taken out of my dog run but with time will warm up to you. I am scared of all the barking dogs. They will tell me all kinds of things when I am walked down the roll of runs with all the other dogs in them and that scares me lots. I am a bit over weight , I am kinda of roundish. I have to tell you that I am very cat aggressive and so can not be around any cats at all. I will hurt them. I just have that very bad habit and I am sorry to have to tell you this because that might keep me from finding a home. Surely there is someone out there that wants a dog and do not have any cats in the home. I am a sweet, quiet girl and do not say a words in my dog run and pen. I just blend in and people over look me.  If I was not a roundish I could really blend in with the floor and no one would never even know I was at this shelter. I am also short to the ground with me short stubby legs. You probably could carry me around if I was not so heavy. I just keep gaining because I do not get much exercise around here. I just sit and wait........ My adoption fee is $90.00 and this includes my shots, worming, spaying and micro chipping.  I can't get my pictures to upload and will try another day.... Sorry about that..... Dotty

name: Buffy
description: Yep I am here at the shelter waiting for a loving home of my own. I am Buffy and I am about a year and a half years old. I am a very beautiful girl. I was abandoned and left all alone and finally found by a caring person  and brought to this shelter.  I am nice and will make a great dog for someone wanting a cute girl. My adoption fee is $90.00 and this includes my shots, worming, spaying and micro chipping. I will be looking for you....... Buffy

name: CHARLIE
description:
CHARLIE - READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
Isn't he a cute little boy? Charlie was found by a Good Samaritan after he had been hit by a car - unconscious and laying on the side of the road. Thankfully, the vet says he was just stunned with a 'headache.' This little Beagle mix boy is about 1 yr old and weighs 30 lbs. It is assumed that he was abandoned as he was very hungry. Charlie is a sweet boy, loves everyone and gets along with other dogs very well. This little sweetheart will make a wonderful family fur baby!

name: TANK
description:
TANK - READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME AND FAMILY
This big ol' boy is a Tank!!!! That's his size (85 lb) but he is a big, affectionate, lovable couch potato!!! He is a Staffordshire Terrier mix, possibly mixed with Weimaraner. Tank is happily living in a foster home with his foster Dad and several other dogs. He is a wonderful boy, about 3-4 yrs old, who loves nothing more than to lounge around the house and be close to his people. Tank is house and crate trained, never gets into mischief in the house and is just a wonderful boy! Due to his large size, a home with small kids is not recommended. Make room - Tank is ready to be your big baby!!!

name: BAILEY
description:
BAILEY
Bailey is a gorgeous Red Heeler mix, under a year old. He is a fun loving puppy boy who loves other dogs, playing and is friendly with everyone he meets. He'll make a great family pet!

name: Laken
description: Laken was picked up as a stray. He is in very good shape and we hope his owner will come and get him. If that doesn't happen he will be available for adoption on 8-18-19. He is very friendly, strong, and playful. He will be someone's best friend. Please make an appointment to meet this sweet dog. Adoption Fee: $75 Contact Information for Adoptions: Ruth Ann Vowan- ravfcahs@gmail.com; Adoption Fee Includes spay/neuter, HW test (if of age), 5-way vaccine, rabies vaccine (if of age), bordatella, microchip, and basic deworming.

name: Edie
description: Edie is a mostly black Shepherd/Lab mix. She is 5 months old on 8-13-19. She loves to play with other dogs and people. She will be a great pet to grow up with. Please make an appointment to meet this sweet dog. Adoption Fee: $75 Contact Information for Adoptions: Ruth Ann Vowan- ravfcahs@gmail.com; Adoption Fee Includes spay/neuter, HW test (if of age), 5-way vaccine, rabies vaccine (if of age), bordatella, microchip, and basic deworming.

name: BELLA  &  ARI
description:
BELLA & ARI - WAITING FOR THEIR FOREVER HOMES AD FAMILY.
These sweet dogs were abandoned by their owner when they moved. Bella is an 8 yr old pure bred Dalmatian who is very loving and so affectionate. She loves a calm and quiet home where she gets lots of love. Ari ( aka Ferrari) is a 2 yr old Boxer mix who has spent her entire life with Bella - they are very bonded. They are both house trained, friendly and playful with each other. Bella does not care for other female dogs - but is fine with the boys! Ari is a sweet girl who loves everyone! They would love to stay together!

name: Tux
description: Tux is a sweet boy. Loves people.He needs an immediate placement. He has been neutered. We are in hopes this has taken care of his tendency to not like male dogs. He has been treated for heartworms as of 7/17/2019 he is negative.

name: BB & PEARL
description:
B B & PEARL - TOGETHER OR SEPARATELY
Sweet little BB and Pearl are beautiful Lab and Hound mix girls who can hardly wait for their very own forever people! They are young puppy girls, born Dec, 2018 so not even a year old! They are precious girls who are good with kids and other dogs. They may be adopted together or separately!

name: Lordy
description: You can fill out an adoption application online on our official website.Greenerdaysar.rescuegroups.org Lordy was the unwanted child in a divorce. so sadly he finds himself looking for his forever home again. He has been living with us in our home hoping the owner would return as promised, but the statue of limitations is well over and they never came back. Loving and fitting in great, with 9 personal dogs, even I must say bid my good byes to this sweet guy. His adoption fee is $125.00

name: Roe
description: Roe is appx 1 yearold female mixed breed (possibly shepherd/pit mix) with ADORABLE ears! Shes a very sweet dog and is fine with other dogs.She is on the small side-short and kind of stocky! She was a stray picked up in Mount Pleasant, TX.

name: Bess
description: Bess is a female shepherd mix that is approximately 1 year old. She is on the timid side but fine with other dogs. She would make a great family dog. She is not hyper at all and quiet.

name: Kampfer
description: Kampfer is german for fighter and this girl is :) She is a 6-8 month old female pit mix with a gorgeous golden coat. She was found starved as a stray in Caddo Parrish, Louisiana. She is SUPER sweet and loves other dogs!

name: Oreo
description: This 8 month old female possible pit/catahoula mix came up from Louisiana. She is heartworm negative and gets along great with other dogs! microchipped

name: Karli Simone
description: 6 month old female hound/pit mix-owner surrender in Mount Pleasant, TX

name: Rya
description: Meet Rya! She's a happy, social puppy, who is up for anything. She enjoys walking on her harness, playing with her toys, cuddling in her blankets, which she drags all over the house, or just hanging out next to her person. Rya loves to be spoiled by her people, rides well in the car and would enjoy going on lot's of adventures with you! She is estimated to be just over a year old, house trained, crate trained, knows basic commands, and is eager to learn and please. She presently lives in a home with 2 human children, and many other dogs and cats, and gets along with all. She would thrive in a home with another pup-mate, or a family with the time to help her to continue to grow.

name: Macquin
description: Meet Mac (short for Macquin), the life of the party! He is a collie mix who was born to run and play. Mac is always happy, with his tail wagging. Although a bit hyper at first, Mac calms quickly to become your best companion. He loves walks, hiking, his chew toys, is house trained, crate trained, and knows basic commands. Due to his active nature, he does best with dogs that enjoy having a playmate. He is not aggressive with cats, but does enjoy a good chase. He would do best with older kids due to activity level. Mac becomes putty in your hands when receiving attention from his humans, and would only thrive with an active family of his own.

name: Marshmallow
description: This little smoosh face is a female possible pit/bulldog mix that is approximately 1 year old. She was a stray picked up in Louisiana. microchipped

name: Shiloh
description: Shiloh, a collie mix, was found in Shiloh Estates in Conway, AR. He had a lot of fur loss and dark thick skin patches. Since then he has improved greatly and has beautiful yellow and white fur! He's a young adult and weighs about 80 lbs.Shiloh is sweet and friendly. He is ready for his very own loving home.

name: Jake
description: JAKE was found as a stray when he was a young puppy. He had a rough start in life but survived parvo. He's a yellow lab mix and has a pretty wavy coat. He's about 1 1/2 years old and is medium size. All he needs is someone to give him a chance at a new safe life.

name: Jax
description:
Jax is very loving and sweet young adult who's about one year old and gets along great with other dogs and people. He's of medium energy level, will be a great walking, or hiking companion. His brown eyes will melt your heart when he looks at you. He has a great since of humor as well and thinks he's pretty funny.

Jax comes fully vetted and microchipped. His adoption fee is $175 in Arkansas and $350 in New England (due to transport fees, the adoption fee is higher)

He was rescued from a hoarding sitution in Arkansas and is a very lucky boy to have a chance to start a new life. Will you open your heart and your home to this wonderful boy?

name: Lilly the German Shepherd
description:
Name: Lilly

Gender: Female

Breed: German Shepherd mix

Color: Black and Brown

Date of Birth: January 22, 2019

Paper trained or Potty trained: Paper trained working on Potty training

VETTING DONE: Will be done May 20, 2019

Wormer:

Flea prevention : Comfortis

Spayed/Neutered: Will be done on May 20, 2019

Chipped: Will be done on May 20th, 2019

BIO: Hello, my name is Lilly and I am looking for my forever home. My foster mom says I am a very gentle and loving, good girl. I love to play with my sisters and Mom. I like my foster dog sisters and the cats that I am living with. I am a little rough with the kitties because I don't know how strong I am but I am learning to play more gently with them. I love to be petted and play with toys and I would love to play with you. I will be your best friend. Will you please, let me go home with you?

Contact Info: Maryann at mkjaros@hotmail.com

If interested in adopting, please visit our site, below, and fill out an application.

http://www.ArkanPaws.org/

name: Wooley Bell
description:
Sorry, we can not adopt to MA residents at this time.

This sweet angel was found abandoned in a park. That is how she got her name. Wooley B is a super playful, energetic, loving, and fun girl. She is one year young and is up to date on her vaccinations, spayed, microchipped, and ready for a loving family.

She especially enjoys her stuffed animals and gets along great with other dogs and cats. Very loving nature who follows your every move while you are outside working in the yard. She is going to make someone a very good pet.

Currently, she is located in Arkansas, but transport is available.

name: Mona
description: MONA is a very smart friendly girl. She's large size but gentle.

name: Piper
description: Piper, a black lab mix puppy, is small at about 27 pounds and likely will remain small. She loves to play in the water, and also loves kids and people. Sometimes she's a little dominate around her food, but most of the time is very sweet. Piper was found in an abandoned rent house with a large litter. It's time for her to know love and have a forever home of her own.

name: Moose
description: MOOSE is young beautiful catahoula leopard mix with golden eyes. He is peoplefriendly and gets along with other dogs. Moose is medium size.

name: Star
description:
NAME: Star

GENDER: Female

BREED: German Shepherd mix

BIRTH DATE: 1/22/19

POTTY TRAINED: Paper trained, working on outside training

VETTING DONE: Will be done May 20th

Wormer(Brand and dates):

Flea prevention: Comfortis

Spayed/Neutered: Will be done May 20th

Chipped: Will be done May 20th

GETS ALONG WITH OTHER CATS/DOGS? Yes/Yes

CHILDREN? Good but very excitable

SPECIAL NEEDS: N/A

BIO: Hello, I am Star and I am looking for my forever home. I am a very loving puppy who was found in freezing cold weather. I love to run, jump, and play. Sometimes I get very excited but my foster mom is trying to help with that. I like to play with my sisters very much and we are close. I am a good girl and would love to play with you. I like playing in my fenced yard but I sleep inside inside with my sisters and my mom. My mom is a German Shepherd mix and I am not sure who my dad is but my foster mom says I am a pretty little girl. Can you please take me home with you? I need a best friend to play with and spend time with me.

Contact Info: Maryann at arkanpawscats@gmail.com

Please visit the site below and fill out an application to adopt this sweet girl.

http://www.ArkanPaws.org/

name: Sadie
description: Sadie is a brownhound mix mediumsize.She haslots of energy and loves having space to run. Sweet girl.

name: Pepper
description:
Pepper was found tied to a tree in an area known for irresponsible pet owners dumping their pets. In spite of her harsh beginning,this playful, fun-loving, and so full of life girl still wants to be with people.

Her body is lean and strong. She's fully vetted: spayed, rabies vaccination, all cores vaccinations, a bordetella to prevent kennel cough, and is heart worm negative. Her black coat is very shiny and her dark brown eyes display a true happiness.

Pepper loves to go for walks, plays well with the other dogs in our program. She would do great with older kids and adults, but may be a little too clumsy for smaller children. She has not been exposed to cats, so we do not know how she would react around them.

Currently, she is in Arkansas and we offer transport to Rhode Island. Unfortunately, we are not registered to adopt to Massachusetts.

name: Roscoe
description: Roscoe and his 2 siblings were strays. One was adopted in the Northeast and the other passed away from parvo. Roscoe is medium size and has beautiful reddish brown coat. He gets along well with the other dogs at the rescue. He loves people...has done very well at adoption events. Very sweet boy.

name: Shadow
description: Shadow is an adult maleblack lab mix. He is verycalm andsweet. Shadowgets along with other dogs. He and hisbuddy, Hank, were on theeuthanasia list in Mississippi because theirsenior owner had to give them up.Consider giving Shadow the safe home he deserves.

name: Blair
description: Blair is a large people friendly dog. She loves attention and is very sweet. She can be dog selective at times. But she was recently spayed and is already doing better.Blair would greatly benefit from a foster or forever home. She needs space to exerciseand play.

name: Bambi
description:
This baby-faced girl is Bambi, and she's one of the may pit/pit mixes we have available in our shelter. She is absolute sweet heart who just want to cuddle and play. Unfortunately she's in a city that has breed specific legislation, so she and her kind aren't allowed. If you live in an area that doesn't have BSL, please come by and visit us. We have some great pitties who want nothing more than a loving home and family just like all dogs deserve. We're open every weekday from 8-5.

217 South Redmond Road, Jacksonville, AR 72076

501 982 2916

name: Kane
description: Another happy boy looking for his forever home. This is Kane, and he's a young Catahoula mix found as a stray and never claimed. He's a happy, healthy, and playful boy so we don't know why his owner didn't come looking for him. He's ready to start the next chapter in his life :)

name: ABBY & GABBY
description:
ABBY & GABBY 
Two sweet sisters, about 1 yr old, are Pit Bull Terriers. They are love everyone they meet - people and other dogs! They maybe fostered or adopted together or separately.

name: BISCUIT
description: Biscuit is one big, beautiful boy!  He is a Pit Bull Terrier, born in June, 2018. Biscuit loves everyone he meets but it is felt that, due to his size, he would do best around older children. He is not good at sharing his food so he'll need to be an 'only dog child.'

name: BULMA
description: Bulma is sweet girl who is an Australian Shepherd and Pit Bull mix girl, born in August, 2018. Unfortunately, her loving family is no longer able to care for her. This pretty girl has beautiful dark black fur with dainty white slippers!   Bulma is a sweet heart who loves people, kids who would do best as an only âfur babyâ as she does not like to share her toys or food with other dogs.  She is housetrained and a love!

name: DELILAH
description: Isnât she beautiful!  Delilah is a gorgeous Australian Shepherd and Pit Bull mix girl, born in August, 2018. Unfortunately, her loving family is no longer able to care for her. This pretty girl has the beauty of the Aussieâs spotted coat and one blue/one brown eye but the short coat of a Pit.   Delilah is a sweet heart who loves people, kids and is good with other dogs.  She is housetrained and a love!

name: WIDGET
description:
WIDGET  - READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME

This sweet little boy was found wandering and is now in a loving foster home while he awaits his forever family. Widget is a 5 year old Min-Pin mix with long legs and weighing just 11 lbs. He is blind in one eye, possibly a birth defect according to the vet.  This little sweetheart loves nothing more than to cuddle, be held or lay in your lap! He will make a wonderful companion and new best forever friend!

name: Raven
description: We've named this cute little female pup Raven. She is a lab mix, about 10 wks old on 8-7-19. She will make a nice family pet for someone interested in loving her and giving her a good home. Please make an appointment to meet this sweet puppy in Forrest City, AR. Adoption Fee: $75 Contact Information for Adoptions: Ruth Ann Vowan- ravfcahs@gmail.com; Adoption Fee Includes spay/neuter, HW test (if of age), 5-way vaccine, rabies vaccine (if of age), bordatella, microchip, and basic deworming.

name: Myrtle
description: Meet Myrtle! She is an awesome dog needing a good home! She is very friendly and loves attention. She is great around other dogs too. Myrtle can jump a 4 foot fence, so she really needs a 6 foot fence or to be leashed walked. She is one of the cutest dogs. She has a lot of personality. Myrtle is now enrolled in the Paws in Prison Program at the North Central Unit in Calico Rock for 8 weeks of training and TLC. She will learn basic commands, get kennel trained, house trained and will learn some tricks too. If you would like to arrange a visit to NCU to meet Myrtle, please call Stone County Humane Society at 870-269-5200 or you can also go on-line and complete an adoption application at our website schspets.org. Myrtle would make a great addition to any home.

name: Taco - 1908309 / 2019
description:
Taco
Taco is an adorable pup whose owner decided that having a pup was just a tad too much with having other dogs. She is a terrier mix and she is 4-6 months old. Taco is absolutely adorable. Though she does know a few things, she will need additional training in the 'home rules' department. We are looking for a family for her that can help her learn and grow. Date of Intake: 8/13/19
Taco is located at Maumelle Animal Services, 425 Cogdell Drive, Maumelle Arkansas. Open M-F 10-5, Sat. 12-4:30. Email us at Dogs@maumellefoa.org for more information. Online adoption applications available at www.Maumellefoa.org. Our adoption fee is $80. Included in the fee is shots, sterilization, microchip, dogs are given a dewormer at time of intake, placed on monthly flea/tick preventative, if heartworm negative then they are placed on heartworm preventative, if heartworm positive then they are treated once an adoption finalized.
We are always at the NLR PetSmart with our available pets on every Saturday of the month. 10:30 - 3:15 ish.
Find Maumelle Friends of the Animals on Facebook!

name: Brandon
description:
Brandon is a 1 year old Terrier mix, weighing 31 pounds. He is healthy, heartworm negative, and has been neutered. He leashes and walks well. He gets along well with most other dogs. He is learning \"sit.\" He's lively and alert. He's happy and friendly. Brandon would do best to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where he can get the exercise he needs. Brandon is high energy and active and would do well with an active family.
.............................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: Ducky
description: I am darling, darling Ducky. I was abandoned and ended up here at the shelter. It says on my profile that I am a flat backed  retriever but maybe the flat coated is the same thing. Yep, Yep,Yep... I am about 7 years old and just a charming, charming guy. My fur is so soft and long. I am just so good-looking I must tell you. I don't jump around and around with all that energy. I do not jump on you either. As you can see from my picture I just sit beside you and look up at people with loving eyes and a sweet smile. I am just precious. I have been sponsored and so my adoption fee is different. You will have to call the shelter to find our how much my adoption fee will be and this covers my shots, worming, neutering and micro chipping.  Yep. Yep, Yep.... I am Ducky

name: Sweet Pea
description:
Sweet Pea is a 9-10 month old Mixed Breed dog, weighing 29 pounds. She is healthy, heartworm negative, and has been spayed. She leashes and walks well and is easy to handle. She is working on housetraining. She fetches and likes water. She's reported to do well with kids, cats, and other dogs. She's sweet and affectionate. Sweet Pea would do best to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where she can get the exercise she needs.
......................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: MaMa
description: I think it is late and time for bed my children. That is what I would be telling my kids if they were still here. You see I came to the shelter with lots of puppy kids  and they were all adopted and here I am still waiting for my own new home. I am about 2 years old and as you can see from the pictures I get along with other dogs. I do not even have a lease on in that picture with other dogs. I am a good dog.  I am in the very last dog run so I get over looked lots of times. I also will run outside in my dog run when people come up to my cage door to see me. I must be shy or something I think and so people can't get to know just how wonderful I  am . My adoption fee is $90.00 and this includes my shots, worming, spaying and micro chipping. Bed time for me I know and probably you too..... sweet dreams my children where ever you are........ MaMa

name: Friday
description: Howdy,  I am your girl Friday and I am about 13 weeks old. I came into the shelter just last Friday with my brother Henry. I am cute, quiet and still smell like a puppy. My fur is so soft. I have a beautiful coat of black with white on my feet, end of tail and on my chest. I am just the cutest fur ball you have ever seen. I had to come to the shelter because the person who had me and my brother had way too many dogs, and puppy to be able to care for all of us in a healthy way. My adoption fee is $90.00 and this includes my shots (got some Friday), worming ( got some Friday), spaying ( when I am old enough) and micro chipping if you want this service. I am being fostered so if you want to see me you just have to call the shelter or come by and I can be brought to the shelter for you to see cute roly poly me...  Remember ---- I am his girl Friday.

name: Whitey
description: I am beautiful Whitey and I am so sweet. I am here at the shelter in the big outside yard with Miller. We get along just fine. We keep each other company. We have a swimming pool to play in and lots of shade trees. The sand is good to lay in to keep cool. I was a good girl when the ladies came to take updated pictures of me. I did not jump on them or anything. I sat and  they got really cute pictures of me. I am really pretty with my markings of black on my white coat of fur. Being a terrier sometimes I can have skin trouble but with care I can be just fine. I was neglected and so had to come here to find another family that will take care of me, love me and be my bestest friend.  My adoption fee is $90.00 and this includes my spaying, worming, shots, and micro-chipping.  I am beautiful Whitey Oh, forgot to tell you I am about 8 years old.

name: BO
description:
BO - READY FOR HIS FOREVER HOME & FAMILY
Bo is a sweet heart! This Boxer boy is 5 yrs younG and is a Boxer mix. He is house trained, good with people and other dogs. He so wants a loving home and family as his family could no longer care for him. Do you have room in your heart for this sweet , shy boy?

name: MADDIE
description:
MADDIE NEEDS HER FOREVER HOME
Isn't she absolutely gorgeous? This is Maddie, a sweet Australian Shepherd with so many colors in her coat! Maddie was born in October, 2018 so she is still very much a puppy! She is the perfect little lady - she is good with kids, other dogs and house trained. She so wants a loving fur-ever home and family!

name: OLIVIA
description:
OLIVIA 
Olivia was rescued from a kill shelter on 'her last day'' - she was so very frightened when she came to her foster home. She was very, very matted and so uncomfortable with being so unkempt. A very frightened little girl. After a trip to the groomer - she was a 'new girl!' So much more comfortable and happy! She is thought to be about  1 1/2 yrs old and she is a Terrier mix. Olivia is good with other dogs and is a happy girl. She weighs about 30 lbs. and will require regular grooming to keep her beautiful and mat-free.

name: ROO
description:
ROO 
This sweet puppy was abandoned. She is a little Pit Bull mix girl, weighing just 8 lbs and was born in April, 2019. She is adorable, loving and loves to be loved. She is great with kids and is very sweet, very well mannered and calm. She will weigh about 35- 40 lbs as an adut as she is a smaller breed. Roo is a super sweet and gentle little girl.

name: Gidget - 1505268 / 2019
description:
Gidget
Gidget is a precious girl who stole our hearts in 2015. Back then, she was about 6 months old. She was adopted into a loving home and raised with another dog and a little boy. Due to Gidgets knack of escaping their backyard, the family feared for her as they were moving into the country. So here she is, 4 years later and once again, she is ready for adoption. Gidget has been an indoor dog. She is gentle and sweet but she does have her crazy moments. Gidget is all girly girl. She loves sweet talk and being included. Gidget would be an excellent addition to any family. Cats unknown. Kids are definetly okay. Date of Intake: 5/22/15, 7/31/19
Gidget is located at Maumelle Animal Services, 425 Cogdell Drive, Maumelle Arkansas. Open M-F 10-5, Sat. 12-4:30. Email us at Dogs@maumellefoa.org for more information. Online adoption applications available at www.Maumellefoa.org. Our adoption fee is $80. Included in the fee is shots, sterilization, microchip, dogs are given a dewormer at time of intake, placed on monthly flea/tick preventative, if heartworm negative then they are placed on heartworm preventative, if heartworm positive then they are treated once an adoption finalized.
We are always at the NLR PetSmart with our available pets on every Saturday of the month. 10:30 - 3:15 ish.
Find Maumelle Friends of the Animals on Facebook!

name: Buckley
description:
Buckley is a 4-5 month old Mixed Breed puppy, weighing 34 pounds (on 9.15). He is healthy, has had all three puppy shots, and has been neutered. He leashes and walks well. He's active and likes to run and play. He gets along well with other dogs. He's sweet and loves to have his belly rubbed. He's learning \"sit\" and would do well with further training. Buckley will do best to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where he can get the exercise he needs.
...............................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: Nikki
description:
Nikki is an 11 month old Shepherd mix, weighing 52 pounds. She is healthy, heartworm negative, spayed, and housetrained. She's reported to love horses and goats and to do well with chickens. She gets along well with most other dogs, but likes to play rough and might not do well with smaller dogs. She does okay with older kids. She's not good with cats. She's used to being mostly inside. She's alert and intelligent. Nikki will need to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where she can get the exercise she needs. She is active and will make for a great jogging and hiking adventure buddy.
....................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: Arlo
description:
Arlo is a 7 month old Labrador Retriever mix, weighing 49 pounds. He is healthy, heartworm negative, and has been neutered. He's working on housetraining. He leashes and walks well. He was turned in due to no fault of his own. He's reported to do well with kids and other dogs. He's sweet and mild-mannered. He is used to being inside. Arlo would do best to go to a home with a fenced in yard or to a large SAFE property where he can get the exercise he needs.
................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: TJ
description: TJ is a gentle loving snuggling male pit. He gets along with all the other 7 dogs running crazy at his fosters. He would rather lay in your lap than wrestle ... he is very low key except for his happy whip... nothing low key about that... and his smile is like sunshine. He is learning to sit for treats and meal time (the fosterspack all sit and wait for their food to be placed to eat ) TJ was very underweight when the fosters daughter rescued him but he has a heart appetite and with lots of love, consistent meals and peanut butter sandwiches the foster will have him at champ weight status in no time. TJ is neutered and fully vetted.

name: BENTLEY
description:
BENTLEY
Bentley is a sweet boy who is waiting for a new loving family. He is a pure bred German Shepherd boy, about 6-7 yrs old. . Bentley was used to being an outdoor boy but would love the chance to lovingly lay by your feet and be loved! His owners were unable to care for him any longer due to their age. He's a good boy, loving, friendly, good with other dogs and loving.

name: BROWNIE
description:
BROWNIE
Brownie is a sweet boy who is waiting for a new loving family. He is a Great Pyrenees and Golden Retriever mix boy, about 6-7 yrs old. . Brownie was used to being an outdoor boy but would love the chance to lovingly lay by your feet and be loved! His owners were unable to care for him any longer due to their age. He's a good boy, loving, friendly, good with other dogs and loving.

name: BOOTS
description:
BOOTS
Boots is a sweet boy who is waiting for a new loving family. He is a Great Pyrenees and Golden Retriever mix boy, about 6-7 yrs old. Boots was used to being an outdoor boy but would love the chance to lovingly lay by your feet and be loved! His owners were unable to care for him any longer due to their age. He's a good boy, loving, friendly, good with other dogs and loving.

name: Sadie
description: Sadie is a sweet and loving pit bull/hound mix who looks like she hasn't had a very good life so far. She's got some scars, she's underweight, and she looks like she's had babies in the past. She's ready to find her real forever home and family where she can have the life she deserves. She must be adopted into an area that doesn't have a. ban on her type of breed. If you're interested in Sadie or any of the other wonderful pitties we have, please come by and visit. 217 S. Redmond Road, Jacksonville, AR 72076 501 982 2916

name: Lilly
description: And another one! This is Lilly, and she's a pit mix who also looks like she's had babies in the past. She's a quiet and gentle girl who preferred to walk around the dog park today doing her own thing. She did love wallowing in the grass though and found several nice cool areas to roll in. She looks like a youngish adult, and she's quite a big girl--maybe 75lbs or so. I don't think she's missed many meals! She would love a home and family to call her own in an area that does not have BSL (Breed Specific Legislation). Come and visit Lilly and all the other great pitties we have. We're open Monday-Friday 8-5. 501 982 2916 217 S. Redmond Road, Jacksonville, AR

name: Dallas
description: Dallas is a super-sweet and friendly pit bull mix, one of many at our shelter who found themselves in the wrong city--one which doesn't allow their kind :(. He's a loving and affectionate boy who loves to run and play, and he looks like he may have a little chocolate Lab in his ancestry. He's a youngish adult. If you live in an area that doesn't have BSL (breed specific legislation) please come by the shelter and visit Dallas or one of the other great pitties we have (and we have a lot!) 217 South Redmond Road, Jacksonville, AR 72076 501 982 2916

name: Heidi
description: Heidi is a sweet-natured pit bull mix at the shelter waiting for her forever home. She's a gentle and affectionate girl who loves to play ball, and she seems to get along with the other dogs at the shelter. She passed by their kennels as we went to the dog park and there was no barking or growling--just sniffing and tail wagging. She looks like a youngish adult, and she would love a home in an area that doesn't have BSL (breed specific legislation). If you're interested in in Heidi or one of the other sweet pitties we have in our shelter, please come by and visit. 217 South Redmond Road, Jacksonville, AR 72076. 501 982 2916

name: Spot
description: This gorgeous boy is Spot, and he's one of the many pit/pit mixes we have in our shelter waiting for their forever homes. Unfortunately, Jacksonville has Breed Specific Legislation (BSL) which means that dogs who look like him are not welcome. That's a shame because he's an absolute sweetheart, and he's such a happy boy. He's a youngish adult and would make a great family member. If you live in an area that doesn't discriminate against Spot and his kind, please come and visit us Monday-Friday from 8-5pm 217 South Redmond Road, Jacksonville, AR 72076 501 982 2916

name: Angel
description: Look at the smile on this sweet girl's face! This is Angel, and she is one of the many pittie/ pit mixes we have available for adoption at our shelter. She's a friendly and sociable lady but wasn't interested in playing ball at all. It was hot in the park that day though. She looks like a youngish adult but has probably had pups in the past. If you live in an area that doesn't discriminate against Angel and her kind, please come and visit us Monday-Friday from 8-5pm 217 South Redmond Road, Jacksonville, AR 72076 501 982 2916

name: Coppertina
description:
If you can see this dog, she is AVAILABLE. We hide them from view once adopted.

Meet Coppertina. Sheâs a gorgeous shepherd/lab mix thatâs about 1 year old as of 2019. On 7/29/19 she weighed 46.5lbs. Sheâs being fostered in central Arkansas and hereâs what her foster mom has to say about her:

Coppertina aka âCopperâ is the sweetest girl. Sheâs pretty shy at first, but if you give her a little time she opens up and itâs so worth it! New things are scary to her, but weâre slowly trying to expose her to things and she gains more confidence every day. Copper craves attention and is very affectionate and loving. She loves to be pet, have her ears rubbed and loves a good belly rub. She does great with other dogs and had a kennel mate at the shelter. I have a dog that she has done great with so far. Sheâs a submissive dog, so sheâs really liked having my dog to show her the ropes. Copper sleeps through the night in her crate without a peep and so far has kept a clean crate. She eager to please and is working hard on all her training. Copper is the best girl and deserves the best home. Iâd keep her, but then I wouldnât be able to help another dog find their forever home!

She is heart worm positive, and has begun receiving treatment for it.

There is no set adoption fee for this dog. In lieu of an adoption fee we are asking for a donation to our shelter to help us care for these babies and keep them safe. We do not receive any funding so any donation is greatly appreciated



ADOPTION FEE AND HEALTH INFORMATION

Upon adoption, she will have received:  age appropriate vaccines (2 DHPP vaccine), (Bordetella vaccine), (Rabies vaccine if 12 weeks and older), up to date on flea/tick prevention and heartworm prevention, spay or neuter of pet, bi-weekly worming, microchip, fostering costs, and health certificate.


APPLY

Isn't she sweet? Wondering what's next?

You MUST fill out an application to adopt. Please copy and paste the Google form URL Below:

https://goo.gl/forms/YKPbHaym6keQA6772


Once you have submitted an application, we do our best to work efficiently to process them. That being said, we are all volunteers that handle adoptions on top of full time jobs, so at times processing can take up to two weeks. 



FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Q: Where is she located?
A: She is currently at our shelter in Arkansas. She must be adopted locally due to her heart worm status.


Q: I would like to set up a meet and greet!
A: Please fill out an application!  Once approved, we can set up a time where you can go meet her at the shelter.


Q: I have more questions!! Who do I contact?
A: Please e-mail adoptionshsdelta@gmail.com directly. We DO NOT answer adoption questions or inquiries on any other platform.


Q: I am under 21, will you adopt to me?
A: Unfortunately, we do not adopt to anyone under the age of 21.


Q: I would like to surprise my family with a dog! Can I do this?
A: Unfortunately, no. If there is more than one decision-maker in the home, all of them should be in agreement. 


Thank you for your understanding and consideration and for helping the dogs and puppies in need!

name: Cresley
description: This big, chunky girl is Cresley, and she's a returning customer who likes the shelter so much she thought she'd come back! As you can see, she hasn't missed many meals, but she still has lots of energy. She's a beautiful brindle shepherd mix and she's spayed so can go home right away. She's a friendly, sociable, and friendly girl!

name: Hank
description: Hank was abandoned at the shelter. He is a lanky 2 1/2 year old hound who can bay at the moon (or anything else). He is very laid back and gentle. He loads in a car easily and is easy to handle. He can be very vocal when he wants something like your attention. This great dog will be a terrific pet or hunting buddy. Please make an appointment to meet this deserving dog. Adoption Fee: $75 Contact Information for Adoptions: Ruth Ann Vowan- ravfcahs@gmail.com; Adoption Fee Includes spay/neuter, HW test (if of age), 5-way vaccine, rabies vaccine (if of age), bordatella, microchip, and basic deworming.

name: Trixie
description: This long-legged, long-tongued girl is Trixie, and she's a shepherd/Lab mix waiting for her forever home. She's a friendly and playful girl, and she likes to play ball. I thought she would get in the pool but at least she got her feet in and got a drink. She would love a home and family to call her own.

name: Rocket
description:
Rocket is an 8 month old Mixed Breed dog, weighing 33 pounds. He is healthy, heartworm negative, and has been neutered. He gets along well with most other dogs. He knows \"sit.\" He's smart and would do well with training. He's a sweet, happy, and friendly boy. He loves everybody. He's gentle and mild-mannered. Rocket can scale a cyclone fence and will need to go to a home with a privacy fence or to a large SAFE property where he can get the exercise he needs.
......................................If you would like further information please e-mail us directly at hss@cablelynx.com. The e-mail link Petfinder offers seldom works. Our shelter phone number is 501-268-3535.

name: Princess
description: Look at this big, beautiful girl! This is Princess (I think she may have come in with Penny but I'm not certain). She's a little on the shy side but she soon warmed up to me once we got out in the park. She had no idea what a ball was or what she was supposed to do with it, but she enjoyed herself anyway. She's listed as a Lab mix but I think I see a little Rottie in that big head. Come see her!

name: Penny
description: Penny is a big, beautiful chocolate Lab waiting at the shelter for her forever home. She's a sweet and friendly girl, but she does flinch when you make any sudden moves, and she will roll over on her back in a submissive mode. Once she knows you're not going to hurt her, she will let you rub her belly. She looks like a youngish adult. Come and meet sweet Penny.

name: Keegan
description: Keegan is a fat and sassy Lab mix who has been waiting at the shelter for a while. She's a friendly girl but not an overly affectionate dog. She's more an independent type who comes up for a quick pet then goes off to investigate the good smells in the park. She's a youngish adult and already spayed so she can go come right away :)
